analyzed: upasaṃhriyate ca ante saṃhartā ca svayam prabhuḥ

original: pṛthivyāpas tathā tejo vāyurākāśa eva ca /
analyzed: pṛthivī apaḥ tathā tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśaḥ eva ca
sarva indriya antaḥkaraṇam puruṣa ākhyam hi yat jagat
saḥ eva sarva bhūta ātmā viśva rūpaḥ yatas avyayaḥ
sarga ādikam tu tasya eva bhūta stham upakārakam

original: sa eva sṛjyaḥ sa ca sargakartā sa eva pātyatti ca pālyate ca /
analyzed: saḥ eva sṛjyaḥ sa ca sarga kartā saḥ eva pāti atti ca pālyate ca
brahma ādi avasthābhiḥ aśeṣa mūrtiḥ viṣṇuḥ variṣṭhaḥ vara daḥ vareṇyaḥ
iti śrī viṣṇupurāṇe prathame aṃśeṃ dvitīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca
nirguṇasya aprameyasya śuddhasya api amala ātmanaḥ
katham sarga ādi kartṛ tvam brahmaṇā abhyupagamyate
śrī parāśāraḥ uvāca
śaktayaḥ sarva bhāvānām acintya jñāna gocarāḥ
yatas atas brahmaṇaḥ tastu sarga ādyāḥ bhāva śaktayaḥ

original: bhavanti tapatāṃ śreṣṭha pāvakasya yathoṣṇatā // ViP_1,3.2 //
analyzed: bhavanti tapatām śreṣṭha pāvakasya yathā uṣṇa tā
tat nibodha yathā sarge bhagavān saṃpravartate
nārāyaṇa ākhyaḥ bhagavān brahmā lokapitāmā ahar
utpannaḥ procyate vidvan nityam eva upacārataḥ
nijena tasya mānena āyuḥ varṣa śatam smṛtam
tad para ākhyam tad arddha ca parārdham abhidhiyate
kāla svarūpam viṣṇoḥ ca yat mayā uktam tava anagha

original: tena tasya nibodhe tvaṃ parimāṇopapādanam // ViP_1,3.6 //
analyzed: tena tasya nibodhe tvam parimāṇa upapādanam

original: anyeṣāṃ caiva jantūnāṃ carāṇāmacarāś ca ye /
analyzed: anyeṣām ca eva jantūnām carāṇām acarāḥ ca ye
bhū bhūbhṛt sāgara ādīnām aśeṣāṇām ca sattama
kāṣṭhā pañcadaśa ākhyātāḥ nimeṣāḥ muni sattama
tāvat saṃkhyaiḥ ahorātram muhūrtaiḥ mānuṣam smṛtam
ahorātrāṇi tāvanti māsaḥ pakṣa dvaya ātmakaḥ

original: taiḥ ṣaḍbhir ayanaṃ varṣaṃ dve 'yane dakṣiṇottare /
analyzed: taiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ayanam varṣam dve ayane dakṣiṇa uttare
ayanam dakṣiṇam rātriḥ devānām uttaram dinam

original: caturyugaṃ dvādaśabhis tadvibhāgaṃ niboda me // ViP_1,3.11 //
analyzed: caturyugam dvādaśabhiḥ tad vibhāgam niboda me
catvāri trīṇi dve ca ekam kṛta ādiṣu yathākramam
sahasrāṇi yuga uṣu āhuḥ purāvidaḥ

original: sandhyāṃśaścaiva tattulyo yugasyānantaro hi saḥ // ViP_1,3.13 //
analyzed: sandhyāṃśaḥ ca eva tad tulyaḥ yugasya anantaraḥ hi saḥ

original: yugākhyaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ kṛtatretādisaṃjñitaḥ // ViP_1,3.14 //
analyzed: yuga ākhyaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ kṛta tretā ādi saṃjñitaḥ

original: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaś ca kaliścaiva caturyugam /
analyzed: kṛtam tretā dvāparaḥ ca kaliḥ ca eva caturyugam

original: procyate tatsahasraṃ va brahmaṇāṃ divasaṃ mune // ViP_1,3.15 //
analyzed: procyate tat sahasram brahmaṇām divasam mune

original: bhavanti pariṇāmaṃ ca teṣāṃ kālakṛtaṃ śṛṇu // ViP_1,3.16 //
analyzed: bhavanti pariṇāmam ca teṣām kāla kṛtam śṛṇu

original: ekakāle hi sṛjyante saṃhniyante ca pūrvavat // ViP_1,3.17 //
analyzed: eka kāle hi sṛjyante saṃhniyante ca pūrvavat

original: manvantaraṃ manoḥ kālaḥ surādīnāṃ ca sattama // ViP_1,3.18 //
analyzed: manvantaram manoḥ kālaḥ sura ādīnām ca sattama

original: aṣṭau śata sahasrāṇi divyayā saṃkhyayā smṛtam /
analyzed: aṣṭau śata sahasrāṇi divyayā saṃkhyayā smṛtam
dvipañcāśat tathā anyāni sahasrāṇi adhikāni tu
triṃśat koṭyaḥ tu saṃpūrṇāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ saṃkhyayā dvija
saptaṣaṣṭiḥ tathā anyāni niyutāni mahā mune
viṃśatiḥ tu sahasrāṇi kālaḥ yam adhikam vinā

original: manvantarasya saṃkhyeyaṃ mānuṣair vatsarair dvija // ViP_1,3.21 //
analyzed: manvantarasya saṃkhyā iyam mānuṣaiḥ vatsaraiḥ dvija

original: brahmo naimittiko nāma tasyānte pratisañcaraḥ // ViP_1,3.22 //
analyzed: brahmaḥ naimittikaḥ nāma tasya ante pratisañcaraḥ

original: tadā hi dahyate sarva trailokyaṃ bhūrbhuvādikam /
analyzed: tadā hi dahyate trailokyam bhūrbhuva ādikam
janam prayānti tāpa ārtāḥ mahar loka nivāsinaḥ
ekārṇave tu traitokye brahmā nārāyaṇa ātmakaḥ
bhogi śayyām gataḥ śete trailokya grāsa bṛṃhitaḥ
jana sthaiḥ yogibhiḥ devaḥ cityamāna ubja sambhavaḥ

original: tatpramāṇāṃ hi tāṃrātriṃ tadante sṛjate punaḥ // ViP_1,3.25 //
analyzed: tad pramāṇām hi tām rātrim tad ante sṛjate punar

original: evaṃ tu brahmaṇo varṣamevaṃ varṣaśataṃ ca yat /

original: śataṃ hiṃ tasya varṣāṇāṃ paramāyurmahātmanaḥ // ViP_1,3.26 //
analyzed: śatam him tasya varṣāṇām parama āyuḥ mahātmanaḥ
ekam asya vyatītam tu parārdham brahmaṇaḥ anagha

original: vārāha iti kalpoyaḥ prathamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // ViP_1,3.28 //
analyzed: vārāhaḥ iti kalpaḥ ūyaḥ prathamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
iti śrī viṣṇupurāṇe prathame aṃśe tṛtīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī maitreyaḥ uvāca
brahma nārāyaṇa ākhyaḥ kalpa ādau bhagavān yathā
sasarja sarva bhūtāni tat ācakṣva mahā mune
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
prajāḥ sasarja bhagavān brahmā nārāyaṇa ātmakaḥ
prajāpati patiḥ devaḥ yathā tat me niśāmaya
atīta kalpa avasāne niśā supta utthitaḥ prabhuḥ

original: sattvodriktas tathā brahmā śūnyaṃ lokamavaikṣata // ViP_1,4.3 //
analyzed: sattva udriktaḥ tathā brahmā śūnyam lokam avaikṣata
nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ acintyaḥ pareṣām api sa prabhuḥ
imam ca udāharanti atra ślokam nārāyaṇam prati
brahma svarūpiṇam devam jagataḥ prabhava apyayam

original: āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ /
analyzed: āpaḥ nārāḥ iti proktāḥ āpaḥ vai nara sūnavaḥ

original: ayanaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // ViP_1,4.6 //
analyzed: ayanam tasya tāḥ pūrvam tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
toya antar sthām mahīm jñātvā jagati ekārṇavīkṛte
anumānāt tad uddhāram kartu kāmaḥ prajāpatiḥ
akarot sva tanūm anyām kalpa ādiṣu yathā purā
satsya kūrma ādikām tadvat vārāham

original: sthitaḥ sthirātmā sarvātmā paramātmā prajāpatiḥ // ViP_1,4.9 //

jana loka gataiḥ siddhaiḥ sanaka ādyaiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ

original: tuṣṭāva praṇatā bhūtvā bhaktinamrā vasundharā // ViP_1,4.11 //
analyzed: tuṣṭāva praṇatā bhūtvā bhakti namrā vasundharā
śrī pṛthivī uvāca
namaḥ te puṇḍarīkākṣa śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara

tvayā aham uddhṛtā pūrvam tvad mayā aham janārdana

original: tvaṃ kartā sarvabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ pātā tvaṃ vināśakṛt /

sarga ādiṣu prabho brahma viṣṇu rudra ātma rūpadhṛk

original: bhavato yatparaṃ tattvaṃ tanna jānāti kaścana /

original: tvāmārādhya paraṃ brahma yātā muktiṃ mumukṣavaḥ /

original: rasātalādutpalapatrasannibhaḥ samutthito nīla ivācalo mahān // ViP_1,4.26 //

original: śvasānilāstājha paritaḥ prayānti siddhā jane ye niyatā vasanti // ViP_1,4.28 //

original: ta tuṣṭuvustoṣaparītacetaso loke jane ye nivasanti yoginaḥ /

original: pādeṣu dedāstava yūpadaṃṣṭrā danteṣu jajñāścitayaś ca vaktre /
analyzed: pādeṣu dedāḥ tava yūpa daṃṣṭrā danteṣu jajñāḥ citayaḥ ca vaktre

original: hutāśajihvosi tanuruhāṇi darbhāḥ prabho yajñapumāṃstvameva // ViP_1,4.32 //
analyzed: hutāśa jihvā usi tanuruhāṇi darbhāḥ prabho yajña pumān tvam eva

original: sūktānyaśeṣāṇi saṭākalāpo ghrāṇaṃ samastāni havīṃṣi deva // ViP_1,4.33 //
analyzed: sūktāni aśeṣāṇi saṭā kalāpaḥ ghrāṇam samastāni havīṃṣi deva

pūrta iṣṭa dharma śravaṇaḥ asi deva sanātana ātman bhagavan prasīda

original: viśvasya vidmaḥ parameśvaro'si prasīda nāthosi parāvarasta // ViP_1,4.35 //
analyzed: viśvasya vidmaḥ parama īśvaraḥ asi prasīda nāthaḥ asi

original: vyāptaṃ jagavdyāptisamarthadīpte hitāya viśvasya vibho bhava tvam // ViP_1,4.37 //
analyzed: vyāptam jagat dyāpti samartha dīpte hitāya viśvasya vibho bhava tvam
paramārthaḥ tvam eva ekaḥ na anyaḥ asti jagataḥ pate
tava eṣa mahimā yena vyāptam etat carācaram
yat etat dṛśyate mūrtam etat jñāna ātmanaḥ tava
bhrānti jñānena paśyanti jagat rūpam ayoginaḥ
jñāna svarūpam akhilam jagat etat abuddhayaḥ
artha svarūpam paśyantaḥ bhrāmyante moha saṃplave
ye tu jñāna vidaḥ suddha cetasaḥ te akhilam jagat
jñāna ātmakam prapaśyanti tvad rūpam parameśvara
prasīda sarva sarva ātman bhavāya jagatām imām
uddhara urvi imameya ātman channaḥ dehi abja locana
sattva udriktaḥ asi bhagavan govinda pṛthivīm imām
samuddhara bhavāya īśa śan naḥ dehi abja locana
sarga pravṛttiḥ bhavataḥ jagatām upakāriṇi
bhavatu eṣā namaḥ te astu śat naḥ dehi abja locana
śrī pāraśaraḥ uvāca
evam saṃstūyamānaḥ tu paramātmā mahīdharaḥ

original: ujjahāra kṣitiṃ kṣipraṃ nyastavāṃś ca mahāmbhasi // ViP_1,4.45 //
analyzed: ujjahāra kṣitim kṣipram nyastavān ca mahā ambhasi

original: vitatattvāttu dehasya na mahī yāti saṃplāvam // ViP_1,4.46 //
analyzed: vitata tvāt tu dehasya na mahī yāti saṃplāvam

original: tataḥ kṣitiṃ samāṃ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ socinodgirīn /
analyzed: tatas kṣitim samām kṛtvā pṛthivyām saḥ ucinot girīn
yathāvibhāgam bhagavān anādiḥ parameśvaraḥ

amoghena prabhāveṇa sasarja a mogha vāñchitaḥ
bhū vibhāgam tatas kṛtvā sapta dvīpān yathātatham
bhūḥ ādyān caturaḥ lokān pūrvavat samakalpayat
brahma rūpa dharaḥ devaḥ tatas asau rajasā vṛtaḥ
cakāra sṛṣṭim bhagavān catur vakra dharaḥ hariḥ
nimitta mātram eva asau sṛjyānām sarga karmaṇi
pradhāna kāraṇībhūtāḥ yatas vai sṛjya śaktayaḥ

original: nīyate tapatāṃ śreṣṭa svaśaktyā vastu vastutām // ViP_1,4.52 //
analyzed: nīyate tapatām śreṣṭa sva śaktyā vastu vastu tām
iti śrī viṣṇupurāṇe prathame aṃśe pṛthivyuddhāraḥ caturthaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī maitreyaḥ uvāca
yathā sasarja devaḥ asau deva ṛṣi pitṛ dāna vān
manuṣya tiryak vṛkṣa ādīn bhū vyoma salila okasaḥ

original: yadguṇaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ ca yadrūpaṃ ca jagaddvija /
analyzed: yad guṇam yad svabhāvam ca yad rūpam ca jagat dvija
sarga ādau sṛṣṭavān brahmā tat mama ācakṣva kṛtstraśas
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
maitreya kathayāmi etat śṛṣuṣva su samāhitaḥ
yathā sasarja devaḥ asau deva ādīn akhilān vibhuḥ

original: sṛṣṭiṃ cintaya tastasya kalpādiṣu yathā purā /
analyzed: sṛṣṭim cintaya tasya tasya kalpa ādiṣu yathā purā
a buddhi pūrvakaḥ sargaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ tamaḥ mayaḥ
tamomohaḥ mahāmohaḥ tāmistraḥ hi andha saṃjñitaḥ
avidya pañca parvā eṣā prāguḥ bhūtā mahātmanaḥ
pañcadhā avasthitaḥ sargaḥ pratibodhavān
bahis antar aprakāśaḥ ca saṃvṛta ātmā naga ātmakaḥ

original: mukhyā nagā yataḥ proktā mukhyasargastatastvayam // ViP_1,5.7 //
analyzed: mukhyāḥ nagāḥ yatas proktāḥ mukhya sargaḥ tatas tu ayam
tam dṛṣvā sādhakam sargam amanyat aparam punar
tasya abhidhyāyataḥ sargaḥ tiryak strotaḥ bhyavartata
yasmāt tiryak pravṛttisya tiryakstrotāḥ tatas smṛtaḥ
paśu ādayaḥ te vikhyātāḥ stamaḥ prāyāḥ hi avedinaḥ
utpatha grāhiṇaḥ ca eva te ajñāne jñāna māninaḥ
ahaṅkṛtāḥ ahaṃmānāḥ aṣṭāviṃśat vadha ātmakāḥ

original: ataḥ prakāśāste sarve āvṛtāś ca parasparam // ViP_1,5.11 //
analyzed: atas prakāśāḥ te sarve āvṛtāḥ ca parasparam
tam api asādhakam matvā dhyāyataḥ nyaḥ tatas abhavat
ūrdhvaḥ tretāḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu sāttvika ūrdhvam avartata
te sukha prīti bahulāḥ bahis antar ca na āvṛtāḥ

original: prakāśā bahirantaś ca ūrdhvastrotodbhavāḥ smṛtāḥ // ViP_1,5.13 //
analyzed: prakāśāḥ bahis antar ca ūrdhva strotā udbhavāḥ smṛtāḥ
tuṣṭa ātmānaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu deva sargaḥ tu sa smṛtaḥ
tasmin sarge bhavat prītiḥ niṣpanne brahmaṇaḥ ta dā

original: tatonyaṃ sa tadā dadhyau sādhakaṃ sargamuttamam /
analyzed: tatonyam sa tadā dadhyau sādhakam sargam uttamam
asādhakān tu tān jñātvāḥ mukhya sarga ādi sambhavān
tathā abhidhyāyataḥ tasya satya abhidhyāyinaḥ tatas
prādurbabhūva ca avyaktāt arvāḥ tretāḥ tu sādhakaḥ
yasmāt arvāk vyavartanta tatas urvāc strotasaḥ tu te
te ca prakāśa bahulāḥ tama udriktāḥ rajaḥ adhikāḥ
tasmāt te duḥkha bahulāḥ bhūyas bhūyas ca kāriṇaḥ

original: prakāśā bahirantaś ca manuṣyāḥ sādhakāstu te // ViP_1,5.18 //
analyzed: prakāśāḥ bahis antar ca manuṣyāḥ sādhakāḥ tu te
iti ete kathitāḥ sargāḥ ṣaṭ atra muni sattama

original: prathamo mahataḥ sargo vijñeyo brahmaṇastu saḥ // ViP_1,5.19 //
analyzed: prathamaḥ mahataḥ sargaḥ vijñeyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tu saḥ

original: tanmātrāṇāṃ dvitīyaś ca bhūtasargo hi sa smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tanmātrāṇām dvitīyaḥ ca bhūta sargaḥ hi sa smṛtaḥ
vaikārikaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu sargaḥ endriyakaḥ smataḥ
iti eṣa prākṛtaḥ sargaḥ sambhūtaḥ buddhi pūrvakaḥ

original: mukhyasargaścaturthastu mukhyā vai sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ // ViP_1,5.21 //
analyzed: mukhya sargaḥ caturthaḥ tu mukhyāḥ vai sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: tiryakstrotāstu yaḥ proktas tairyagyonyaḥ sa ucyate /
analyzed: tiryakstrotāḥ tu yaḥ proktaḥ tairyagyonyaḥ saḥ ucyate
tad ūrdhvaḥ trotasām ṣaṣṭhaḥ deva sargaḥ tu saṃsmṛtaḥ

original: tator'vākstrotasāṃ sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mānuṣaḥ // ViP_1,5.23 //
analyzed: tatas avākstrotasām sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mānuṣaḥ
aṣṭamaḥ anugrahaḥ sargaḥ sāttvikaḥ tāmasaḥ ca saḥ

original: pañcaite vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāstu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ // ViP_1,5.24 //
analyzed: pañca ete vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāḥ tu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ
prākṛtaḥ vaikṛtaḥ ca eva kaumāraḥ navamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ityete vai samākhyātā nava sargāḥ prajāpateḥ // ViP_1,5.25 //
analyzed: iti ete vai samākhyātāḥ nava sargāḥ prajāpateḥ
prākṛtāḥ vaikṛtāḥ ca eva jagataḥ mūla hetavaḥ
sṛjataḥ jagadīśasya kim anyat śrotum icchasi
śrī maitreyaḥ uvāca
saṃkṣepāt kathitaḥ sarge deva ādīnām mune tvayā
vistarāt śrotum icchami tvattaḥ muni vara uttama
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: karmabhir bhāvitāḥ pūrvaiḥ kuśalāḥ kuśalais tu tāḥ /
analyzed: karmabhiḥ bhāvitāḥ pūrvaiḥ kuśalāḥ kuśalaiḥ tu tāḥ

original: khyātyā tayā hyanirmuktāḥ saṃhāre hyupasaṃhṛtāḥ // ViP_1,5.28 //
analyzed: khyātyā tayā hi anirmuktāḥ saṃhāre hi upasaṃhṛtāḥ
sthāvara antāḥ sura ādyāḥ tu prajāḥ brahmaḥ caturvidhāḥ

original: brahmaṇaḥ kurvataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ jajñire mānasāstu tāḥ // ViP_1,5.29 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ kurvataḥ sṛṣṭim jajñire mānasāḥ tu tāḥ
tatas deva asura pitṝn manuṣyān ca catuṣṭayam
sisṛkṣuḥ ambhāṃsi etāni svam ātmānam ayūyujat
yukta ātmanaḥ tamaḥ mātrā hi udriktā abhūt prajāpateḥ
sisṛkṣoḥ jaghanāt pūrvam asurāḥ jajñire tatas
utsasarja tatas tām tu tamaḥ mātra ātmikām tanum

original: sā tu vyaktā tanustena maitreyābhūdvibhāvarī // ViP_1,5.32 //
analyzed: sā tu vyaktā tanuḥ tena maitreya abhūt vibhāvarī
sisṛkṣuḥ anya deha sthaḥ prītim āpa tatas surāḥ

original: sattvodriktāḥ samudbhutā mukhato brahmaṇo dvijaḥ // ViP_1,5.33 //
analyzed: sattva udriktāḥ samudbhutāḥ mukhataḥ brahmaṇaḥ dvijaḥ
tyaktā sā api tanuḥ tena sattva prāyam abhūt dinam

original: tato hi balino rātrāvasurā devatā divā // ViP_1,5.34 //
analyzed: tatas hi balinaḥ rātrau asurāḥ devatāḥ divā
sattva mātra ātmikām eva tatas nyām jagṛhe tanum
pitṛ vat manyamānasya pitaraḥ tasya jajñire

original: utsasarja tatastāṃ tu pitṝnsṛṣṭvāpi sa prabhuḥ /
analyzed: utsasarja tatas tām tu pitṝn sṛṣṭvā api sa prabhuḥ
sā ca utsṛṣṭā abhavat saṃdhyā nakta antara sthitā
rajaḥ mātra ātmikām anyām jagṛhe sa tanum tatas
rajaḥ mātra utkaṭāḥ jātāḥ manuṣyāḥ dvijasattama

original: tāmapyāśu sa tatyāja tanuṃ sadyaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: tām api āśu sa tatyāja tanum sadyas prajāpatiḥ
jyotstrā samabhavat sā api prāksandhyā yā abhidhīyate

original: jyotstrāgame tu balino manuṣyāḥ pitaras tathā /
analyzed: jyotstrā āgame tu balinaḥ manuṣyāḥ pitaraḥ tathā

original: maitreya saṃdhyāsamaye tasmādete bhavanti vai // ViP_1,5.39 //
analyzed: maitreya saṃdhyā samaye tasmāt ete bhavanti vai

original: jyotsnā rātryahani saṃdhyā catvāryatāni vai prabhoḥ /
analyzed: jyotsnā rātri ahani saṃdhyā catvāri atāni vai prabhoḥ
brahmaṇaḥ tu śarīrāṇi triguṇa upāśrayāṇi tu
rajaḥ mātra ātmikām eva tatas nyām jagṛhe tanum

original: tataḥ kṣudbrahmaṇo jātā jajñe kāmastayā tataḥ // ViP_1,5.41 //
analyzed: tatas kṣudh brahmaṇaḥ jātā jajñe kāmaḥ tayā tatas
kṣudh kṣāmān andhakārān itha saḥ usṛjat bhagavān tatas

original: vurūpāḥ śmaśrulā jātāstebhyadhāvaṃ stataḥ prabhum // ViP_1,5.42 //
analyzed: vurūpāḥ śmaśrulāḥ jātāḥ tebhyadhāvam statas prabhum

original: maivaṃ bho rakṣyatāmeṣa yair uktaṃ rākṣasāstu te /
analyzed: mā evam bho rakṣyatām eṣa yaiḥ uktam rākṣasāḥ tu te

original: ūcuḥ khādāma ityanye ye te yakṣāstu jakṣaṇāt // ViP_1,5.43 //
analyzed: ūcuḥ khādāmaḥ iti anye ye te yakṣāḥ tu jakṣaṇāt
apriyeṇa tu tān dṛṣṭvā keśāḥ śīryanta vedhasaḥ

original: hīnāś ca śiraso bhūyaḥ samārohanta tacchiraḥ // ViP_1,5.44 //
analyzed: hīnāḥ ca śirasaḥ bhūyas samārohanta tat śiraḥ
sarpaṇāt te abhavan sarpāḥ hīna tvāt ahayaḥ smṛtāḥ
tatas kruddhaḥ jagatstraṣṭā krodha ātmānaḥ vinirmame
varṇena kapiśena ugra bhūtāḥ te piśitāśanāḥ
dhyāyataḥ uṅgāt samutpannāḥ gandharvāḥ tasya tad kṣaṇāt

original: pibanto jajñire vācaṃ gandharvāstena te dvija // ViP_1,5.46 //
analyzed: pibantaḥ jajñire vācam gandharvāḥ tena te dvija
etāni sṛṣṭvā bhagavān brahma tad śakti coditaḥ
tatas sva chandataḥ anyāni vayāṃsi vayasaḥ asṛjat
apayaḥ vakṣasaḥ cakre mukhatojāḥ sa sṛṣṛvān

original: sṛśṛvānudarādgāś ca pārśvabhyāṃ ca prajāpatiḥ // ViP_1,5.48 //
analyzed: ca pārśvabhyām ca prajāpatiḥ
padbhyām ca aśvān sa mātaṅgān rāsabhān gavayān mṛgān
uṣṭrān aśvatarān ca eva nyaṅkūn anyāḥ ca jātayaḥ
oṣadhyaḥ phala mūlinyaḥ romabhyaḥ tasya jatrire
tretā yuga mukhe brahmā kalpasya ādau dvijottama
sṛṣṭvā apaḥ ca oṣadhīḥ samyak yuyojasa tadā adhvare
gauḥ ajaḥ puruṣaḥ meṣaḥ ca aśva aśvatara gardabhāḥ
etān grāmyān paśūn āhuḥ āraṇyān ca nibodha me
śvāpadāḥ dvi khurāḥ hastī vānarāḥ pakṣi pañcamāḥ

original: audakāḥ paśavaḥ ṣaṣṭhā saptamāstu sarīsṛpāḥ // ViP_1,5.52 //
analyzed: audakāḥ paśavaḥ ṣaṣṭhā saptamāḥ tu sarīsṛpāḥ
gāyatram ca ṛcaḥ ca eva trivṛt somam rathantaram

original: agniṣṭomaṃ ca yajñānāṃ nirmame prathamānmukhāt // ViP_1,5.53 //
analyzed: agniṣṭomam ca yajñānām nirmame prathamān mukhāt

original: yajūṃṣi traiṣṭubhaṃ chandaḥ stomaṃ pañcadaśaṃ tathā /
analyzed: yajūṃṣi traiṣṭubham chandaḥ stomam pañcadaśam tathā

original: bṛhatsāma tathokthaṃ ca dakṣiṇādasṛjanmu khāt // ViP_1,5.54 //
analyzed: bṛhatsāma tathā uktham ca dakṣiṇāt asṛjat mu khāt
sāmāni jagatī chandaḥ stomam saptadaśam tathā
vairūpam atirātram ca paścimāt asṛjat mukhāt
ekaviṃśam atharvāṇam āptoryāmāṇam eva ca
anuṣṭubham ca vairājam uttarāt asṛjat mukhāt
uccāvacāni bhūtāni gātrebhyaḥ tasya jajñire

original: devāsurapitṝn sṛṣṭvā manuṣyāṃś ca prajāpatiḥ // ViP_1,5.57 //
analyzed: deva asura pitṝn sṛṣṭvā manuṣyān ca prajāpatiḥ
tatas punar sasarja ādau saṃkalpasya pitāmahaḥ
yakṣān piśācān gandharvān tathā eva apsarasām gaṇān
nara kinnara rakṣāṃsi vayaḥ paśu mṛga uragān

original: avyayaṃ ca vyayaṃ caiva yadidaṃ sthāṇujaṅgamam // ViP_1,5.59 //
analyzed: avyayam ca vyayam ca eva yat idam sthāṇu jaṅgamam
tat sasarja tadā brahma bhagavān ādi kṛt prabhuḥ

original: teṣāṃ ye yāni karmāṇi praksṛṣṭyāṃ pratipedire /
analyzed: teṣām ye yāni karmāṇi praksṛṣṭyām pratipedire

original: tānyeva te prapadyante sṛjyamānāḥ punaḥpunaḥ // ViP_1,5.60 //
analyzed: tāni eva te prapadyante sṛjyamānāḥ punar punar
histra a hiṃstre mṛdu krūre dharma dharma āvṛta anṛte
tad bhāvitāḥ prapadyante tasmāt tat tasya rocate

original: indriyārtheṣu bhūteṣu śarīreṣu ca sa prabhuḥ /
analyzed: indriyārtheṣu bhūteṣu śarīreṣu ca sa prabhuḥ

original: nānātvaṃ viniyogaṃ ca dhātaivaṃ vyasṛjatsvayam // ViP_1,5.62 //
analyzed: nānātvam viniyogam ca dhātā evam vyasṛjat svayam

original: nāma rūpaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ kṛtyānāṃ ca prapañcanam /
analyzed: nāma rūpam ca bhūtānām kṛtyānām ca prapañcanam

original: vedaśabdebhya evādau devādīnāṃ cakāra saḥ // ViP_1,5.63 //
analyzed: veda śabdebhyaḥ eva ādau deva ādīnām cakāra saḥ
ṛṣīṇām nāmadheyāni yathā veda śrutāni vai
tathā niyoga yogyāni hi anyeṣām api saḥ akarot
yathā ṛtuṣu ṛtu liṅgāni nānā rūpāṇi pari ye

original: dṛsyante tāni tānyeva tathā bhāvā yugādiṣu // ViP_1,5.65 //
analyzed: tāni tāni eva tathā bhāvāḥ yuga ādiṣu

original: karotyevaṃvidhāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kalpādau sa punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: karoti evaṃvidhām sṛṣṭim kalpa ādau sa punar punar
sisṛkṣā śakti yuktaḥ asau sṛjya śakti pracoditaḥ
iti śrī viṣṇupurāṇe prathame aṃśe pañcamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī maitreyaḥ uvāca
arvākstrotāḥ tu kathitaḥ bhavatā yaḥ tu mānuṣaḥ
brahman vistarataḥ brūhi brahma tam asṛjat yathā

original: yathā ca varṇānasṛjadyadguṇāṃ ś ca prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: yathā ca varṇān asṛjat yad guṇān ca prajāpatiḥ

original: yacca teṣāṃ smṛtaṃ karma viprādīnāṃ taducyatām // ViP_1,6.2 //
analyzed: yat ca teṣām smṛtam karma vipra ādīnām tat ucyatām
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
satya abhidhyāyinaḥ pūrvam sisṛkṣeḥ brahmaṇaḥ jagat
ajāyanta dvijaśreṣṭha sattva udriktāḥ mukhāt prajāḥ
vakṣamaḥ rajasā udriktāḥ tathā vai brahmaṇaḥ abhavan
rajasā tamasā ca eva samudriktāḥ tathā ūrutaḥ
padbhyām anyāḥ prajāḥ brahmā sasarja dvijasattama
tamaḥ pradhānāḥ tāḥ sarvaḥ cāturvarṇyam idam tatas

original: brahmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā veśyāḥ śūdrāś ca dvijasattama /
analyzed: brahmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ veśyāḥ śūdrāḥ ca dvijasattama
pāda ūru vakṣa sthalataḥ mukhataḥ ca samudgatāḥ
yajña niṣpattaye sarvam etat brahyā cakāra vai
cāturvarṇyam mahābhāga yajña sādhanam uttamam

original: yajñair āpyāyitā devā vṛṣṭyutsargeṇa vai prajāḥ /
analyzed: yajñaiḥ āpyāyitāḥ devāḥ vṛṣṭi utsargeṇa vai prajāḥ
āpyāyayante dharma jña yajñāḥ kalyāṇa hetavaḥ

original: niṣpādyante narais tais tu svadharmābhirataiḥ sadā /
analyzed: niṣpādyante naraiḥ taiḥ tu svadharma abhirataiḥ sadā
viśuddha ācaraṇa epetaiḥ sadbhiḥ sat mārga gāmibhiḥ
svarga apavargau mānuṣyāt prāpnuvanti narāḥ mune

original: yaccābhir ucitaṃ sthānaṃ tadyānti manujā dvija // ViP_1,6.10 //
analyzed: yat ca ābhiḥ ucitam sthānam tat yānti manujāḥ dvija
prajāḥ tāḥ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭāḥ cāturvarṇya vyavasthi tāḥ
samyak śraddhāḥ samācāra pravaṇāḥ muni sattama
yathā icchā vāsa niratāḥ sarva bādhā vivarjitāḥ

original: śuddhāntaḥ karaṇāḥ śuddhāḥ karmānuṣṭhā nanirmalāḥ // ViP_1,6.12 //
analyzed: śuddha antar karaṇāḥ śuddhāḥ karma anuṣṭhā na nirmalāḥ

original: śuddhe ca tāsāṃ manasi śuddhentaḥsaṃsthite harau /
analyzed: śuddhe ca tāsām manasi śuddha intar saṃsthite harau

original: suddhajñānaṃ prapaśyanti bilvākhyaṃ yena tatpadam // ViP_1,6.13 //
analyzed: suddha jñānam prapaśyanti bilva ākhyam yena tat padam

original: tataḥ kālātma ko yo 'sau sa cāṃśaḥ kathito hareḥ /
analyzed: tatas kāla ātma kaḥ yaḥ asau sa ca aṃśaḥ kathitaḥ hareḥ

original: sa pātayatyaghaṃ ghoram alpam alpālpasāravat // ViP_1,6.14 //
analyzed: sa pātayati agham ghoram alpam alpa alpa sāravat
adharma bījam udbhutam tamaḥ lobha samudbhavam
prajāsu tāsu maitreya rāga ādikam asādhakam

original: tataḥ sā sahajā siddhastāsāṃ nātīva jāyate /
analyzed: tatas sā sahajā siddhaḥ tāsām na atīva jāyate
rasa ullāsa ādayaḥ ca anyāḥ siddha yoṣṭau bhavanti yāḥ
tāsu kṣīṇāsu aśeṣāsu vardhamāne ca pātake
dvandva abhibhava duḥkha ārtāḥ tāḥ bhavanti tatas prajāḥ
tatas durgāṇi tāḥ cakruḥ dhānvam pārvatam audakam

original: kṛtrimaṃ ca tathā durgaṃ purakharvaṭakādikam // ViP_1,6.18 //
analyzed: kṛtrimam ca tathā durgam pura kharvaṭaka ādikam

original: gṛhīṇi ca yathānyāyaṃ teṣu cakuḥ purādiṣu /
analyzed: gṛhīṇi ca yathānyāyam teṣu cakuḥ pura ādiṣu
śīta ātapa ādi bādhānām praśamāya mahāmate
pratīkāram imam katvā śīta ādeḥ tāḥ prajāḥ punar
vārttā upāyam tatas cakruḥ hasta siddhim ca karma jām
vrīhayaḥ ca yavāḥ ca eva godhūmāḥ caṇavaḥ tilāḥ

original: priyaṅgavo hyudā rāś ca koradūṣāḥ satīnakāḥ // ViP_1,6.21 //
analyzed: priyaṅgavaḥ rāḥ ca koradūṣāḥ satīnakāḥ

original: māṣā mudgā masūrāś ca niṣpāvāḥ sakulātthakāḥ /
analyzed: māṣāḥ mudgāḥ masūrāḥ ca niṣpāvāḥ sa kulātthakāḥ
āḍhakyaḥ caṇakāḥ ca eva śaṇāḥ saptadaśa smṛtāḥ

original: ityetā oṣadhīnāṃ tu grāmyānāṃ jātayo mune /
analyzed: iti etāḥ oṣadhīnām tu grāmyānām jātayaḥ mune
oṣadhyaḥ yajñiyāḥ ca eva grāmya āraṇyāḥ caturdaśa
vrīhayaḥ sa yavāḥ māṣāḥ godhūmāḥ ca aṇavaḥ stilāḥ
priyaṅgu saptamāḥ hi ete aṣṭamāḥ tu kulatthakāḥ
śyāmākāḥ tu atha nīvārāḥ jartilāḥ sa gavedhukāḥ

original: tathā veṇuyavāḥ proktas tathā markaṭakā mune // ViP_1,6.25 //
analyzed: tathā veṇuyavāḥ proktaḥ tathā markaṭakāḥ mune
grāmya āraṇyāḥ smṛtāḥ hi etāḥ oṣadhyaḥ tu caturdaśa
yajña niṣpattaye yajñaḥ tathā āsām hetuḥ uttamaḥ

original: etāś ca saha yajñena prajānāṃ kāraṇaṃ param /
analyzed: etāḥ ca saha yajñena prajānām kāraṇam param
parāvara vidaḥ prājñāḥ tatas yajñān vitanveta
ahani ahani anuṣṭhānam yajñānām muni sattama
upakāra karam puṃsām kriyamāṇā gha śānti dam
yeṣām tu kāla sṛṣaḥ asau pāpa banduḥ mahā mune

original: cetaḥsu vavṛdhe cakruste na yajñeṣu mānasam // ViP_1,6.29 //
analyzed: cetaḥsu vavṛdhe cakruḥ te na yajñeṣu mānasam

original: vedavādāṃs tathā vedānyajña karmādikaṃ ca yat /

original: saṃsiddhāyāṃ tu vārtāyāṃ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: saṃsiddhāyām tu vārtāyām prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā prajāpatiḥ
saryādām sthāpayāmāsa yathāsthānam yathāguṇam
varṇāḥ nāma āśramāṇām ca dharma dharma bhṛtām vara
lokān ca sarva varṇānām samyak dharma anupālinām
prajāpatyam smṛtam sthānam kriyāvatām
sthānam aindram kṣatriyāṇām saṃgrameṣu a nivartatām
vaiśyānām mārutam sthānam svadharmam anuvartinām

original: smṛtaṃ teṣāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ tadeva guruvāsinām // ViP_1,6.36 //

original: saptarṣiṇāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ smṛtaṃ tadvai vanaukasām /
analyzed: saptarṣiṇām tu yat sthānam smṛtam tat vai vanaukasām
prājāpatyam gṛhasthānām nyāsinām brahma saṃjñitam

original: ekāntinaḥ sadā brahmadhyāyino yoginaś ca ye /
analyzed: ekāntinaḥ sadā brahma dhyāyinaḥ yoginaḥ ca ye

analyzed: teṣām tu paramam sthānam yat tat paśyanti sūrayaḥ
gatvā a gatvā nivartante candra sūrya ādayaḥ grahāḥ
adya api na nivartante dvādaśa akṣara cintakāḥ

asipatravanam ghoram kālasūtram avīcikam
vinindakānām vedasya yajña vyāghāta kāriṇām

iti śrī viṣṇururāṇe prathame aṃśe ṣaṣṭhaḥ adhyāyaḥ

tatas abhidhyāyataḥ tasya jajñire mānasāḥ prajāḥ

original: kṣetrajñāḥ samavartanta gātrebhyasya syaḥ dhīmataḥ // ViP_1,7.1 //
analyzed: kṣetrajñāḥ samavartanta gātrebhyasya syaḥ dhīmataḥ

original: bodho viṣṇuriyaṃ buddhirdharmo 'sau satkriyā tviyam // ViP_1,8.18 //

original: ānīya sahitā daityaiḥ kṣīrābdhau saralau ṣadhīḥ /
analyzed: ānīya sahitāḥ daityaiḥ kṣīrābdhau saralau ṣadhīḥ
prakṣipya atra amṛta artham tāḥ sakalāḥ daitya dānavaiḥ

original: manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim // ViP_1,9.77 //
analyzed: manthānam mandaram kṛtvā netram kṛtvā ca vāsukim
mathyatām amṛte devāḥ sahāye mayi avasthite
sāma pūrvam ca daiteyāḥ tatra sāhāyya karmaṇi
sāmānya phala bhoktāraḥ yūyam vācyāḥ bhaviṣyatha
mathyamāne ca tatra abdhau yat samutpatsyate amṛtam
tad pānāt balinaḥ yūyam amarāḥ ca bhaviṣyatha

original: tathā cāhaṃ kariṣyāmi te yathā tridaśadviṣaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca aham kariṣyāmi te yathā tridaśa dviṣaḥ

original: na prāpsyantyamṛtaṃ devāḥ kevalaṃ kleśabhāginaḥ // ViP_1,9.81 //
analyzed: na prāpsyanti amṛtam devāḥ kevalam kleśa bhāginaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: ityuktā devadevena sarva eva tadā surāḥ /
analyzed: iti uktāḥ devadevena sarve eva tadā surāḥ
sandhānam asūraiḥ kṛtvā yatnavantaḥ amṛte abhavan
nānā oṣadhīḥ samānīya deva daiteya dānavāḥ
kṣiptvā kṣīrābdhi payasi śara dabhra amala tviṣi

original: manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim /
analyzed: manthānam mandaram kṛtvā netram kṛtvā ca vāsukim
tatas mathitum ārabdhāḥ maitreya tarasā amṛtam

original: vibudhāḥ sahitāḥ sarve yataḥ pucchaṃ tataḥ kṛtāḥ /
analyzed: vibudhāḥ sahitāḥ sarve yatas puccham tatas kṛtāḥ
kṛṣṇena vāsukeḥ daityāḥ pūrva kāye niveśitāḥ
te tasya mukha niśvāsa vahni tā apahata tviṣaḥ
nistejasaḥ asurāḥ sarve babhūvuḥ amita ojasaḥ
tena eva mukha niśvāsa vāyunā asta balāhakaiḥ

original: pucchapradeśe varṣadbhis tadā cāpyāyitāḥ surāḥ // ViP_1,9.87 //
analyzed: puccha pradeśe varṣadbhiḥ tadā ca āpyāyitāḥ surāḥ
bhagavān kūrma rūpī svayam hariḥ
manthana adreḥ adhiṣṭhānam bhramataḥ abhūt mahā mune
rūpeṇa anyena devānām madhye cakra gadā dharaḥ

original: cakarṣa nāga rājānaṃ daityamadhye 'pareṇa ca // ViP_1,9.89 //
analyzed: cakarṣa nāga rājānam daitya madhye apareṇa ca
upari ākrāntavān śailam bṛhat rūpeṇa keśavaḥ

original: tathāpareṇa maitreya yanna dṛṣṭaṃ surāsuraiḥ // ViP_1,9.90 //
analyzed: tathā apareṇa maitreya yat na dṛṣṭam sura asuraiḥ
tejasā nāgarāḥ jānam tathā āpyāyitavān hariḥ
anyena tejasā devān upabṛṃhitavān prabhuḥ
mathyamāne tatas tasmin kṣirā abdhaḥ deva dānavaiḥ
havirdhāmā abhavat pūrvam surabhiḥ

original: jagmurmudaṃ tato devā dānavāś ca mahāmune /
analyzed: jagmuḥ mudam tatas devāḥ dānavāḥ ca mahā mune
vyākṣipta cetasaḥ ca eva babhūvuḥ timita īkṣaṇāḥ
kim etat iti siddhānām divi cintayatām tatas
babhūva vāruṇī devī mada āghūrṇita locanā
kṛtāvartāt tatas tasmāt kṣīrodāt vāsayan jagat
gandhena pārījātaḥ bhūt deva strī nandanaḥ taruḥ
rūpa audārya guṇa upetaḥ tathā ca apsarasām gaṇaḥ
kṣīrodadheḥ samutpannaḥ maitreya parama adbhutaḥ
tatas śītāṃśuḥ abhavat jagṛhe tam maheśvaraḥ

original: jagṛhuś ca viṣaṃ nāgāḥ kṣīrodābdhisamutthitam // ViP_1,9.97 //
analyzed: jagṛhuḥ ca viṣam nāgāḥ kṣīroda abdhi samutthitam
tatas dhanvantariḥ devaḥ śveta ambara dhara svayam
bibhrat kamaṇḍalum pūrṇam amṛtasya samutthitaḥ
tatas svastha manaskāḥ te sarve daitaiya dānavāḥ

original: babhūvurmuditāḥ sarve maitreya munibhiḥ saha // ViP_1,9.99 //
analyzed: babhūvuḥ muditāḥ sarve maitreya munibhiḥ saha
tatas sphurat kāntimatī vikāsi kamale sthitā
śrīḥ devī payasaḥ tasmāt udbhūtā dhṛta paṅkajā

original: tāṃ tuṣṭuvurmudā yuktāḥ śrīsūktena maharṣayaḥ // ViP_1,9.101 //
analyzed: tām tuṣṭuvuḥ mudā yuktāḥ śrīsūktena mahā ṛṣayaḥ
viśvāvasu mukhāḥ tasyāḥ gandharvāḥ puratas jaguḥ
ghṛtācī pramukhāḥ tatra nanṛtuḥ ca apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ
gaṅgā ādyāḥ saritaḥ toyaiḥ snāna artham upatasthire
diggajāḥ hema pātra stham ādāya vimalam jalam
strāpayāñcakrire devīm sarva loka maheśvarīm
kṣīrodaḥ rūpa dhṛk tasyai mālām amlāna paṅkajām

original: dadau vibhūṣaṇānyaṅge viśvakarmā cakāra ha // ViP_1,9.104 //
analyzed: dadau vibhūṣaṇāni aṅge viśvakarmā cakāra ha
divya mālya ambara dharāḥ trātā bhūṣaṇa bhūṣitā

original: paśyatāṃ sarvadevānāṃ yayau vakṣasthalaṃ hareḥ // ViP_1,9.105 //
analyzed: paśyatām sarva devānām yayau vakṣa sthalam hareḥ
tayā vilokitāḥ devāḥ hari vakṣa sthala sthayā

original: lakṣmyā maitreya sahasā parāṃ nirvṛtimāgatāḥ // ViP_1,9.106 //
analyzed: lakṣmyāḥ maitreya sahasā parām nirvṛtim āgatāḥ
udvegam paramam jagmuḥ daityāḥ viṣṇu parāṅmukhāḥ
tyaktāḥ lakṣmyā mahābhāga vipracittiḥ uraḥ gamāḥ
tatas te jagṛhuḥ daityāḥ dhanvantari kara sthitam
kamaṇḍalum mahā vīryā yatra ā'ste amṛtam uttamam
māyayā mohayitvā tān viṣṇuḥ strī rūpa saṃsthitaḥ
dānavebhyaḥ tat ādāya devebhyaḥ pradadau prabhuḥ
tatas papuḥ sura guṇāḥ śakra ādyāḥ tat tadā amṛtam
udyata āyudha nistraṃśāḥ daityāḥ tān ca samābhyayuḥ
pīte amṛte ca balibhiḥ devaiḥ daitya camūḥ tadā

original: vadhyamānā diśo bheje pātālaṃ ca viveśa vai // ViP_1,9.111 //
analyzed: vadhyamānāḥ diśaḥ bheje pātālam ca viveśa vai
tatas devāḥ mudā yuktāḥ śaṅkha cakra gadā bhṛtam
praṇipatya yathāpūrvam āśāsat tat triviṣṭapam

original: tataḥ prasannabhāḥ sūryaḥ prayayau svena vartmanā /
analyzed: tatas prasanna bhās sūryaḥ prayayau svena vartmanā
jyotīṃṣi ca yathāmārgam prayayuḥ muni sattama
jajvāla bhagavān ca uccais cāru dīptiḥ vibhāvasuḥ

original: dharme ca sarvabhūtānāṃ tadā matirajāyata // ViP_1,9.114 //
analyzed: dharme ca sarva bhūtānām tadā matiḥ ajāyata

original: trailokyaṃ ca śriyā juṣṭaṃ babhūva dvijasattama /
analyzed: trailokyam ca śriyā juṣṭam babhūva dvijasattama

original: śakraś ca tridaśaśreṣṭhaḥ punaḥ śrīmā najāyata // ViP_1,9.115 //
analyzed: śakraḥ ca tridaśa śreṣṭhaḥ punar śrīmā najāyata
siṃhāsana gataḥ śakraḥ saṃprāpya tridivam punar

original: devarājye stito devīṃ tuṣṭāvābjakarāṃ tataḥ // ViP_1,9.116 //
analyzed: deva rājye stitaḥ devīm tuṣṭāva abja karām tatas
indraḥ uvāca
namasye sarva lokānām jananīm abja sambhavām
śriyam unnidra padma akṣīm viṣṇu vakṣa sthala sthitām
padma ālayām padma karām padma patra nibha īkṣaṇām
vande padma sukhīm devīm padmanābha priyām aham

original: tvaṃ siddhistvaṃ svadhā svāhā sudhā tvaṃ lokapāvanī /
analyzed: tvam siddhiḥ tvam svadhā svāhā sudhā tvam loka pāvanī

original: sandhyā rātriḥ prabhā bhūtirmedhā śraddhā sarasvatī // ViP_1,9.119 //
analyzed: sandhyā rātriḥ prabhā bhūtiḥ medhā śraddhā sarasvatī
yajña vidyā mahā vidya guhya vidya ca śobhane

original: ātmavidyā ca devi tvaṃ visuktiphaladāyinī // ViP_1,9.120 //
analyzed: ātma vidyā ca devi tvam visukti phala dāyinī
ānvīkṣikī trayī vārta daṇḍanītiḥ tvam eva ca
saimya asaumyaiḥ jagat rūpaiḥ tvayā ettat devi pūritam

original: kā tvanyā tvāmṛte devi sarvayajñamayaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: kā tu anyā tvām ṛte devi sarva yajña mayam vapuḥ
adhyāste devadevasya yogi cintyam gadābhṛtaḥ
tvāyāḥ devi parityaktam sakalam bhuvanatrayam
vinaṣṭa prāyam abhavat tvayā idānīm samedhitam
dārāḥ putrāḥ tathā āgāra suhṛd dhānya dhana ādikam
bhavati etat mahābhāge nityam tvad vīkṣaṇa antṛṇām
śarīra ārogyam aiśvaryam ari pakṣa kṣayaḥ sukham

original: devi tvaddṛṣṭidṛṣṭānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na durlabham // ViP_1,9.125 //
analyzed: devi tvad dṛṣṭi dṛṣṭānām puruṣāṇām na durlabham

original: tvaṃ mātā sarvalokānāṃ devadevo hariḥ pitā /
analyzed: tvam mātā sarva lokānām devadevaḥ hariḥ pitā
tvayā etat viṣṇunā ca amba jagat dyāptam carācaram

original: mā naḥ kośaṃ tathā goṣṭhaṃ mā gṛhaṃ mā paricchadam /
analyzed: mā naḥ kośam tathā goṣṭham mā gṛham mā paricchadam

original: mā śarīraṃ kalatraṃ ca tyajethāḥ sarvapāvani // ViP_1,9.127 //
analyzed: mā śarīram kalatram ca tyajethāḥ sarva pāvani

original: mā putrānmā suhṛrdvaga mā paśunmā vibhūṣaṇam /
analyzed: mā putrān mā suhṛd dvaga mā paśun mā vibhūṣaṇam
tyajethāḥ mama devasya viṣṇoḥ vakṣaḥsthala ālaye
sattvena satya śaucābhyām tathā śīla dibhiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: tyajyante te narāḥ sadyaḥ saṃtyaktā ye tvāyāmale // ViP_1,9.129 //
analyzed: tyajyante te narāḥ sadyas saṃtyaktāḥ ye tu āyāmale

original: tvayā vilokitāḥ sadyaḥ śīlādyair akhilair guṇaiḥ /
analyzed: tvayā vilokitāḥ sadyas śīla ādyaiḥ akhilaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: kulaiśvaryaiś ca yujyante puruṣā nirguṇā api // ViP_1,9.130 //
analyzed: kula aiśvaryaiḥ ca yujyante puruṣāḥ nirguṇāḥ api

original: sar ślāghyaḥ sa guṇī dhanyaḥ sa kulīnaḥ sa buddhimān /
analyzed: sar ślāghyaḥ sa guṇī dhanyaḥ sa kulīnaḥ sa buddhimān

original: sa śūraḥ sa ca vikrānto yastvayā devi vīkṣitaḥ // ViP_1,9.131 //
analyzed: sa śūraḥ sa ca vikrāntaḥ yaḥ tvayā devi vīkṣitaḥ
sadyas vaiguṇyam āyānti śīla ādyaḥ sakalāḥ guṇāḥ

original: parāṅmukhī jagaddhātrī yasya tvaṃ viṣṇuvallabhe // ViP_1,9.132 //
analyzed: parāṅmukhī jagaddhātrī yasya tvam viṣṇu vallabhe

original: na te varṇayituṃ śaktā guṇāñcihvāpi bedhasaḥ /
analyzed: na te varṇayitum śaktāḥ guṇān cihvā api bedhasaḥ

original: prasīda devi padmākṣi māsmāṃstyākṣīḥ kadāṭana // ViP_1,9.133 //
analyzed: prasīda devi padma akṣi mā asmān tyākṣīḥ kadāṭana
śrī paraśaraḥ uvāca

original: evaṃ śrīḥ saṃstutā samyak prāha devī śatakratum /
analyzed: evam śrīḥ saṃstutā samyak prāha devī śatakratum
śṛṇvatām sarva devānām sarva bhūta sthitā dvija
śrīḥ uvāca
parituṣṭā asmi deveśe stotreṇa anena te hare

original: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva yastviṣṭo vara dāhaṃ tavāgatā // ViP_1,9.135 //
analyzed: varam vṛṇīṣva yaḥ tu iṣṭaḥ vara dā aham tava āgatā
indraḥ uvāca

original: varadā yadi me devi vārarhe yadi vāpyaham /
analyzed: vara dā yadi me devi vāra rhe yadi vā api aham

original: trailokyaṃ na tvayā tyājyameṣa mestu varaḥ paraḥ // ViP_1,9.136 //
analyzed: trailokyam na tvayā tyājyam eṣa meḥ tu varaḥ paraḥ
stotreṇa yaḥ tathā etena tvām stoṣyati abdhi sambhave

original: sa tvayā na parītyājyo dvitīyostu varo mama // ViP_1,9.137 //
analyzed: sa tvayā na parītya ajyaḥ varaḥ mama
śrīḥ uvāca

original: trailokyaṃ trida śaśreṣṭha na santyakṣyāmi vāsava /
analyzed: trailokyam trida śaśreṣṭha na santyakṣyāmi vāsava
dattaḥ varaḥ mayā āyante stautra ārādhana tuṣṭayā

original: yaś ca sāyaṃ tathā prātaḥ stotreṇānena mānavaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca sāyam tathā prātar stotreṇa anena mānavaḥ

original: māṃ stoṣyati na tasyāhaṃ bhaviṣyāmi parāṅmukhī // ViP_1,9.139 //
analyzed: mām stoṣyati na tasya aham bhaviṣyāmi parāṅmukhī
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: evaṃ dadau varaṃ devī devarājāya vai purā /
analyzed: evam dadau varam devī devarājāya vai purā
maitreya śrīḥ mahābhāgā stotra ārādhana toṣitā

original: bhṛgoḥ khyātyāṃ samutpannā śrīḥ pūrvamudadheḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: bhṛgoḥ khyātyām samutpannā śrīḥ pūrvam udadheḥ punar
deva dānava yatnena prasūta amṛta manthane
evam yadā jagatsvāmī devadevaḥ janārdanaḥ
avatāram karoti eṣā tadā śrīḥ tad mahāyini
punar ca padmāt utpannāḥ ādityaḥ bhūt yadā hariḥ

original: yadā tu bhārgavo rāmastadābhūddharaṇī tviyam // ViP_1,9.143 //
analyzed: yadā tu bhārgavaḥ rāmaḥ tadā abhūt dharaṇī tu iyam
rāghava tve abhavat sītā rukmiṇī kṛṣṇa janmani
anyeṣu ca avatāreṣu viṣṇoḥ eṣā anapāyini
deva tve deva dehā iyam manuṣya tve ca mānuṣī
viṣṇoḥ deha anurūpām vai karoti eṣa ātmanaḥ tanum
yaḥ ca etat śṛṇuyāt janma lakṣmyāḥ yaḥ ca paṭhet naraḥ

original: śriyo na vicyutistasya gṛhe yāvatkulatrayam // ViP_1,9.146 //
analyzed: śriyaḥ na vicyutiḥ tasya gṛhe yāvat kula trayam
paṭhyate yeṣu ca evā iyam gṛheṣu śrī stutiḥ mune

original: alakṣmīḥ kalahādhārā na te ṣvāste kadācana // ViP_1,9.147 //
analyzed: alakṣmīḥ kalaha ādhārā na te su āste kadācana
etat te kathitam brahman yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi

original: kṣīrābdho śrīryathā jātā pūrvaṃ bhṛgusutā satī // ViP_1,9.148 //
analyzed: kṣīrābdho śrīḥ yathā jātā pūrvam bhṛgu sutā satī

original: iti sakala vibhūtyavāptihetuḥ stutiriyamindramukhodgatā hi lakṣmyāḥ /
analyzed: iti sakala vibhūti avāpti hetuḥ stutiḥ iyam indra mukha udgatā hi lakṣmyāḥ

original: anudinamiha paṭhyate nṛbhir yair vasati na teṣu kadācidapyalakṣmīḥ // ViP_1,9.149 //
analyzed: anudinam iha paṭhyate nṛbhiḥ yaiḥ vasati na teṣu kadācid api alakṣmīḥ
iti śrī viṣṇupurāṇe prathame aṃśe navamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: kathitaṃ me tvāyā sarvaṃ yatpṛṣṭosi mayā mune /
analyzed: kathitam me tvāyā sarvam yat pṛṣṭaḥ asi mayā mune

original: bhṛgusargātprabhṛtyeṣa sargo me kathyatāṃ punaḥ // ViP_1,10.1 //
analyzed: bhṛgu sargāt prabhṛti eṣa sargaḥ me kathyatām punar
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
bhṛgoḥ khyātyām samutpannā lakṣmīḥ viṣṇu parigrahaḥ

original: tathā dhātṛvidhātārau khyātyāṃ jātau sutau bhṛgoḥ // ViP_1,10.2 //
analyzed: tathā dhātṛ vidhātārau khyātyām jātau sutau bhṛgoḥ
āyatiḥ niyatiḥ ca eva meroḥ kanye mahātmanaḥ
bhārye dhātṛ vidhātroḥ te tayoḥ jātau sutau ubhau
prāṇaḥ ca eva mṛkaṇḍuḥ ca mārkaṇḍeyaḥ mṛkaṇḍutaḥ

original: tato vedaśirā jajñe prāṇasyāpi sutaṃ śṛṇu // ViP_1,10.4 //
analyzed: tatas vedaśirāḥ jajñe prāṇasya api sutam śṛṇu
prāṇasya dyutimān putraḥ rājavān ca tatas abhavat

original: tato vaṃśo mahābhāga vistaraṃ bhārgavo gataḥ // ViP_1,10.5 //
analyzed: tatas vaṃśaḥ mahābhāga vistaram bhārgavaḥ gataḥ
patnī marīceḥ saṃbhūtiḥ paurṇamāsam asūyatā

original: virajāḥ parvataścaiva tasya putro mahātmanaḥ // ViP_1,10.6 //
analyzed: virajāḥ parvataḥ ca eva tasya putraḥ mahātmanaḥ
vaṃśa saṃkīrtane putrān vadiṣye iham tatas dvija
smṛtiḥ ca aṅgīrasaḥ patnī prasūtā kanyakāḥ tathā

original: sinīvālī kuhūścaiva rākā cānumatī tathā // ViP_1,10.7 //
analyzed: sinīvālī kuhūḥ ca eva rākā ca anumatī tathā
anasūyā tathā eva atreḥ jajñe niṣkalmaṣān sutān

original: somaṃ durvāsasaṃ caiva dattātreyaṃ ca yoginam // ViP_1,10.8 //
analyzed: somam durvāsasam ca eva dattātreyam ca yoginam
prītyām pulastya bhāryāyām dattoliḥ tad sutaḥ abhavat
pūrva janmani yaḥ agastyaḥ smṛtaḥ svāyaṃbhuventare
kardamaḥ cārvarīvān ca sahiṣṇuḥ ca sutāḥ trayaḥ

original: kṣamā tu suṣave bhāryā pulahasya prajāpateḥ // ViP_1,10.10 //
analyzed: kṣamā tu suṣave bhāryā pulahasya prajāpateḥ
kratoḥ ca saṃtatiḥ bhāryā vālakhilyā anasūyata
ṣaṣṭi putra sahasrāṇi munīnām ūrdhvaretasām
aṅguṣṭha parva mātrāṇām jvalat bhāskara tejasām

original: ūrjāyāṃ tu vasiṣṭhasya saptājāyanta vai sutāḥ // ViP_1,10.12 //
analyzed: ūrjāyām tu vasiṣṭhasya sapta ajāyanta vai sutāḥ
rajaḥ gotra ūrdhvabāhuḥ ca savanaḥ ca anaghaḥ tathā

original: sutapāḥ śukra ityete sarve saptarṣayo 'malāḥ // ViP_1,10.13 //
analyzed: sutapāḥ śukraḥ iti ete sarve saptarṣayaḥ amalāḥ
yaḥ asau agni abhimānī syāt brahmaṇaḥ tanayaḥ agrajaḥ
tasmāt svāhā sutān lebhe trīn udāra ojasaḥ dvija

original: pāvakaṃ pavamānaṃ tu śuciṃ cāpi jalāśinam // ViP_1,10.15 //
analyzed: pāvakam pavamānam tu śucim ca api jala āśinam

original: tamārādhyācyutaṃ vṛddhiḥ prajānāṃ vo bhaviṣyati // ViP_1,14.17 //

original: saṃdhyā ca parameśasya tasmai kālātmane namaḥ // ViP_1,14.25 //

original: pitṝṇāṃ ca namastasmai viṣṇave pāvakātmane // ViP_1,14.30 //

original: layasthānaṃ ca yastasmai namaḥ prakṛtidharmiṇe // ViP_1,14.36 //

a dīrgha hrasvam a sthūlaṇvanam a śyāma lohitam

vanaspatīnām rājāneḥ plakṣam ā eva abyaṣecayat
evam eva anya jātīnām prādhānyena akarot prabhūn
evam vibhajya rājyāni diśām pāla anantaram
prajāpati patiḥ brahmā sthāpayāmāsa sarvatas
pūrvasyām diśi rājānam vairājasya prajāpateḥ

original: diśāpālaṃ sudhanvānaṃ sutaṃ vai so 'bhyaṣecayat // ViP_1,22.11 //
analyzed: diśāpālam sudhanvānam sutam vai saḥ abhyaṣecayat
dakṣiṇasyām diśi tathā kardamasya prajāpateḥ

original: putraṃ śaṅkhapadaṃ nāma rājānaṃ so 'bhyaṣecayat // ViP_1,22.12 //
analyzed: putram śaṅkhapadam nāma rājānam saḥ abhyaṣecayat
paścimasyām diśi tathā rajasaḥ putram acyutam
ketumantam mahātmānam rājānam saḥ abhyaṣaicayat
tathā hiraṇya romāṇam parjanyasya prajāpateḥ
udīcyām diśi durdharṣam rājānam abhyaṣecayat

original: tair iyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā saptadvīpā sapattanā /
analyzed: taiḥ iyam pṛthivī sarvā saptadvīpā sa pattanā
yathāpradeśam adya api dharmataḥ paripālyate
ete sarve pravṛttasya sthitau viṣṇoḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: vibhūtibhūtā rājāno ye cānye munisattama // ViP_1,22.16 //
analyzed: vibhūti bhūtāḥ rājānaḥ ye ca anye muni sattama

original: ye bhaviṣyanti ye bhūtāḥ sarve bhūteśvarā dvija /
analyzed: ye bhaviṣyanti ye bhūtāḥ sarve bhūta īśvarāḥ dvija

original: te sarve sarvabhūtasya viṣṇoraṃśā dvijottama // ViP_1,22.17 //
analyzed: te sarve sarva bhūtasya viṣṇoḥ aṃśāḥ dvijottama

original: ye tu devādhipatayo ye ca daityādhipās tathā /
analyzed: ye tu deva adhipatayaḥ ye ca daitya adhipāḥ tathā

original: dānavānāṃ ca ye nāthā ye nāthāḥ piśitāśinām // ViP_1,22.18 //
analyzed: dānavānām ca ye nāthāḥ ye nāthāḥ piśitāśinām

original: paśunāṃ ye ca patayaḥ patayo ye ca pakṣiṇām /
analyzed: paśunām ye ca patayaḥ patayaḥ ye ca pakṣiṇām

original: manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarpāṇāṃ nāgānāmadhipāś ca ye // ViP_1,22.19 //
analyzed: manuṣyāṇām ca sarpāṇām nāgānām adhipāḥ ca ye

original: vṛkṣāṇāṃ parvatānāṃ ca grahāṇāṃ cāpi ye 'dhipāḥ /
analyzed: vṛkṣāṇām parvatānām ca grahāṇām ca api ye adhipāḥ

original: atītā vartamānāś ca ye bhaviṣyanti cāpare /
analyzed: atītāḥ vartamānāḥ ca ye bhaviṣyanti ca apare
te sarve sarva bhūtasya viṣṇoḥ aṃśa samudbhāvāḥ
na hi pālana sāmarthyam ṛte sarva īśvaram harim

original: sthitaṃ sthitau mahāprājña bhavatyanyasya kasyacit // ViP_1,22.21 //
analyzed: sthitam sthitau mahā prājña bhavati anyasya kasyacid
sṛjati eṣa jagat sṛṣṭau sthitau pāti sanātanaḥ
hanti ca eva antaka tvena rajaḥ sattva ādi saṃśrayaḥ
catur vibhāgaḥ saṃsṛṣṭau caturdhā saṃsthitaḥ sthitau

original: pralayaṃ ca karotyante caturbhedo janārdanaḥ // ViP_1,22.23 //
analyzed: pralayam ca karoti ante catur bhedaḥ janārdanaḥ
ekena aṃśena brahma sau bhavati avyakta mūrtimān
marīci miśrāḥ patayaḥ prajānām ca anya bhāgaśas
kālaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tasya aṃśaḥ sarva bhūtāni ca aparaḥ

original: itthaṃ caturdhā saṃsṛṣṭau vartatesau rajoguṇaḥ // ViP_1,22.25 //
analyzed: ittham caturdhā saṃsṛṣṭau vartate au rajaḥ guṇaḥ
eka aṃśena āsthitaḥ viṣṇuḥ karoti pratipālanam
manu ādi rūpaḥ ca anyena kāla rūpaḥ ca
sarva bhūteṣu ca anyena saṃśthitaḥ kurute sthitim

original: sattvaṃ guṇaṃ samāśritya jagataḥ puruṣottamaḥ // ViP_1,22.27 //
analyzed: sattvam guṇam samāśritya jagataḥ puruṣottamaḥ
āśritya tamasaḥ vṛttimant akāle tathā punar
rudra sva rūpaḥ bhagavān eka aṃśena bhavati ajaḥ
agni antaka ādi rūpeṇa bhāgena anyena vartate
kāla svarūpaḥ bhāgaḥ yaḥ sarva bhūtāni ca aparaḥ
vināśam kurvataḥ tasya caturdhā evam mahātmanaḥ
vibhāga kalpanā brahman kathyate sārvakālikī
brahma dakṣa ādayaḥ kālaḥ tathā vā akhila jantavaḥ
vibhūtayaḥ hareḥ etāḥ jagataḥ sṛṣṭi hetavaḥ
viṣṇuḥ manu ādayaḥ kālaḥ sarva bhūtāni ca dvija
sthiteḥ nimitta bhūtasya viṣṇoḥ etāḥ vibhūtayaḥ
rudraḥ kāla antaka ādyāḥ ca samastāḥ ca eva jantavaḥ
caturdhā pralāyāya etāḥ janārdana vibhūtayaḥ
jagat ādau tathā madhye sṛṣṭiḥ ā pralayā dvija

original: dhātrā marīcimiśraiś ca kriyate jantubhis tathā // ViP_1,22.34 //
analyzed: dhātrā marīci miśraiḥ ca kriyate jantubhiḥ tathā
brahma sṛjati ādi kāle marīci pramukhāḥ tatas
utpādayanti apatyāni jantavaḥ ca pratikṣaṇam

original: kālena na vinā brahma sṛṣṭiniṣpādako dvija /
analyzed: kālena na vinā brahma sṛṣṭi niṣpādakaḥ dvija

original: na prajāpatayaḥ sarve na caivākhilajantavaḥ // ViP_1,22.36 //
analyzed: na prajāpatayaḥ sarve na ca eva akhila jantavaḥ
evam eva vibhāgaḥ ūyam stitau api upadiśyati

original: caturdā tasya devasya maitreya pralaye tathā // ViP_1,22.37 //
analyzed: caturdā tasya devasya maitreya pralaye tathā
yat kiñcid sṛjyate yena sattva jātena vai dvija

original: tasya sṛjyasya sambhūto tatsarvaṃ vai harestanuḥ // ViP_1,22.38 //
analyzed: tasya sṛjyasya tat sarvam vai hareḥ tanuḥ
hanti yāvat ca yat kiñcid sattvam sthāvara jaṅgamam
janārdanasya tat raudram maitreya anta karam vatuḥ
evam eṣa jagat straṣṭā jagat pātā tathā jagat
jagat bhakṣayitā devaḥ samastasya janārdanaḥ
sṛṣṭhi sthiti anta kāleṣu tridhā evam saṃpravartate

original: guṇapravṛtyā paramaṃ padaṃ tasyāguṇaṃ mahat // ViP_1,22.41 //
analyzed: guṇa pravṛtyā paramam padam tasya aguṇam mahat
tat ca jñāna mayam vyāpi sva asaṃvedyam anaupamam
catuṣprakāram tat api svarūpam paramātmanaḥ
śrī maitreyaḥ uvāca
catur prakāra tām tasya brahma bhūtasya he mune

original: mamācakṣva yathānyāyaṃ yaduktaṃ paramaṃ padam // ViP_1,22.43 //
analyzed: mama ācakṣva yathānyāyam yat uktam paramam padam
śrī parāsaraḥ uvāca
maitreya kāraṇam proktam sādhanam sarva vastuṣu
sādhyam ca vastu abhimatam yat sādhayitum ātmanaḥ

original: sādhyaṃ ca paramaṃ brahma punarnavartateyataḥ // ViP_1,22.45 //
analyzed: sādhyam ca paramam brahma

original: sādhanālambanaṃ jñānaṃ muktaye yogināṃ hi yat /
analyzed: sādhana ālambanam jñānam muktaye yoginām hi yat

original: sa bhedaḥ prathamastasya brahmabhūtasya vai mune // ViP_1,22.46 //
analyzed: sa bhedaḥ prathamaḥ tasya brahma bhūtasya vai mune
yuñjataḥ kleśa mukti artham sādhyam yat brahma yoginaḥ
tad ālambana vijñānam dvitīyaḥ aṃśaḥ mahā mune
ubhayoḥ tu avibhāgena sādhya sādhanayoḥ hi yat
vijñānam advaita mayam tad bhāgaḥ nyaḥ mayā uditaḥ

original: jñānatrayasya vai tasya viśeṣo yo mahāmune /
analyzed: jñāna trayasya vai tasya viśeṣaḥ yaḥ mahā mune
nirvyāpāram anākhyeyam vyāpti mātram anūpamam
ātma sambodha viṣayam sattā mātram alakṣaṇam
praśāntam abhayam śuddham durvibhāvyam asaṃśrayam
viṣṇoḥ jñāna mayasya uktam tat jñānam brahma saṃjñitam

original: tatra jñānanirodhena yogino yānti ye layam /
analyzed: tatra jñāna nirodhena yoginaḥ yānti ye layam

original: saṃsārakarṣaṇoptau te yānti nirbījatāṃ dvijā // ViP_1,22.52 //
analyzed: saṃsāra karṣaṇa uptau te yānti nirbīja tām dvijāḥ
evaṃprakāram amalam nityam vyāpakam akṣayam
samasta heya rahitam viṣṇu ākhyam paramam padam

original: tadbrahma paramaṃ yogī yato nāvartate punaḥ /
analyzed: tat brahma paramam yogī yatas na āvartate punar
śrayati apuṇya uparame kṣīṇa kleśe ati nirmale

original: dve rūpe brahmaṇastasya mūrta cāmūrtameva ca /
analyzed: dve rūpe brahmaṇaḥ tasya ca amūrtam eva ca
kṣara akṣarā svarūpe te sarva bhūteṣu avasthite

original: akṣaraṃ tatparaṃ brahma kṣaraṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat /
analyzed: akṣaram tat param brahma kṣaram sarvam idam jagat
eka deśa sthitasya agneḥ jyotstrā vistāriṇi yathā
parasya brahmaṇaḥ śaktiḥ tathā udam akhilam jagat
tatra api āsanna dūra tvāt bahu tva su alpa tā mayaḥ
jyotsnā bhedaḥ usti tad śakteḥ tadvat maitreya vidyate
brahman pradhānāḥ brahma śaktayaḥ

original: tataś ca devā maitreya nyūnā dakṣādayastataḥ // ViP_1,22.58 //
analyzed: tatas ca devāḥ maitreya nyūnāḥ dakṣa ādayaḥ tatas
tatas manuṣyāḥ paśavau mṛga pakṣi sarīsṛpāḥ
nyūna anyūnatarāḥ ca eva vṛkṣa gulma ādayaḥ tathā
tat etat akṣaram nityam jagat muni vara akhitam
āvirbhāva tirobhāva janma nāśa vikalpavat

original: sarvaśakti mayo viṣṇuḥ svarūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ param /
analyzed: sarva śakti mayaḥ viṣṇuḥ svarūpam brahmaṇaḥ param

original: mūrtaṃ yadyogibhiḥ purvaṃ yogārambheṣu cintyate // ViP_1,22.61 //
analyzed: mūrtam yat yogibhiḥ yoga ārambheṣu cintyate
sa ālambanaḥ mahā yogaḥ sa bījaḥ yatra saṃsthitaḥ
manasi avyāhate samyak yuñjatām jāyate mune
sa paraḥ para śaktīnām brahmaṇaḥ samanantaram

original: mūrtaṃ brahma mahābhāga sarvabrahmamayo hariḥ // ViP_1,22.63 //
analyzed: mūrtam brahma mahābhāga sarva brahma mayaḥ hariḥ
yatra sarvam idam protam otam ca eva akhitam jagat
tatas jagat jagati asmin sa jagat ca akhilam mune
kṣara akṣara mayaḥ viṣṇuḥ bibharti akhilam īśvaraḥ
puruṣa avyākṛta mayam bhūṣaṇa astra svarūpavat
śrī maitreyaḥ uvāca
bhūṣaṇa astra svarūpa stham yat ca etat akhilam jagat
bibharti bhagavan viṣṇuḥ stat mama ākhyātum arhasi
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
namaskṛtvā aprameyāya viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave

original: kathayāmi yathākhyātaṃ vasiṣṭhena mamā bhavat // ViP_1,22.67 //
analyzed: kathayāmi yathā ākhyātam vasiṣṭhena bhavat
ātmānam asya jagataḥ nirlepam aguṇa amalam
bibharti kaustubha maṇi sva rūpam bhagavān hariḥ
śrīvatsa saṃsthāna dhara manante na samāśritam
pradhānam buddhiḥ api āste gada rūpeṇa mādhave
bhūtādim indriya ādim ca dvidhā ahaṅkāram īśvaraḥ

original: bibharti śaṃkharūpeṇa śārṅgarūpeṇa ca sthitam // ViP_1,22.70 //
analyzed: bibharti śaṃkha rūpeṇa śārṅga rūpeṇa ca sthitam
calat svarūpam atyantam javena antārita anilam

original: cakrasvarūpaṃ ca mano dhatte viṣṇukare sthitam // ViP_1,22.71 //
analyzed: cakra svarūpam ca manaḥ dhatte viṣṇu kare sthitam

original: pañcarūpā tu yā mālā vaijayantī gadābhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: pañca rūpā tu yā mālā vaijayantī gadābhṛtaḥ

original: sā bhūtahetusaṃghātā bhūtamālā ca vai dvija // ViP_1,22.72 //
analyzed: sā bhūta hetu saṃghātā bhūta mālā ca vai dvija
yāni indriyāṇi aśeṣāṇi buddhi karma ātmakāni vai
śara rūpāṇi aśeṣāṇi tāni dhatte janārdanaḥ
bibharti yat ca asi ratnam acyuta utyanta nirmalam
vidyā maya tu tat jñānam avidyā kośa saṃsthitam
ittham pumān pradhānam ca buddhi ahaṅkāram eva ca

original: bhūtāni ca hṛṣīkeśe manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca /
analyzed: bhūtāni ca hṛṣīkeśe manaḥ sarva indriyāṇi ca
vidyā avidye ca maitreya sarvam etat samāśritam
astra bhūṣaṇa saṃsthāna svarūpam rūpa varjitaḥ

original: bibhārti māyārūposau śreyase prāṇināṃ hariḥ // ViP_1,22.76 //
analyzed: bibhārti māyā rūpā usau śreyase prāṇinām hariḥ
sa vikāram pradhānam ca pumān ca eva akhilam jagat
bibharti puṇḍahīkākṣaḥ tat evam parameśvaraḥ
yā vidyā yā tathā avidyā yat sat yat ca asat avyayam
tat sarvam sarva bhūta īśe maitreya madhusūdane
kalā kāṣṭhā nimeṣa ādi dina ṛtu ayana hāyanaiḥ
kāla svarūpaḥ bhagavān apāpaḥ hariḥ avyayaḥ
bhūrlokaḥ utha bhuvarlokaḥ svarlokaḥ muni sattama

original: maharjanastapaḥ satyaṃ sapta lokā ime vibhuḥ // ViP_1,22.80 //
analyzed: mahar janaḥ tapaḥ satyam sapta lokāḥ ime vibhuḥ
loka ātma mūrtiḥ sarveṣām pūrveṣām api pūrvajaḥ

original: ādhāraḥ sarvavidyānāṃ svayameva hariḥ sthitaḥ // ViP_1,22.81 //
analyzed: ādhāraḥ sarva vidyānām svayam eva hariḥ sthitaḥ
deva mānuṣa paśu ādi śva rūpaiḥ bahubhiḥ sthitaḥ
tatas sarva īśvaraḥ anantaḥ bhūta mūrtiḥ a mūrtimān
ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni tathā eva atharvāṇāni vai
itihāsa upavedāḥ ca vedānteṣu tathā uktayaḥ
vedāṅgāni samastāni manu ādi gaditāni ca

original: śāstrāṇyaśeṣāṇyākhyānāny anuvākāś ca ye kvacit // ViP_1,22.84 //
analyzed: śāstrāṇi aśeṣāṇi ākhyānāni anuvākāḥ ca ye kvacid
kāvya ālāpāḥ ca ye kecid rītakāni akhilāni ca
śabda mūrti dharasya etat vapuḥ viṣṇoḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: yāni mūrtāny amūrtāni yānyatrānyatra vā kvacit /
analyzed: yāni mūrtāni amūrtāni yāni atra anyatra vā kvacid

original: santi vai vastujātāni tāni sarvāṇi tadvapuḥ // ViP_1,22.86 //
analyzed: santi vai vastu jātāni tāni sarvāṇi tad vapuḥ

original: ahaṃ hariḥ sarvamidaṃ janārdano nānyattataḥ kāraṇakāryajātam /
analyzed: aham hariḥ sarvam idam janārdanaḥ na anyat tatas kāraṇa kārya jātam

original: īdṛṅmano yasya na tasyaṭa bhūyo bhavodbhāvā dvandvagadā bhavanti // ViP_1,22.87 //
analyzed: īdṛś manaḥ yasya na bhūyas bhava udbhāvāḥ dvandva gadāḥ bhavanti

original: ityaiṣa teṃśaḥ prathamaḥ purāṇasyāsya vai dvija /
analyzed: iti eṣa te aṃśaḥ prathamaḥ purāṇasya asya vai dvija
yathāvat kathitaḥ yasmin hṛte pāpaiḥ pramucyate
kārttikyām puṣkara snāne dvādaśa abdena yat phalam
tat asya śravaṇāt sava maitreya āpnoti mānavaḥ
deva ṛṣi pitṛ gandharva yakṣa ādinām ca sambhavam

original: bhavanti śṛṇvataḥ puṃso devādya varadā mune // ViP_1,22.90 //
analyzed: bhavanti śṛṇvataḥ puṃsaḥ deva adya vara dāḥ mune
iti śri viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe prathame aṃśe dvāviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: iti śrīparāśaramuniviracite śriviṣṇuparatvanirṇāyake śrīmati viṣṇumahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśaḥ samāptaḥ /
analyzed: iti śrī parāśara muni viracite śri viṣṇu para tva nirṇāyake śrīmati viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe prathama aṃśaḥ samāptaḥ

original: atha śrīviṣṇumahāpurāṇe viṣṇucittyātmaprakāśākhyaśrīdharīya vyākhyādvayopete dvitīyoṃśaḥ prārabhyate
analyzed: atha śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe viṣṇu citti ātma prakāśa ākhya śrīdharīya vyākhyā dvaya upete dvitīyaḥ ūṃśaḥ prārabhyate
śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca
bhagavan samyak ākhyātam mama etat akhilam tvāyā

original: jagataḥ sargasambandhi yatpṛṣṭosi guro mayā // ViP_2,1.1 //
analyzed: jagataḥ sarga sambandhi yat pṛṣṭaḥ asi guro mayā
yaḥ ayam aṃśaḥ jagat sṛṣṭi sambandhaḥ gaditaḥ tvayā
tatra aham śrotum icchāmi bhūyas pi muni sattama
priyavrata uttānapādau sutau svāyambhuvasya yau
tayoḥ uttānapādasya dhruvaḥ putraḥ tvayā uditaḥ
priyavratasya nā evā uktā bhavatā dvija santatiḥ
tām aham śrotum icchāmi prasannaḥ vaktum arhasi
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
kardamasya ātmajām kanyām upayeme prayivrataḥ

original: samrāṭ kukṣi ca tatkanye daśaputrastathāpare // ViP_2,1.5 //
analyzed: samrāj ca tad kanye daśa putraḥ tathā apare
mahā prajñāḥ mahā vīryāḥ vinītāḥ dayitāḥ pituḥ

original: priyavratasutāḥ khyātāsteṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu // ViP_2,1.6 //
analyzed: priyavrata sutāḥ khyātāḥ teṣām nāmāni me śṛṇu
āgnīdhraḥ ca agnibāhuḥ ca vapuṣmān dyutimān tathā

original: medhā medhātithirbhavyaḥ savanaḥ putra eva ca // ViP_2,1.7 //
analyzed: medhāḥ medhātithiḥ bhavyaḥ savanaḥ putraḥ eva ca
jyotiṣmān daśamaḥ teṣām satyanāmā sutaḥ abhavat
priyavratasya putrāḥ te prakhyātāḥ bala vīryataḥ
medha agnibāhu putrāḥ tu trayaḥ yoga parāyaṇāḥ

original: jātismārā mahābhāgāna rājyāya mano dadhuḥ // ViP_2,1.9 //
analyzed: jāti smārāḥ mahābhāgāna rājyāya manaḥ
nirmalāḥ samasta artheṣu vai mune

original: cakruḥ kriyāṃ yathānyāyamaphalākākṣiṇo hi te // ViP_2,1.10 //
analyzed: cakruḥ kriyām yathānyāyam aphalāka akṣiṇaḥ hi te
priyavrataḥ dadau teṣām saptānām muni sattama
sapta dvīpāni maitreya vibhajya su mahātmanām
jambūdvīpe mahābhāga sa ugnīdhrāya dadau pitā
medhātitheḥ tathā prādāt plakṣadvīpam tathā aparam
śālmale ca vapuṣmantam narendram abhiṣiktavān
jyotiṣmantam kuśadvīpe rājānam kṛtāvān prabhuḥ
dyutimantam ca rājānam krauñcadvīpe samādiśat

original: śākadvīpeśvaraṃ cāpi bhavyaṃ cakre priyavrataḥ // ViP_2,1.14 //
analyzed: śākadvīpa īśvaram ca api bhavyam cakre priyavrataḥ

original: puṣkarādhipatiṃ cakre savanaṃ cāpi sa prabhuḥ /
analyzed: puṣkara adhipatim cakre savanam ca api sa prabhuḥ
jambūdvīpa īśvaraḥ yaḥ tu āgnīdhraḥ muni sattama
tasya putrāḥ babhūvuḥ te prajāpati samāḥ nava
nābhiḥ kiṃpuruṣaḥ ca eva harivarṣaḥ ilāvṛtaḥ

original: ramyo hiraṇvānṣaṣṭhaś ca kurubhadrāśva eva ca /
analyzed: ramyaḥ hiraṇvān ṣaṣṭhaḥ ca kuru bhadrāśvaḥ eva ca
ketumālaḥ tathā eva anyaḥ sādhu ceṣṭaḥ abhavan tṛpaḥ

original: janbūdvīpavi bhāgāṃś ca teṣāṃ vipra niśāmaya /
analyzed: janbūdvīpa vi bhāgān ca teṣām vipra niśāmaya

original: pitrā dattaṃ himāhvaṃ tu varṣaṃ nābhestu dakṣiṇam // ViP_2,1.18 //
analyzed: pitrā dattam himāhvam tu varṣam nābheḥ tu dakṣiṇam

original: hemakūṭaṃ tathā varṣaṃ dadau kiṃpuruṣāya saḥ /
analyzed: hemakūṭam tathā varṣam dadau kiṃpuruṣāya saḥ

original: tṛtīyaṃ naiṣadhaṃ varṣaṃ harivarṣāya dattavān // ViP_2,1.19 //
analyzed: tṛtīyam naiṣadham varṣam harivarṣāya dattavān
ilāvṛtāya pradadau meruḥ yatra tu madhyamaḥ

original: nīlācalāśritaṃ varṣa ramyāya pradadau pitā // ViP_2,1.20 //
analyzed: nīla acala āśritam varṣa ramyāya pradadau pitā

original: śvetaṃ yaduttaraṃ tasmātpitrā dattaṃ hiraṇvate // ViP_2,1.21 //
analyzed: śvetam yat uttaram tasmāt pitrā dattam hiraṇvate
yat uttaram śṛṅgavataḥ varṣa tat kurave dadau

original: meroḥ purveṇa yadvarṣa bhadrāśvāya pradattavān // ViP_2,1.22 //
analyzed: meroḥ purveṇa bhadrāśvāya pradattavān
gandhamādhana varṣa tu ketumālāya dattavān

original: ityetāni dadau tebhyaḥ putrebhyaḥ sa nareśvaraḥ // ViP_2,1.23 //
analyzed: iti etāni dadau tebhyaḥ putrebhyaḥ sa nareśvaraḥ
varṣeṣu eteṣu tān putrān abhiṣicya sa bhūmipaḥ

original: sālāgrāmaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ maitreya tapase yayau // ViP_2,1.24 //
analyzed: sālāgrāmam mahā puṇyam maitreya tapase yayau
kiṃpuruṣa ādi iti varṣa avyaṣṭau mahā mune

original: teṣāṃ svābhāviki siddhiḥ sukhaprāyā hyayatnataḥ // ViP_2,1.25 //
analyzed: teṣām svābhāviki siddhiḥ sukha prāyā hi ayatnataḥ

original: viparyayo na teṣvasti jarāmṛtyubhayaṃ na ca /
analyzed: viparyayaḥ na teṣu asti jarā mṛtyu bhayam na ca
dharma dhamau na teṣu āstām na uttama adhama madhyamāḥ
na teṣu asti yuga avasthā kṣetreṣu aṣṭasu sarvadā
himāhvayam tu vai varṣam nābeḥ āsīt mahātmanaḥ
tasya ṛṣabhaḥ abhavat putraḥ merudevyām mahā dyutiḥ
ṛṣabhāt bhārataḥ jajñe jyeṣṭhaḥ putra śatasya saḥ

original: kṛtvā rājyaṃ svadharmeṇa tathaiṣṭvā vividhānmakhān // ViP_2,1.28 //
analyzed: kṛtvā rājyam svadharmeṇa tathā eṣṭvā vividhān makhān
abhiṣicya sutam vīram bharatam pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: tapase sa mahābhāgaḥ pulahasyāśramaṃ yayau // ViP_2,1.29 //
analyzed: tapase sa mahābhāgaḥ pulahasya āśramam yayau
vānaprastha vidhānena tatra api kṛta niścayaḥ
tapaḥ tepe yathānyāyam iyāja sa mahīpatiḥ
tapasā karṣita utyartham kṛśaḥ dhamani santataḥ

original: nagno vīṭāṃ mukhe kṛtvā vīrādhvānaṃ tato gataḥ // ViP_2,1.31 //
analyzed: nagnaḥ vīṭām mukhe kṛtvā vīrādhvānam tatas gataḥ
tatas ca bhāratam varṣam etat lokeṣu gīyate

original: bharatāya yataḥ pitrā dattaṃ prātiṣṭhatā vanam // ViP_2,1.32 //
analyzed: bharatāya yatas pitrā dattam prātiṣṭhatā vanam
sumatiḥ bharatasya abhūt putraḥ parama dhārmikaḥ

original: kṛtvā samyagdadau tasmai rājyamiṣṭamakhaṃ pitā // ViP_2,1.33 //
analyzed: kṛtvā samyak dadau tasmai rājyam iṣṭa makham pitā
putra saṃkrāmita śrīḥ tu bharataḥ sa mahīpatiḥ
yoga abhyāsa rataḥ prāṇān sālagrāme ayajat mune

original: ajāyata ca viprosau yogīnāṃ pravare kule /
analyzed: ajāyata ca viprā usau yogīnām pravare kule

original: maitreya tasya caritaṃ kathayiṣyāmi te punaḥ // ViP_2,1.35 //
analyzed: maitreya tasya caritam kathayiṣyāmi te punar
mumateḥ tejasaḥ tasmāt indradyumnaḥ vyajāyata
parameṣṭhī tatas tasmāt pratihāraḥ tad anvayaḥ
pratihartā iti vikhyātaḥ utpannaḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ
bhavaḥ tasmāt atha udgīthaḥ prāstaviḥ tad sutaḥ vibhuḥ
pṛthuḥ tatas tatas naktaḥ naktasya api gayaḥ sutaḥ
naraḥ gayasya natayaḥ tad putraḥ bhūt virāj tatas
tasya putraḥ mahā vīryaḥ dhīmān tasmāt ajāyata
mahāntaḥ tad sutaḥ ca abhūt manasyuḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ
tpaṣṭā tvaṣṭuḥ ca virajaḥ rajaḥ tasya api abhūt sutaḥ
śatajit rajasaḥ tasya jajñe putra śanta mune
viṣvagjyoti pradhānāḥ te yaiḥ imāḥ vardhitāḥ prajāḥ

original: tair idaṃ bhārataṃ varṣaṃ navabhedamalaṅkṛtam // ViP_2,1.41 //
analyzed: taiḥ idam bhāratam varṣam nava bhedam alaṅkṛtam

original: teṣāṃ vaṃśaprasūtaiś ca bhukteyaṃ bhāratī purā /
analyzed: teṣām vaṃśa prasūtaiḥ ca bhuktā iyam bhāratī purā
kṛta tretā ādi sargeṇa yuga ākhyām ekasaptatim

original: eṣa svāyaṃbhuvaḥ sargau yenedaṃ pūritaṃ jagat /
analyzed: eṣa svāyaṃbhuvaḥ sargau yena idam pūritam jagat

original: vārāhe tu mune kalpe pūrvamanvantarādhipaḥ // ViP_2,1.43 //
analyzed: vārāhe tu mune kalpe pūrva manvantara adhipaḥ
iti śrī viṣṇupurāṇe dvitīye aṃśe prathamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: kathito bhavatā brahmansargaḥ svāyambhuvaś ca me /
analyzed: kathitaḥ bhavatā brahman sargaḥ svāyambhuvaḥ ca me

original: śrotumicchāmyahaṃ tvattaḥ sakalaṃ maṇḍalaṃ bhuvaḥ // ViP_2,2.1 //
analyzed: śrotum icchāmi aham tvattaḥ sakalam maṇḍalam bhuvaḥ

original: yāvantaḥ sāgara dvīpās tathā varṣāṇi parvatāḥ /
analyzed: yāvantaḥ sāgara dvīpāḥ tathā varṣāṇi parvatāḥ

original: vanāni satitaḥ puryo devādīnāṃ tathā mune // ViP_2,2.2 //
analyzed: vanāni satitaḥ puryaḥ deva ādīnām tathā mune
yad pramāṇam idam sarvam yad ādhāram yad ātmakam
saṃsthānam asya ca mune yathābat vaktum arhasi
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
maitreya śrūyatām etat saṃkṣepāt gadataḥ mama

original: nāsya varṣaśatenāpi vaktuṃ śakyo hi vistaraḥ // ViP_2,2.4 //
analyzed: na asya varṣa śatena api vaktum śakyaḥ hi vistaraḥ
jambū plakṣa āhvayau dvīpau śālmaliḥ ca aparaḥ dvija

original: kuśaḥ kraiñcas tathā śākaḥ puṣkaraścaiva saptamaḥ // ViP_2,2.5 //
analyzed: kuśaḥ kraiñcaḥ tathā śākaḥ puṣkaraḥ ca eva saptamaḥ

original: ete dvīpāḥ samudrais tu saptasaptabhir āvṛtāḥ /
analyzed: ete dvīpāḥ samudraiḥ tu sapta saptabhiḥ āvṛtāḥ
praviṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśa adhastāt dvātriṃśat mūrdhri vistṛta
mūle ṣoḍaśa sāhasraḥ vistāraḥ tasya sarvaśas
bhū padmasya asya śailaḥ asau karṇikā ākāra saṃsthitaḥ
himāvān hemakūṭaḥ ca dakṣiṇe

original: nīlaḥ śvetaś ca śṛṅgī ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ // ViP_2,2.11 //
analyzed: nīlaḥ śvetaḥ ca śṛṅgī ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ
lakṣa pramāṇaḥ dvau madhyau daśa hīnāḥ tathā apare
sahasra dvitaya ucchrāyāḥ tāvat vistāriṇaḥ ca te

original: bhārataṃ prathamaṃ varṣaṃ tataḥ kipuruṣaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: bhāratam prathamam varṣam tatas kipuruṣam smṛtam
harivarṣam tathā eva anyat meroḥ dakṣiṇatas dvija
ramyakam ca uttaram varṣam tasya eva anu hiraṇmayam

original: uttarāḥ kuravaścaiva yathā vai bhārataṃ tathā // ViP_2,2.14 //
analyzed: uttarāḥ kuravaḥ ca eva yathā vai bhāratam tathā
nava sāhasram aikaikam eteṣām dvijasattama

original: ilāvṛtaṃ ca tanmadhye sauvarṇo merurucchritaḥ // ViP_2,2.15 //
analyzed: ilāvṛtam ca tad madhye sauvarṇaḥ meruḥ ucchritaḥ
meroḥ caturdiśam tat tu nava sāhasra vistṛtam
ilāvṛtam mahābhāga catvāraḥ ca atra parvatāḥ
viṣkaṃbhā racitā meroḥ yojana ayutam ucchritaḥ

original: navaiḥ sarobhiś ca samaṃ dikṣvete keśavācalāḥ // ViP_2,2.17 //
analyzed: navaiḥ sarobhiḥ ca samam dikṣu ete keśava acalāḥ
purveṇa mandaraḥ nāma dakṣiṇe gandhamādanaḥ

original: viplalaḥ paścime pārśve mupārśvaścottara smṛtaḥ // ViP_2,2.18 //
analyzed: viplalaḥ paścime pārśve smṛtaḥ

original: kadambasteṣu jambūś ca pippalo vaṭa eva ca /
analyzed: kadambaḥ teṣu jambūḥ ca pippalaḥ vaṭaḥ eva ca
ekādaśa śata āyāmāḥ pādapāḥ giri ketavaḥ
jambūdvīpasya sā jambūḥ nāma hetuḥ mahā mune
jambvāḥ tasyāḥ phalani vai

original: patanti bhūbhṛtaḥ pṛṣṭhe śīryamāṇāni sarvataḥ // ViP_2,2.20 //
analyzed: patanti bhūbhṛtaḥ pṛṣṭhe śīryamāṇāni sarvatas

original: rasena teṣāṃ prakhyātā tatra jāmbūnadīti vai /
analyzed: rasena teṣām prakhyātā tatra jāmbūnadī iti vai
sarit pravartate ca api pīyate tad nivāsibhiḥ

original: na svedo na ca daurgandhyaṃ na jarā nendriyakṣayaḥ /
analyzed: na svedaḥ na ca daurgandhyam na jarā na indriya kṣayaḥ
tad pānāt svaccham anāsāṃjanānām tatra jāyate
tīra mṛd tad rasam prāpya sukha vāyu viśoṣitā
jāmbūnada ākhyam bhavati suvarṇam siddha bhūṣaṇam

original: bhadrāśvaṃ pūrvato meroḥ ketumālaṃ ca paścime /
analyzed: bhadrāśvam pūrvatas meroḥ ketumālam ca paścime

original: varṣe dve tu muniśreṣṭha tayormadhyamilāvṛtaḥ // ViP_2,2.24 //
analyzed: varṣe dve tu muni śreṣṭha tayoḥ madhyam ilāvṛtaḥ
vanam caitraratham pūrve dakṣiṇe gandhamādanam

original: vaibhrājaṃ paścime tadvaduttare nandanaṃ smṛtam // ViP_2,2.25 //
analyzed: vaibhrājam paścime tadvat uttare nandanam smṛtam
aruṇa udam mahā bhadram asita udam sa mānasam
sarāṃsi otāni catvāri deva bhogyāni sarvadā

original: śītāmbhaś ca kumundaś ca kurarī mālyavāṃs tathā /
analyzed: śītāmbhaḥ ca kumundaḥ ca kurarī mālyavān tathā
vaikaṅka prasukhāḥ meroḥ pūrvatas kesara acalāḥ
trikūṭaḥ śiśiraḥ ca eva pataṅgaḥ rucakaḥ tathā
niṣad ādyāḥ dakṣiṇatas tasya kesara parvataḥ
śikhivāsāḥ sa vaiḍūryaḥ kapilaḥ gandhamādanaḥ
jārudhi pramukhāḥ tadvat paścime kesara acalāḥ
meroḥ anantara aṅgeṣu jaṭhara ādiṣu avasthitāḥ

original: śaṃśakūṭotha ṛṣabho haṃso nāgas tathā paraḥ /
analyzed: śaṃśakūṭaḥ utha ṛṣabhaḥ haṃsaḥ nāgaḥ tathā paraḥ

original: kālañjanādyāś ca tathā uttare kesarācalāḥ // ViP_2,2.30 //
analyzed: kālañjana ādyāḥ ca tathā uttare kesara acalāḥ
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi yojanānām mahā purī

original: merorupari maitreya brahmaṇaḥ prathitā divi // ViP_2,2.31 //
analyzed: meroḥ upari maitreya brahmaṇaḥ prathitāḥ divi
tasyāḥ samantataḥ ca aṣṭau diśāsu vidiśāsu ca
indra ādi lokapālānām prakhyātāḥ pravarāḥ puraḥ
viṣṇu pāda viniṣkrāntā plāvayitvā indu maṇḍalam

original: samantādbrahyaṇaḥ puryāṃ gaṅga patati vai divaḥ // ViP_2,2.33 //
analyzed: samantāt brahyaṇaḥ puryām gaṅga patati vai divaḥ

original: sā tatra patitā dikṣu caturdhā pratipadyate /
analyzed: sā tatra patitā dikṣu caturdhā pratipadyate

original: sītā cālakanandā ca cakṣurbhadrā ca vai kramāt // ViP_2,2.34 //
analyzed: sītā ca alakanandā ca cakṣuḥ bhadrā ca vai kramāt
pūrveṇa śailāt śītā tu śailam yāti antarīkṣa gā

original: tataś ca pūrvavarṣaiṇa bhadrāśvainaiti sārṇavam // ViP_2,2.35 //
analyzed: tatas ca pūrva varṣaiṇa sa arṇavam
tathā evā alakanandā api dakṣiṇena etya bhāratam

original: prayāti sāgaraṃ bhūtvā saptabhedā mahāmune // ViP_2,2.36 //
analyzed: prayāti sāgaram bhūtvā sapta bhedāḥ mahā mune
paścima girīn atītya sakalān tatas

original: paścimaṃ ketumālākhya varṣaṃ gatvaiti sāgaram // ViP_2,2.37 //
analyzed: paścimam ketumāla ākhya varṣam gatvā eti sāgaram
bhadrā tathā uttara girīn uttarān ca tathā kurūn
atītya uttaram ambhodhim samabhyeti mahā mune
ā nīla niṣadha āyāmau mālyavat gandhamādanau
tayoḥ madhya gataḥ merūḥ karṇikā ākāra saṃsthitaḥ

original: bhāratāḥ ketumālāś ca bhadrāśvāḥ kuravas tathā /
analyzed: bhāratāḥ ketumālāḥ ca bhadrāśvāḥ kuravaḥ tathā
patrāṇi loka padmasya maryādā śaila bāhyatas
jaṭharaḥ hemakūṭaḥ ca maryādāparvatau ubhau
tau dakṣima uttara āyāmau ā nīla niṣadha āyatau
gandhamādana kailāsau pūrvavat ca āyatau ubhau
āśi iti yojana āyāmau arṇava anta vyavasthitau
niṣadhaḥ pariyātraḥ ca maryādāparvatau ubhau

original: meroḥ paścimadigbhāge yathā pūrve tathā sthitau // ViP_2,2.43 //
analyzed: meroḥ paścima digbhāge yathā pūrve tathā sthitau
triśṛṅgaḥ jārudhiḥ ca eva uttarau varṣaparvatau
pūrva paśca āyatau etau arṇava antar vyavasthitau
iti ete muni varya uktāḥ maryādāparvatāḥ tava

original: jaṭharādyāḥ sthitā merosteṣāṃ dvaudvau caturdiśam // ViP_2,2.45 //
analyzed: jaṭhara ādyāḥ sthitāḥ meroḥ teṣām dvau dvau caturdiśam
meroḥ caturdiśam ye tu proktāḥ kesara parvatāḥ
śīta anta ādyāḥ mune teṣām atīva hi manoramāḥ
śailānām antare droṇyaḥ siddha cāraṇa sevitāḥ

original: suramyāṇi tathā tāsu kānanāni purāṇi ca /
analyzed: su ramyāṇi tathā tāsu kānanāni purāṇi ca
lakṣmī viṣṇu agni sūrya ādi devānām muni sattama
tāsu āyatana varyāṇi juṣṭāni vara kinnaraiḥ
gandharva yakṣa rakṣāṃsi tathā daiteya dānavāḥ
krīḍanti tāsu ramyāsu śaila droṇīṣu aharnisam

original: bhaumā hyete smṛtāḥ svargā dharmiṇāmālayā mune /
analyzed: bhaumāḥ hi ete smṛtāḥ svargāḥ dharmiṇām ālayāḥ mune

original: naituṣu pāpakarmāṇo yānti janmaśatair api // ViP_2,2.49 //
analyzed: na etuṣu pāpa karmāṇaḥ yānti janma śataiḥ api
bhadrāśve bhagavān viṣṇuḥ āste hayaśirāḥ dvija

original: varājaḥ ketumāle tu bhārate kūrmarūpadhṛk // ViP_2,2.50 //
analyzed: varājaḥ ketumāle tu bhārate kūrma rūpadhṛk
matsya rūpaḥ ca govindaḥ kuruṣu āste janārdanaḥ

original: viśvarūpeṇa sarvatra sarvaḥ sarvatrago hariḥ // ViP_2,2.51 //
analyzed: viśva rūpeṇa sarvatra sarvaḥ sarvatragaḥ hariḥ
sarvasya ādhāra bhūtā asau maitreya āste khila ātmakaḥ
kiṃpuruṣa ādini varṣāṇi aṣṭau mahā mune

original: na teṣu śauko nāyāso nodvegaḥ kṣudbhayādikam // ViP_2,2.53 //
analyzed: na teṣu śaukaḥ na āyāsaḥ na udvegaḥ kṣudh bhaya ādikam
svasthāḥ prajāḥ nirātaṅkāḥ sarva duḥkha vivarjitāḥ
daśa dvādaśa varṣāṇām sahasrāṇi sthira āyuṣaḥ

original: na teṣu varṣate devo bhaumānyambhāṃsi teṣu vai /
analyzed: na teṣu varṣate devaḥ bhaumāni ambhāṃsi teṣu vai

original: kṛtatretādikaṃ naiva teṣu sthāneṣu kalpanā // ViP_2,2.55 //
analyzed: kṛta tretā ādikam nā eva teṣu sthāneṣu kalpanā
sarveṣu eteṣu varṣeṣu sapta sapta kula acalāḥ

original: nadyaś ca śataśastebhyaḥ prasūtā yā dvijottama // ViP_2,2.56 //
analyzed: nadyaḥ ca śataśas tebhyaḥ prasūtāḥ yāḥ dvijottama
iti śri viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe dvitīye aṃśe dvitīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
uttaram yat samudrasya himādreḥ ca eva dakṣiṇam

original: varṣaṃ tadbhārataṃ nāma bhāratī yatra santatiḥ // ViP_2,3.1 //
analyzed: varṣam tat bhāratam nāma bhāratī yatra santatiḥ
nava yojana sāhasraḥ vistāraḥ asya mahā mune
karma bhūmiḥ iyam svargam apavargam ca gacchatām
mahendraḥ malayaḥ sahyaḥ śuktimān ṛkṣa parvataḥ

original: vindhyaś ca pārīyātraś ca saptātra kulaparvatāḥ // ViP_2,3.3 //
analyzed: vindhyaḥ ca pārīyātraḥ ca sapta atra kulaparvatāḥ
atas saṃprāpyate svargaḥ suktim asmāt prayānti vai

original: tiryaktvaṃ narakaṃ cāpi yāntyataḥ puruṣā mune // ViP_2,3.4 //
analyzed: tiryaktvam narakam ca api yānti atas puruṣāḥ mune

original: itaḥ svargaś ca mokṣaś ca madhyaṃ cāntaś ca gamyate /
analyzed: itas svargaḥ ca mokṣaḥ ca madhyam ca antaḥ ca gamyate

original: na khlavanyatra martyānāṃ karmabhūmau vidhīyate // ViP_2,3.5 //
analyzed: na khlava anyatra martyānām karma bhūmau vidhīyate

original: idradvīpaḥ kaseruś ca tāmraparṇāṃ gabhastimān // ViP_2,3.6 //
analyzed: idradvīpaḥ kaseruḥ ca tāmraparṇām gabhastimān

original: ayaṃ tu navamastaṣāṃ dvīpaḥ sāgārasaṃvṛtaḥ // ViP_2,3.7 //
analyzed: ayam tu navamaḥ taṣām dvīpaḥ sa āgāra saṃvṛtaḥ

original: pūrve kirātā yasyānte paścime yavanāḥ sthitāḥ // ViP_2,3.8 //

original: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā madhye śabdrāś ca bhāgaśaḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ madhye śabdrāḥ ca bhāgaśas
ijyā āyudha vaṇijya ādyaiḥ vartayantaḥ vyavasthitāḥ
śatadrū candrabhāgā ādyāḥ himayat pāda nirgatāḥ
vedasmṛti mukha ādyāḥ ca pārīyātra udbhavāḥ mune
narmadā murasā ādyāḥ ca nadyaḥ vindhya adri nirgatāḥ
tāpī payoṣṇī nirvindhyā prasūkhāḥ ṛkṣa saṃbhavāḥ
sahya pāda udbhavāḥ nadyaḥ smṛtāḥ pāpa bhaya apahāḥ
trisāmā ca ṛṣikulyā ādyāḥ mahendra prabhavāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: āsāṃ nadya upānadyaḥ santyanyāś ca sahasraśaḥ // ViP_2,3.14 //
analyzed: āsām nadyaḥ upānadyaḥ santi anyāḥ ca sahasraśas
tāsu ime kuru pāñcālāḥ madhyadeśa ādayaḥ janāḥ

original: puṇḍrāḥ kaliṅgā magadhā dakṣiṇādyāś ca sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: puṇḍrāḥ kaliṅgāḥ magadhāḥ dakṣiṇa ādyāḥ ca sarvaśas
tathā aparāntāḥ saurāṣṭrāḥ śūra ābhīrāḥ tathā arbudāḥ

original: sauvīrāḥ saindhavā hūṇāḥ sālvāḥ kosalavāsināḥ // ViP_2,3.17 //
analyzed: sauvīrāḥ saindhavāḥ hūṇāḥ sālvāḥ kosala vāsināḥ

original: āsāṃ pibanti salilaṃ vasanti sahitāḥ sadā /
analyzed: āsām pibanti salilam vasanti sahitāḥ sadā

original: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparañca kaliścānyatra na kvacit // ViP_2,3.19 //
analyzed: kṛtam tretā dvāparan ca kaliḥ ca anyatra na kvacid
tapaḥ tapyanti munayaḥ juhvate ca atra yajvanaḥ

atrā api bhāratam śreṣṭham janbūdvīpe mahā mune

original: yato hi karmabhūreṣā hyatonyā bhogabhūmayaḥ // ViP_2,3.22 //
analyzed: yatas hi karma bhūḥ eṣā hi atas nyāḥ bhogabhūmayaḥ
atra janma sahasrāṇām sahasraiḥ api sattama

original: gāyanti devāḥ kila gītakāni dhanyāstu te bhārata bhūmibhāge /
analyzed: gāyanti devāḥ kila gītakāni dhanyāḥ tu te bhārata bhūmi bhāge

original: svargāpavargāspadamārgabhūte bhavanti bhūyaḥ puruṣāḥ suratvāt // ViP_2,3.24 //

original: avāpya tāṃ karmamahīmanante tasmillayaṃ ye tvamalāḥ prayānti // ViP_2,3.25 //
analyzed: avāpya tām karma mahīm anante tasmin layam ye tu amalāḥ prayānti

original: jānīma naitatkva vayaṃ vilīne svargaprade karmaṇi dehabandham /
analyzed: jānīma na etat kva vayam vilīne svarga prade karmaṇi deha bandham

original: prāpsyāma dhanyāḥ khalu te manuṣyā ye bhārate nendriyaviprahīnāḥ // ViP_2,3.26 //
analyzed: prāpsyāma dhanyāḥ khalu te manuṣyāḥ ye bhārate na indriya viprahīnāḥ

lakṣa yojana vistāram saṃkṣepāt kathitam tava
jambūdvīpam samāvṛtya lakṣa yojana vistaraḥ

iti śri viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe dvitīye aṃśe tṛtīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
kṣārodena yathā dvīpaḥ jambū saṃjñaḥ abhiveṣṭitaḥ

original: saṃveṣṭya kṣāramudadhiṃ plakṣadvīpas tathā sthitaḥ // ViP_2,4.1 //
analyzed: saṃveṣṭya kṣāram udadhim plakṣadvīpaḥ tathā sthitaḥ

original: sa evaṃ dviguṇo brahman plakṣadvīpa udāhṛtaḥ // ViP_2,4.2 //
analyzed: saḥ evam dviguṇaḥ brahman plakṣadvīpaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
sapta medhātitheḥ putrāḥ plakṣadvīpa īśvarasya vai
jyeṣṭha śāntahayaḥ nāma śiśiraḥ tad anantaraḥ

original: dhruvaś ca saptamasteṣāṃ plakṣadvīpeśvarā hi te // ViP_2,4.4 //

original: pūrvaṃ śāntahayaṃ varṣaṃ śiśiraṃ ca sukhaṃ tathā /

original: ānandaṃ ca śivaṃ caiva kṣemakaṃ dhruvameva ca // ViP_2,4.5 //

original: saptaiva teṣāṃ nāmāni śṛṇuṣva munisattama // ViP_2,4.6 //

original: gomadeścaiva candraś ca nāradau dundubhis tathā /
analyzed: candraḥ ca nāradau dundubhiḥ tathā
somakaḥ mumanāḥ ca eva vaibhrājaḥ ca eva saptamaḥ

original: nādhayo vyādhayo vāpi sarvakālasukhaṃ hi tat // ViP_2,4.9 //
analyzed: na ādhayaḥ vyādhayaḥ vā api sarva kāla sukham hi tat

original: teṣāṃ nadyastu saptaiva varṣāṇāṃ ca samudragāḥ /

original: nāmatastāḥ pravakṣyāmi śrutāḥ pāpaṃ haranti yāḥ // ViP_2,4.10 //

original: ete śailās tathā nadyaḥ pradhānāḥ kathitāstava /

original: na tvevāsti yugāvasthā teṣu stāneṣu saptasu // ViP_2,4.13 //

original: varṇāś ca tatra catvārastānnibodha vadāmi te // ViP_2,4.16 //

original: sīmarūpi jagatstraṣṭā sarvaḥ sarveśvaro hariḥ // ViP_2,4.19 //

original: nadyaś ca sapta tāsāṃ tu śṛṇu nāmānyanukramāt // ViP_2,4.42 //

original: dhūtapāpā śivā caiva pavitrā saṃmatis tathā /

original: vidyudambhā mahī cānyā sarvapāpa harāstvimāḥ // ViP_2,4.43 //

original: kuśadvīpe guśastambaḥ saṃjñayā tasya tatsmṛtam // ViP_2,4.44 //

analyzed: ghṛtodaḥ ca samudraḥ vai krauñcadvīpena saṃvṛtaḥ

original: muniś ca dundubhiścaiva saptaite tatsutā mune // ViP_2,4.48 //
analyzed: muniḥ ca dundubhiḥ ca eva saptā ete tad sutāḥ mune

original: nadīrmaitreya te tatra yāḥ pibanti śṛṇuṣva tāḥ /

original: kṣāntiś ca puṇḍarīkā ca saptaitā varṣanimnagāḥ // ViP_2,4.55 //
analyzed: kṣāntiḥ ca puṇḍarīkā ca saptā etāḥ varṣa nimnagāḥ

original: yāgau rudrasvarūpaś ca ijyate yajñasannidhau // ViP_2,4.56 //

original: āvṛtaḥ sarvataḥ krauñca dvīpatulyena mānataḥ // ViP_2,4.57 //

original: saptaiva tanayāstaṣāṃ dadau varṣāṇi sapta saḥ // ViP_2,4.59 //
analyzed: sapta eva tanayāḥ taṣām dadau varṣāṇi sapta saḥ

original: jaladaś ca kumāraś ca mukumāro marīcakaḥ /
analyzed: jaladaḥ ca kumāraḥ ca mukumāraḥ marīcakaḥ

original: kusumodaś ca maudākiḥ saptamaś ca mahādrumaḥ // ViP_2,4.60 //
analyzed: kusumodaḥ ca maudākiḥ saptamaḥ ca mahādrumaḥ
tad saṃjñāni eva tatra api sapta varṣāṇi anukramāt

pūrvaḥ tatra udayagiriḥ jalādhāraḥ tathā aparaḥ
