original: āmbikeyas tathā ramyaḥ kesarī parvatottamaḥ // ViP_2,4.62 //
analyzed: āmbikeyaḥ tathā ramyaḥ kesarī parvata uttamaḥ
śākaḥ tatra mahā vṛkṣaḥ siddha gandharva sevitaḥ
yatratya vāta saṃspārśāt āhlādaḥ jāyate paraḥ
tatra puṇyāḥ janapadāḥ cāturvarṇya samanvitāḥ
nadyaḥ ca atra mahā puṇyāḥ sarva pāpa bhaya apahāḥ

original: sukumārī kumārī ca nalinī dhenukā ca yā /
analyzed: sukumārī kumārī ca nalinī dhenukā ca yā

original: ikṣuś ca veṇukā caiva gabhastī saptamī tathā // ViP_2,4.65 //
analyzed: ikṣuḥ ca veṇukā ca eva gabhastī saptamī tathā
anyāḥ ca śataśas tatra kṣudra nadyaḥ mahā mune

original: mahīdharās tathā santi śataśotha sahasraśaḥ // ViP_2,4.66 //
analyzed: mahīdharāḥ tathā santi śataśas utha sahasraśas

original: tāḥ pibanti mudāyuktā jaladādiṣu ye sthitāḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ pibanti mudā yuktāḥ jalada ādiṣu ye sthitāḥ

original: varṣaṣu te janapadāḥ svargādabhyetya medinīm // ViP_2,4.67 //
analyzed: varṣaṣu te janapadāḥ svargāt abhyetya medinīm
dharma hāniḥ na teṣu asti na saṃgharṣaḥ parasparam

original: maryādāvyutkramo nāpi teṣu deśeṣu saptasu // ViP_2,4.68 //
analyzed: maryādā vyutkramaḥ na api teṣu deśeṣu saptasu

original: vaṅgāś ca māgadhāścaiva mānasā mandagās tathā /
analyzed: vaṅgāḥ ca māgadhāḥ ca eva mānasāḥ mandagāḥ tathā
vaṅgāḥ brahmaṇa bhūyiṣṭhāḥ māgadhāḥ kṣatriyāḥ tathā

original: vaiśyāstu mānasāsteṣāṃ śūdrasteṣāṃ tu mandagāḥ // ViP_2,4.69 //
analyzed: vaiśyāḥ tu mānasāḥ teṣām śūdraḥ teṣām tu mandagāḥ

original: śākadvīpe tu tair viṣṇuḥ sūryarūpadharo muneṃ /
analyzed: śākadvīpe tu taiḥ viṣṇuḥ sūrya rūpa dharaḥ muneṃ
yathā uktauḥ ijyate samyak karmabhiḥ niyata ātmabhiḥ
śākadvīpaḥ tu maitreya kṣirodena samāvṛtaḥ
śākadvīpa pramāṇena valayena iva veṣṭitaḥ
kṣirā abdhiḥ sarvatas brahman puṣkara ākhyena veṣṭitaḥ
dvīpena śākadvīpāt tu dvīguṇena samantataḥ
puṣkare savanasya api mahāvīraḥ abhavat sutaḥ

original: dhātukiś ca tayostatra dve varṣe nāmacihnite /
analyzed: dhātukiḥ ca tayoḥ tatra dve varṣe nāma cihnite
mahāvīram tathā eva anya dhātukīkhaṇḍa saṃjñitam
ekaḥ catra mahābhāga prakhyātaḥ varṣaparvataḥ
mānāsottara saṃjñaḥ vai madhyatas valaya ākṛtiḥ
yojanānām sahasrāṇi ūrdhvam pañcāśat ucchritaḥ

original: tāvadeva ca vistīrṇaḥ sarvataḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ // ViP_2,4.75 //
analyzed: tāvat eva ca vistīrṇaḥ sarvatas parimaṇḍalaḥ
puṣkaradvīpa valayam madhyena vibhajan iva

original: sthitosau tena vichinnaṃ jātaṃ tadvarṣakadvayam // ViP_2,4.76 //
analyzed: sthitā usau tena vichinnam jātam tat varṣaka dvayam
valaya ākāram ekaikam tayoḥ varṣam tathā giriḥ
daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi tatra jīvanti mānavāḥ
virāmayāḥ viśokāḥ ca rāga dveṣa ādi varjitāḥ

original: adhamottamau na teṣvāstāṃ na vadhyavadhakau dvija /
analyzed: adhama uttamau na teṣu āstām na vadhya vadhakau dvija

original: nerṣyāsūyā bhayaṃ dveṣo doṣo lobhādiko na ca // ViP_2,4.79 //
analyzed: na īrṣyā asūyā bhayam dveṣaḥ doṣaḥ lobha ādikaḥ na ca
mahāpītam bahis varṣam dhātakīkhaṇḍam antatas
mānasottara śaulasya deva daitya ādi sevitam
satya anṛtena tatra āstām dvīpe puṣkara saṃjñite

original: na tatra nadyaḥ śailā vā dvīpe varṣadvayānvite // ViP_2,4.81 //
analyzed: na tatra nadyaḥ śailāḥ vā dvīpe varṣa dvaya anvite
tulya peṣāḥ tu manujāḥ devāḥ tatra eka rūpiṇaḥ
varṇa āśrama ācāra hīnam dharma ācaraṇa varjitam
trayī vārtā daṇḍanīti śuśrūṣā rahitam ca yat
varṣa dvayam tu maitreya bhaumaḥ svargoyam uttamaḥ
sarva ṛtu sukha daḥ kālaḥ jarā roga ādi varjitaḥ

original: dhātakīkhaṇḍasaṃjñe 'tha mahāvīre ca vai mune // ViP_2,4.84 //
analyzed: dhātakīkhaṇḍa saṃjñe atha mahāvīre ca vai mune
nyagrodhaḥ puṣkaradvīpe brahmaṇaḥ sthānam uttamam
tasmin avasati brahmā pūjyamānaḥ sura asuraiḥ
svādu udakena udadhinā puṣkaraḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ
samena puṣkarasya eva vistārāt maṇḍalam tathā

original: evaṃ dvīpāḥ samudraiś ca saptasaptabhir āvṛtāḥ /
analyzed: evam dvīpāḥ samudraiḥ ca sapta saptabhiḥ āvṛtāḥ

original: dvīpaścaiva samudraś ca samāno dviguṇau parau // ViP_2,4.87 //
analyzed: dvīpaḥ ca eva samudraḥ ca samānaḥ dviguṇau parau
payāṃsi sarvadā sarva samudreṣu samāni vai
nyūna atirikta tā teṣām kadācid nā eva jāyate
sthālī stham agnī saṃyogāt udreki salile
tathā indu vṛddhau salilam aṃbhodhau muni sattama
anyūna anatiriktāḥ ca vardhanti āpaḥ hrasaṃti ca
udaya astamaneṣu indoḥ pakṣayoḥ śukla kṛṣṇayoḥ
daśa uttarāṇi pañca eva hi aṅgulānām śatāni vai

original: apāṃ vṛddhikṣaṇo dṛṣṭau sāmudrīṇāṃ mahāmune // ViP_2,4.91 //
analyzed: apām vṛddhi kṣaṇaḥ dṛṣṭau sāmudrīṇām mahā mune
bhojanam puṣkaradvīpe tatra svayam upasthitam

original: ṣaḍrasaṃ bhuñjate vipra prajāḥ sarvāḥ sadaiva hi // ViP_2,4.92 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ rasam bhuñjate vipra prajāḥ sarvāḥ sadā eva hi
svādu udakasya paritas loka saṃsthitiḥ
dviguṇā kāñcanī bhūmiḥ sarva jantu vivarjitā
lokālokaḥ tatas śailaḥ jojana ayuta vistṛtaḥ

original: ucchrāyeṇāpi tāvanti sahasrāṇyacalo hi saḥ // ViP_2,4.94 //
analyzed: ucchrāyeṇa api tāvanti sahasrāṇi acalaḥ hi saḥ

original: tatastamaḥ samāvṛtya taṃ śaulaṃ sarvataḥ sthitam /
analyzed: tatas tamaḥ samāvṛtya tam śaulam sarvatas sthitam
tamaḥ ca aṇḍa kaṭāhena samantāt pariveṣṭitam
pañcaśat koṭi vistārā sā iyam urva mahā mune
saha eva aṇḍa kaṭāhena sa dvīpa abdhi mahīdharā
sā iyam dhātrī vidhātrī ca sarva bhūta guṇa adhikā
sarveṣām maitreya jagatām iti
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe dvitīye aṃśe caturthaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: vistāra eṣa kathitaḥ pṛthivyā bhavato mayā /
analyzed: vistāraḥ eṣa kathitaḥ pṛthivyāḥ bhavataḥ mayā
saptatiḥ tu sahasrāṇi dvijocchrāyaḥ api kathyate
daśa sāhasram ekaikam pātālam muni sattama

original: atalaṃ vitalaṃ caiva nitalaṃ ca gabhastimat /
analyzed: atalam vitalam ca eva nitalam ca gabhastimat

original: mahākhyaṃ sutalaṃ cāgryaṃ pātālaṃ cāpi saptamam // ViP_2,5.2 //
analyzed: mahā ākhyam sutalam ca agryam pātālam ca api saptamam
śukla a kṛṣṇa aruṇāḥ pītāḥ śarkarāḥ śaila kāñcanāḥ
bhūmayaḥ yatra maitreya para grāsāt a maṇḍitāḥ

original: teṣu dānavadaiteyā yakṣāś ca śataśas tathā /
analyzed: teṣu dānava daiteyāḥ yakṣāḥ ca śataśas tathā

original: nivasanti mahānāgajā tayaś ca mahāmune // ViP_2,5.4 //
analyzed: nivasanti mahā nāga jā tayaḥ ca mahā mune
svar lokāt api ramyāṇi pātālāni iti nāradaḥ

original: prāha svargasadaṃ madhye pātālābhyāgato divi // ViP_2,5.5 //
analyzed: prāha svargasadam madhye pātāla abhyāgataḥ divi
āhlāda kāriṇaḥ śubhrāḥ maṇayaḥ yatra su prabhāḥ
nāga ābharaṇa bhūṣāsu pātālam kena tat samam
daitya dānava kanyābhiḥ itas ca etas ca śobhite

original: pātāle kasya na prītirvimuktasyāpi jāyate // ViP_2,5.7 //
analyzed: pātāle kasya na prītiḥ vimuktasya api jāyate
divā arka raśmayaḥ yatra prabhām tanvanti na ātapam

original: śaśiraśmir na śītāya niśi dyotāya kevalam // ViP_2,5.8 //
analyzed: śaśi raśmiḥ na śītāya niśi dyotāya kevalam
bhakṣya bhojya mahā pāna muditaiḥ api bhogibhiḥ

original: yatra na jñāyate kālo gatopi danujādibhiḥ // ViP_2,5.9 //
analyzed: yatra na jñāyate kālaḥ gataḥ api danuja ādibhiḥ
vanāni nadyaḥ ramyāṇi sarāṃsi kamala ākarāḥ
puṃskokila abhilāpāḥ ca manojñāni ambarāṇi ca
bhūṣaṇāni ati śubhrāṇi gandha āḍhyam ca anulepanam
vīṇā veṇu mṛdaṅgānām svanaiḥ a pūritāni ca
etāni anyāni ca udāra bhagya bhogyāni tānavaiḥ
daitya uragaiḥ ca bhujyante pātāla antara gocaraiḥ
pātālānām adhas ca āste viṣṇoḥ yā tāmasī tanuḥ

original: śeṣakhyā yadruṇānvaktuṃ na śaktā daityadānavāḥ // ViP_2,5.13 //
analyzed: śeṣa khyāḥ yat ruṇā anvaktum na śaktāḥ daitya dānavāḥ
pāṭhyate siddhaiḥ daivaḥ deva ṛṣi pūjitaḥ
sa sahasra śirāḥ vyakta svasti kāmala bhūṣaṇaḥ
phaṇāmaṇi sahasreṇa yaḥ sa vidyotayan diśaḥ
sarvān karoti nirviryān hitāya jagataḥ asurān
mada āghūrṇita netra usau yaḥ sadā eva eka kumḍalaḥ

original: kiriṭī sragdharo bhāti sāgniḥ śveta ivācalaḥ // ViP_2,5.16 //
analyzed: kiriṭī sraj dharaḥ bhāti sa agniḥ śvetaḥ iva acalaḥ
nīla vāsāḥ mada utsiktaḥ śveta hāra upaśobhitaḥ
sa abhra gaṅgā pravāhaḥ usau kailāsa adriḥ iva aparaḥ
lāṅgala āsakta hasta agraḥ bibhran musalam utamam

original: upāsyate svayaṃ kāntyā yo vāruṇyā ca mūrtayā // ViP_2,5.18 //
analyzed: upāsyate svayam kāntyā yaḥ vāruṇyā ca mūrtayā
kalpa ante yasya vaktrebhyaḥ viṣa anala śikhā ujjvalaḥ
saṃkarṣaṇa ātmakaḥ rūdraḥ niṣkramya atti jagattrayam
sa bibhrat śekharībhūtam aśeṣam kṣiti maṇḍalam
āste pātāla mūla sthaḥ śeṣaḥ aśeṣa sura arcitaḥ

original: tasya vīryaṃ prabhāvaś ca svarūpaṃ rūpameva ca /
analyzed: tasya vīryam prabhāvaḥ ca svarūpam rūpam eva ca

original: na hi varṇayituṃ śakyaṃ jñātuṃ ca tridaśair api // ViP_2,5.21 //
analyzed: na hi varṇayitum śakyam jñātum ca tridaśaiḥ api
yasya eṣā sakalā pṛthvī phaṇāmaṇi śikhā rūṇā
āste kusuma mālā iva kaḥ tat vīryam vadiṣyati
yadā vijṛmbhat enantaḥ mada āghūrṇita locanaḥ

original: tadā calati bhūreṣā sābdhitoyā sakānanā // ViP_2,5.23 //
analyzed: tadā calati bhūḥ eṣā sa abdhi toyā sa kānanā
gandharva apsarasaḥ siddhāḥ kinnara uraga cāraṇāḥ
na antam guṇānām gacchanti tena anantaḥ yam avyayaḥ
yasya nāga vadhū hastaiḥ laṃbitam hari candanam
muhur śvāsa anila apāstam yāti diś kṣoda vāsatām
yam ārādhya pūrāṇa ṛṣiḥ gargaḥ jyotīṃṣi tattvataḥ
jñātavān sakalam ca eva nimitta paṭhitam phalam
tena iyam nāga varyeṇa śirasā vidhṛtā mahī
bibharti mālām lokānām sa deva asura mānuṣām
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāhurāṇe dvitīraye aṃśe pañcamaḥ adhyāya
parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: tataś ca narakā vipra bhuvodhaḥ salilasya ca /
analyzed: tatas ca narakāḥ vipra bhuvaḥ ūdhaḥ salilasya ca
pāpinaḥ yeṣu pātyante tān śṛṇuṣva mahā mune
rauravaḥ sūkaraḥ rodhaḥ tālaḥ viśasanaḥ tathā
mahājvālaḥ taptakumbhaḥ vilohitaḥ

original: asipatravanaṃ kṛṣṇo lālābhakṣaś ca dāruṇaḥ // ViP_2,6.3 //
analyzed: asipatravanam kṛṣṇaḥ lālābhakṣaḥ ca dāruṇaḥ

original: tathā pūyavahaḥ pāpo vahnijvālo hyadhaḥ śirāḥ /
analyzed: tathā pūya vahaḥ pāpaḥ vahni jvālaḥ hi adhas sirāḥ

original: saṃdaṃśaḥ kālasūtraś ca tamaścāvīcireva ca // ViP_2,6.4 //
analyzed: saṃdaṃśaḥ kālasūtraḥ ca tamaḥ ca avīciḥ eva ca
śvabhojanaḥ utha apratiṣṭhaḥ ca apraciḥ ca tathā paraḥ
iti evamādayaḥ ca anye narakāḥ bhṛśa dārūṇāḥ
yamasya viṣaye ghorāḥ śastra agni bhaya dāyinaḥ

original: patanti yeṣu puruṣāḥ pāpakarmaratāstu ye // ViP_2,6.6 //
analyzed: patanti yeṣu puruṣāḥ pāpa karma ratāḥ tu ye
kūṭa sākṣī tathā asamyak pakṣapātena yaḥ vadet

original: yaścānyadanṛtaṃ vakti sa naro yāti rauravam // ViP_2,6.7 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca anyat anṛtam vakti sa naraḥ yāti rauravam

original: bhrūṇahā purahantā ca gaughnaś ca munisattama /
analyzed: bhrūṇa hā pura hantā ca gaughnaḥ ca muni sattama

original: yānti te narakaṃ rodhaṃ yaścocchvāsanirodhakaḥ // ViP_2,6.8 //
analyzed: yānti te narakam rodham yaḥ ca ucchvāsa nirodhakaḥ

original: surāpo brahmahā hartā suvarṇasya ca sūkare /
analyzed: surā paḥ brahma hā hartā suvarṇasya ca sūkare

original: prayānti narake yaś ca taiḥ saṃsargamupaiti vai // ViP_2,6.9 //
analyzed: prayānti narake yaḥ ca taiḥ saṃsargam upaiti vai
rājanya vaiśya hantā ca tathā eva guru talpa gaḥ

original: taptakuṇḍesvasṛgāmī hanti rājabhaṭāṃś ca yaḥ // ViP_2,6.10 //
analyzed: hanti rāja bhaṭān ca yaḥ
sādhvī vikraya kṛt bandha pālaḥ kesari vikrayī

original: taptalohe patanty ete yaś ca ca bhaktaṃ parityajet // ViP_2,6.11 //
analyzed: taptalohe patanti ete yaḥ ca ca bhaktam parityajet

original: snuṣāṃ sutāṃ cāpi gatvā mahājvāle nipātyate /
analyzed: snuṣām sutām ca api gatvā mahājvāle nipātyate

original: avamantā gurūṇāṃ yo yaścākroṣṭā narādhamaḥ // ViP_2,6.12 //
analyzed: avamantā gurūṇām yaḥ yaḥ ca ākroṣṭā nara adhamaḥ
veda dūṣayitā ayaḥ ca veda vikrayakaḥ ca yaḥ

original: agamyagāmī yaś ca syātte yānti lavaṇaṃ dvija // ViP_2,6.13 //
analyzed: agamya gāmī yaḥ ca syāt te yānti lavaṇam dvija

original: coro vilohe patati maryādādūṣakas tathā // ViP_2,6.14 //
analyzed: coraḥ vilohe patati maryādā dūṣakaḥ tathā
deva dvija pitṛ dveṣṭā ratna dvaṣayitā ca yaḥ

original: sa yāti krimibhakṣe vai krimiśe ca duriṣṭakṛt // ViP_2,6.15 //
analyzed: sa yāti krimi bhakṣe vai krimiśe ca duriṣṭa kṛt
pitṛ deva atithīn tyaktvā paryaśnāti nara adhamaḥ

original: lālābhakṣe sa yāty ugre śarakartā ca vedhake // ViP_2,6.16 //
karoti karṇano yaś ca yaś ca khaṅgādikṛnnaraḥ /
analyzed: karoti yaḥ ca yaḥ ca khaṅga ādi kṛt naraḥ
prayānti ete viśasane narake bhṛśa daruṇe
asat pratigṛhītā tu narake yāti adhomukhe
a yājya yājakaḥ ca eva tathā nakṣatrasūcakaḥ

original: vegī pūyavahe caiko yāti maṣṭānnabhuṅgaraḥ // ViP_2,6.19 //
analyzed: vegī pūyavahe ca ekaḥ yāti maṣṭa anna bhuṅgaraḥ
lākṣā māsa rasānām ca tilānām lavaṇasya ca

original: vikretā brahmaṇo yāti tameva narakaṃ dvija // ViP_2,6.20 //
analyzed: vikretā brahmaṇaḥ yāti tam eva narakam dvija
mārjāra kukkuṭa chāga śva varāha vihaṅgamān
poṣayan narakam yāti tam eva dvijasattama
raṅga upajīvī kaivartaḥ kumḍāśī garadaḥ tathā

original: sūcī māhiṣakaścaiva parvakārī ca yo dvijaḥ // ViP_2,6.22 //
analyzed: sūcī māhiṣakaḥ ca eva parva kārī ca yaḥ dvijaḥ
agāra dāhī mitra ghnaḥ śākuniḥ grama yājakaḥ

original: rudhirāndhe patantyete somaṃ vikrīṇate ca ye // ViP_2,6.23 //
analyzed: rudhirāndhe patanti ete somam vikrīṇate ca ye

original: makhahā grāmahantā ca yāti vaitaraṇīṃ naraḥ // ViP_2,6.24 //
analyzed: makha hā grāma hantā ca yāti vaitaraṇīm naraḥ
retaḥ pāta ādi kartāraḥ maryādā bhedinaḥ hi ye

original: te kṛṣṇe yāntyaśaucāś ca kuhakājīvinaś ca ye // ViP_2,6.25 //
analyzed: te kṛṣṇe yānti aśaucāḥ ca kuhaka ājīvinaḥ ca ye
asipatravanam yāti vana chedī vṛthā eva yaḥ

original: aurabhriko mṛgavyādho vahnijvāle patanti vai // ViP_2,6.26 //
analyzed: aurabhrikaḥ mṛgavyādhaḥ vahnijvāle patanti vai

original: yāntyete dvija tatraiva ye cāpākeṣu vahnidāḥ // ViP_2,6.27 //
analyzed: yānti ete dvija tatra eva ye ca apākeṣu vahni dāḥ
vratānām lopakaḥ yaḥ ca sva āśramāt vicyutaḥ ca yaḥ
sandaṃśa yātanā madhye patataḥ tau ubhau api

original: divā svapne ca skandante ye narā brahmacāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: divā svapne ca skandante ye narāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: putrair adhyāpitā ye ca te patanti śvabhojane // ViP_2,6.29 //
analyzed: putraiḥ adhyāpitāḥ ye ca te patanti śvabhojane

original: ete cānye ca narakāḥ śataśotha sahasraśaḥ /
analyzed: ete ca anye ca narakāḥ sahasraśas
yeṣu duṣkṛta karmāṇaḥ pacyante yātanā gatāḥ
yathā eva pāpāni etāni tathā anyāni sahasraśas
bhujyante tāni puruṣaiḥ naraka antara gocaraiḥ

original: varṇāśramaviruddhaṃ ca karma kurvanti ye narāḥ /
analyzed: varṇa āśrama viruddham ca karma kurvanti ye narāḥ

original: karmaṇā manasā vācā nirayeṣu patanti te // ViP_2,6.32 //
analyzed: karmaṇā manasā vācā nirayeṣu patanti te
adhas śirobhiḥ dṛśyante nārakaiḥ divi devatāḥ
devāḥ ca adhomukhān sarvān adhas paśyanti nārakān

original: sthāvarāḥ krimayobjāś ca pakṣiṇaḥ paśavo narāḥ /
analyzed: sthāvarāḥ krimayaḥ ubjāḥ ca pakṣiṇaḥ paśavaḥ narāḥ
dhārmikāḥ tridaśāḥ tad hat mokṣiṇaḥ ca yathākramam
sahasra bhāga prathamāḥ dvitīya anukramāḥ tathā
sarve hi ete mahābhāgāḥ yāvat mukti samāśrayāḥ
yāvantaḥ jantavaḥ svarge tāvantaḥ naraka okasaḥ
pāpa kṛt yāti narakam prāyās citta parāṅmukhaḥ
pāpānām anurūpāṇi prāyaścittāni yat yathā

original: tathā tathaiva saṃsmṛtya proktāni paramarṣibhiḥ // ViP_2,6.37 //
analyzed: tathā tathā eva saṃsmṛtya proktāni parama ṛṣibhiḥ

original: pāpe gurūṇi guruṇi svalpānyalpe ca tadvidaḥ /
analyzed: pāpe gurūṇi guruṇi su alpāni alpe ca tad vidaḥ
prāyaścittāni maitreya jaguḥ svāyaṃbhuva ādayaḥ
prāyaścittāni aśeṣāṇi tapaḥ karma tmakāni vai
yāni kṛṣṇa anusmaraṇam param

original: kṛte pāpe 'nutāpo vai yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate /
analyzed: kṛte pāpe anutāpaḥ vai yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate

original: prāyaścittaṃ tu tasyaikaṃ harisaṃsmaraṇaṃ param // ViP_2,6.40 //
analyzed: prāyaścittam tu tasya ekam hari saṃsmaraṇam param
prātar niśi tathā sandhyā madhyāhna ādiṣu saṃsmaran
nārāyaṇam avāpnoti sadyas pāpa kṣayan naraḥ
viṣṇu saṃsmaraṇāt kṣīṇa samasta kleśa sañcayaḥ
muktim prayāti svarga āptiḥ tasya vighnaḥ anumīyate
vāsudeve manaḥ yasya japa homa arcana ādiṣu
tasya antarāyaḥ maitreya deva indra tva ādikam phalam
kva nāka pṛṣṭha gamanam punarāvṛtti lakṣaṇam
kva japaḥ vāsudeva iti mukti bījam anuttamam
tasmāt aharniśam viṣṇu saṃsmaran puruṣaḥ mune

original: na yāti narakaṃ martyaḥ saṃkṣīṇākhilapātakaḥ // ViP_2,6.45 //
analyzed: na yāti narakam martyaḥ saṃkṣīṇa akhila pātakaḥ
manaḥ prīti karaḥ svargaḥ narakaḥ tad viparyayaḥ
naraka svarga saṃjñe vai pāpa puṇye dvijottama
vastu ekam eva duḥkhāya sukhāya iṣrī āgamāya ca

original: kopāya ca yatastasmādvastu vastvātmakaṃ kutaḥ // ViP_2,6.47 //
analyzed: kopāya ca yatas tasmāt vastu vastu ātmakam kutas

original: tadeva prītaye bhūtvā punarduḥkhā ya jāyate /
analyzed: tat eva prītaye bhūtvā jāyate

original: tadeva kopāya yataḥ prasādāya ca jāyate // ViP_2,6.48 //
analyzed: tat eva kopāya yatas prasādāya ca jāyate
tasmāt duḥkha ātmakam nā asti na ca kiñcid sukha ātmakam
manasaḥ sukha duḥkha ādi lakṣamaḥ

original: jñānameva paraṃ brahma jñānaṃ bandhāya ceṣyate /
analyzed: jñānam eva param brahma jñānam bandhāya ca iṣyate

original: jñānatmakamidaṃ viśvaṃ na jñānādvidyate param // ViP_2,6.50 //
analyzed: jñāna tmakam idam viśvam na jñānāt vidyate param
vidyā avidyā iti maitreya jñānam eva upadhāraya
evam etat mayā ākhyātam bhavataḥ maṇḍalam bhuvaḥ

original: pātālāni ca sarvāṇi tathāva narakā dvija // ViP_2,6.52 //
analyzed: pātālāni ca sarvāṇi narakāḥ dvija
samudrāḥ parvatāḥ ca eva dvīpāḥ varṣāṇi nimnagāḥ
saṃkṣepāt sarvam ākhyātam kim bhūyas śrotum icchasi
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe dvitīye aṃśe ṣaṣṭhaḥ adhyāyaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca
kathitam bhū talam brahman bhama etat akhilam tvayā
bhuvarloka ādikān lokān śrotum icchāmi aham mune
tathā eva graha saṃsthānam pramāṇāni yathā tathā
samācakṣva mahābhāga tat mahyam paripṛcchate
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
ravi candramasoḥ yāvat mayūkhaiḥ avabhāsyate
sa samudra sarit śailā tāvatī pṛthivī smṛtā
yāvat pramāṇā pṛthivī vistāra parimaṇḍalāt
nabhaḥ tāvan pramāṇam vai vyāsa maṇḍalataḥ dvija

original: bhūmeryo janalakṣe tu sauraṃ maitreya maṇḍalam /
analyzed: bhūmeḥ yaḥ jana lakṣe tu sauram maitreya maṇḍalam
lakṣāt divākarasya api maṇḍalam śaśinaḥ sthitam
śata sahasre tu yojanānām niśākarāt
nakṣatra maṇḍalam kṛtstram upariṣṭāt prakāśate

original: dve lakṣe cottare brahman budho nakṣatramaṇḍalāt /
analyzed: dve lakṣe ca uttare brahman budhaḥ nakṣatra maṇḍalāt
tāvat pramāṇa bhāge tu budhasya api uśanāḥ sthitaḥ
aṅgarakaḥ upi śukrasya tad pramāṇe vyavasthitaḥ

original: lakṣadvaye tu bhaumasya sthito devapurohitaḥ // ViP_2,7.8 //
analyzed: lakṣa dvaye tu bhaumasya sthitaḥ devapurohitaḥ
sauriḥ bṛhaspateḥ ca ūrdhvam dvi lakṣe samavasthitaḥ
saptarṣi maṇḍalam tasmāt lakṣam ekam dvijottamā
ṛṣibhyaḥ tu sahasrāṇām śatāt ūrdhvam vyavasthitaḥ

original: meḍhībhūtaḥ samastasya jyotiścakrasya vai dhruvaḥ // ViP_2,7.10 //
analyzed: meḍhī bhūtaḥ samastasya jyotiścakrasya vai dhruvaḥ
trailokyam etat kathitam utsedhena mahā mune

original: ijyāphalasya bhūreṣā ijyā cātra pratiṣṭhitā // ViP_2,7.11 //
analyzed: ijyā phalasya bhūḥ eṣā ijyā ca atra pratiṣṭhitā
dhruvāt ūrdhvam mahar lokaḥ yatra te kalpa vāsināḥ
eka yojana koṭiḥ tu yatra te kalpa vāsinaḥ

original: dve koṭī tu jano loko yatra te brahmaṇaḥ sutāḥ /
analyzed: dve koṭī tu janaḥ lokaḥ yatra te brahmaṇaḥ sutāḥ
sanandana ādyāḥ prathitāḥ maitreya amala cetasaḥ
catur gaṇa uttare ca ūrdhvam janalokāt tapaḥ sthitaḥ

original: vairājā yatra te devāḥ sthitā dāhavivarjitāḥ // ViP_2,7.14 //
analyzed: vairājāḥ yatra te devāḥ sthitāḥ dāha vivarjitāḥ
ṣaḍguṇena tapolokān satyalokaḥ virājate

original: apunarmārakā yatra brahmaloko hi saṃsmṛtaḥ // ViP_2,7.15 //
analyzed: a punar mārakāḥ yatra brahma lokaḥ hi saṃsmṛtaḥ
pāda gamyantu yat kiñcid vastu asti pṛthivī mayam

original: sa bhūrlokaḥ samākhyāto vistaro 'sya mayoditaḥ // ViP_2,7.16 //
analyzed: sa bhūrlokaḥ samākhyātaḥ vistaraḥ asya mayā uditaḥ
bhūmi mūrya antaram yat ca siddha ādi muni sevitam

original: bhuvarlokastu so 'py ukto dvitīyo munisattama // ViP_2,7.17 //
analyzed: bhuvarlokaḥ tu saḥ api uktaḥ dvitīyaḥ muni sattama
dhruva sūrya antaram yat ca niyutāni caturdaśa
svarlokaḥ saḥ api gaditaḥ loka saṃsthāna cintakaiḥ
trailokyam atatkṛtakam maitreya paripaṭhyate

original: janastapas tathā satyamiti cākṛtakaṃ trayam // ViP_2,7.19 //
analyzed: janaḥ tapaḥ tathā satyam iti ca akṛtakam trayam
kṛtaka akṛtayoḥ madhye mahar lokaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: śunyo bhavati kalpānte yotyantaṃ na vinaśyati // ViP_2,7.20 //
analyzed: śunyaḥ bhavati kalpa ante yoti antam na vinaśyati

original: ete sapta mayā lokā maitreya kathitāstava /
analyzed: ete sapta mayā lokāḥ maitreya kathitāḥ tava

original: pātālāni ca saptaiva brahmāṇḍasyaiṣa vistaraḥ // ViP_2,7.21 //
analyzed: pātālāni ca sapta eva brahmāṇḍasya eṣa vistaraḥ
etad aṇḍa kaṭāhena tiryak ca ūdhvam adhas tathā

original: kapitthasya yathā bījaṃ sarvato vai samāvṛtam // ViP_2,7.22 //
analyzed: kapitthasya yathā bījam sarvatas vai samāvṛtam
daśa uttareṇa payasā maitreya aṇḍam ca tat vṛtam
sarva umbu paridhānā usau vahninā veṣṭitaḥ bahis

original: vahniś ca vāyunā vāyurmaitreya nabhasā vṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vahniḥ ca vāyunā vāyuḥ maitreya nabhasā vṛtaḥ
bhūtādinā nabhaḥ saḥ api mahatā pariveṣṭitaḥ
deśa uttarāmi aśeṣāṇi maitreya etāni sapta vai
mahāntam ca samāvṛtya pradhānam samavasthitam

original: anantasya na tasyāntaḥ saṃkhyānaṃ cāpi vidyate // ViP_2,7.25 //
analyzed: anantasya na tasya antar saṃkhyānam ca api vidyate
tat anantam asaṃkhyāta pramāṇam ca api vai yatas

original: hetubhūtamaśeṣasya prakṛtiḥ sā parā mune // ViP_2,7.26 //
analyzed: hetu bhūtam aśeṣasya prakṛtiḥ sā parā mune
aṇḍānām tu sahasrāṇām sahasrāṇi ayutāni ca

original: īdṛśānāṃ tathā tatra koṭikoṭiśatāni ca // ViP_2,7.27 //
analyzed: īdṛśānām tathā tatra koṭi koṭi śatāni ca
hāruṇī agniḥ yathā tailam tile tadvat pumān api
pradhāne avasthitaḥ vyāpī cetanā ātmā ātma vedanaḥ
pradhānam ca pumān ca eva sarva bhūtātma bhūtayā
viṣṇu śaktyā mahābuddhe vṛtau saṃśraya dharmiṇau
tayoḥ sā eva pṛthak bhāva kāraṇam saṃśrayasya ca
kṣobha kāraṇa bhūtā ca sarga kāle mahāmate

original: yathā saktaṃ jale vāto bibharti kaṇikāśatam /
analyzed: yathā saktam jale vātaḥ bibharti kaṇikā śatam

original: śaktiḥ sāpi tathā viṣṇoḥ pradhānapuruṣātmakam // ViP_2,7.31 //
analyzed: śaktiḥ sā api tathā viṣṇoḥ pradhāna puruṣa ātmakam
yathā ca pāda yauḥ mūla skandha śākhā ādi saṃyutaḥ
ādi bījāt prabhavati bījāni anyāni vai tatas
prabhāvanti tatas tebhyaḥ sambhavanti apare drumāḥ
te api tad lakṣaṇa dravya kāraṇa anugatāḥ mune
evam avyākṛtāt pūrvam jāyante mahat ādayaḥ
viśaṃṣā antāḥ statas tebhyaḥ saṃbhavanti asura ādayaḥ

original: tebhyaś ca putrāsteṣāṃ ca putrāṇāmapare sutāḥ // ViP_2,7.34 //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ ca putrāḥ teṣām ca putrāṇām apare sutāḥ
bījāt vṛkṣa praroheṇa yathā na apacayaḥ taroḥ
bhūtānām bhūta sargeṇa na eva asti apacayaḥ tathā
sannidhānāt yathā ākāśa kāla ādyāḥ kāraṇam taroḥ
tathā eva apariṇāmā iva viśvasya bhagavān hariḥ

original: vrīhibīje yathā mūlaṃ nālaṃ patrāṅkurau tathā /
analyzed: vrīhi bīje yathā mūlam nālam patra aṅkurau tathā

original: kāṇḍakoṣastu puṣpaṃ ca kṣīraṃ tadvacca taṇjulāḥ // ViP_2,7.37 //
analyzed: kāṇḍa koṣaḥ tu puṣpam ca kṣīram tadvat ca taṇjulāḥ

original: tuṣāḥ kaṇāś ca santo vai yāntyāvirbhāvamātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tuṣāḥ kaṇāḥ ca santaḥ vai yānti āvirbhāvam ātmanaḥ
praroha hetu sāmagryam āsādya muni sattama
tathā karmasu anekeṣu deva ādyāḥ samavasthitāḥ
viṣṇu śaktim samāsādya praroham upayānti vai

original: sa ca viṣṇuḥ paraṃ brahma yataḥ sarvamidaṃ jagat /
analyzed: sa ca viṣṇuḥ param brahma yatas sarvam idam jagat

original: jagacca yo yatra cedaṃ yasmiṃś ca layameṣyati // ViP_2,7.40 //
analyzed: jagat ca yaḥ yatra ca idam yasmin ca layam eṣyati
tat brahma tat param dhāma sat asat paramam padam
yasya sarvam abhedena yatas ca etat carācaram

original: sa eva mūla prakṛtirvyaktarūpī jagacca saḥ /
analyzed: taḥ eva jagat ca saḥ

original: tasminneva layaṃ sarvaṃ yāti tatra ca tiṣṭhati // ViP_2,7.42 //
analyzed: tasmin eva layam sarvam yāti tatra ca tiṣṭhati

original: kattā kriyāṇāṃ sa ca ijyate kratuḥ sa evatatkarmaphalaṃ ca tasya /
analyzed: kattā kriyāṇām sa ca ijyate kratuḥ saḥ eva tad karma phalam ca tasya
struc ādi yat sādhanam api aśeṣam hareḥ na
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe dvitīye aṃśe saptamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
prāśaraḥ uvāca
vyākhyātam ā etat brahmaṇḍa saṃsthānam tava suvrata

original: tataḥ pramāṇasaṃsthāne sūryādīnāṃ śṛṇuṣva mai // ViP_2,8.1 //
analyzed: tatas pramāṇa saṃsthāne sūrya ādīnām śṛṇuṣva mai
yojanānām sahasrāṇi bhāskarasya rathaḥ nava
īṣā daṇḍaḥ tathā eva asya dviguṇaḥ muni sattama
sārdha koṭiḥ tathā sapta niyutāni adhikāni vai

original: yojanānāṃ tu tasyākṣastatra cakraṃ pratiṣṭhitam // ViP_2,8.3 //
analyzed: yojanānām tu tasya akṣaḥ tatra cakram pratiṣṭhitam
tri nābhimati pañca are
saṃvatsara maye kṛtstram kālacakram pratiṣṭhitam

original: hayāś ca saptacchadāṃsi teṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu /
analyzed: hayāḥ ca sapta chadāṃsi teṣām nāmāni me śṛṇu
gāyatrī ca bṛhatī uṣṇih jagatī triṣṭubhā iva ca
anuṣṭubh paṅktiḥ iti uktā chandāṃsi harayaḥ raveḥ
catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi dvitīyaḥ akṣaḥ vivasvataḥ

original: pañcānyāni tu sārdhāni syandanasya mahāmate // ViP_2,8.6 //
analyzed: pañca anyāni tu sārdhāni syandanasya mahāmate
ā akṣa pramāṇam ubhayoḥ pramāṇam tat yuga ardhayoḥ
hrasva ukṣaḥ tad yuga ardhena dhruva ādhāraḥ rathasya vai

original: dvitīyekṣe tu taccakraṃ sasthitaṃ mānasācale // ViP_2,8.7 //
analyzed: dvitīya ikṣe tu tat cakram sasthitam mānasa acale
mānasottara śailasya pūrvatas vāsavī purī

original: dakṣiṇe tu yama syānyāpratīcyāṃ varuṇasya ca /
analyzed: dakṣiṇe tu varuṇasya ca

original: uttareṇa ca somasya tāsāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu // ViP_2,8.8 //
analyzed: uttareṇa ca somasya tāsām nāmāni me śṛṇu
vasvaukasārā śakrasya yāmyā saṃyamanī tathā

original: purī sukhājaleśasya somasya ca vibhāvarī // ViP_2,8.9 //
analyzed: purī sukhājaleśasya somasya ca vibhāvarī
kāṣṭhām gataḥ dakṣiṇatas kṣipta iṣuḥ iva sarpati
maitreya bhagavān bhānuḥ jyotiṣām cakra saṃyutaḥ
ahar rātra vyavasthāna kāraṇam bhagavān raviḥ

original: devayānaḥ paraḥ panthā yogināṃ kleśasaṃkṣaye // ViP_2,8.11 //
analyzed: deva yānaḥ paraḥ panthāḥ yoginām kleśa saṃkṣaye
divasasya variḥ madhye sarvākālam vyavasthitaḥ

original: sarvadvīpeṣu maitreya niśārdhasya ca sanmukhaḥ // ViP_2,8.12 //
analyzed: sarva dvīpeṣu maitreya niśārdhasya ca sat mukhaḥ
udaya astamane ca eva sarvakālam tu saṃmukhe

original: vidiśāsu tvaśeṣāsu tathā brahman diśāsu ca // ViP_2,8.13 //
analyzed: vidiśāsu tu aśeṣāsu tathā brahman diśāsu ca

original: yair yatra dṛśyate bhāsvānsa teṣāmudayaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yaiḥ yatra dṛśyate bhāsvān sa teṣām udayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tirobhāvaṃ ca yatraiti tatraivāstamanaṃ raveḥ // ViP_2,8.14 //
analyzed: tirobhāvam ca yatra eti tatra eva astamanam raveḥ
na eva astamanam arkasya na udayaḥ sarvadā sataḥ
udaya astamana ākhyam hi darśana adarśanam raveḥ
śakra ādīnām pure tiṣṭhan spṛśati eṣa puratrayam

original: vikoṇau dvau vikoṇasthastrīn koṇāndve pure tathā // ViP_2,8.16 //
analyzed: vikoṇau dvau vikoṇa sthaḥ trīn koṇān dve pure tathā
uditaḥ vardhamāna abhirāma adhyāhnāt tapan raviḥ

original: tataḥ paraṃ hrasantībhir gobhir astaṃ niyacchati // ViP_2,8.17 //
analyzed: tatas param hrasantībhiḥ gobhiḥ astam niyacchati
udaya astamanābhyām ca smṛte pūrva apare diśau
yāvat purastāt tapati tāvat pṛṣṭhe ca pārśvayoḥ
ṛte amara gireḥ meroḥ upari brahmaṇaḥ sabhām
ye ye marīcayā ūrkasya prayānti brahmaṇaḥ sabhām
te te nirastāḥ tad bhāsā pratīpam upayānti vai
tasmāt diśi uttarasyām vai divā rātriḥ sadā eva hi
sarveṣām dvīpa varṣāṇām seruḥ uttaratas yatas
prabhā vivasvataḥ rātrau astam gacchati bhāskare
viśati agnimataḥ rātrau vahniḥ dūrāt prakāśate
vahnoḥ prabhā tathā bhānuḥ dineṣu āviśati dvija
atīva vahni saṃyogāt atas sūryaḥ prakāśate
tejasī bhāskara āgneye prakāśa uṣṇa svarūpiṇī
paraspara anupraveśāt āpyāyete divāniśam
samuttiṣṭhati bhāskare
ā ahar rātram viśati ambhaḥ tamaḥ prākāśya śīlavat
ātāmrāḥ hi bhavati āpaḥ divā nakta praveśanāt
dinam viśati ca eva aṃbhaḥ
tasmāt śuklāḥ bhavanti āpaḥ naktam ahnaḥ praveśanāt
evam puṣkara madhyena yadā yāti divākaraḥ
triṃśat bhāgaḥ tu medinyāḥ tadā mauhūrtikī gatiḥ
kulāla cakra paryante bhraman eṣa divākaraḥ

original: karotyahas tathā rātriṃ vimuñcanmedinīṃ dvijaḥ // ViP_2,8.27 //
analyzed: karoti ahar tathā rātrim vimuñcan medinīm dvijaḥ
ayanasya uttarasya ādau makaram yāti bhāskaraḥ

original: tataḥ kumbhaṃ ca mīnaṃ ca rāśe rāśyantaraṃ dvija // ViP_2,8.28 //
analyzed: tatas kumbham ca mīnam ca rāśeḥ rāśi antaram dvija
triṣu eteṣu atha bhukteṣu tatas vaiṣuvatīm gatim

original: prayāti savitā kurvannahorātraṃ tataḥ samam // ViP_2,8.29 //
analyzed: prayāti savitā kurvan ahorātram tatas samam

original: tato rātriḥ kṣayaṃ yāti vardhate 'nudinaṃ dinam // ViP_2,8.30 //
analyzed: tatas rātriḥ kṣayam yāti vardhate anudinam dinam
tatas ca mithunasya ante parām kāṣṭhām upāgataḥ

original: rāśiṃ karkaṭakaṃ prāpya kurute dakṣiṇāyanam // ViP_2,8.31 //
analyzed: rāśim karkaṭakam prāpya kurute dakṣiṇāyanam

original: tasmātprakaṣṭāṃ bhūmiṃ tu kālenālpena gacchati // ViP_2,8.33 //
analyzed: tasmāt prakaṣṭām bhūmim tu kālena alpena gacchati

muhūrtaiḥ tāvat ṛkṣāṇi naktam aṣṭādaśaiḥ caran
kulāla cakra madhya sthaḥ yathā mandam prasarpati
tathā udagayane sūryaḥ sarpate manda vikramaḥ

muhūrtaiḥ tāvat ṛkṣāṇi rātrau dvādaśabhiḥ caran

original: ato mandataraṃ nābhyāṃ cakraṃ bhramati vai yathā /
analyzed: atas mandataram nābhyām cakram bhramati vai yathā

original: mṛtpiṇḍa iva madhyastho dhruvo bhramati vai tathā // ViP_2,8.39 //
analyzed: mṛd piṇḍaḥ iva madhya sthaḥ dhruvaḥ bhramati vai tathā

original: dhruvas tathā hi maitreya tatraiva parivartate // ViP_2,8.40 //
analyzed: dhruvaḥ tathā hi maitreya tatra eva parivartate

original: divā naktaṃ ca sūryasya mandā śīghrāca vai gatiḥ // ViP_2,8.41 //

original: dakṣiṇe tvayane caiva viparītāṃ vivasvataḥ // ViP_2,8.47 //

original: sa hanti sūryaṃ sandhyāyā nopāstiṃ kurute tu yaḥ // ViP_2,8.57 //

original: apūrvapuṇyaprāptiś ca sadyo maitreya jāyate // ViP_2,8.116 //

original: samāśataṃ prayacchanti tṛptiṃ maitreya durlabhām // ViP_2,8.117 //
analyzed: samā śatam prayacchanti tṛptim maitreya durlabhām
yasyām iṣṭvā mahā yajñaiḥ yajñeśam puruṣottamam

original: dvijabhūpāḥ parāṃ siddhimavāpurdivi ceha ca // ViP_2,8.118 //
analyzed: dvija bhūpāḥ parām siddhim avāpuḥ divi ca iha ca
snānāt vidhūta pāpāḥ ca yad jalaiḥ yatayaḥ tathā
prāptāḥ nirvāṇam uttamam
śrutā abhilaṣitā dṛṣṭā spṛṣṭā pītā avagāhitā

original: yā pāvayati bhūtāni kīrtitā ca divedine // ViP_2,8.120 //
analyzed: yā pāvayati bhūtāni kīrtitā ca divedine
gagāgaṅgā iti yaiḥ nāma yojanānā śataṣu api

original: sthitair uccāritaṃ hanti pāpaṃ janmatrayārjitam // ViP_2,8.121 //
analyzed: sthitaiḥ uccāritam hanti pāpam janma traya arjitam
yatas sā pāvanāya alam trayāṇām jagatām api

original: samudbhūtā paraṃ tattu tṛtīyaṃ bhagavatpadam // ViP_2,8.122 //
analyzed: samudbhūtā param tat tu tṛtīyam bhagavat padam
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe dvitīye aṃśe aṣṭamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī pāraśaraḥ uvāca
tārā mayam bhagavataḥ śiśumāra ākṛti prabhoḥ

original: divi rūpaṃ harer yattu tasya pucche sthito dhruvaḥ // ViP_2,9.1 //
analyzed: divi rūpam hareḥ yat tu tasya pucche sthitaḥ dhruvaḥ
sa eṣa bhraman bhrāmayati candra āditya ādikān grahān

original: bhramantamanu taṃ yānti nakṣatrāṇi ca cakravat // ViP_2,9.2 //
analyzed: bhramantam anu tam yānti nakṣatrāṇi ca cakra vat
sūryācandramasau tārā grahaiḥ saha

original: vātānīkamayair bandhair dhruve baddhāni tāni vai // ViP_2,9.3 //
analyzed: vātānīka mayaiḥ bandhaiḥ dhruve baddhāni tāni vai
śiśumāra ākṛti proktam yat rūpam jyotiṣām divi

original: nārāyaṇo 'yanaṃ dhāmnāṃ tasyādhāraḥ svayaṃ hṛdi // ViP_2,9.4 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ ayanam dhāmnām tasya ādhāraḥ svayam hṛdi
uttānapāda putraḥ tu tam ārādhya jagatpatim

original: sa tārā śiśumārasya dhruvaḥ pucche vyavasthitaḥ // ViP_2,9.5 //
analyzed: sa tārā śiśumārasya dhruvaḥ pucche vyavasthitaḥ
ādhāraḥ śiśumārasya sarva adhyakṣaḥ janārdanaḥ
dhruvasya śiśumāraḥ tu dhruve bhānuḥ vyavasthitaḥ
tad ādhāram jagat ca idam sa deva asura mānuṣam
yena vipra vidhānena tat mama ekamanāḥ śṛṇu
vivasvān aṣṭabhiḥ māsaiḥ ādāya apaḥ rasa ātmikāḥ
varṣati ambu tatas ca annam annāt api akhilam jagat
vivasvān aṃśubhiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ ādāya jagataḥ jatam
somam puṣmā ati atha induḥ ca vāyu nāḍī mayaiḥ divi
nālaiḥ vikṣipate abhreṣu dhūma agni anila mūrtiṣu
na bhraśyanti yatas tebhyaḥ jalāni abhrāṇi tāni atas
abhra sthāḥ prapatanti āpaḥ vāyunā samudīritāḥ
saṃskāram kāṃla janitam maitreya āsādya nirmalāḥ
sarit samudra bhomāḥ tu tathā āpaḥ prāṇi sambhavāḥ
catuṣprakārā bhagavān ādatte savitā mune
ākāśagaṅgā salilam tathā ādāya gabhastimān
anabhra gatam evā urvyām sadyas kṣipati raśmibhiḥ
tasya saṃsparśa nirdhūta pāpa paṅkaḥ dvijottama

original: na yāti narakaṃ martyo divyaṃ snānaṃ hi tatsmṛtam // ViP_2,9.13 //
analyzed: na yāti narakam martyaḥ divyam snānam hi tat smṛtam

original: dṛṣṭasūryaṃ hi yadvāri patatyabhrair vinā divaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa sūryam hi yat vāri patati abhraiḥ vinā divaḥ
ākāśagaṅgā salilam tat gobhiḥ kṣipyate raveḥ
kṛttikā ādiṣu ṛkṣeṣu viṣameṣu ca yat divaḥ
dṛṣṭa arka patitam jñeyam tat gāṅgam diggaja ujjhitam
yugma ṛkṣeṣu ca yat toyam patati arka ujjhitam divaḥ
tat sūrya raśmibhiḥ sarvam samādāya nirasyate
ubhayam puṇyam atyartham nṛṇām pāpa bhaya apaham
ākāśagaṅgā salilam divyam snānam mahā mune

original: yattu maighaiḥ samutsṛṣṭaṃ vāri tatprāṇināṃ dvija /
analyzed: yat tu maighaiḥ samutsṛṣṭam vāri tat prāṇinām dvija

original: puṣṇātyauṣadhayaḥ sarvā jīvanāyāmṛtaṃ hi tat // ViP_2,9.18 //
analyzed: puṣṇāti auṣadhayaḥ sarvāḥ jīvanāya amṛtam hi tat
tena vṛddhim parām nītaḥ sakalaḥ ca oṣadhī gaṇaḥ

original: sādhakaḥ phalapākantaḥ prajānāṃ dvija jāyate // ViP_2,9.19 //
analyzed: sādhakaḥ phala pākantaḥ prajānām dvija jāyate
tena yajñān yathā proktān mānavāḥ śāstra cakṣuṣaḥ
kurvanti aharahar taiḥ ca devān āpyāyayanti te

original: evaṃ yajñāś ca vedāś ca varṇāś ca dvijapūrvakāḥ /
analyzed: evam yajñāḥ ca vedāḥ ca varṇāḥ ca dvija pūrvakāḥ

original: sarve devanikāyāś ca sarve bhūtagaṇāś ca ye // ViP_2,9.21 //
analyzed: sarve deva nikāyāḥ ca sarve bhūta gaṇāḥ ca ye
vṛṣṭyā dhṛtam idam sarvam annam niṣpādyate yayā

original: sāpi niṣpādyate vṛṣṭiḥ savitrā munisattama // ViP_2,9.22 //
analyzed: sā api niṣpādyate vṛṣṭiḥ savitrā muni sattama
ādhāra bhūtaḥ savituḥ dhruvaḥ muni vara uttama
dhruvasya śiśupāraḥ asau saḥ api nārāyaṇa ātmakaḥ
hṛdi nārāyaṇaḥ tasya saṃsthitaḥ
bibhartā sarva bhūtānām ādi bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe dvitīye aṃśe navamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
tryaśīti maṇḍala śatam kāṣṭhayoḥ antaram dvayoḥ
ārohaṇa avarohābhyām bhānoḥ abdena yā gatiḥ

original: sa rathodhiṣṭhito devair ādityai ṛṣibhis tathā /
analyzed: sa rathaḥ adhiṣṭhitaḥ devaiḥ ādityaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ tathā
gandharvaiḥ apsarobhiḥ ca grāmaṇīsarpa rākṣasaiḥ

original: dhātā kratusthalā caiva pulastyo bāsukis tathā /
analyzed: dhātā kratusthalā ca eva pulastyaḥ bāsukiḥ tathā
rathabhṛt grāmaṇīḥ hetiḥ tumburuḥ ca eva saptamaḥ

original: ete vasanti vai caitre madhumāse sadaiva hi /
analyzed: ete vasanti vai caitre madhu māse sadā eva hi
maitreya syandane bhānoḥ sapta māsa adhikāriṇaḥ
aryamā pulahaḥ ca eva rathaujāḥ puñcikasthalā

original: prahetiḥ kacchavīraśva nāradaś ca rathe raveḥ // ViP_2,10.5 //
analyzed: prahetiḥ kaccha vīra śva nāradaḥ ca rathe raveḥ

original: mādhave nivasantyete śucisaṃjñe nibodha me // ViP_2,10.6 //
analyzed: mādhave nivasanti ete śuci saṃjñe nibodha me
mitraḥ utriḥ takṣakaḥ rakṣaḥ pauruṣeyā utha menakā

original: hāhā rathasvanaścaiva maitreyaite vasanti vai // ViP_2,10.7 //
analyzed: hāhā rathasvanaḥ ca eva maitreya ete vasanti vai

original: varuṇo vasiṣṭho rambhā ca sahajanyā huhūrathaḥ /
analyzed: varuṇaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ rambhā ca sahajanyā huhūrathaḥ
rathacitraḥ tathā śukre vasanti āṣāḍha saṃjñake
indraḥ viśvāvasuḥ srotāḥ elā putraḥ tathā aṅgirāḥ

original: pramlocā ca na bhasyete saptiścārke vasanti vai // ViP_2,10.9 //
analyzed: pramlocā ca na bhasyete saptiḥ ca arke vasanti vai
vivasvān ugrasenaḥ ca bhṛguḥ āpūraṇaḥ tathā

original: anumlocā śaṅkhapālo vyāghro bhādrapade tathā // ViP_2,10.10 //
analyzed: anumlocā śaṅkhapālaḥ vyāghraḥ bhādrapade tathā
pūṣā ca suruciḥ vātaḥ gautamaḥ utha dhanañjayaḥ

original: suṣeṇo 'nyo ghṛtācī ca vasantyāśvayuje ravau // ViP_2,10.11 //
analyzed: suṣeṇaḥ anyaḥ ghṛtācī ca vasanti āśvayuje ravau
viśvāvasuḥ bharadvājaḥ parjanyaiḥ āvatau tathā

original: viśvācī senajiccāpi kārttike ca vasanti vai // ViP_2,10.12 //
analyzed: viśvācī senajit ca api kārttike ca vasanti vai
aṃśaḥ kāśyapa tārkṣyāḥ tu mahāpadmaḥ tathā urvaśī
citrasenaḥ tathā vidyut mārgaśīrṣa idhi kāriṇaḥ
kratuḥ bhagaḥ tatas ūrṇāyuḥ sphūrjaḥ kārkoṭakaḥ tathā
ariṣṭanemiḥ ca eva anyā pūrvācittiḥ vara apsarāḥ
pauṣa māse vasanti ete sapta bhāskara maṇāle
loka prakāśana arthāya vigra varya adhikāriṇaḥ
tvaṣṭā atha jamadagniḥ ca tilottamā
brahmopetaḥ utha ṛtajit dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ utha saptamaḥ
māgha māse vasanti ete sapta maitreya bhāskare

original: śrūyatāṃ cāpare sūrye phālgunenivasanti yo // ViP_2,10.17 //
analyzed: śrūyatām ca apare sūrye
viṣṇuḥ aśvataraḥ rambhā sūryavarcāḥ ca satyajit

original: viśvāmitras tathā rakṣo yajñopeto mahāmune // ViP_2,10.18 //
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ tathā rakṣaḥ yajñopetaḥ mahā mune
māseṣu eteṣu maitreya vasanti ete tu saptakāḥ
savituḥ maṇḍale brahman viṣṇu sakti upabṛṃhitāḥ

original: stuvanti munayaḥ sūryaṃ gandharvair gīyate puraḥ /
analyzed: stuvanti munayaḥ sūryam gandharvaiḥ gīyate puras
nṛtyanti apsarasaḥ yānti sūryasya anu niśācarāḥ
vahanti pannagāḥ yakṣaiḥ kriyate abhīṣu saṃgrahaḥ
vālakhityāḥ tathā eva enam parivārya samāsate
saḥ ayam sapta gaṇaḥ sūrya maṇḍale muni sattama
hima uṣṇa vāri vṛṣṭīnām hetuḥ sva samayam gataḥ
iti kṣiviṣṇu mahāpurāṇe dvitīye aṃśe daśamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca
yat etat bhagavān āha gaṇaḥ saptavidhaḥ raveḥ

original: maṇḍale himatāpādeḥ kāraṇaṃ tanmayā śrutam // ViP_2,11.1 //
analyzed: maṇḍale hima tāpa ādeḥ kāraṇam tat mayā śrutam
vyāpāraḥ ca api kathitaḥ gandharva uraga rakṣasām
ṛṣīṇām vālakhilyānām tathā eva apsarasām guro
yakṣāṇām ca rathe bhānoḥ viṣṇu śakti dhṛta ātmanām

original: kiṃ cādityasya yatkarma tannātroktaṃ tvayā mune // ViP_2,11.3 //
analyzed: kim ca ādityasya yat karma tat na atra uktam tvayā mune

original: yadi saptagaṇo vāri himamuṣṇaṃ ca varṣati /
analyzed: yadi sapta gaṇaḥ vāri himam uṣṇam ca varṣati
tat kim atra raveḥ yena vṛṣṭiḥ sūryāt iti īryate
vivasvān uditaḥ madhye yāti astam iti kim janaḥ

original: bravītyetatsamaṃ karma yadi saptagaṇasya tat // ViP_2,11.5 //
analyzed: bravīti etat samam karma yadi sapta gaṇasya tat
parāśaraḥ uvāca
maitreya śrūyatām etat yat bhavān paripṛccati
yathā sapta gaṇaḥ api ekaḥ prādhānyena adhikaḥ raviḥ
sarva śaktiḥ parā viṣṇo ṛk yajuḥ sāma saṃjñitā

original: saiṣātrayī tapatyaṃho jagataś ca hinasti yā // ViP_2,11.7 //
analyzed: sā eṣā atrayī tapati aṃhaḥ jagataḥ ca hinasti yā

original: saiṣa viṣṇuḥ sthitaḥ sthityāṃ jagataḥ pālanodyataḥ /
analyzed: sa eṣa viṣṇuḥ sthitaḥ sthityām jagataḥ pālana udyataḥ
ṛk yajuḥ sāma bhūtaḥ ūntaḥ savituḥ dvija tiṣṭhati

original: māsimāsi raviryoyastatra tatra hi sā parā /
analyzed: māsi māsi raviḥ yaḥ yaḥ tatra tatra hi sā parā
trayī mayī viṣṇu śaktiḥ avasthānam karoti vai
ṛcaḥ stuvantiḥ pūrvāhne madhyāhne tha yajūṃṣi vai
bṛhat rathantara ādīni sāmāni ahnaḥ kṣaye ravim
aṅgam eṣā trayī viṣṇo ṛk yajuḥ sāma saṃjñitā
viṣṇu śaktiḥ avasthānam sadā āditye karoti sā

original: na kevalaṃ raveḥ śaktirvaiṣṇavī sā trayīmayī /
analyzed: na kevalam raveḥ śaktiḥ vaiṣṇavī sā trayī mayī
brahmā atha puruṣaḥ rudraḥ trayam etat trayī mayam
sarga ādau ṛk mayaḥ brahmā sthitau viṣṇuḥ yajuḥ mayaḥ
rudraḥ sāma mayaḥ antāya tasmāt tasya aśuciḥ thvaniḥ

original: evaṃ sā sāttvikī śaktirvaiṣṇavī yā trayīmayī /
analyzed: evam sā sāttvikī śaktiḥ vaiṣṇavī yā trayī mayī
ātma sapta gaṇa stham tam bhāsvantam adhitiṣṭhati
tayā ca adhiṣṭhitaḥ saḥ api jājvalīti sva raśmibhiḥ
tamaḥ samasta jagatām nāśam nayati ca akhilam

original: stuvanti cainaṃ munayo gandharvair gīyate puraḥ /
analyzed: stuvanti ca enam munayaḥ gandharvaiḥ gīyate puras

original: nṛtyantyo 'psaraso yānti tasya cānu niśācarāḥ // ViP_2,11.16 //
analyzed: nṛtyantyaḥ apsarasaḥ yānti tasya ca anu niśācarāḥ
vahanti pannagāḥ yakṣaiḥ kriyate abhīṣu saṃgrahaḥ
vālakhilyāḥ tathā eva enam parivārya samāsate
na udetā na astam etā ca kadācid śakti rūpa dhṛk
viṣṇuḥ viṣṇoḥ pṛthak tasya gaṇāḥ saptavidhaḥ api ayam
stambha stha darpaṇasya iva yaḥ ayam āsanna tām gataḥ
chāyā darśana saṃyogam sa tam prāpnoti atha ātmanaḥ

original: evaṃ sā vaiṣṇavī śaktirnaivāpaiti tato dvija /
analyzed: evam sā vaiṣṇavī śaktiḥ nā evā apaiti tatas dvija
māsa anumāsam bhāsvantam adhyāste tatra saṃsthitam
pitṛ deva manuṣya ādīn sa sadā āpyāyayan prabhuḥ
parivartati ahorātra kāraṇam savitā dvaja
sūrya raśmi suṣumṇā ayaḥ tarpitaḥ tena candramāḥ
kṛṣṇa pakṣemaraiḥ śaśvat pīyate vai sudhā mayaḥ

original: pītaṃ taṃ dvikalaṃ somaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣakṣaye dvija /
analyzed: pītam tam dvi kalam somam kṛṣṇa pakṣa kṣaye dvija
pibanti pataraḥ teṣām bhāskarāt tarpamam tathā

original: ādatte raśmibhir yaṃtu kṣitisaṃsthaṃ rasaṃ raviḥ /
analyzed: ādatte raśmibhiḥ kṣiti saṃstham rasam raviḥ
tam utsṛjati bhūtānām puṣṭi artham sasya vṛddhaye
tena prīṇāti aśeṣāṇi bhūtāni bhagavān raviḥ
pitṛ deva manuṣya ādīn evam āpyāyayati asau

original: pakṣatṛptiṃ tu devānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ caiva māsikīm /
analyzed: pakṣa tṛptim tu devānām pitṝṇām ca eva māsikīm

original: śaśvattṛptiṃ ca martyānāṃ maitreyārkaḥ prayacchati // ViP_2,11.26 //
analyzed: śaśvat tṛptim ca martyānām maitreya arkaḥ prayacchati
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe dvitīya iṃśe ekādaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
rathaḥ tri cakraḥ somasya kunda ābhāḥ tasya vājinaḥ
vāma dakṣiṇataḥ yuktā daśatena carati asau
vīthi āśrayāṇi ṛkṣāṇi dhruva ādhāreṇa veginā
hrāsa vṛddhi kramaḥ tasya raśmīnām savituḥ yathā

original: arkasyeva hi tasyāśvāḥ sakṛdyuktā vahanti te /
analyzed: arkasya iva hi tasya aśvāḥ sakṛt yuktāḥ vahanti te
kalpam ekam muni śreṣṭha vārī garbha samudbhavāḥ
kṣīṇam pītam suraiḥ somam āpyāyayati dīptimān
maitreya eka kalam santam raśminā ekena bhāskaraḥ

original: krameṇa yena pīto 'sau devais tena niśākaram /
analyzed: krameṇa yena pītaḥ asau devaiḥ tena niśākaram
āpyāyayati anudinam bhāskaraḥ vāritaskaraḥ
saṃbhṛtam ca ardha māsena tad soma stham sudhā amṛtam

original: pibandi devā maitreya sudhāhārā yato 'marāḥ // ViP_2,12.6 //
analyzed: devāḥ maitreya sudhā āhārāḥ yatas amarāḥ
trayāstriṃśat sahasrāṇi trayastriṃśat śatāni ca
trayastriṃśat tathā devāḥ pibanti kṣaṇadākaram
kalā dvayā viśiṣṭaḥ tu praviṣṭaḥ sūrya maṇḍalam

original: amākhyāraśmau vasati amāvāsyā tataḥ smṛtā // ViP_2,12.8 //
analyzed: amā ākhyā raśmau vasati amāvāsyā tatas smṛtā
apsu tasmin ahorātre pūrvam viśati candramāḥ

original: tato vīrutsu vasati prayātyarkaṃ tataḥ kramāt // ViP_2,12.9 //
analyzed: tatas vīrutsu vasati prayāti arkam tatas kramāt
chinatti virudhaḥ yaḥ tu vīrudh saṃsthe niśākare

original: patraṃ vā pātayatyekaṃ brahmahatyāṃ sa vindati // ViP_2,12.10 //
analyzed: patram vā pātayati ekam brahmahatyām sa vindati
somam pañcadaśe bhāge kiñcid śiṣṭe kalā ātmake
apārāhne pitṛ gaṇa ajaghanyam paryupāsate

original: pibanti dvikalākāraṃ śiṣṭā tasya kalā tu yā /
analyzed: pibanti dvi kalā ākāram śiṣṭā tasya kalā tu yā

original: sudhāmṛtamayī puṇyā tāmindoḥ pitaro mune // ViP_2,12.12 //
analyzed: sudhā amṛta mayī puṇyā tām indoḥ pitaraḥ mune
niḥsṛtan tat amāvāsyām gabhastibhyaḥ sudhā amṛtam
māsam tṛptim avāpya agryām pitaraḥ santi nirvṛtāḥ

original: saumyā barhiṣadaścaiva agniṣvāttāś ca te tridhā // ViP_2,12.13 //
analyzed: saumyāḥ barhiṣadaḥ ca eva agniṣvāttāḥ ca te tridhā

original: evaṃ devān site pakṣe kṛṣṇapakṣe tathā pitṝn /
analyzed: evam devān site pakṣe kṛṣṇa pakṣe tathā pitṝn
vīrudhaḥ ca amṛta mayaiḥ śītaiḥ ap paramāṇubhiḥ
vīrudhā oṣadhi niṣpattyā manuṣya paśu kīṭakān
āpyāyayati śītāṃśuḥ prākāśya āhlādanena tu
vāyu agni dravya saṃbhūtaḥ rathaḥ candrasutasya ca

original: piśaṅgais turagair yuktaḥ so 'ṣṭābhir vāyuvegibhiḥ // ViP_2,12.16 //
analyzed: piśaṅgaiḥ turagaiḥ yuktaḥ saḥ aṣṭābhiḥ vāyu vegibhiḥ
sa varūthaḥ sa anukarṣaḥ yuktaḥ bhū saṃbhavaiḥ hayaiḥ
sa upāsaṃga patākaḥ tu śukrasya api rathaḥ mahān
aṣṭa aśvaḥ kāñcanaḥ śrīmān bhaumasya api rathaḥ mahān
padmarāga aruṇaiḥ aśvaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ vahni sambhavaiḥ
aṣṭābhiḥ pāṇḍuraiḥ yuktaḥ vājibhiḥ kāñcanorathaḥ
tasmin tiṣṭhati varṣa ante rāśau rāśau vṛhaspatiḥ
ākāśa sambhavaiḥ aśvaiḥ śabalaiḥ syandanam yutam
tam āruhya śanais yāti manda gāmī śanaiścaraḥ
svarbhānoḥ turagāḥ hi aṣṭau bhṛṅga ābhāḥ dhūsaram ratham
sakṛt yuktāḥ tu maitreya vahanti aviratam sadā
ādityāt niḥsṛtaḥ rāhuḥ somam gacchati parvasu

original: ādityameti somācca punaḥ saureṣu parvasu // ViP_2,12.22 //
analyzed: ādityam eti somāt ca punar saureṣu parvasu
tathā ketu rathasya aśvāḥ api aṣṭau vāta raṃhasaḥ
palāla dhūma varṇa ābhāḥ lākṣā rasa nibha aruṇāḥ

original: ete mayā grahāṇāṃ vai tavākhyātā rathā nava /
analyzed: ete mayā grahāṇām vai tava ākhyātāḥ rathāḥ nava

original: sarve dhruve mahābhāga prabaddhā vāyuraśmibhiḥ // ViP_2,12.24 //
analyzed: sarve dhruve mahābhāga prabaddhāḥ vāyu raśmibhiḥ
graha ṛkṣa tārā dhiṣṇyāni dhruve baddhāni aśeṣatas
bhramanti ucita cāreṇa maitreya anila raśmibhiḥ
yāvāntyaḥ ca eva tārāḥ tā tāvantaḥ vāta raśmayaḥ

original: sarve dhruve nibaddhāste bhramanto bhrāmayanti tam // ViP_2,12.26 //
analyzed: sarve dhruve nibaddhāḥ te bhramantaḥ bhrāmayanti tam

original: tailapīḍā yathā cakraṃ bhramanto bhrāmayanti vai /
analyzed: tailapīḍāḥ yathā cakram bhramantaḥ bhrāmayanti vai

original: tathā bhramanti jyotīṃṣi vātaviddhāni sarvaśaḥ // ViP_2,12.27 //
analyzed: tathā bhramanti jyotīṃṣi vāta viddhāni sarvaśas
alāta cakra vat yānti vāta cakra īritāni tu

original: yasmajyotīṃṣi vahati pravahastena sa smṛtaḥ // ViP_2,12.28 //
analyzed: vahati pravahaḥ tena sa smṛtaḥ

original: śiśumārastu yaḥ proktaḥ sa dhruvo yatra tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: śiśumāraḥ tu yaḥ proktaḥ sa dhruvaḥ yatra tiṣṭhati

original: sanniveśaṃ ca tasyāpi śṛṇuṣva munisattama // ViP_2,12.29 //
analyzed: sanniveśam ca tasya api śṛṇuṣva muni sattama

original: yadahnā kurute pāpaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā niśi mucyate /
analyzed: yat ahnā kurute pāpam tam dṛṣṭvā niśi mucyate
yāvantyaḥ ca eva tārāḥ tāḥ śiśumāra āśritāḥ divi
tāvanti eva tu varṣāṇi jīvati abhyadhikāni ca
uttānapādaḥ tasya adhas vijñeyaḥ hi uttaraḥ hanuḥ

original: yajño 'dharaś ca vijñeyo dharmo mūrdhānamāśritaḥ // ViP_2,12.31 //
analyzed: yajñaḥ adharaḥ ca vijñeyaḥ dharmaḥ mūrdhānam āśritaḥ
hṛdi nārāyaṇaḥ ca āste aśvinau pūrva pādayoḥ

original: varuṇaścāryamā caiva paścime tasya sakthinī // ViP_2,12.32 //
analyzed: varuṇaḥ ca aryamā ca eva paścime tasya sakthinī
śiśraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ tasya mitraḥ apānam samāśritaḥ

original: pucchegniś ca mahendraś ca kasyapotha tato dhruvaḥ /
analyzed: pucchegniḥ ca mahendraḥ ca tatas dhruvaḥ
tārakā śiśumārasya na astam eti catuṣṭayam
iti eṣa sanniveśaḥ ayam pṛthivyāḥ jyotiṣām tathā

original: dvīpānāmudadhīnāṃ ca parvatānāṃ ca kīrtitaḥ // ViP_2,12.35 //
analyzed: dvīpānām udadhīnām ca parvatānām ca kīrtitaḥ

original: varṣāṇāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca ye ca teṣu vasanti vai /
analyzed: varṣāṇām ca nadīnām ca ye ca teṣu vasanti vai

original: teṣāṃ svarūpamākhyātaṃ saṃkṣepaḥ śruyatāṃ punaḥ // ViP_2,12.36 //
analyzed: teṣām svarūpam ākhyātam saṃkṣepaḥ śruyatām punar
yat ambu vaiṣṇavaḥ kāyaḥ tatas vipra vasundharā
padma ākārā samudbhūtā parvata abdhi ādi saṃyutā

original: jyotīṣi viṣṇurbhuvanāni viṣṇurvanāni viṣṇurgirayo diśaś ca /
analyzed: jyotīṣi viṣṇuḥ bhuvanāni viṣṇuḥ vanāni viṣṇuḥ girayaḥ diśaḥ ca

original: nadyaḥ samudrāś ca sa eva sarvaṃ yadasti yannāsti ca vipravarya // ViP_2,12.38 //
analyzed: nadyaḥ samudrāḥ ca saḥ eva sarvam yat asti yat na asti ca vipra varya
jñāna sva rūpaḥ bhagavān yatas sā vaśeṣa mūrtiḥ na tu vastu bhūtaḥ
tatas hi śaila bdhi dharā ādi bhedān jānīhi vijñāna vijṛmbhitāni

original: yadā tu śuddhaṃ nijarūpi sarvaṃ karmakṣaye jñānamapāstadoṣam /
analyzed: yadā tu śuddham nija rūpi sarvam karma kṣaye jñānam apāsta doṣam

original: tadā hi saṃkalpataroḥ phalāni bhavanti no vastuṣu vastubhedāḥ // ViP_2,12.40 //
analyzed: tadā hi saṃkalpa taroḥ phalāni bhavanti no vastuṣu vastu bhedāḥ
vastu asti kim kutrācid ādi madhya paryanta hīnam satata eka rūpam

original: yaccānyathātvaṃ dvija yāti bhūyo na tattathā tatra kuto hi tattvam // ViP_2,12.41 //
analyzed: yat ca anyathā tvam dvija yāti bhūyas na tat tathā tatra kutas hi tattvam
mahī ghaṭa tvam ghaṭataḥ kapālikā kapālikā cūrṇa rajaḥ tatas aṇuḥ

original: janaiḥ svakarmastimitātmaniścayair ālakṣyate brūhi kimatra vastu // ViP_2,12.42 //
analyzed: janaiḥ sva karma stimita ātma niścayaiḥ ālakṣyate brūhi kim atra vastu

original: tasmān na vijñānam ṛte 'sti kiṃcit kvacit kadācid dvija vastujātam /
analyzed: tasmāt na vijñānam ṛte asti kiṃcid kvacid kadācid dvija vastu jātam
vijñānam ekam nija karma bheda vibhinna citteḥ bahudhā abhyupetam
jñānam viśuddham vimalam viśo kam aśeṣa lobha ādi nirasta saṅgam

original: ekaṃ sadaikaṃ paramaḥ sa vāsudevo na yato 'nyadasti // ViP_2,12.44 //
analyzed: ekam sadā ekam paramaḥ sa vāsudevaḥ na yatas anyat asti

original: sadbhāva evaṃ bhavato mayokto jñānaṃ yathā satyamastayatyamanyat /
analyzed: sadbhāvaḥ evam bhavataḥ mayā uktaḥ jñānam yathā

original: etattu yatsaṃvyavahārabhūtaṃ tatrāpi coktaṃ bhuvanāśritaṃ te // ViP_2,12.45 //
analyzed: etat tu yat saṃvyavahāra bhūtam tatra api ca uktam bhuvana āśritam te

original: yajñaḥ paśurvahniraśeṣaṛtviksomaḥ surāḥ svargamayaś ca kāmaḥ /
analyzed: yajñaḥ paśuḥ vahniḥ aśeṣa ṛtvij somaḥ surāḥ svarga mayaḥ ca kāmaḥ

original: ityādikarmāśritamārgadṛṣṭaṃ bhūrādibhogāś ca phalāni teṣām // ViP_2,12.46 //
analyzed: iti ādi karma āśrita mārga dṛṣṭam bhūḥ ādi bhogāḥ ca phalāni teṣām

original: yaccaitadbhuvanagataṃ mayā tavoktaṃ sarvatra vrajati hi tatra karmavaśyaḥ /
analyzed: yat ca etat bhuvana gatam mayā tava uktam sarvatra vrajati hi tatra karma vaśyaḥ

original: jñātvaivaṃ dhruvamacalaṃ sadaikarūpaṃ tatkuryādviśati hi yena vāsudevam // ViP_2,12.47 //
analyzed: jñātvā evam dhruvam acalam sadā eka rūpam tat kuryāt viśati hi yena vāsudevam
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe dvitīye aṃśe dvādaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca
bhagavan samyak ākhyātam yat pṛṣṭaḥ asi mayā kila
bhū samudra ādi saritām saṃsthānam sthitiḥ
viṣṇu ādhāram yathā ca etat trailokyam samavasthitam

original: paramārthastu te prokto yathājñānaṃ pradhānataḥ // ViP_2,13.2 //
analyzed: parama arthaḥ tu te proktaḥ yathājñānam pradhānataḥ
yat tu etat bhagavān āha bharatasya mahīpateḥ
śrotum icchami caritam tat mama ākhyātum arhasi
bharataḥ sa mahīpālaḥ sālagrāme avasat kila

original: yogayuktaḥ samādhāya vāsudeve sadā manaḥ // ViP_2,13.4 //
analyzed: yoga yuktaḥ samādhāya vāsudeve sadā manaḥ
puṇyedeśa prabhāvena dhyāyataḥ ca sadā harim

original: kathaṃ tu nābhavanmuktiryadabhūtsa dvijaḥ punaḥ // ViP_2,13.5 //
analyzed: katham tu nā abhavat muktiḥ yat abhūt sa dvijaḥ punar

original: vipratve ca kṛtaṃ tena yadbhūyaḥ sumahātmanā /
analyzed: vipra tve ca kṛtam tena yat bhūyas su mahātmanā
bharatena muni śreṣṭha tat sarvam vaktum arhasi
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
sālagrāme mahābhāgaḥ bhagavat nyasta mānasaḥ

original: sa uvāsa ciraṃ kālaṃ maitreya pṛtivīpatiḥ // ViP_2,13.7 //
analyzed: saḥ uvāsa ciram kālam maitreya pṛtivīpatiḥ
ahiṃsā ādiṣu aśeṣeṣu guṇeṣu guṇinām varaḥ

original: avāpa paramāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ manasaścāpi saṃyame // ViP_2,13.8 //
analyzed: avāpa paramām kāṣṭhām manasaḥ ca api saṃyame
yajñeśa acyuta govinda mādhava ananta keśava

original: kṛṣṇa viṣṇo hṛṣīkeśa vāsudeva namostu te // ViP_2,13.9 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa viṣṇo hṛṣīkeśa vāsudeva namaḥ astu te
iti rājā āha bharataḥ hareḥ nāmāni kevalam
na anyat jagāda maitreya kiñcid sva prāntare pi ca
ca vinā na anyat acintayat
samidh puṣpa kuśa ādānam cakre deva kriyā kṛte

original: nānyāni cakre karmāṇi niḥsaṅgo yogatāpasaḥ // ViP_2,13.11 //
analyzed: na anyāni cakre karmāṇi niḥsaṅgaḥ yoga tāpasaḥ
jagāma saḥ abhiṣeka artham ekadā tu mahā nadīm

original: sasnau tatra tadā cakre snānasyānantarakriyāḥ // ViP_2,13.12 //
analyzed: sasnau tatra tadā cakre snānasya anantara kriyāḥ
athā ājagāma tat tīram jalam pātum pipāsitā
āsanna prasavā brahman ekā eva hariṇī vanāt
tatas samabhavat tatra pīta prāye jale tathā
siṃhasya nādaḥ su mahān sarva prāṇi bhayaṅkaraḥ
tatas sā sahasā trāsāt āplutā nimnagā taṭam

original: atyuccārohaṇenāsyā nadyāṃ garbhaḥ papāta ha // ViP_2,13.15 //
analyzed: ati ucca ārohaṇena asyāḥ nadyām garbhaḥ papāta ha
tam ūhyamānam vegena vīci mālā pariplutam

original: jagrāha sa nṛpo garbhātpatitaṃ mṛgapotakam // ViP_2,13.16 //
analyzed: jagrāha sa nṛpaḥ garbhāt patitam mṛga potakam
garbha pracyuti doṣeṇa prottuṅga ākramaṇena ca

original: maitreya sāpi hariṇī papāta ca mamāra ca // ViP_2,13.17 //
analyzed: maitreya sā api hariṇī papāta ca mamāra ca
hariṇīm tām vilokya atha vipannām tṛpa tāpasaḥ
mṛga potam samādāya nijam āśramam āgataḥ
cakāra anudinam ca asau mṛga potasya vai nṛpaḥ

original: poṣaṇaṃ puṣyamāṇaś ca sa tena vavṛdhe mune // ViP_2,13.19 //
analyzed: poṣaṇam puṣyamāṇaḥ ca sa tena vavṛdhe mune
cacāra āśrama paryante tṛṇāni gahaneṣu saḥ

original: dvaraṃ gatvā ca śārdulatrāsādabhyāyayau punaḥ // ViP_2,13.20 //
analyzed: dvaram gatvā ca śārdula trāsāt abhyāyayau punar
prātar gatvā ati dūram ca sāyam āyāti atha āśramam
punar ca bharatasya abhūt āśramasya uṭaja ajire
tasya tasmin mṛge dūra samīpa parivartini

original: āsīccetaḥ samāsaktaṃ na yayāvanyato dvija // ViP_2,13.22 //
analyzed: āsīt cetaḥ samāsaktam na yayau anyatas dvija
vimukta rājya tanayaḥ projjhita aśeṣa bāndhavaḥ
mamatvam sa cakāra uccais tasmin hariṇa bālake

original: kiṃ vṛkair bhakṣito vyaghraiḥ kiṃ siṃhena nipātitaḥ /
analyzed: kim vṛkaiḥ bhakṣitaḥ vyaghraiḥ kim siṃhena nipātitaḥ
cirāyamāṇe niṣkrānte tasya āsīt iti mānasam
eṣā vasumatī tasya khura agra kṣata karburā
prītaye mama jātā asau kva mama eṇaka bālakaḥ
mad bāhum kaṇḍūyana paraḥ hi saḥ
kṣemeṇa abhyāgata uraṇyāt api mām sukhayiṣyati
ete lūna śikhāḥ tasya daśanaiḥ acira udgataiḥ

original: kuśāḥ kāśā virājante baṭavaḥ sāmāgā iva // ViP_2,13.27 //
analyzed: kuśāḥ kāśāḥ virājante baṭavaḥ sāma āgāḥ iva

original: itthaṃ ciragate tasminsa cakre mānasaṃ muniḥ /
analyzed: ittham cira gate tasmin sa cakre mānasam muniḥ
prīti prasanna vadanaḥ pārśva sthe ca abhavat mṛge
samādhi bhaṅgaḥ tasya āsīt tad maya tva ādṛta ātmanaḥ
san tyakta rājya bhoga ṛdhi sva janasya api bhūpateḥ
capalam capale tasmin dūra gam dūra gāmini
mṛga pote abhavat cittam stairya vat tasya bhūpateḥ

original: kālena gacchatā so 'tha kālaṃ cakre mahīpatiḥ /
analyzed: kālena gacchatā saḥ atha kālam cakre mahīpatiḥ

original: piteva sāstraṃ putreṇa mṛgapotena vīkṣitaḥ // ViP_2,13.31 //
analyzed: pitā iva sa astram putreṇa mṛga potena vīkṣitaḥ
mṛgam eva tadā adrākṣīt tyajan prāṇān asau api
tad maya tvena maitreya na anyat kiñcid acintayat

original: tataś ca tatkālakṛtāṃ bhāvanāṃ prāpya tādṛśīm /
analyzed: tatas ca tad kāla kṛtām bhāvanām prāpya tādṛśīm
jambūmārge mahā araṇye jātaḥ jātismaraḥ mṛgaḥ
jātismara tvad udvignaḥ saṃsārasya dvijottama
vihāya mātaram bhūyas sālagrāmam upāyayaḥ

original: śuṣkais tṛṇais tathā parṇaiḥ sa kurvann ātmapoṣaṇam /
analyzed: śuṣkaiḥ tṛṇaiḥ tathā parṇaiḥ sa kurvan ātma poṣaṇam
mṛga tva hetu bhūtasya karmaṇaḥ niṣkṛtim yayau
tatra ca utsṛṣṭa dehaḥ asau jajñe jātismaraḥ dvijaḥ
sat ācāravatām śuddhe yoginām pravare kule
sarva vijñāna saṃpannaḥ sarva śāstṛ artha tattva vid

original: apaśyatya ca maitreya ātmānaṃ prakṛteḥ param // ViP_2,13.37 //
analyzed: apaśyatya ca maitreyaḥ ātmānam prakṛteḥ param
ātmanaḥ adhigata jñānaḥ deva ādīni mahā mune
sarva bhūtāni abhedena sa dadarśa tadā ātmanaḥ
na papāṭha guru proktam kṛta upanayanaḥ śrutim

original: na dadarśa ca karmāṇi śāstrāṇi jagṛhe na ca // ViP_2,13.39 //
analyzed: na dadarśa ca karmāṇi śāstrāṇi jagṛhe na ca
uktaḥ api bahuśas kiñcid jaḍa vākyam abhāṣata
tat api a saṃskāra guṇam grāmya vākya ukti saṃśritam
apadhvasta vapuḥ saḥ api malina ambarak dvijaḥ

original: klinnadantāntaraḥ sarvaiḥ paribhūtaḥ sa nāgaraiḥ // ViP_2,13.41 //
analyzed: klinna danta antaraḥ sarvaiḥ paribhūtaḥ sa nāgaraiḥ
saṃmānana parām hānim yoga ṛdhaḥ kurute yatas

original: janenāvamato yogī yogasiddhaṃ ca vindati // ViP_2,13.42 //
analyzed: janena avamataḥ yogī yoga siddham ca vindati
tasmāt careta vai yogī satām dharmam a dūṣayan
janāḥ yathā vamanyeran gaccheyuḥ na eva saṅgatim
hiraṇyagarbha vacanam vicintya ittham mahāmatiḥ
ātmānam darśayāmāsa jaḍa unmatta ākṛtim jane
bhukte kulmāṣa vāṭī ādi śākam vanyam phalam kaṇān
yat yat āpnoti su bahu tat atte kāla saṃyamam
pitari uparate saḥ atha bhrātṛ bhrātṛvya bāndhavaiḥ
kāritaḥ kṣetra karma ādika danna āhāra poṣitaḥ
sama akṣa pīna avayavaḥ jaḍa kārī ca karmaṇi
sarva loka upakaraṇam babhūva āhāra cetanaḥ
tam tādṛśam a saṃskāram vipra ākṛti viceṣṭitam
kṣattāsauvīra rājasya kālyai paśum akalpayat
rātrau tam samalaṅkṛtya vaiśasasya vidhānataḥ

original: adhiṣṭhitaṃ mahākālī jñātvā yogeśvaraṃ tathā // ViP_2,13.49 //
analyzed: adhiṣṭhitam mahākālī jñātvā yogeśvaram tathā

original: tataḥ khaṅgaṃ samādāya niśitaṃ niśi sā tathā /
analyzed: tatas khaṅgam samādāya niśitam niśi sā tathā
kṣattāram krūra karmāṇam acchinat kaṇṭha mūlataḥ
sva pārṣada yutā devī papau rudhiram ulbaṇam
tatas sauvīra rājasya prayātasya mahātmanaḥ
viṣṭa kartā atha manyeta viṣṭi yogyā iyam iti api
tam tādṛśam mahātmānam bhasma channam iva analam
kṣattā sauvīra rājasya viṣṭi yogyam amanyata
sa rājā śibikā ārūḍhaḥ gantum kṛtamatiḥ dvija
babhūva ikṣumatī tīre kapila ṛṣeḥ vara āśramam
śreyaḥ kim atra saṃsāre duḥkha prāye nṛṇām iti

original: praṣṭuṃ taṃ mokṣadharmajñaṃ kapilākhyaṃ mahāmunim // ViP_2,13.54 //
analyzed: praṣṭum tam mokṣa dharma jñam kapila ākhyam mahā munim
uvāha śibikām tasya kṣattuḥ vacana coditaḥ
nṛṇām viṣṭi gṛhītānām anyeṣām saḥ api madhya gaḥ
gṛhītaḥ viṣṭinā vipraḥ sarva jñāna eka bhājanam

original: jātismarosau papāsya kṣayakāma uvāha tām // ViP_2,13.56 //
analyzed: jātismarā usau papā asya kṣaya kāmaḥ uvāha tām
yayau jaḍa matiḥ saḥ utha mṛga mātra avalokanam
kurvan matimatām śraṣṭhaḥ tad anye tvaritam yayuḥ
vilokya nṛpatiḥ saḥ utha viṣamām śibikā gatim
kim etat iti āha samam gamyatām śibikā vahāḥ

original: punastathaiva śibikaṃ vilokya viṣamāṃ hi saḥ /
analyzed: punar tathā eva śibikam vilokya viṣamām hi saḥ
nṛpaḥ kim etat iti āha bhavadbhiḥ gamyate nyathā
bhūpateḥ vadataḥ tasya śrutvā ittham bahuśas vacaḥ
śibikā vāhakāḥ projuḥ ayam yāti iti a satvaram
rājā uvāca

anātmani ātma vijñānam śabdaḥ vā bhrānti lakṣaṇaḥ
jihvā bravīti aham iti danta uṣṭhau tāluke nṛpa

original: ataḥ pīvānasītyetad vaktum itthaṃ na yujyate // ViP_2,13.88 //

original: prādādaśeṣavijñānaṃ sa tasmai parayā mudā // ViP_2,15.4 //

ṛbhuḥ uvāca
kadannāni dvijautāni mṛṣṭam annam prayaccha me
saṃyāva pāyasa ādīni drapsa phāṇitavanti ca
nidāghaḥ uvāca
hehe śālini mad gehe yat kiñcid ati śobhanam
bhakṣya upasādhanam mṛṣṭam tena asya annam prasādhaya
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: ityuktā tena sā patnīmṛṣṭamannaṃ dvijasya yat /
analyzed: iti uktā tena sā patnī mṛṣṭam annam dvijasya yat
prasāditavatī tat vai bhartuḥ vacana gauravāt
tam bhuktavantam icchātaḥ mṛṣṭam annam mahā munim

original: nidādhaḥ prāha bhūpāla praśrayāvanataḥ sthitaḥ // ViP_2,15.16 //
analyzed: nidādhaḥ prāha bhūpāla praśraya avanataḥ sthitaḥ
nidāghaḥ uvāca
api te paramā tṛptiḥ utpannā tuṣṭiḥ eva ca

original: api te mānasaṃsvasthamāhāreṇa kṛtaṃ dvija // ViP_2,15.17 //
analyzed: api te mānasam svastham āhāreṇa kṛtam dvija
kvanivāsaḥ bhavān vipra kva ca gantum samudyataḥ

original: āgamyate ca bhavatā yatastacca dvijocyatām // ViP_2,15.18 //
analyzed: āgamyate ca bhavatā yatas tat ca dvija ucyatām
ṛmuḥ uvāca
kṣudh yasya tasya bhuktā inne tṛptiḥ brāhmaṇa jāyate

original: na me kṣunnābhavattṛptiḥ kasmānmāṃ paripṛcchasi // ViP_2,15.19 //
analyzed: na me kṣudh na abhavat tṛptiḥ kasmāt mām paripṛcchasi
vahninā pārthive dhātau kṣapite kṣudh samudbhavaḥ

original: bhavatyambhasi ca kṣīṇe nṛṇāṃ tṛḍapi jāyate // ViP_2,15.20 //
analyzed: bhavati ambhasi ca kṣīṇe nṛṇām tṛṣ api jāyate

original: kṣuttuṣṇe dehadharmākhye na mamaite yato dvija /
analyzed: kṣudh tuṣṇe deha dharma ākhye na mama ete yatas dvija
tatas kṣudh sambhava abhāvāt tṛptiḥ asti eva me sadā
manasaḥ svastha tā tuṣṭiḥ citta dharmau imau dvija

original: cetaso yasya tatpṛccha pumān ebhir na yujyate // ViP_2,15.22 //
analyzed: cetasaḥ yasya tat pṛccha pumān ebhiḥ na yujyate

original: kva nivāsastavetyuktaṃ kva gantāsi ca yattvāyā /
analyzed: kva nivāsaḥ tava iti uktam kva gantāsi ca

original: kutāścāgamyate tatra tritayepi nibodha meḥ // ViP_2,15.23 //
analyzed: kutas ca āgamyate tatra tritaye api nibodha meḥ
pumān sarva gataḥ vyāpī ākāśa vat ayam yatas

original: kutaḥ kutra kva gantāsītye tadapyarthavatkatham // ViP_2,15.24 //
analyzed: kutas kutra kva gantāsi iti e tat api arthavat katham
saḥ aham gantā na ca āgantā na eka deśa niketanaḥ

original: tvaṃ cānye ca na ca tvaṃ ca nānye naivāhamapyaham // ViP_2,15.25 //
analyzed: tvam ca anye ca na ca tvam ca na anye na eva aham api aham

original: mṛṣṭaṃ na mṛṣṭamapyeṣā jijñāsā me kṛtā tava /
analyzed: mṛṣṭam na mṛṣṭam api eṣā jijñāsā me kṛtā tava

original: kiṃ vakṣyasīti tatrāpi śrūyatāṃ dvijasattama // ViP_2,15.26 //
analyzed: kim vakṣyasi iti tatra api śrūyatām dvijasattama
kim asvādu atha vā mṛṣṭam bhuñjataḥ asti dvijottama
mṛṣṭam eva yathā mṛṣṭam tat eva udvega kārakam
a mṛṣṭam jāyate mṛṣṭam mṛṣṭāt udvijate janaḥ
ādi madhya avasāneṣu kim annam ruci kārakam

original: mṛṇmayaṃ hi gṛhaṃ yadvan mṛdā liptaṃ sthiraṃ bhavet /
analyzed: mṛṇmayam hi gṛham yadvat mṛdā liptam sthiram bhavet

original: parthivoyaṃ tathā dehaḥ pārthivaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ // ViP_2,15.29 //
analyzed: tathā dehaḥ pārthivaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ
yava godhūma mudga ādi ghṛtam tailam payaḥ dadhi
guḍaṃphala ādīni tathā pārthivāḥ paramāṇavaḥ
tat etat bhavatā jñātvā mṛṣṭa amṛṣṭa vicāri yat

original: tanmanaḥsamatālambi kāryaṃ sāmyaṃ hi muktaye // ViP_2,15.31 //
analyzed: tat manaḥ samatā ālambi kāryam sāmyam hi muktaye
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca
iti ākarṇya vacaḥ tasya parama artha śritam nṛpa
praṇipatya mahābhāgaḥ nidāghaḥ vākyam abravīt
prasīda mad hita arthāya kathyatām yat tvam āgataḥ

original: naṣṭo mohastavākarṇya vacāṃsyetāni me dvīja // ViP_2,15.33 //
analyzed: naṣṭaḥ mohaḥ tava ākarṇya vacāṃsi etāni me dvīja
ṛbhuḥ uvāca
ṛmuḥ asmi tava ācāryaḥ prajñā dānāya te dvija
yāsyāmi parama arthaḥ tava uditaḥ

original: evamekamidaṃ viddhi na bhedi sakalaṃ jagat /
analyzed: evam ekam idam viddhi na bhedi sakalam jagat
vāsudeva abhidheyasya svarūpam paramātmanaḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca
tathā iti uktvā nidāghena praṇipāta puraḥsaram

original: pūjataḥ parayā bhaktyā icchātaḥ prayayāv ṛbhuḥ // ViP_2,15.36 //
analyzed: pūjataḥ parayā bhaktyā icchātaḥ prayayau ṛbhuḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe dvitīye aṃśe pañcadaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca
ṛbhuḥ varṣa sahasre tu samatīte nareśvara
nidāgha jñāna dānāya tat eva nagaram yayau

original: nagarasya bahiḥ sotha nidāghaṃ dadṛśe muniḥ /
analyzed: nagarasya bahis saḥ utha nidāgham dadṛśe muniḥ
mahī bala parīvāre puram viśati pārthive
dūre sthitam mahābhāgam naja saṃmarda varjakam
kṣudh kṣāma kaṇṭham āyāntam araṇyāt sa samidh kuśam
dṛṣṭvā nidāgham saḥ ṛbhuḥ upagamya abhivādya ca

original: uvāca kasmādekānte sthīyate bhavatā dvija // ViP_2,16.4 //
analyzed: uvāca kasmāt ekānte sthīyate bhavatā dvija
nidāghaḥ uvāca
bho vipra jana saṃmarde mahān eṣa nareśvaraḥ

original: pravivikṣuḥ puraṃ ramyaṃ tenātra sthīyate mayā // ViP_2,16.5 //
analyzed: pravivikṣuḥ puram ramyam tena atra sthīyate mayā
ṛbhuḥ uvāca
narādhipaḥ utra katamaḥ katamaḥ ca itaraḥ janaḥ

original: kathyatāṃ me dvija śreṣṭha tvamabhijño mato mama // ViP_2,16.6 //
analyzed: kathyatām me dvija śreṣṭha tvam abhijñaḥ mataḥ mama
nidāghaḥ uvāca
gaja indram unmattam adri śṛṅga samucchritam
adhirūḍhaḥ naredraḥ ayam kaḥ tathā itaraḥ
ṛbhuḥ uvāca
etau hi gaja rājānau yugapad darśitau mama
bhavatā na viśeṣeṇa pṛthak cihna upalakṣaṇau
tat kathyatām mahābhāga viśeṣaḥ bhavatā anayoḥ

original: jñātumicchāmyahaṃ kotra gajaḥ ko vā narādhipaḥ // ViP_2,16.9 //
analyzed: jñātum icchāmi aham kaḥ utra gajaḥ kaḥ vā narādhipaḥ
nidāghaḥ uvāca
gajaḥ yaḥ yam atho brahman upari asya eṣa bhūpatiḥ

original: vāhyavā hakasambandhaṃ ko na jānāni vai dvija // ViP_2,16.10 //
analyzed: vāhya vā haka sambandham kaḥ na jānāni vai dvija
ṛbhuḥ uvāca
jānāmi aham yathā brahyan tathā mām avabodhaya
adhas śabda nigadyam hi kim ca ūrdhvam abhidhiyate
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca
iti uktaḥ sahasā āruhya nidāghaḥ prāha tam ṛbhum

original: śrūyatāṃ kathayāmyeṣa yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // ViP_2,16.12 //
analyzed: śrūyatām kathayāmi eṣa yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi

original: uparyahaṃ yathā rājā tvamadhaḥ kuñjaro yathā /
analyzed: upari aham yathā rājā tvam adhas kuñjaraḥ yathā

original: avabodhāya te brahmandṛṣṭānto darśito mayā // ViP_2,16.13 //
analyzed: avabodhāya te brahman dṛṣṭāntaḥ darśitaḥ mayā
ṛbhuḥ uvāca
tvam rājena dvijaśreṣṭha sthitaḥ uham gaja vat yadi
tat etat tvam samācakṣva katamaḥ tvam aham tathā
brāhmamaḥ uvāca
iti uktaḥ sa tvaram tasya pragṛhya caramau ubhau
nidāghaḥ tu āha bhagavān ācāryaḥ tvam ṛbhuḥ dhruvam
na anyasya advaita saṃskāra saṃskṛtam mānasam tathā

original: yathācāryasya tena tvāṃ manye prāptamahaṃ gurum // ViP_2,16.16 //
analyzed: yathā ācāryasya tena tvām manye prāptam aham gurum
ṛbuḥ uvāca
tava upadeśa dānāya pūrva śuśruṣaṇa ādṛtaḥ
guru snehāt ṛbhuḥ nāma nidāgha samupāgataḥ
tat etat upadiṣṭam te saṃkṣepeṇa mahāmate
paramārtha sāra bhūtam yat advaitam aśeṣatas
brāhmaḥ uvāca
evam uktvā yayau vidvān nidāgham saḥ ṛbhuḥ guruḥ
nidāghaḥ upi upadeśena tena advaita paraḥ bhavat
sarva bhūtāni abhedena dadṛśe sa tadā ātmanaḥ

original: yathā brahmaparo muktimavāpa paramāṃ dvijaḥ // ViP_2,16.20 //
analyzed: yathā brahma paraḥ muktim avāpa paramām dvijaḥ
tathā tvam api dharma jña tulya utmarīpu bāndhavaḥ
bhava sarga gatam jānan atmānam avanīpate
sita nīlāḥ di bhedena yathā ekam dṛśyate nabhaḥ
bhrānta dṛṣṭibhiḥ ātmā api tathā ekaḥ san pṛthak pṛthak

original: ekaḥ samastaṃ yadihāsti kiñcittadacyuto nāsti paraṃ tatonyat /
analyzed: ekaḥ samastam yat iha asti kiñcid tat acyutaḥ na asti param tatas anyat

original: so 'haṃ sa ca tvaṃ ca sarvametadātmasvarūpaṃ tyaja bhedamoham // ViP_2,16.23 //
analyzed: saḥ aham sa ca tvam ca sarvam etat ātma svarūpam tyaja bheda moham
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti īritaḥ tena sa rājavarḥ tatyāja bhedam parama artha dṛṣṭiḥ
sa ca api jāti smaraṇa āpta bodhaḥ tatra eva janmani apavargam āpa

original: iti bharatanarendrasāravṛttaṃ kathayati yaś ca śṛṇoti bhaktiyuktaḥ /
analyzed: iti bharata narendra sāra vṛttam kathayati yaḥ ca śṛṇoti bhakti yuktaḥ

original: sa vimalamatireti nātma mohaṃ bhavati ca saṃsaraṇeṇu muktiyogyaḥ // ViP_2,16.25 //
analyzed: sa vimala matiḥ eti moham bhavati ca mukti yogyaḥ
iti śrī viṣṇumadṛdvidṛṣoḍaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
iti śri viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe dvitīyaḥ oṃśaḥ samāptaḥ

original: atha śrīviṣṇumahāpurāṇe viṣṇucittyātmaprakāśākhyaśrīdharīya vyākhyādvayopete tṛtīyoṃśaḥ prārabhyate
analyzed: atha śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe viṣṇu citti ātma prakāśa ākhya śrīdharīya vyākhyā dvaya upete tṛtīyaḥ ūṃśaḥ prārabhyate
śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca
kathitā gurūṇā asamyak bhū samudra ādi saṃsthitiḥ

original: sūryādināṃ ca saṃsthānaṃ jyotiṣāṃ cātivistarāt // ViP_3,1.1 //
analyzed: sūrya ādinām ca saṃsthānam jyotiṣām ca ati vistarāt
deva ādīnām tathā sṛṣṭiḥ ṛṣīṇām ca api varṇitā
cāturvarṇyasya ca utpattiḥ tiryagyoni gatasya ca
dhruva prahlāda caritam vistarāt ca tvayā uditam
manvantarāṇi aśeṣāṇi śrotum icchāmi anukramāt
manvantara adhipān ca eva
bhavatā kathitān etān śrotum icchāmi aham guro
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
atīta anāgatāni iha yāni manvantarāṇi vai

original: tānyahaṃ bhavataḥ samyaklathayāmi yathā kramam // ViP_3,1.5 //
analyzed: tāni aham bhavataḥ samyak lathayāmi yathā kramam

original: svāyaṃbhuvo manuḥ pūrvaṃ paraḥ svārociṣas tathā /
analyzed: svāyaṃbhuvaḥ manuḥ pūrvam paraḥ svārociṣaḥ tathā
uttamaḥ tāmasaḥ ca eva raivataḥ cākṣuṣaḥ tathā
ṣaṭ ete manavaḥ utītāḥ sāṃpratam tu raveḥ sutaḥ
vaivasvateyam yaḥ tu etat maptamam vartate intaram
svāyaṃbhuvam tu kathitam kalpa ādau antaram mayā

original: devāḥ saptarṣayaś caiva yathāvat kathitā mayā // ViP_3,1.8 //
analyzed: devāḥ saptarṣayaḥ ca eva yathāvat kathitāḥ mayā
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi manoḥ svārociṣasya tu
manvantara adhipān samyak devarṣin tad sutān tathā
pārāvatāḥ sa tuṣitāḥ devāḥ svārociṣe antare
vipaścat tatra deva indraḥ maitreya āsīt mahā balaḥ
ūrjastaṃbhaḥ tathā pṛṣabhaḥ tathā

original: nirayaś ca parīvāṃś ca tatra saptarṣayo 'bhavan // ViP_3,1.11 //
analyzed: nirayaḥ ca parīvān ca tatra saptarṣayaḥ abhavan
caitra kiṃpuruṣa ādyāḥ ca sutāḥ svārociṣasya tu
dvitīyam etat vyākhyātam antaram śṛṇu ca uttamam
tṛtīye api antare brahman uttamaḥ nāma yaḥ manuḥ
suśāntiḥ nāma deva indraḥ maitreya āsīt sutān śṛṇu
sudhāmānaḥ tathā satyāḥ japāḥ ca atha pratardanāḥ

original: vaśavartiś ca pañcaite gaṇā dvādaśakāḥsmṛtāḥ // ViP_3,1.14 //
analyzed: vaśavartiḥ ca pañca ete gaṇāḥ dvādaśakāḥ smṛtāḥ
vasiṣṭha tanayāḥ hi ute sapta saptarṣayaḥ bhavan
ajaḥ paraśudīpta ādyāḥ tathā uttama manoḥ sutāḥ
tāmasasya antare devāḥ supārāḥ harayaḥ tathā

original: satyāś ca sudhiyaścaiva saptaviṃśatikā gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,1.16 //
analyzed: satyāḥ ca sudhiyaḥ ca eva saptaviṃśatikāḥ gaṇāḥ
śiviḥ indraḥ tathā ca āsīt śatayajña upala kṣamaḥ

original: saptarṣa yaś ca ye teṣāṃ teṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu // ViP_3,1.17 //
analyzed: saptarṣa yaḥ ca ye teṣām teṣām nāmāni me śṛṇu
jyotirdhāmā puthuḥ kātyaḥ caitra ugniḥ dhanakaḥ tathā

original: pīvaraścarṣayo hyete sapta tatrāpi cāntare // ViP_3,1.18 //
analyzed: pīvaraḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ hi ete sapta tatra api ca antare
naraḥ khyātiḥ ketu rūpaḥ jānujaṅgha ādayaḥ tathā
putrāḥ tu tāmasasya āsan ājānaḥ su mahā balāḥ

original: pañcame vāpi maitreya raivato nāma nāmataḥ /
analyzed: pañcame vā api maitreya raivataḥ nāma nāmataḥ

original: manurvibhuś ca tatrendro devāṃścātrāntare śṛṇu // ViP_3,1.20 //
analyzed: manuḥ vibhuḥ ca tatra indraḥ devān ca atra antare śṛṇu
amitābhāḥ bhūtarayāḥ vaikuṇṭhāḥ susamedhasaḥ
ete deva gaṇāḥ tatra caturdaśa caturdaśa
hiraṇyaromā veda aśriḥ ūrdhvabāhuḥ tathā avaraḥ
vedabāhuḥ sudhāmā ca parjanyaḥ ca mahā muniḥ
ete saptarṣayaḥ vipra tatra āsan raivata intare
balabandhuḥ ca saṃbhāvyaḥ satyaka ādyāḥ ca tad sutāḥ
narendrāḥ ca mahā vīryāḥ babhūvuḥ muni sattama
svārociṣaḥ ca auttamaḥ ca tāmasaḥ raivataḥ tathā
priyavrata anvayāḥ hi ete catvāraḥ manavaḥ smṛtāḥ
viṣṇum ārādhya tapasā sa rājarṣiḥ priyavrataḥ
manvantara adhipān etān laṃbdhavān ātma vaṃśa jān
ṣaṣṭhe ca āsīt cākṣuṣa ākhyaḥ tathā manuḥ
manojavaḥ tathā evā indraḥ devān api nibodha me

original: āpyāḥ prasūtā bhavyāś ca pṛthukāścā divaukasaḥ /
analyzed: āpyāḥ prasūtāḥ bhavyāḥ ca divaukasaḥ

original: mahānubhāvā lakhāś ca pañcaite hyaṣṭakā gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,1.27 //
analyzed: mahā anubhāvāḥ lakhāḥ ca pañca ete hi aṣṭakāḥ gaṇāḥ
sumedhāḥ virajāḥ ca eva haviṣmān uttamaḥ madhuḥ

original: atināmā sahiṣṇuś ca saptāsanniti carṣayaḥ // ViP_3,1.28 //
analyzed: atināmā sahiṣṇuḥ ca sapta āsan iti ca ṛṣayaḥ
ūruḥ pūruḥ śatadhyumna pramukhāḥ su mahā balāḥ
cākṣuṣasya manoḥ putrāḥ pṛthivīpatayaḥ abhavan
vivasvataḥsutaḥ vipra śrāddhadevaḥ mahā dyutiḥ
manuḥ saṃvartate dhīmān sāṃpratam saptamentare
āditya vasu rudra ādyāḥ devāḥ ca atra mahā mune
purandaraḥ tathā eva atra maitreya tridaśeśvaraḥ
vaśiṣṭhaḥ kāśyapaḥ utha atriḥ jamadagniḥ sa gautamaḥ
viśvāmitra bharadvājau sapta saptarṣayaḥ abhavan

original: ikṣvākuś ca nṛgaścaiva dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātireva ca /
analyzed: ikṣvākuḥ ca nṛgaḥ ca eva dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātiḥ eva ca

original: nariṣyantaś ca vikhyāto nābhāgoriṣṭa eva ca // ViP_3,1.33 //
analyzed: nariṣyantaḥ ca vikhyātaḥ nābhāgoriṣṭaḥ eva ca
karūṣaḥ ca pṛṣadhraḥ ca su mahān loka viśrutaḥ
manoḥ vaivasvatasya ete nava putrāḥ su dhārmikāḥ
viṣṇuśaktiḥ anaupamyā sattva udriktā sthitau sthitā
manvantareṣu aśeṣeṣu deva tvena adhitiṣṭhati
aṃśena tasyāḥ jajñe asau yajñaḥ svāyaṃbhuventare

original: ākūtyāṃ mānaso deva utpannaḥ prathamentare // ViP_3,1.36 //
analyzed: ākūtyām mānasaḥ devaḥ utpannaḥ prathama intare

original: tataḥ punaḥ sa vai devaḥ prāpte svārociṣentare /
analyzed: tatas punar sa vai devaḥ prāpte svārociṣa intare
tuṣitāyām samutpannaḥ hi ājiṣaḥ tuṣitaiḥ saha
auttam api antare devaḥ tuṣitaḥ tu punar sa vai
satyāyām abhavat satyaḥ satyaiḥ saha sura uttamaiḥ
tāmasasya antare ca eva punar eva hi

original: haryāyāṃ haribhiḥ sārdha harireva babhūva ha // ViP_3,1.39 //
analyzed: haryāyām haribhiḥ sārdha hariḥ eva babhūva ha
raivate api antare devaḥ saṃbhūtyām mānasaḥ hariḥ

original: saṃbhūto raivataiḥ sārdha devair devavaro hariḥ // ViP_3,1.40 //
analyzed: saṃbhūtaḥ raivataiḥ sārdha devaiḥ deva varaḥ hariḥ
cākṣuṣe ca antare devaḥ vaikuṇṭhaḥ puruṣottamaḥ

original: vikuṇṭhāyāmasau jajñe vaikuṇṭhair daivataiḥ saha // ViP_3,1.41 //
analyzed: vikuṇṭhāyām asau jajñe vaikuṇṭhaiḥ daivataiḥ saha
manvantare itra saṃprāpte tathā
vāmanaḥ kāśyapāt viṣṇuḥ adityām saṃbabhūva ha

original: tribhiḥ kramair imāṃl lokāñ jitvā yena mahātmanā /
analyzed: tribhiḥ kramaiḥ imān lokān jitvā yena mahātmanā
purandarāya trailokyam dattam nihata kaṇṭakam
iti etāḥ tanavaḥ tasya sapta manvantareṣu vai
saptasu eva abhavan vipra yābhiḥ saṃvardhitāḥ prajāḥ

original: yasmād viṣṭamidaṃ viśvaṃ yasya śaktyā mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt viṣṭam idam viśvam yasya śaktyā mahātmanaḥ
tasmāt sa procyate viṣṇuḥ viśoḥ dhātoḥ praveśanāt

original: sarve ca devā manavaḥsamastāḥsaptarṣayo ye manusūnavaś ca /
analyzed: sarve ca devāḥ manavaḥ samastāḥ saptarṣayaḥ ye manu sūnavaḥ ca
indraḥ cayaḥ ayam tridaśa īśa bhūtaḥ viṣṇoḥ aśoṣāḥ tu vibhūtayaḥ tāḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe prathamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca
proktāni etāni bhavatā sapta manvantarāṇi vai
bhaviṣyāṇi api viprarṣa mama ākhyātum tvam arhasi
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
sūryasya patnī saṃjñā abhūt tanayā viśvakarmaṇaḥ

original: manuryamo yamī caiva tadapatyāni vai mune // ViP_3,2.2 //
analyzed: manuḥ yamaḥ yamī ca eva tad apatyāni vai mune

original: asahantī tu sā bhartustejaśchāyāṃ yuyoja vai /
analyzed: a sahantī tu sā bhartuḥ tejaḥ chāyām yuyoja vai
bhartṛ śuśrūṣaṇe araṇyam svayam ca tapase yayau
saṃjñā iyam iti atha arkaḥ ca chāyāyām ātmaja trayam

original: śanaiścaraṃ manuṃ cānyaṃ tapatīṃ cāpyajājanat // ViP_3,2.4 //
analyzed: śanaiścaram manum ca anyam tapatīm ca api ajājanat

original: chāyāsaṃjñā dadau śāpaṃ yamāya kupitā yadā /
analyzed: chāyā saṃjñā dadau śāpam yamāya kupitā yadā
tadā anyā iyam asau buddhiḥ iti āsīt yama sūryayoḥ
tatas vivasvān ākhyātām tayā eva araṇya saṃsthitām
samādhi dṛṣṭyā dadṛśe tām aśvām tapasi sthitām
vāji rūpa dharaḥ saḥ utha tasyām devau atha aśvinau

original: janayāmāsa revantaṃ retasoṃte ca bhāskaraḥ // ViP_3,2.7 //
analyzed: janayāmāsa revantam ca bhāskaraḥ

original: āninye ca punaḥ saṃjñāṃ svasthānaṃ bhagavān raviḥ /
analyzed: āninye ca punar saṃjñām sva sthānam bhagavān raviḥ

original: tejasaḥ śamanaṃ cāsya viśvakarmā cakāra ha // ViP_3,2.8 //
analyzed: tejasaḥ śamanam ca asya viśvakarmā cakāra ha
bhramam āropya sūryam tu tasya tejaḥ niśātanam
kṛtavān aṣṭamam bhāgam sa vyaśātayat avyayam
yat tasmāt vaiṣṇavam tejaḥ śātitam viśvakarmaṇā
jājvalyamānam apatat tat bhūmau muni sattama
tvaṣṭā eva tejasā tena viṣṇoḥ cakram akalpayat

original: triśūlaṃ caiva śarvasya śibikāṃ dhanadasya ca // ViP_3,2.11 //
analyzed: triśūlam ca eva śarvasya śibikām dhanadasya ca
śaktim guhasya devānām anyeṣām ca yat āyudham

original: tatsarvaṃ tejasā tena viśvakarmā vyavardhayat // ViP_3,2.12 //
analyzed: tat sarvam tejasā tena viśvakarmā vyavardhayat
chāyā saṃjñā sutaḥ yaḥ asau dvitīyaḥ kathitaḥ manuḥ
sāvarṇiḥ tena kathyate
tasya manvantaram hya utat sāvarṇikam atha aṣṭamam
tat śṛṇuṣva mahābhāga bhaviṣyat kathayāmi te
sāvarṇiḥ tu manuḥ yaḥ asau maitreya bhavitā tatas

original: sutapāścāmitābhāś ca mukhyāścāpi tathā surāḥ // ViP_3,2.15 //
analyzed: sutapāḥ ca amitābhāḥ ca mukhyāḥ ca api tathā surāḥ

original: teṣāṃ gaṇāś ca devānāmekaiko viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām gaṇāḥ ca devānām ekaikaḥ viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ
saptarṣin api vakṣyāmi bhaviṣyān muni sattama

original: dīptimān gālavo rāmaḥ kṛpo droṇis tathā paraḥ /
analyzed: dīptimān gālavaḥ rāmaḥ kṛpaḥ droṇiḥ tathā paraḥ

original: matputraś ca tathā vyāsa ṛṣyaśṛṅgaś ca saptamaḥ // ViP_3,2.17 //
analyzed: mad putraḥ ca tathā vyāsaḥ ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ ca saptamaḥ
viṣṇu prasādāt anaghaḥ pātāla antara gocaraḥ
virocana sutaḥ teṣām baliḥ indraḥ bhaviṣyati

original: sāvarṇestu manoḥ putrā bhaviṣyanti nareśvarāḥ // ViP_3,2.19 //
analyzed: sāvarṇeḥ tu manoḥ putrāḥ bhaviṣyanti nareśvarāḥ
navamaḥ dakṣasāvarṇiḥ bhaviṣyati mune manuḥ

original: pārā marīcigarbhāś ca sudharmāṇas tathā tridhā /
analyzed: pārāḥ marīcigarbhāḥ ca sudharmāṇaḥ tathā tridhā

original: bhaviṣyanti tathā devā hyokaiko dvādaśo gaṇaḥ // ViP_3,2.21 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti tathā devāḥ hi oka ekaḥ dvādaśaḥ gaṇaḥ
teṣām idraḥ mahā vīryaḥ bhaviṣyati adbhutaḥ dvija
savanaḥ dyutimān bhavyaḥ vasuḥ medhātithiḥ tathā

original: jyotiṣmān saptamaḥ satyastatraite ca maharṣayaḥ // ViP_3,2.23 //
analyzed: jyotiṣmān saptamaḥ satyaḥ tatra ete ca mahā ṛṣayaḥ
dhṛtaketuḥ dīptiketuḥ pañcahasta nirāmayau
pṛthuśrava ādyāḥ ca tathā dakṣamāvarṇika ātmajāḥ
dasamaḥ brahmasāvarmiḥ bhaviṣyati mune manuḥ

original: sūdhāmāno viśuddhāś ca śatasaṃkhyās tathā surāḥ // ViP_3,2.25 //
analyzed: sūdhāmānaḥ viśuddhāḥ ca śatasaṃkhyāḥ tathā surāḥ

original: teṣām indraś ca bhavitā śāntir nāma mahābalaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām indraḥ ca bhavitā śāntiḥ nāma mahā balaḥ

original: saptarṣayo bhaviṣyanti ye tathā tāñchṛṇuṣva ha // ViP_3,2.26 //
analyzed: saptarṣayaḥ bhaviṣyanti ye tathā tān śṛṇuṣva ha
haviṣmān sukṛtaḥ satyaḥ tapomūrtiḥ tathā aparaḥ
nābhāgaḥ apratimaujāḥ ca satyaketuḥ tathā eva ca
sukṣetraḥ ca uttamaujāḥ ca bhūriṣeṇa ādayaḥ daśa
brahmasāvarṇi putrāḥ tu rakṣiṣyanti vasuṃdharām

original: ekādaśaś ca bhavitā dharmasāvarṇiko manuḥ // ViP_3,2.29 //
analyzed: ekādaśaḥ ca bhavitā dharmasāvarṇikaḥ manuḥ
vihaṅgamāḥ kāma āgamāḥ nirvāṇāḥ ṛṣayaḥ tathā

original: gaṇāstvete tadā mukhyā devānāṃ ca bhaviṣyatām /
analyzed: gaṇāḥ tu ete tadā mukhyāḥ devānām ca bhaviṣyatām

original: aikaikastriṃśakasteṣāṃ gaṇaścendraś ca vai pṛṣā // ViP_3,2.30 //
analyzed: aikaikaḥ triṃśakaḥ teṣām gaṇaḥ ca indraḥ ca vai pṛṣā
niḥ svaraḥ ca agnitejāḥ ca vapuṣmān ghaṇiḥ āruṇiḥ
haviṣmān anaghaḥ ca eva bhāvyāḥ saptarṣayaḥ tathā
sarvatraga sūdharmā ca devānīka ādayaḥ tathā
bhaviṣyanti manoḥ tasya tanayāḥ pṛti viśvarāḥ

original: ṛkudhāmā ca tatredro bhavitā śṛṇu me surān // ViP_3,2.33 //
analyzed: ṛkudhāmā ca tatra idraḥ bhavitā śṛṇu me surān

original: haritā rohitā devās tathā mumanaso dvija /
analyzed: haritāḥ rohitāḥ devāḥ tathā mumanasaḥ dvija

original: sukarmāṇaḥ surāpāś ca daśakāḥ pañca vai gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,2.34 //
analyzed: su karmāṇaḥ surā pāḥ ca daśakāḥ pañca vai gaṇāḥ
tapasvī sutapāḥ ca eva tapomūrtiḥ taporatiḥ

original: saptarṣayastvime tasya putrānapi nibodha me // ViP_3,2.35 //
analyzed: saptarṣayaḥ tu ime tasya putrān api nibodha me

original: trayodaśo rucirnāmā bhaviṣyati mune manaḥ // ViP_3,2.37 //
analyzed: trayodaśaḥ ruciḥ nāmā bhaviṣyati mune manaḥ

original: trayastriṃśadvibhedāsta devānāṃ yatra vai gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,2.38 //
analyzed: trayastriṃśat vibhedāḥ āsta devānām yatra vai gaṇāḥ
divaspatiḥ mahā vīryaḥ teṣām indraḥ abhiviṣyati

original: saptarṣayastvamī tasya putrānapi nibodhe me // ViP_3,2.40 //
analyzed: saptarṣayaḥ tu amī tasya putrān api nibodhe me

original: śucirindraḥ suragaṇastatra pañca śṛṇuṣva tān // ViP_3,2.42 //

original: cākṣuṣāś ca pavitrāś ca kaniṣṭhā bhrājikās tathā /
analyzed: cākṣuṣāḥ ca pavitrāḥ ca kaniṣṭhāḥ bhrājikāḥ tathā

original: vācavṛddhaś ca vai devāḥsaptarṣīnapi me śṛṇu // ViP_3,2.43 //

original: agnibāhuḥ śuciḥ śukro māgadhognīdhra eva ca /

original: yuktas tathā jitaścānyo manuputrānataḥ śṛṇu // ViP_3,2.44 //

original: kathitā muniśārdula pālayiṣyanti ye mahīm // ViP_3,2.45 //
analyzed: kathitāḥ muni śārdula pālayiṣyanti ye mahīm

original: pravartayanti tānetya bhuvaṃ saptarṣayo divaḥ // ViP_3,2.46 //

original: kṛtekṛte smṛter vipra praṇetā jāyate manuḥ /
analyzed: kṛte kṛte smṛteḥ vipra praṇetā jāyate manuḥ

original: devā yajñabhujaste tu yāvanmanvantaraṃ tu tat // ViP_3,2.47 //
analyzed: devāḥ yajñabhujaḥ te tu yāvat manvantaram tu tat

original: bhavanti ye manoḥ putrā yāvanmanvaṃrataṃ tu taiḥ /

original: manuḥsaptarṣayo devā bhūpālāś ca manoḥ sutāḥ /
analyzed: manuḥ saptarṣayaḥ devāḥ bhūpālāḥ ca manoḥ sutāḥ

original: caturdaśabhir etais tu gatair manvantarair dvija /
analyzed: caturdaśabhiḥ etaiḥ tu gataiḥ manvantaraiḥ dvija
