original: tāvatpramāṇā ca niśā tato bhavati sattama /
analyzed: tāvat pramāṇā ca niśā tatas bhavati sattama
brahma rūpa dharaḥ śete śeṣa ahau aṃbu saṃplave
trailokyam akhilam grastvā bhagavān ādi kṛt vibhuḥ
sva māyā saṃstitaḥ vipra sarva bhūtaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: tataḥ prabuddho bhagavān yathā pūrvaṃ tathā punaḥ /
analyzed: tatas prabuddhaḥ bhagavān yathā pūrvam tathā punar
sṛṣṭim karoti avyaya ātmā kalpe kalpe rajaḥ gumaḥ
manavaḥ bhūbhujaḥ sa iṃdrāḥ devāḥ saptarṣayaḥ tathā
sāttvika oṃśaḥ sthiti karaḥ jagataḥ dvijasattama

original: yugavyavasthāṃ kurute tathā maitreya tacchṛṇu // ViP_3,2.55 //
analyzed: yuga vyavasthām kurute tathā maitreya tat śṛṇu
kṛte yuge param jñānam kapila ādi sva rūpa dhṛk
dadāti sarva bhūta ātmā sarva bhūta hite rataḥ
cakravarti svarūpeṇa tretāyām api sa prabhūḥ
duṣṭānām nigraha kurvan paripāti jagattrayam
vedam ekam catur bhedam kṛtvā śākhā śataiḥ vibhuḥ
karoti bahulam bhūyas vedavyāsa sva rūpa dhṛk
vedān tu dvāpare vyasya kaleḥ ante punar hariḥ
evam etat jagat sarvam śaśvat pāti karoti ca
hanti ca anteṣu ananta ātmā na asti asmad dyatireki yat
bhūtam bhavyam bhaviṣyam ca sarva bhūtāt mahātmanaḥ

original: tadatrānyatra vā vipra sadbhāvaḥ kathitastava // ViP_3,2.61 //
analyzed: tat atrā anyatra vā vipra sadbhāvaḥ kathitaḥ tava
manvantarāṇi aśeṣāṇi kathitāni mayā tavā
manvantara adhipān ca eva kim anyat kathayāmi te
iti śri viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe dvitīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca
jñātam etat mayā tvattaḥ yathā sarvam idam jagat

original: viṣṇurviṣṇo viṣṇutaś ca na paraṃ vidyate tataḥ // ViP_3,3.1 //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ viṣṇo viṣṇutaḥ ca na param vidyate tatas
etat tu śrotum icchāmi vyastāḥ vedāḥ mahātmanā
vedavyāsa sva rūpeṇa yathā tena yuge yuge
yasmin yasmin yuge vyāsaḥ yaḥ yaḥ āsīt mahā mune

original: tantamācakṣva bhagavañchāśābhedāṃś ca me vada // ViP_3,3.3 //
analyzed: bhagavan śāśā bhedān ca me vada
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
veda drumasya maitreya śākhā bhedāḥ sahasraśas

original: na śakto vistarādvaktuṃ sekṣepeṇa śṛṇuṣva tam // ViP_3,3.4 //
analyzed: na śaktaḥ vistarāt vaktum sa īkṣepeṇa śṛṇuṣva tam
dvāpare dvāpare viṣṇuḥ vyāsa rūpī mahā mune

original: vedamekaṃ subahudhā kurute jagato hitaḥ // ViP_3,3.5 //
analyzed: vedam ekam su bahudhā kurute jagataḥ hitaḥ

original: vīryaṃ tejo balaṃ cālpaṃ manuṣyāṇāmavekṣya ca /
analyzed: vīryam tejaḥ balam ca alpam manuṣyāṇām avekṣya ca
hitāya sarva bhūtānām veda bhedān karoti saḥ

original: yayāsau kurute tanvā vedamekaṃ pṛthak prabhuḥ /
analyzed: yayā asau kurute tanvā vedam ekam pṛthak prabhuḥ

original: vedavyāsābhidhānā tu sā ca mūrtirmadhrudviṣaḥ // ViP_3,3.7 //
analyzed: vedavyāsa abhidhānā tu sā ca mūrtiḥ madhrudviṣaḥ
yasmin vyāsāḥ ye ye syuḥ tān nibodha me

original: yathā ca bhedaḥ śākhānāṃ vyāsena kriyate mune // ViP_3,3.8 //
analyzed: yathā ca bhedaḥ śākhānām vyāsena kriyate mune
aṣṭaviṃśati kṛtvas vai vedaḥ vyastaḥ saha ṛṣibhiḥ
vaivasvata intare tasmin dvāpareṣu punar punar
vedavyāsāḥ vyatītāḥ ye hi aṣṭar viśati sattama

original: caturdhā yaiḥ kṛto vedo dvāpareṣu punaḥ punaḥ // ViP_3,3.10 //
analyzed: caturdhā yaiḥ kṛtaḥ vedaḥ dvāpareṣu punar punar
dvāpare prathame vyastaḥ svayam vedaḥ svayaṃbhuvā

original: dvitīye dvāpare caiva vedavyāsaḥ prajāpati // ViP_3,3.11 //
analyzed: dvitīye dvāpare ca eva vedavyāsaḥ prajāpati
tṛtīye ca uśanāḥ vyāsaḥ caturthe ca bṛhaspatiḥ

original: savitā pañcame vyāsaḥ ṣaṣṭhe mṛtyuḥ smṛtaḥ prabhuḥ // ViP_3,3.12 //
analyzed: savitā pañcame vyāsaḥ ṣaṣṭhe mṛtyuḥ smṛtaḥ prabhuḥ
saptame ca tathā evā indraḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ ca aṣṭame smṛtaḥ

original: sārasvataś ca navame tridhāmā daśame smṛtaḥ // ViP_3,3.13 //
analyzed: sārasvataḥ ca navame tridhāmā daśame smṛtaḥ
ekādaśe tu triśikhaḥ bharadvājaḥ tatas paraḥ

original: trayodaśe cāntarikṣo varṇī cāpi caturdaśe // ViP_3,3.14 //
analyzed: trayodaśe ca āntarikṣaḥ varṇī ca api caturdaśe
trayyāruṇaḥ pañcadaśe ṣoḍaśe tu dhanañjayaḥ

original: kratuñjayaḥ saptadaśe tadūrdhvaṃ ca jayaḥsmṛtaḥ // ViP_3,3.15 //
analyzed: kratuñjayaḥ saptadaśe tad ūrdhvam ca jayaḥ smṛtaḥ
tatas vyāsaḥ bharadvājaḥ bharadvājāt ca gautamaḥ
gautamāt uttaraḥ vyāsaḥ haryātmā yaḥ abhidhīyate
atha haryātmanaḥ unte ca smṛtaḥ vājaśravāḥ muniḥ
somaśuṣkāyaṇaḥ tasmāt tṛṇabinduḥ iti smṛtaḥ
ṛkṣaḥ bhūt bhārgavaḥ tasmāt vālmīkiḥ yaḥ abhidhīyate
tasmāt asmad pitā śaktiḥ vyāsaḥ tasmāt aham mune
jātukarṇaḥ bhavat mattaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ tatas
aṣṭaviṃśatiḥ iti ete vedavyāsāḥ purātanāḥ

original: eko vedaścaturdhā tu taiḥ kṛto dvāparādiṣu // ViP_3,3.20 //
analyzed: ekaḥ vedaḥ caturdhā tu taiḥ kṛtaḥ dvāpara ādiṣu
bhaviṣye dvāpare ca api drauṇiḥ vyāsaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: vyatīte mama putresmin kṛṣṇadvaipāyane mune // ViP_3,3.21 //
analyzed: vyatīte mama putresmin kṛṣṇadvaipāyane mune
dhruvam ekākṣaram brahma om iti eva vyavasthitam
bṛha tvāt bṛṃhaṇa tvāt ca tat brahyā iti abhidhīyate
praṇava avasthitam nityam bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar iti īryate
ṛk yajuḥ sāma atharvāṇaḥ yat tasmai brahmaṇe namaḥ
jagataḥ pralaya utpattyoḥ yat tat kāraṇa saṃjñitam

original: mahataḥ paramaṃ guhyaṃ tasmai subrahmaṇe namaḥ // ViP_3,3.24 //
analyzed: mahataḥ paramam guhyam tasmai su brahmaṇe namaḥ
agādha apāram akṣayyam jagat saṃmohana ālayam
sva prakāśa pravṛttibhyām puruṣa artha prayojanam
saṃkhya jñānavatām niṣṭhā gatiḥ śama dama ātmanām
yat tat avyaktam amṛtam pravṛttiḥ brahma śāśvatam
pradhānam ātma yoniḥ ca guhā saṃstham ca śabdyate
avibhāgam tathā śukram akṣayam bahudhā ātmakam
parama brahmaṇe tasmai nityam eva namaḥ namaḥ
yat rūpam vāsudevasya paramātma svarūpiṇaḥ
etat brahma tridhā bhedam abhedam api sa prabhuḥ
sarva bhedeṣu abhedā ūsau bhidyate bhinna buddhibhiḥ
saḥ ṛk mayaḥ sāma mayaḥ sarva ātmā sa yajuḥ mayaḥ
ṛk yajuḥ sāma sāra ātmā saḥ eva ātmā śarīriṇām

original: sa bhidyate vedamayaḥsvavedaṃ karoti bhedair bahubhiḥ saśākham /
analyzed: sa bhidyate veda mayaḥ sva vedam karoti bhedaiḥ bahubhiḥ sa śākham
śākhā praṇetā sa samasta śākhā jñāna svarūpaḥ bhagavān asaṃgaḥ
iti kṣiviṣṇu mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe tṛtīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
ādyaḥ vedaḥ catuṣpādaḥ kṛtaḥ sāhasra saṃmitaḥ

original: tato daśagumaḥ kṛtsno yajñoyaṃ sarvakāmadhuk // ViP_3,4.1 //
analyzed: tatas daśagumaḥ kṛtsnaḥ yajñaḥ yam sarva kāmaduh
tatas utra mad sutaḥ vyāsaḥ
vedam ekam catuṣpādam caturdhā vyabhajat prabhuḥ

original: yathā ca tena vai vyastā vedabyāsena dhīmatā /
analyzed: yathā ca tena vai vyastāḥ vedabyāsena dhīmatā

original: vedās tathā samastais tair vyastā vyastais tathā mayā // ViP_3,4.3 //
analyzed: vedāḥ tathā samastaiḥ taiḥ vyastāḥ vyastaiḥ tathā mayā
tat anena eva vedānām śākhā bhedān dvijottama
catur yugeṣu paṭhitān samasteṣu avadhāraya
kṛṣṇadvaipāyanam vyāsam viddhi nārāyaṇam prabhum

original: ko hyanyo bhuvi maitreya mahābhāratakṛdbhavet // ViP_3,4.5 //
analyzed: kaḥ hi anyaḥ bhuvi maitreya mahābhārata kṛt bhavet

original: tena vyastā yathā vedā matputreṇa mahātmanā /
analyzed: tena vyastāḥ yathā vedāḥ mad putreṇa mahātmanā

original: dvāpare hy atra maitreya tasmiñ śṛṇu yathātatham // ViP_3,4.6 //
analyzed: dvāpare hi atra maitreya tasmin śṛṇu yathātatham
brahmaṇā coditaḥ vyāsaḥ vedān vyastum pracakrame
atha śiṣyān prajagrāha caturaḥ vedapāragān
ṛgveda pāṭhakam pailam jagrāha sa mahā muniḥ
vaiśaṃpāyana nāmānam yajurvedasya ca agrahīt
jaiminim sāmavedasya tathā eva atharvaveda vid
sumantuḥ tasya śiṣyaḥ bhūt vedavyāsasya dhīmataḥ
romaharṣaṇa nāmānam mahā buddhim mahā muniḥ

original: sūtaṃ jagrāha śiṣyaṃ sa itihāsapurāṇayoḥ // ViP_3,4.10 //
analyzed: sūtam jagrāha śiṣyam saḥ itihāsa purāṇayoḥ
ekaḥ āsīt yajurvedaḥ tam caturdhā vyakalpayat
cāturhetram abhūt tasmin tena yajñam atha akarot

original: ādhvaryavaṃ yajurbhis tu ṛgbhir hotraṃ tathā muniḥ /
analyzed: ādhvaryavam yajurbhiḥ tu ṛgbhiḥ hotram tathā muniḥ
audgātram sāma ābhiḥ cakre brahmatvam ca api atharvabhiḥ
tatas saḥ ṛcaḥ uddhṛtya ṛgvedam kṛtavān muniḥ

original: yajṛṃṣi ca yajurvedaṃ sāmavedaṃ ca sāmābhaḥ // ViP_3,4.13 //
analyzed: yajṛṃṣi ca yajurvedam sāmavedam ca sāma abhaḥ
rājñām ca atharvavedena sarva karmāṇi ca prabhuḥ

original: kārayāmāsa maitreya brahmatvaṃ ca yathāsthiti // ViP_3,4.14 //
analyzed: kārayāmāsa maitreya brahmatvam ca yathāsthiti
saḥ ayam ekaḥ yathā vedaḥ taruḥ tena pṛthakkṛtaḥ
caturdhā atha tatas jātam veda pādapa kānanam
bibheda prathamam vipra pailaḥ ṛgveda pādapam
indrapramitaye prādāt bāṣkalāya ca saṃhite

original: caturdhā sa vibhedātha bāṣkalopi ca saṃhitām /
analyzed: caturdhā sa vibheda atha bāṣkalopi ca saṃhitām

original: bodhādibhyo dadau tāś ca śiṣyebhyaḥ samahāmuniḥ // ViP_3,4.17 //
analyzed: bodha ādibhyaḥ dadau tāḥ ca śiṣyebhyaḥ sa mahā muniḥ
bodhya agni māḍhakau
pratiśākhāḥ tu śākhāyāḥ tasyāḥ te jagṛhuḥ mune
indrapramitiḥ ekām tu saṃhitām sva sūtam tatas
māṇḍukeyam mahātmānam maitreya adhyāpayat tadā
tasya śiṣya praśiṣyebhyaḥ putra śiṣya kramāt yayau
vedamitraḥ tu śākalyaḥ saṃhitām tām adhītavān

original: cakāra saṃhitāḥ pañca śiṣyebhyaḥ pradadau ca tāḥ // ViP_3,4.21 //
analyzed: cakāra saṃhitāḥ pañca śiṣyebhyaḥ pradadau ca tāḥ

original: tasya śiṣyāstu ye pañca teṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu /
analyzed: tasya śiṣyāḥ tu ye pañca teṣām nāmāni me śṛṇu

original: mudgalo gomakhaścaiva vātsyaḥ śālīya eva ca /
analyzed: mudgalaḥ gomakhaḥ ca eva vātsyaḥ śālīyaḥ eva ca
śarīraḥ pañcamaḥ ca āsīt maitreya su mahāmatiḥ
saṃhitā tritayam cakre śākapūrṇaḥ tathā itaraḥ
niruktam akarot tat ūccaturtham muni sattama
kraiñcaḥ vaitālikaḥ tadvat balākaḥ ca mahā muniḥ
niruktaḥ ca caturthaḥ bhūt veda vedāṅga pāragaḥ
iti etāḥ pratiśākhābhyaḥ hi anuśākhāḥ dvijottama
bāṣkalaḥ ca aparāḥ tistraḥ saṃhitāḥ kṛtavān dvija
śiṣyaḥ kālāyaniḥ gārgyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ ca kathājapaḥ

original: ityetā bahvṛcāḥ proktāḥ saṃhitā yaiḥ pravartitāḥ // ViP_3,4.26 //
analyzed: iti etāḥ bahvṛcāḥ proktāḥ saṃhitāḥ yaiḥ pravartitāḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe caturthaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
yajuḥ vetadaroḥ śākhāḥ saptaviṃśat mahā muniḥ
vaiśaṃpāyana nāmāsaḥ vyāsa śiṣyaḥ cakāra vai

original: śiṣyebhyaḥ pradadau tāś ca jagṛhustepyanukramāt // ViP_3,5.2 //
analyzed: śiṣyebhyaḥ pradadau tāḥ ca jagṛhuḥ te pi anukramāt
yājñavalkyaḥ tu tatra abhūt bāhyarāta sutaḥ dvija
śiṣyaḥ parama dharma jñaḥ guru vṛtti paraḥ sadā
ṛṣiḥ yā udya mahāmeroḥ samāje nā āgamiṣyati

original: tasya vai saptarātrāttu brahmahattyā bhaviṣyati // ViP_3,5.4 //
analyzed: tasya vai sapta rātrāt tu brahma hattyā bhaviṣyati

original: pūrvamevaṃ munigaṇaiḥ samayo yaḥ kṛto dvija /
analyzed: pūrvam evam muni gaṇaiḥ samayaḥ yaḥ kṛtaḥ dvija
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ ekaḥ tu tam vyatikrāntavān tadā

original: svastrīyaṃ bālakaṃ sotha padā spṛṣṭamatāḍayat // ViP_3,5.6 //
analyzed: sva strīyam bālakam saḥ utha padā spṛṣṭam atāḍayat

original: śiṣyānāha sa bhoḥ śiṣyā brahmahattyāpahaṃ vratam /
analyzed: śiṣyān āha sa bhoḥ śiṣyāḥ brahma hattyā apaham vratam

original: caradhvaṃ matkṛte sarve na vicāryamidaṃ tathā // ViP_3,5.7 //
analyzed: caradhvam mad kṛte sarve na vicāryam idam tathā

original: athāha yājñavalkyastu kim ebhir bhagavan dvijaiḥ /
analyzed: atha āha yājñavalkyaḥ tu kim ebhiḥ bhagavan dvijaiḥ
kleśitaiḥ alpa tejobhiḥ cāriṣye iham idam vratam

original: tataḥ kruddho guruḥ prāha yājñavalkyaṃ mahāmunim /
analyzed: tatas kruddhaḥ guruḥ prāha yājñavalkyam mahā munim
mucyatām yat tvayā adhītam mattaḥ vipra avamānaka
nistejasaḥ vadasi enā anyat tvam brāhmaṇam puṅgavān
tena śiṣyeṇa na arthaḥ asti mama ājñā bhaṅga kāriṇā
yājñavalkyaḥ tatas prāha bhaktyā etat te mayā uditam

original: mamāpyalaṃ tvayādhītaṃ yanmayā tadidaṃ dvija // ViP_3,5.11 //
analyzed: mama api alam tvayā adhītam yat mayā tat idam dvija
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti uktaḥ rudhira aktāni sarūpāṇi

original: chardayitvā dadau tasmai yayau sa svecchayā muni // ViP_3,5.12 //
analyzed: chardayitvā dadau tasmai yayau sa sva icchayā muni
yajūṃṣi atha visṛṣṭāni yājñavalkyena vai dvija

original: jagṛhustittirā bhūtvā taittirīyāstu te tataḥ // ViP_3,5.13 //
analyzed: jagṛhuḥ tittirāḥ bhūtvā taittirīyāḥ tu te tatas

original: brahmahattyāvrataṃ cīrṇaṃ guruṇā coditais tu taiḥ /
analyzed: brahma hattyā vratam cīrṇam guruṇā coditaiḥ tu taiḥ
cākruḥ ādhvaryavam te tu caraṇāt muni sattama
yājñavalkyaḥ upi maitreya prāṇāyāma parāyaṇaḥ
tṛṣṭāva prayataḥ sūryam yajūṃṣi abhilaṣan tatas
yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca
namaḥ savitre dvārāya mukteḥ amita tejase

original: ṛgyajuḥsāmabhūtāya trayīdhāmne ca te namaḥ // ViP_3,5.16 //
analyzed: ṛk yajuḥ sāma bhūtāya trayī dhāmne ca te namaḥ
namaḥ agnīṣoma bhūtāya jagataḥ kāraṇa ātmane
bhāskarāya param tejaḥ sauṣumṇa ruci bibhrate
kalā kāṣṭhā nimeṣa ādi kāla jñāna ātma rūpiṇe
dhyeyāya viṣṇu rūpāya parama akṣara rūpiṇe
bibharti yaḥ sura gaṇān āpyāya indum sva raśmibhiḥ

original: svadhāmṛtena ca pitṝṃs tasmai tṛptyātmane namaḥ // ViP_3,5.19 //
analyzed: svadhā amṛtena ca pitṝn tasmai tṛpti ātmane namaḥ

original: himāṃbugharmavṛṣṭīnāṃ kartā bhartā ca yaḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: hima aṃbu gharma vṛṣṭīnām kartā bhartā ca yaḥ prabhuḥ
tasmai tri kāla rūpāya namaḥ sūryāya vedhase

original: apahanti tabho yaś ca jagatosya jagatpatiḥ /
analyzed: apahanti tabhaḥ yaḥ ca jagataḥ usya jagatpatiḥ

original: tasya dhāmadharo devo namastasmai vivasvate // ViP_3,5.21 //
analyzed: tasya dhāma dharaḥ devaḥ namaḥ tasmai vivasvate
sat karma yogyaḥ na janaḥ na eva apaḥ śuddhi kāraṇam

original: yasminnanudite tasmai namo devāya bhāsvate // ViP_3,5.22 //
analyzed: yasmin an udite tasmai namaḥ devāya bhāsvate

original: spṛṣṭo yadaṃśubhir lokaḥ kriyāyogyo hi jāyate /
analyzed: spṛṣṭaḥ yad aṃśubhiḥ lokaḥ kriyā yogyaḥ hi jāyate
pavitra kāraṇa ātmāya tasmai śuddha ātmane namaḥ
namaḥ savitre sūryāya bhāskarāya vivasvate
ādityāya ādi bhūtāya deva ādīnām namaḥ namaḥ
hiraṇmayam ratham yasya ketavaḥ umṛta vājinaḥ
vahanti bhuvana āloka cakṣuṣam tam namāmi aham
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti evamādibhiḥ tena stūyamānaḥ sa vai raviḥ
vāji rūpa dharaḥ prāha vāñchitam
yājñavalkyaḥ tadā prāha praṇipatya divākaram

original: yajūṃṣi tāni me dehi yāni saṃti na me gurau // ViP_3,5.27 //
analyzed: yajūṃṣi tāni me dehi yāni saṃti na me gurau
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
evam uktaḥ dadau tasmai yajūṃṣi bhagavān raviḥ

original: ayātayāmasaṃjñāni yāni vetti na tadguruḥ // ViP_3,5.28 //
analyzed: ayātayāma saṃjñāni yāni vetti na tad guruḥ

original: yajūṃṣi yair adhītāni tāni viprair dhijottama /
analyzed: yajūṃṣi yaiḥ adhītāni tāni vipraiḥ dhijottama
vājinaḥ te samākhyātāḥ sūryaḥ api aśvaḥ bhavat yatas

original: śākhābhedāstu teṣāṃ vai daśa pañca ca vājinām /
analyzed: śākhā bhedāḥ tu teṣām vai daśa pañca ca vājinām
kāṇva ādyāḥ su mahābhāgāḥ yājñavalkyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe pañcamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
sāmaveda taroḥ śākhāḥ vyāsa śiṣyasya jauminiḥ

original: krameṇa yena maitreya vibhedaśṛṇu tanmama // ViP_3,6.1 //
analyzed: krameṇa yena maitreya vibheda śṛṇu tat mama
susaṃtuḥ tasya putraḥ bhūt sūtvānaḥ ca abhavat sutaḥ

original: adhītavantau caikaikāṃ saṃhitāṃ tau māhamatī // ViP_3,6.2 //
analyzed: adhītavantau ca ekaikām saṃhitām tau
sahasrasaṃhitā bhedam sukarmā a tad sutaḥ tatas

original: cakāra taṃ ca tacchiṣyau jagṛhāte mahāvratau // ViP_3,6.3 //
analyzed: cakāra tam ca tad śiṣyau jagṛhāte mahā vratau
hiraṇyanābhaḥ kausalyaḥ pauṣpiṃjiḥ ca dvijottama
udīcyāḥ sāmagāḥ śiṣyāḥ tasya pañcaśatam smṛtāḥ
hiraṇyanābhāt tāvatyaḥ saṃhitāḥ yaiḥ dvijottamaiḥ
gṛhītāḥ te api ca ucyante paṇḍitaiḥ prācya sāmagāḥ
lokākṣiḥ naidhamiḥ ca eva kakṣivān lāṅgaliḥ tathā
pauṣpiji śiṣyāḥ tad bhedaiḥ saṃhitāḥ bahulīkṛtāḥ
hiraṇyanābha śiṣyaḥ tu caturviśati saṃhitāḥ

original: provāca kṛtanāmāsau śiṣyebhyaś ca mahāmuniḥ // ViP_3,6.7 //
analyzed: provāca kṛta nāmā asau śiṣyebhyaḥ ca mahā muniḥ
taiḥ ca api sāmavedaḥ asau śākhābhiḥ bahulīkṛtaḥ
atharvaṇām atho vakṣye saṃhitānām samuccayam
atharvavedam sa muniḥ su saṃtura mita dyutiḥ
śiṣyam adhyāpayāmāsa kabandham saḥ api tam dvidhā

original: kṛtvā tudevadarsāya tathā pathyāya dattavān // ViP_3,6.9 //
analyzed: kṛtvā tudevadarsāya tathā pathyāya dattavān
devadarśasya śiṣyāḥ tu medhaḥ brahmabaliḥ tathā
śaulkāyaniḥ pippalādaḥ tathā anyaḥ dvijasattama

original: pathyasyāpi trayaḥ śiṣyāḥ kṛtā yair dvija saṃhitāḥ /
analyzed: pathyasya api trayaḥ śiṣyāḥ kṛtāḥ yaiḥ dvija saṃhitāḥ

original: jābāliḥ kumudādiś ca tṛtīyaḥ śaunako dvija // ViP_3,6.11 //
analyzed: jābāliḥ kumudādiḥ ca tṛtīyaḥ śaunakaḥ dvija

original: śaunakastu dvidhā kṛtvā dadāvekāṃ tu babhrave /
analyzed: śaunakaḥ tu dvidhā kṛtvā dadau ekām tu babhrave

original: dvitīyāṃ saṃhitāṃ prādātsaindhavāya ya saṃjñine // ViP_3,6.12 //
analyzed: dvitīyām saṃhitām prādāt saindhavāya yaḥ saṃjñine
saindhavāt mujikeśaḥ ca dvedha bhinnāḥ tridhā punar

original: nakṣatrakalpo vedānāṃ saṃhitānāṃ tathaiva ca // ViP_3,6.13 //
analyzed: nakṣatrakalpaḥ vedānām saṃhitānām tathā eva ca
caturthaḥ syāt āṅgirasaḥ śāntikalpaḥ ca pañcamaḥ
śreṣṭhāḥ tu atharvaṇām ete saṃhitānām vikalpakāḥ
ākhyānaiḥ ca api upākhyānaiḥ gāthābhiḥ kalpa śuddhibhiḥ
purāṇa saṃhitām cakre purāṇa artha viśāradaḥ
prakhyātaḥ vyāsa śiṣyaḥ bhūt sūtaḥ vai romaharṣaṇaḥ

original: purāmasaṃhitāṃ tasmai dadau vyāso mahāmatiḥ // ViP_3,6.16 //
analyzed: purāma saṃhitām tasmai dadau vyāsaḥ mahāmatiḥ
sumatiḥ ca agnivarcāḥ ca mitrāyuḥ śāṃsapāyanaḥ
akṛtavraṇa sāvarṇiḥ paṣ śiṣyāḥ tasya ca abhavan
kāśyapaḥ saṃhitā kartā sāvarṇiḥ śāṃsapāyanaḥ
romaharṣāṇikā ca anyā tisṝṇām mūla saṃhitā
catuṣṭayena bhedena saṃhitānām idam mune
ādyam sarva purāṇānām purāṇam brāhmam ucyate
aṣṭādaśa purāṇāni purāṇa jñāḥ pracakṣate

original: brāhmaṃ pādmaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca śaivaṃ bhāgavataṃ tathā /
analyzed: brāhmam pādmam vaiṣṇavam ca śaivam bhāgavatam tathā

original: tathānyaṃ nāradīyaṃ ca mārkaṇḍeyaṃ ca saptamam // ViP_3,6.21 //
analyzed: tathā anyam nāradīyam ca mārkaṇḍeyam ca saptamam
āgneyam aṣṭamam ca eva bhaviṣyat navamam smṛtam
daśamam brahmavaivartam laiṅgam ekādaśam smṛtam

original: vārāhaṃ dvādaśaṃ caiva skāndaṃ cātra trayodaśam /
analyzed: vārāham dvādaśam ca eva skāndam ca atra trayodaśam
caturdaśam vāmanam ca kaurmam pañcadaśam tathā

original: mātsyaṃ ca gāruḍaṃ caiva brahmāṇḍaṃ ca tataḥ param /
analyzed: mātsyam ca gāruḍam ca eva brahmāṇḍam ca tatas param
mahā purāṇāni etāni hi aṣṭādaśa mahā mune

original: tathā copa purāṇāni munibhiḥ kathitāni ca /
analyzed: tathā ca upa purāṇāni munibhiḥ kathitāni ca

original: sargaś ca pratisargaś ca vaṃśamanvantarāṇi ca /
analyzed: sargaḥ ca pratisargaḥ ca vaṃśa manvantarāṇi ca

original: sarveṣveteṣu kathyante vaṃśānucārītaṃ ca yat // ViP_3,6.24 //
analyzed: sarveṣu eteṣu kathyante vaṃśānucārītam ca yat
yat etat tava maitreya purāṇam kathyate mayā
etat vaiṣṇava saṃjñam vai pādmasya samanantaram
sarge ca pratisarge ca vaṃśa manvantara ādiṣu

original: kathyate bhagavān viṣṇur aśeṣeṣv iva sattama // ViP_3,6.26 //
analyzed: kathyate bhagavān viṣṇuḥ aśeṣeṣu iva sattama
aṅgāni vedāḥ catvāraḥ mīmāṃsā nyāya vistaraḥ

original: purāṇaṃ dharmaśāstraṃ ca vidyā hyetāścaturdaśa // ViP_3,6.27 //
analyzed: purāṇam dharma śāstram ca vidyāḥ hi etāḥ caturdaśa
āyurvedaḥ dhanurvedaḥ gāndharvaḥ ca eva te trayaḥ

original: arthaśāstraṃ caturthaṃ tu vidya hyaṣṭādaśaiva tāḥ // ViP_3,6.28 //
analyzed: arthaśāstram caturtham tu hi aṣṭādaśa eva tāḥ

original: jñeyā brahmarṣayaḥ pūrvaṃ tebhyo devarṣayaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: jñeyāḥ brahmarṣayaḥ pūrvam tebhyaḥ devarṣayaḥ punar

guṇān tathāvat dharmān ca vipra ādīnām imān śṛṇu

original: kṣāttraṃ karma dvijasyoktaṃ vaiśyaṃ karma tathā padi /
analyzed: kṣāttram karma dvijasya uktam vaiśyam karma tathā padi

original: rājanyasya ca vaiśyoktaṃ śūdrakarma na caitayoḥ // ViP_3,8.39 //
analyzed: rājanyasya ca vaiśya uktam śūdra karma na ca etayoḥ
sāmarthye sati tat tyājyam ubhābhyām api pārthiva
tat eva āpadi kartavyam na kuryāt karma saṃkaram
iti ete kathitāḥ rājan varṇa dharmāḥ mayā tava
dharmān āśramiṇām samyak bruvataḥ me niśāmaya
iti śri viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe aṣṭamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
aurvaḥ uvāca
bālaḥ kṛta upanayanaḥ veda āharaṇa tatparaḥ
guru gehe vaset bhūpa brahmacārī samāhitaḥ

original: śaucā cāravrataṃ tatra kāryaṃ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ guroḥ /
analyzed: śaucā ācāra vratam tatra kāryam śuśrūṣaṇam guroḥ

original: vratāni caratā grāhyo vedaś ca kṛtabuddhinā // ViP_3,9.2 //
analyzed: vratāni caratā grāhyaḥ vedaḥ ca kṛtabuddhinā

original: ubhe saṃdhye raviṃ bhūpa tathaivāgniṃ samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: ubhe saṃdhye ravim bhūpa tathā eva agnim samāhitaḥ
upatiṣṭhet tadā kuryāt guroḥ api abhivādanam
sthite tiṣṭhet vā ajet yāte nīcais āsīta ca āsati

original: śiṣyo gurornṛpaśreṣṭha pratikūlaṃ na saṃcaret // ViP_3,9.4 //
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ guroḥ nṛpa śreṣṭha pratikūlam na saṃcaret
tena e vā uktam paṭhet vedam na anya cittaḥ puras sthitaḥ
anujñātaḥ ca bhikṣā annam aśnīyāt guruṇā tatas
avagāhet apaḥ pūrvam ācāryeṇa avagāhitaḥ
samidh jala ādikam ca asya kālyam kālyam upānayet
gṛhīta grāhya vedaḥ ca tatas anujñām avāpya ca
gārhasthyam āviśet prājñaḥ niṣpanna guru niṣkṛtiḥ
vidhinā avāpta dāraḥ tu dhanam prāpya sva karmaṇā
gṛhastha kāryam akhilam kuryāt bhūpāla śaktitaḥ
nivāpena pitṝn arcan yajñaiḥ devān tathā atithīn

original: annair munīṃś ca svādhyāyair apatyena prajāpatim // ViP_3,9.9 //
analyzed: annaiḥ munīn ca svādhyāyaiḥ apatyena prajāpatim
bhūtāni balibhiḥ ca eva vātsalyena akhilam jagat
prāpnoti lokān puruṣaḥ nija karma samārjitān
bikṣā bhujaḥ ca ye kecid parivraj brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: tepyatraiva pratiṣṭhante gārhasthyaṃ tena vai param // ViP_3,9.11 //
analyzed: te api atra eva pratiṣṭhante gārhasthyam tena vai param
veda āharaṇa kāryāya tīrtha snānāya ca prabho

original: aṭanti vasudhāṃ viprāḥ pṛthivīdarśanāya ca // ViP_3,9.12 //
analyzed: aṭanti vasudhām viprāḥ pṛthivī darśanāya ca

original: aniketā hyanāhārā yatra sāyaṅgṛhāś ca ye /
analyzed: aniketāḥ hi anāhārāḥ yatra sāyaṅgṛhāḥ ca ye

original: teṣāṃ gṛhasthaḥ sarveṣāṃ pratiṣṭhā yonireva ca // ViP_3,9.13 //
analyzed: teṣām gṛhasthaḥ sarveṣām pratiṣṭhā yoniḥ eva ca
teṣām svāgata dāna ādi vaktavyam madhuram nṛpa
gṛha āgatānām dadyāt ca śayana āsana bhojanam
atithiḥ yasya bhagna āśaḥ gṛhāt pratinivartate

original: sa dattvā duṣkṛtaṃ tasmai puṇyamādāya gacchati // ViP_3,9.15 //
analyzed: sa dattvā duṣkṛtam tasmai puṇyam ādāya gacchati
avajñānam ahaṅkāraḥ daṃbhaḥ ca eva sataḥ

original: paritāpopaghātau ca pāruṣyaṃ ca na śasyate // ViP_3,9.16 //
analyzed: paritāpa upaghātau ca pāruṣyam ca na śasyate
yaḥ tu samyak karoti evam gṛhasthaḥ paramam vidhim
sarva bandha vinirmuktaḥ lokān āpnoti anuttamān
vayaḥ parīṇataḥ rājan kṛtakṛtyaḥ gṛhāśramī

original: putreṣu bhāryāṃ nikṣipya vanaṃ gacchetsahaiva vā // ViP_3,9.18 //
analyzed: putreṣu bhāryām nikṣipya vanam gacchet saha eva vā
parṇa mūla phala āhāraḥ keśa śmaśru jaṭā dharaḥ
bhūmi śāyī bhavet tatra muniḥ sarva atithiḥ nṛpa
carma kāśa kuśaiḥ kuryāt paridhāna uttarīyake
tadvat triṣavaṇam snānam śastam asya nareśvaraḥ
devatā abhyarcanam homaḥ sarva abhyāgata pūjanam
bhikṣā bali pradānam ca śastam asya nareśvara
vanyaḥ trehena gātrāṇām abhyaṅgaḥ ca asya śasyate

original: tapaś ca tasya rājendra śītoṣṇādisahiṣṇutā // ViP_3,9.22 //
analyzed: tapaḥ ca tasya rāja indra śīta uṣṇa ādi sahiṣṇu tā
yaḥ tu etām niyataḥ caryām vānaprasthaḥ caret muniḥ
sa dahati agni vat doṣān jayet lokān ca śāśvatān
caturthaḥ ca āśramaḥ bhikṣoḥ projyate yaḥ manīṣibhiḥ

original: tasya svarūpaṃ gadato mama śrotuṃ nṛpārhasi // ViP_3,9.24 //
analyzed: tasya svarūpam gadataḥ mama śrotum nṛpa arhasi
putra dravya kalatreṣu tyaktaḥ trehaḥ narādhipa
caturtham āśrama sthānam gacchet nirdhūta matsaraḥ
traivargikān tyajet sarvān āraṃbhān avanīpate
mitra ādiṣu samaḥ maitraḥ samasteṣu eva jantuṣu
jarāyu ja aṇḍaja ādīnām vāc manaḥ kāya karmabhiḥ

original: yuktaḥ kurvīta na drohaṃ sarvasaṃgāṃścavarjayet // ViP_3,9.27 //
analyzed: yuktaḥ kurvīta na droham sarva saṃgān ca varjayet
eka arātra sthitiḥ grāme pañca rātra sthitiḥ pure

original: tathā tiṣṭhedyathāprītirdveṣo vā nāsya jāyate // ViP_3,9.28 //
analyzed: tathā tiṣṭhet yathā a prītiḥ dveṣaḥ vā na asya jāyate
prāṇa yātrā nimittam ca vyaṅgāre bhuktavat jane
kāle praśasta varṇānām bhikṣā artham paryaṭet gṛhān

original: kāmaḥ krodhas tathā darpamohalobhādayaś ca ye /
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ tathā darpa moha lobha ādayaḥ ca ye
tān tu sarvān parityajya parivrāj nirmamaḥ bhavet
abhayam sarva bhūtebhyaḥ dattvā yaḥ carate muniḥ

original: tasyāpi sarvabhūtebhyo na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // ViP_3,9.31 //
analyzed: tasya api sarva bhūtebhyaḥ na bhayam vidyate kvacid
kṛtvā agnihotram sva śarīra saṃstham śārīram agnim sva mukhe juhoti

original: viprastu bhaikṣyopahitair havirbhiścitāgnikānāṃ vrahati sma lokān // ViP_3,9.32 //
analyzed: vipraḥ tu bhaikṣya upahitaiḥ havirbhiḥ citāgnikānām vrahati sma lokān
mokṣa uśramam yaḥ carate yathoktam śuciḥ sukham kalpita buddhi yuktaḥ

original: anindhanaṃ jyotiriva praśāntaḥsa brahmalokaṃ śrayate dvijātiḥ // ViP_3,9.33 //
analyzed: an indhanam jyotiḥ iva praśāntaḥ sa brahma lokam śrayate dvijātiḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe navamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
sagaraḥ uvāca
kathitam cāturāśramyam cāturvarṇya kriyāḥ tathā
puṃsaḥ kriyām aham śrotum icchāmi dvijasattama
nitya naimittikāḥ kāmyāḥ kriyāḥ puṃsām aśeṣatas

original: samākhyāhi bhṛguśreṣṭha sarvajño hyasi me mataḥ // ViP_3,10.2 //
analyzed: samākhyāhi bhṛgu śreṣṭha sarva jñaḥ hi asi me mataḥ
aurvaḥ uvāca
yat etat uktam bhavatā nitya naimittika āśrayam
tat aham kathayiṣyāṃmi śṛṇuṣva ekamanāḥ mama
jātasya jātakarma ādi kriyā kāṇḍam aśeṣatas

original: putrasya kurvīta pitā śrāddhaṃ cābhyudayātmakam // ViP_3,10.4 //
analyzed: putrasya kurvīta pitā śrāddham ca abhyudaya ātmakam
yugmān tu prāḍmukhān viprān bhojayet manubha īśvara

original: yathā tṛptis tathā kuryāddaivaṃ pitryaṃ dvijanmanām // ViP_3,10.5 //
analyzed: yathā tṛptiḥ tathā kuryāt daivam pitryam dvijanmanām

original: dadhnā yuktaiḥ sabadarair miśrān piḍān mudā yutaḥ /
analyzed: dadhnā yuktaiḥ sa badaraiḥ miśrān piḍān mudā yutaḥ
nāndīmukhebhyaḥ tīrthena dadyāt daivena pārthiva
prājāpatyena vā sarvam upacāram pradakṣiṇam
kurvīta tat tathā aśeṣa vṛddhi kāleṣu bhūpate

original: tataś ca nāma kurvīta pitaiva daśamehani /
analyzed: tatas ca nāma kurvīta pitā eva daśamehani
deva pūrvam nara ākhyam hi śarma varma ādi saṃyutam
śarma iti brāhyaṇasya uktam varma iti kṣatra saṃśrayam
gupta dāsa ātmakam nāma praśastam vaiśya śudrayoḥ
na artha hīnam na ca aśastam na apaśabda yutam tathā
na amaṅgalyam jugupsākam nāma kuryāt sama akṣaram
na ati dīrgham na ati hrasvam na ati guru akṣara anvitam
sukha uccāryam tu tat nāma kuryāt yat praṇava akṣaram
tatas anantara saṃskāra saṃskṛtaḥ guru veśmani
yathā ukta vidhim āśritya kuryāt vidyā parigraham
gṛhīta vidyaḥ gurave dattvā ca guru dakṣiṇām
gārhasthyam icchan bhūpāla kuryāt dāra parigraham
brahmacaryeṇa vā kālam kuryāt saṃkalpa pūrvakam
gugoḥ śuśruṣaṇam kuryāt tad putra ādeḥ atha api vā
vaikhānasaḥ vā api bhavet parivrāj atha vā icchayā
pūrva saṃkalpitam yādṛś tādṛś kuryāt narādhipa
varṣaiḥ ekaguṇām bhāryām udvahet trigumaḥ svayam

original: nāti keśāmakeśāṃ vā nātikṛṣṇāṃ na piṅgalām // ViP_3,10.16 //
analyzed: na ati keśām akeśām vā na ati kṛṣṇām na piṅgalām
nisarga taḥ adhika aṅgām vā nyūna aṅgām api nā udvahet

original: nāviśuddhāṃ saromāṃ vākulajāṃ vāpi rogiṇīm // ViP_3,10.17 //
analyzed: na aviśuddhām sa romām vā akula jām vā api rogiṇīm

original: na duṣṭāṃ duṣṭavākyāṃ vā vyaṅginīṃ putṛmātṛtaḥ /
analyzed: na duṣṭām duṣṭa vākyām vā vyaṅginīm putṛ mātṛtaḥ

original: na śmaśruvyañjanavatīṃ na caiva puruṣākṛtim // ViP_3,10.18 //
analyzed: na śmaśru vyañjanavatīm na ca eva puruṣa ākṛtim

original: na gharvarasvarāṃ kṣāmāṃ tathā kākasvarāṃ na ca /
analyzed: na gharvara svarām kṣāmām tathā kāka svarām na ca
na anibandha īkṣaṇām tadvat vṛtta akṣīm na udvahet budhaḥ

original: yasyāś ca romaśe jaṅghe gulphau yasyāstathonnatau /
analyzed: yasyāḥ ca romaśe jaṅghe gulphau yasyāḥ tathā unnatau

original: gaṇḍayoḥ kūparau yasyā hasaṃtyāstāṃ na codvahet // ViP_3,10.20 //
analyzed: gaṇḍayoḥ kūparau yasyāḥ hasaṃtyāḥ tām na ca udvahet
na ati rūkṣa chavim pāḍu karajām aruṇa īkṣaṇām
āpīna hasta pādām ca na kanyām udvahet budhaḥ
na vāmanām na ati dīrghām na udvahet saṃhata bhruvam

original: na cāti cchidradaśanāṃ na karālamukhīṃ naraḥ // ViP_3,10.22 //
analyzed: na ca ati chidra daśanām na karāla mukhīm naraḥ
pañcamīm mātṛ pakṣāt ca pitṛ pakṣāt ca saptamīm
gṛhasthaḥ ca udvahet kanyām nyāyena vidhinā nṛpa
brāhmaḥ daivaḥ tathā eva ārṣaḥ prājāpatyaḥ tathā āsuraḥ

original: gāndharvarākṣayau cānyau paiśācaś cāṣṭamo mataḥ // ViP_3,10.24 //
analyzed: gāndharva rākṣayau ca anyau paiśācaḥ ca aṣṭamaḥ mataḥ

original: eteṣāṃ yasya yo dharmo varmasyokto maharṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: eteṣām yasya yaḥ dharmaḥ varmasya uktaḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
kurvīta dāra grahaṇam tena anyam parivarjayet
sa dharma cāriṇīm prāpya gārhasthyam sahitaḥ tayā
samudvahet dadāti etat samyak ūḍham mahā phalam
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe daśamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
sagaraḥ uvāca
gṛhasthasya sat ācāram śrotum icchāmi aham mune
lokāt asmāt parasmāt ca yam ātiṣṭhan na hīyate
aurvaḥ uvāca
śrūyatām pṛthivīpāla sat ācārasya lakṣaṇam
sat ācāravatā puṃsā jitau lokau ubhau api
sādhavaḥ sat cabdaḥ sādhu vācakaḥ
teṣām ācaraṇam yaḥ tu sat ācāraḥ saḥ ucyate
saptarṣayaḥ atha manavaḥ prajānām patayaḥ tathā

original: sadācārasya vaktāraḥ kartāraś ca mahīpate // ViP_3,11.4 //
analyzed: sat ācārasya vaktāraḥ kartāraḥ ca mahīpate
brāhmaḥ muhūrte ca utthāya manasā mati mātrṛpa
prabuddhaḥ cintayet dharmam artham ca api avirodhinam
apīḍayā tayoḥ kāmam ubhayoḥ api cintayet
dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa vināśāya trivarge sama darśinā
parityajet artha kāmau dharma pīḍā karau nṛpa
dharmam api asukha udarkam loka vidveṣṭam eva ca

original: tataḥ kālyaṃ samutthāya kuryānmūtraṃ nareśvara // ViP_3,11.8 //
analyzed: tatas kālyam samutthāya kuryāt mūtram nareśvara
nairṛtyām iṣu vikṣepam atītya abhyadhikam bhuvaḥ
dvarāt āvasathāt mūtra purīṣam ca visarjayet
pāda avanejana ucchiṣṭe prakṣipet na gṛha aṅgaṇe
ātma chāyām taru chāyām go sūrya agni anilān tathā
guru dvija ādīn tu budhaḥ na adhimehet kadācana

original: na kṛṣṭe sasyamadhye vā gauvraje janasaṃsadi /
analyzed: na kṛṣṭe sasya madhye vā gau vraje jana saṃsadi

original: na vartmani na nadyāditīrtheṣu puruṣarṣabha // ViP_3,11.12 //
analyzed: na vartmani na nadī ādi tīrtheṣu puruṣa ṛṣabha
na apsu na eva aṃbhasaḥ tīre śmaśāne na samācaret

original: utsargaṃ vai purīṣasya mūtrasya ca visarjanam // ViP_3,11.13 //
analyzed: utsargam vai purīṣasya mūtrasya ca visarjanam
udak mukhaḥ divā mūtram viparīta mukhaḥ niśi

original: kurvitānāpadi prājño mūtrotsargaṃ ca pārthiva // ViP_3,11.14 //
analyzed: kurvitā anāpadi prājñaḥ mūtra utsargam ca pārthiva
tṛṇaiḥ āstīrya vasudhām vastra prāvṛta mastakaḥ
tiṣṭhet na ati ciram tatra nā eva kiñcid udīrayet
valmīka mūṣikā udbhūtām mṛdam na antar jalām tathā
śauca avaśiṣṭām gehāt cana ādadyāt lepa saṃbhavām
aṇu prāṇi upapannām ca hala utkhātām ca pārthiva
parityajet mṛdaḥ hi etāḥ sakalāḥ śauca karmaṇi

original: ekā liṅge gude tistro dasa vāmakare nṛpa /
analyzed: ekā liṅge gude tistraḥ dasa vāma kare nṛpa

original: hastadvaye ca spata syurmṛdaḥ śaucopapādikāḥ // ViP_3,11.18 //
analyzed: hasta dvaye ca syuḥ mṛdaḥ śauca upapādikāḥ
acchena a gandha lepena jalena a budbudena ca
ācāmet ca mṛdam bhūyas tathā dadyāt samāhitaḥ
niṣpādita aṅghri śaucaḥ tu pādau abhyukṣya taiḥ punar

original: triḥ pibetsalilaṃ tena tathā dviḥ parimārjayet // ViP_3,11.20 //
analyzed: tris pibet salilam tena tathā dvis parimārjayet

original: śirṣaṇyāni tataḥ khāni mūrdhānaṃ ca samālabhet /
analyzed: śirṣaṇyāni tatas khāni mūrdhānam ca samālabhet

original: bāhū nābhiṃ ca toyena hṛdayaṃ cāpi saṃspṛśet // ViP_3,11.21 //
analyzed: bāhū nābhim ca toyena hṛdayam ca api saṃspṛśet
su ācāntaḥ tu tatas kuryāt pumān keśa prasādhanam
ādarśa añjana māṅgalyam dūrvā ādi ālaṃbhanāni ca
tatas sva varṇa dharmeṇa vṛtti artham ca dhana arjanam
kurvīta śraddhā saṃpannaḥ yajet ca pṛthivīpate
somasaṃsthāḥ haviḥsaṃsthāḥ pākasaṃsthāḥ tu saṃsthitāḥ

original: dhane yato manuṣyāṇāṃ yatetāto dhanārjane // ViP_3,11.24 //
analyzed: dhane yatas manuṣyāṇām yateta atas dhana arjane
nadīnada taṭākeṣu devakhāta jaleṣu ca
nitya kriyā artham snāyīta gīri prastravaṇeṣu ca
kūpeṣu uddhṛta toyena snānam kurvīta vā bhuvi
gṛheṣu uddhṛta toyena hi athavā bhuvi asaṃbhave
śuci vastra dharaḥ snātaḥ deva ṛṣi pitṛ tarpaṇam
teṣām eva hi tīrthena kurvīta su samāhitaḥ
tris apaḥ prīṇana arthāya devānām apavarjayet

original: ṛṣīṇāṃ ca yathānyāyaṃ sakṛccāpi prajāpateḥ // ViP_3,11.28 //
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām ca yathānyāyam sakṛt ca api prajāpateḥ
pitṝṇām prīṇana arthāya tat apaḥ pṛtivīpate
pitāmahebhyaḥ ca tathā
mātāmahāya tad pitre tad pitre ca samāhitaḥ
dadyāt paitreṇa tīrthena kāmyam ca anyat śṛṇuṣva me

original: mātre svamātre tanmātre gurupatnyai tathā nṛpa /
analyzed: mātre sva mātre tad mātre guru patnyai tathā nṛpa

original: gurūṇāṃ mātulānāṃ ca snigdhamitrāya bhūbhūje // ViP_3,11.31 //
analyzed: gurūṇām mātulānām ca snigdha mitrāya bhūbhūje
idam ca api japet aṃbu dadyāt ātma icchayā nṛpa
upakārāya bhūtānām kṛta deva ādi tarpaṇam
deva asurāḥ tathā yakṣāḥ nāga gandharva rākṣasāḥ

original: piśācā guhyakāḥsiddhāḥ kūṣmāḍāḥ paśavaḥ khagāḥ // ViP_3,11.33 //
analyzed: piśācāḥ guhyakāḥ siddhāḥ kūṣmāḍāḥ paśavaḥ khagāḥ

original: jalecarā bhūlecarā bhūnilayā vāyvāhārāś ca jatavaḥ /
analyzed: jalecarāḥ bhūlecarāḥ bhū nilayāḥ vāyu āhārāḥ ca jatavaḥ
tṛptim etena yānti āśu mad dattena aṃbunā akhilāḥ
narakeṣu samasteṣu yātanāsu ca saṃsthitāḥ
teṣām āpyāyanāya etat dīyate salilam mayā
ye bāndhava abāndhavāḥ ye yenya janmani bāndhavāḥ

original: te tṛptimakhilā yāntu ye cāsmattobhivāñchati // ViP_3,11.36 //
analyzed: te tṛptim akhilāḥ yāntu ye ca asmattaḥ abhivāñchati
yatra kvacana saṃsthānām kṣudh tṛṣṇā upahata ātmanām
idam āpyāyanāya astu mayā dattam tila udakam
kāmya udaka pradānam te mayā etat kathitam nṛpa
yat dattvā prīṇayati etat manuṣyaḥ sakalam jagat
jagat āpyāyana udbhūtam puṇyam āpnoti
dattvā kāmya udakam samyak etebhyaḥ śrāddhayā anvitaḥ

original: ācamya ca tato dadyātsūryāya salilāñjalim // ViP_3,11.39 //
analyzed: ācamya ca tatas dadyāt sūryāya salila añjalim
namaḥ vivasvate brahma bhāsvate viṣṇu tejase
jagat savitre śucaye savitre karma sākṣiṇe
tatas gṛha ar'canam kuryāt abhīṣṭa sura pūjanam

original: jalābhiṣekaiḥ puṣpaiś ca dhūpādyaiś ca nivedanam // ViP_3,11.41 //
analyzed: jala abhiṣekaiḥ puṣpaiḥ ca dhūpa ādyaiḥ ca nivedanam
apūrvam ca kuryāt prāk brahmaṇe nṛpa
prajāpatim samuddiśya dadyāt āhutim ādarāt

original: gṛhebhyaḥ kāśya pāyātha tatonumataye kramāt // ViP_3,11.43 //
analyzed: gṛhebhyaḥ kāśya pāya atha tatonumataye kramāt
tad śeṣam maṇike kṣipet tatas

original: dvāre dhāturvidhātuś ca madhye ca brahmaṇe kṣipet // ViP_3,11.44 //
analyzed: dvāre dhātuḥ vidhātuḥ ca madhye ca brahmaṇe kṣipet

original: gṛhasya puraṣabyāghra digdevānapi me śṛṇu // ViP_3,11.45 //
analyzed: gṛhasya diś devān api me śṛṇu
indrāya dharmarājāya varuṇāya tathā indave
prācya ādiṣu budhaḥ dadyāt huta śeṣa ātmakam balim
prāguttare ca digbhāge dhanvantāri balim budhaḥ

original: nirvapaidvaiśvadevaṃ ca karma kuryādataḥ param // ViP_3,11.47 //
analyzed: nirvapait vaiśvadevam ca karma kuryāt atas param
vāyavyām vāyave dikṣu samastāsu yathādiśam

original: brahmaṇe cāntārīkṣāya bhānave ca kṣipedbalim // ViP_3,11.48 //
analyzed: brahmaṇe ca antārīkṣāya bhānave ca kṣipet balim
viśvedavān viśva bhūtān aṣṭau viśva patīn pitṝn

original: yakṣāṇāṃ ca samuddiśya baliṃ dadyānnareśvara // ViP_3,11.49 //
analyzed: yakṣāṇām ca samuddiśya balim dadyāt nareśvara
tatonyat annam ādāya bhūmi bhāge śucau budhaḥ
dadyāt aśeṣa bhūtebhyaḥ sva iccayā su samāhitaḥ
devāḥ manuṣyāḥ paśavaḥ vayāṃsi siddhāḥ sa yakṣa uraga daitya saṃghāḥ

original: pratoḥ piśācāstaravaḥsa mastā ye cānnamicchanti mayātra dattam // ViP_3,11.51 //
analyzed: pratoḥ piśācāḥ taravaḥ sa mastāḥ ye ca annam icchanti mayā atra dattam
pipīlikāḥ kīṭa pataṅgaka ādyāḥ bubhukṣitāḥ karma nibandha baddhāḥ

original: prayānti te tṛptimidaṃ mayānnantebhyo visṛṣṭaṃ sukhino bhavantu // ViP_3,11.52 //
analyzed: prayānti te tṛptim idam mayā anna ntebhyaḥ visṛṣṭam sukhinaḥ bhavantu

original: yeṣāṃ na mātā na pitā na bandhurnaivānnasiddhirna nathānnamasti /
analyzed: yeṣām na mātā na pitā na bandhuḥ na eva anna siddhiḥ na nathā annam asti

original: tattṛpye 'nnaṃ bhuvi dattameva te yāntu tṛptiṃ muditā bhavantu // ViP_3,11.53 //
analyzed: tat tṛpye annam bhuvi dattam eva te yāntu tṛptim muditāḥ bhavantu

original: bhūtāni sarvāṇi tathānnametadahaṃ ca viṣṇurna yatonyadasti /
analyzed: bhūtāni sarvāṇi tathā annam etat aham ca viṣṇuḥ na yatas nyat asti

original: tasmādahaṃ bhūtanikāyabhūtamannaṃ prayacchāmi bhavāya teṣām // ViP_3,11.54 //
analyzed: tasmāt aham bhūta nikāya bhūtam annam prayacchāmi bhavāya teṣām

original: caturdaśo bhūtagaṇo ya eṣa tatra sthitā ye 'khilabhūtasaṃghāḥ /
analyzed: caturdaśaḥ bhūta gaṇaḥ yaḥ eṣa tatra sthitāḥ ye akhila bhūta saṃghāḥ

original: tṛptyarthamannaṃ hi mayā nisṛṣṭaṃ teṣāmidaṃ te muditā bhavantu // ViP_3,11.55 //
analyzed: tṛpti artham annam hi mayā nisṛṣṭam teṣām idam te muditāḥ bhavantu
iti uccārya naraḥ dadyāt annam śraddhā samanvitaḥ

original: bhuvi sarvopakārāya gṛhī sarvāśrayo yataḥ // ViP_3,11.56 //
analyzed: bhuvi sarva upakārāya gṛhī sarva āśrayaḥ yatas
śva caṇḍāla vihaṅgānām bhuvi dadyāt nareśvara

original: ye cānye patitāḥ kecidaputrāḥ saṃtimānavāḥ // ViP_3,11.57 //
analyzed: ye ca anye patitāḥ kecid aputrāḥ saṃti mānavāḥ
tatas godoha mātram vai kālam tiṣṭhet gṛha aṅgaṇe
atithi grahaṇa arthāya tad ūrdhvam tu
atithim tatra saṃprāptam pūjayet svāgada ādinā
tathā āsana pradānena pāda prakṣālanena ca
śraddhayā ca anna dānena priya praśna uttareṇa ca
gacchataḥ ca anuyānena prītim utpādayet gṛhī
ajñāta kula nāmānam anya deśāt upāgatam
pūjayet atithim samyak na eka grāma nivāsinam
akiñcanam asaṃbandham ajñāta kula śīlinam
a saṃpūjya atithim bhuktvā bhoktu kāmam vrajati adhas
svādhyāya gotra ācaraṇam a pṛṣṭvā ca tathā kulam
hiraṇyagarbha buddhyā tam manyeta abhyāgatam gṛhī
pitṛ artham ca aparam vipram ekam api āśayet nṛpa
tad deśyam vidita ācāra saṃbhūtim pāñcayajñikam
anna agram ca samuddhṛtya hantakāra upakalpitam
nirvāpa bhūtam bhūpāla śrotriyāya upapādayet
dadyāt ca bhikṣā tritayam parivrāj brahmacārīṇām

original: icchayā ca budho dadyādvibhave satyavāritam // ViP_3,11.66 //
analyzed: icchayā ca budhaḥ dadyāt vibhave satya vāritam

original: ityetetithayaḥ proktā prāguktā bhikṣavaś ca ye /
analyzed: iti etāḥ itithayaḥ proktā prāc uktāḥ bhikṣavaḥ ca ye
caturaḥ pūjāyitvā etān nṛpa pāpāt pramucyate
atithiḥ yasya bhagna āśaḥ gṛhāt pratinivartate

original: sa tasmai duṣkṛtaṃ dattvā puṇyamādāya gacchati // ViP_3,11.68 //
analyzed: sa tasmai duṣkṛtam dattvā puṇyam ādāya gacchati
dhātā prajāpatiḥ śakraḥ vahniḥ vasu gaṇaḥ urayayā
praviśya atithim ete vai bhuñjanta innam nareśvara
tasmāt atithi pūjāyām yateta satatam naraḥ

original: sa kevalamaghaṃ bhuṅkte yo bhuṅkte hyatithiṃ vinā // ViP_3,11.70 //
analyzed: sa kevalam agham bhuṅkte yaḥ bhuṅkte hi atithim vinā
tatas svavāsinīm duḥkhīm gurviṇīm vṛddha bālakān
bhojayet saṃskṛta annena prathamam caramam gṛhī
a bhuktavatsu ca eteṣu bhuñjan bhuṅkte sa duṣkṛtam

original: mṛtaś ca gatvā narakaṃ śloṣmabhugjāyate naraḥ // ViP_3,11.72 //
analyzed: mṛtaḥ ca gatvā narakam śloṣma bhuj jāyate naraḥ
a strāta āśī malam bhukte hi ajapī pūya śoṇitam
a saṃskṛta anna bhuj mūtram bāla ādi prathamam śakṛt

original: ahomī ca kṛmīnbhuṅkte adattvā viṣamāśnute // ViP_3,11.74 //
analyzed: a homī ca kṛmīn bhuṅkte a dattvā viṣam āśnute

original: tasmācchṛṇuṣva rājandra yathā bhuñjīta vai gṛhī /
analyzed: tasmāt śṛṇuṣva rājandra yathā bhuñjīta vai gṛhī

original: bhuñjataś ca yathā puṃsaḥ pāpabandho na jāyate // ViP_3,11.75 //
analyzed: bhuñjataḥ ca yathā puṃsaḥ pāpa bandhaḥ na jāyate
iha ca ārogya vipulam bala buddhiḥ tathā nṛpa
bhavati ariṣṭa śāntiḥ ca vairi pakṣa abhicāriṇaḥ
tathāvat kṛtvā ca deva ṛṣi pitṛ tarpaṇam
praśasta ratna pāṇiḥ tu bhuñjīta prayataḥ gṛhī

original: kṛte jape hute vahnau śuddhavastradharo nṛpa /
analyzed: kṛte jape hute vahnau śuddha vastra dharaḥ nṛpa
dattvā atithibhyaḥ viprebhyaḥ gurubhyaḥ saṃśritāya ca
pumya gandhaḥ sasta mālya dhārī ca eva nareśvara
na eka vastra dharaḥ na ārdra pāṇi pādaḥ mahīpate

original: vuśuddhavadanaḥ prīto bhuñjīta na vidiṅmukhaḥ // ViP_3,11.79 //
analyzed: prītaḥ bhuñjīta na vidiś mukhaḥ
prāc mukha udak mukhaḥ vā api na ca eva anya manāḥ naraḥ

original: annaṃ praśastaṃ pathyaṃ ca prokṣitaṃ prokṣaṇodakaiḥ // ViP_3,11.80 //
analyzed: annam praśastam pathyam ca prokṣitam prokṣaṇa udakaiḥ
na kutsita āhṛtam na eva jugupsā pada saṃskṛtam

original: dattvā tu bhaktaṃ śiṣyebhyaḥ kṣudhitebhyas tathā gṛhī // ViP_3,11.81 //
analyzed: dattvā tu bhaktam śiṣyebhyaḥ kṣudhitebhyaḥ tathā gṛhī
praśasta śuddha pātre tu bhuñjīta akupitaḥ dvijaḥ
na a saṃdi saṃsthite pātre na a deśe ca nareśvara

original: nākāle nātisaṃkīrṇe dattvāgraṃ ca narognaye // ViP_3,11.83 //
analyzed: na akāle na ati saṃkīrṇe dattvā agram ca nara ugnaye

original: mantrābhimantritaṃ śastaṃ na ca paryuṣitaṃ nṛpa /
analyzed: mantra abhimantritam śastam na ca paryuṣitam nṛpa
anyatra phala mūlebhyaḥ śuṣka śākhā ādikāt tathā
tadvat hārītakebhyaḥ ca guḍa bhakṣyebhyaḥ eva ca
bhuñjīta uddhṛta sārāṇi na kadāpi nareśvara
na śeṣam puruṣa uśnīyāt anyatra jagatīpate
madhu aṃbu dadhi sarpibhyaḥ saktubhyaḥ ca vivekavān

original: aśnīyāttanmayo bhūtvā purvaṃ tu madhuraṃ rasam /
analyzed: aśnīyāt tad mayaḥ bhūtvā tu madhuram rasam
tathā madhye kaṭu tikta ādikān tatas
prāk dravam puruṣaḥ uśnīyāt madhye kaṭhina bhojanaḥ

original: ante punardravāśī tu balārogye na muñcati // ViP_3,11.88 //
analyzed: ante punardrava āśī tu bala ārogye na muñcati
anindyam bhakṣayet ittham vāgyata unnam akutsayan

original: pañcagrāsaṃ mahāmaunaṃ prāṇādyāpyāyanaṃ hi tat // ViP_3,11.89 //
analyzed: pañca grāsam mahā maunam prāṇa ādi āpyāyanam hi tat
bhuktvā samyak atha ācamya prāc mukha udak mukhaḥ api vā
yathāvat punar ācāmet pāṇī prakṣālya mūlataḥ
svasthaḥ praśānta cittaḥ tu kṛta āsana parigrahaḥ

original: abhīṣṭadevatānāṃ tu kurvīta smaraṇaṃ naraḥ // ViP_3,11.91 //
analyzed: abhīṣṭa devatānām tu kurvīta smaraṇam naraḥ
agniḥ āpyāyayet dhātum pārthivam pavana īritaḥ
datta avakāśam nabhasā jarayati astu me sukham
annam balāya me bhūmeḥ apām agni anilasya ca
bhavati etat parīṇatam mama asti avyāhatam sukham
prāma apāna samānānām udāna vyānayoḥ tathā

original: annaṃ puṣṭikaraṃ cāstu mamāpyavyāhataṃ sukham // ViP_3,11.94 //
analyzed: annam puṣṭi karam ca astu mama api avyāhatam sukham
agastiḥ agniḥ vaḍavānalaḥ ca bhuktam mayā annam jarayatu aśeṣam

original: sukhaṃ ca me tpariṇāmasaṃbhavaṃ yacchantvarogaṃ mama cāstu dehe // ViP_3,11.95 //
analyzed: sukham ca me yacchantu arogam mama ca astu dehe
viṣṇuḥ samasta indriya deha dehī vṛthā na bhūtaḥ bhagavān yathā ekaḥ
satyena tena attam aśeṣam annam ārogyatām me pariṇāmam etu

original: viṣṇurattā tathaivānnaṃ parimāmaś ca vai tathā /
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ attā tathā eva annam parimāmaḥ ca vai tathā

original: satyena tena madbhuktaṃ jīryatyannamidaṃ tathā // ViP_3,11.97 //
analyzed: satyena tena mad bhuktam jīryati annam idam tathā
iti uccārya sva hastena parimṛjya tathā udaram
kuryāt karmaṇi atandritaḥ
sat śāstra ādi vinodena sat mārgāt avirodhinā
dinam nayet tatas saṃdhyām upatiṣṭhet samāhitaḥ
dina anta saṃdhyām sūryeṇa pūrvām ṛkṣaiḥ yutām budhaḥ
upatiṣṭhedhi athānyāyyam samyak ācamya pārthiva

original: saryeṇābhyudito yaś ca tyaktaḥ sūryeṇa vā svapan /
analyzed: saryeṇa abhyuditaḥ yaḥ ca tyaktaḥ sūryeṇa vā svapan
anyatra ātura bhāvāt tu prāyaścittī bhavet naraḥ
tasmāt anudite sūrye samutthāya mahīpate
upatiṣṭhet naraḥsaṃdhyām a svapan ca dina anta jām

original: upatiṣṭhanti vai saṃdhyāṃ ye na pūrvaṃ na paścimām /
analyzed: upatiṣṭhanti vai saṃdhyām ye na pūrvam na paścimām

original: vrajanti te durātmānastamistraṃ narakaṃ nṛpa // ViP_3,11.104 //
analyzed: vrajanti te durātmānaḥ tamistram narakam nṛpa
punar pākam upādāya sāyam api avanīpate

original: vaiśvadevanimittaṃ vai patnyā sārdhaṃ baliṃ haret // ViP_3,11.105 //
analyzed: vaiśvadeva nimittam vai patnyā sārdham balim haret
tatra api śvapaca ādibyaḥ tathā eva anna visarjanam
atithim ca āgatam tatra sva śaktyā pūjayet budhaḥ
pāda śauca āsana prahva svāgata uktyā ca pūjanam
tatas ca anna pradānena śayanena ca parthiva

original: divātithau tu vimukhe gate yatpātakaṃ nṛpa /
analyzed: divā atithau tu vimukhe gate yat pātakam nṛpa
tat eva aṣṭaguṇam puṃsaḥ sūrya ūḍhe vimukhe gate
tasmāt sva śaktyā rāja indra sūrya ūḍham atithim naraḥ
pūjayet pūjite tasmin pūjitāḥ sarva devatā
anna śāka aṃbu dānena sva śaktyā pūjayet pumān
śayana prastara mahī pradānaiḥ athavā api tam
sṛta pāda ādi śaucaḥ tu bhuktvā sāyam tatas guhī
gacchet śayyām aṃsphuṭitām api dāru mayīm nṛpa

original: nāviśālaṃ na vai bhugnāṃ nāsamāṃ malināṃ na ca /
analyzed: na aviśālam na vai bhugnām na asamām malinām na ca
na ca jantu mayīm śayyām adhitiṣṭhet anāstṛtām

original: prācyāṃ diśi śiraḥ śastaṃ yāmyāyāmatha vā nṛpa /
analyzed: prācyām diśi śiraḥ śastam yāmyāyām atha vā nṛpa

original: sadaiva svapataḥ puṃso viparītaṃ tu rogadam // ViP_3,11.113 //
analyzed: sadā eva svapataḥ puṃsaḥ viparītam tu roga dam
ṛtau upagamaḥ śastaḥ sva patnyām avanīpate

original: punnāmarkṣe śubhe kāle jyeṣṭhāyugmāsu rātriṣu // ViP_3,11.114 //
analyzed: put nāma ṛkṣe śubhe kāle jyeṣṭhā yugmāsu rātriṣu

original: nādyunāṃ tu striyaṃ gacchennāturāṃ na rajasvalām /
analyzed: na adyunām tu striyam gacchet na āturām na rajasvalām

original: nāniṣṭāṃ na prakupitāṃ na trastāṃ na ca gārbhiṇīm // ViP_3,11.115 //
analyzed: na aniṣṭām na prakupitām na trastām na ca gārbhiṇīm
na a dakṣiṇām na anya kāmām na a kāmām na anya yoṣitam

original: kṣutkṣāmāṃ nātibhuktāṃ vā svayaṃ caibhir gurṇair yutaḥ // ViP_3,11.116 //
analyzed: kṣudh kṣāmām na ati bhuktām vā svayam ca ebhiḥ gurṇaiḥ yutaḥ
snātaḥ sraj gandha dhṛk prītaḥ na ādhmātaḥ kṣudhitaḥ api vā

original: sakāmaḥsānurāgaś ca vyavāyaṃ puruṣo vrajet // ViP_3,11.117 //
analyzed: sa kāmaḥ sa anurāgaḥ ca vyavāyam puruṣaḥ vrajet
caturdaśī aṣṭamī ca eva tathā mācā atha pūrṇimā
parvāṇi etāni rājandra ravīsaṃkrāntiḥ eva ca
taila strī māsa saṃbhogī sarvaiṃṣu eteṣu vai pumān

original: viṇmūtrabhojanaṃ nāma prayāti narakaṃ mṛtaḥ // ViP_3,11.119 //
analyzed: viṣ mūtra bhojanam nāma prayāti narakam mṛtaḥ
aśeṣa parvasu eteṣu tasmāt saṃyamibhiḥ budhaiḥ
bhāvyam sat śāstra deva ijyā dhyāna japya paraiḥ naraiḥ
na anya yonau ayonau vā na upayukta auṣadhaḥ tathā

original: dvijadevagurūṇāṃ ca vyavāyī nāśrame bhavet // ViP_3,11.121 //
analyzed: dvija deva gurūṇām ca vyavāyī na āśrame bhavet
caitya catvara tīreṣu nā eva goṣṭhe catuṣpathe
na eva śmaśāna upavane salileṣu mahīpate
prokta parvasu aśeṣeṣu nā eva bhūpāla saṃdhyayoḥ
gacchet yavāyam manasā na mūtra uccāra pīḍitaḥ
parvasu abhigamaḥ nindyaḥ divā pāpa pradaḥ nṛpa
bhuvi roga āvahaḥ nṝṇām apraśastaḥ jalāśaye
para dārān na gaccheta manasā api pathañcana

original: kimu vācāsthibandhopi nāsti teṣu vyavāyinām // ViP_3,11.125 //
analyzed: kimu vācā asthi bandhaḥ api nā asti teṣu vyavāyinām
mṛtaḥ narakam abhyeti hīyate ca āyuṣaḥ
para dāra ratiḥ puṃsām iha ca amutra bhīti dā

original: iti matvā svadāreṣu ṛtumatsu budho vrajet /
analyzed: iti matvā sva dāreṣu ṛtumatsu budhaḥ vrajet
yathā ukta doṣa hīneṣu sa kāmeṣu anṛtau api
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe ekādaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
aurvaḥ uvāca
deva go brāhmaṇān siddhān vṛddha ācāryam
dvikālam ca namet saṃdhyām agnīn upacaret tathā
sadā anupahate vastre praśastāḥ ca mahā oṣadhīḥ

original: gāruḍāni ca ratnāni bibhṛyātprayato naraḥ // ViP_3,12.2 //
analyzed: gāruḍāni ca ratnāni bibhṛyāt prayataḥ naraḥ
prasnigdha amala keśaḥ ca sugandhaḥ cāru veṣa dhṛk

original: sitāḥ sumanaso hṛdyā vibhṛyācca naraḥ sadā // ViP_3,12.3 //
analyzed: sitāḥ sumanasaḥ hṛdyāḥ vibhṛyāt ca naraḥ sadā
kiñcid para svam na haret na alpam api apriyam vadet
priyam ca na anṛtam brūyāt na anya doṣān udīrayet
na anya striyam tathā vairam rocayet puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: na duṣṭaṃ yānamārohetkūlacchāyāṃ na saṃśrayet // ViP_3,12.5 //
analyzed: na duṣṭam yānam ārohet kūla chāyām na saṃśrayet
vidviṣṭa patita unmatta bahuvaiḥ ādi kīṭakaiḥ
vardhakī bandhakī bhartuḥ kṣudra anṛta kathaiḥ saha
tathā ati vyaya śīlaiḥ ca parivāda rataiḥ śaṭhaiḥ

original: budho maitrīṃ na kurvāta naikaḥ panthānamāśrayet // ViP_3,12.7 //
analyzed: budhaḥ maitrīm na kurvāta na ekaḥ panthānam āśrayet
na avagāhet jala oghasya vegam agre
pradīptam veśma na viśet na ārohet śikharam taroḥ
na kuryāt danta saṃgharṣam kuṣṇiyāt ca na nāsikām
na asaṃvṛta mukhaḥ jṛṃbhet śvāsa kāsaḥ visarjayet

original: noccair haset sa śabdaṃ ca na muñcet pavanaṃ budhaḥ /
analyzed: na uccais haset sa śabdam ca na muñcet pavanam budhaḥ

original: nakhānna khādayecchindyānna tṛmaṃ na mahīṃ likhet // ViP_3,12.10 //
analyzed: nakhān na khādayet chindyāt na tṛmam na mahīm likhet
na śmaśru bhakṣayet loṣṭam na mṛdrīyāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
jyotīṃṣi amedhya śastāni na abhivīkṣeta ca prabho
nagnām para striyam ca eva sūryam ca astamaya udaye

original: na huṅkuryācchavaṃ gandhaṃ śavāgandhohi somaja // ViP_3,12.12 //
analyzed: na huṅkuryāt śavam gandham soma ja
catuṣpatham caitya tarum śmaśāna upavanāni ca
duṣṭa strī sannikarṣam ca varjayet naśi sarvadā
pūjya deva dvija jyotiḥ chāyām na atikramet budhaḥ

original: naikaḥ śūnyāṭavīṃ gacchettathā śūnyagṛhe vaset // ViP_3,12.14 //
analyzed: na ekaḥ śūnya aṭavīm gacchet tathā śūnya gṛhe vaset
keśa asthi kaṇṭaka amedhya bali bhasma tuṣān tathā
snāna ārdra dharaṇīm ca eva dūratas parivarjayet
na anāryān āśrayet kāścid na rocayet budhaḥ

original: upasarpenna vai vyālaṃ ciraṃ tiṣṭhenna votthitaḥ // ViP_3,12.16 //
analyzed: upasarpet na vai vyālam ciram tiṣṭhet na vā utthitaḥ
atīva jāgara svapne tadvat sthāna āsane budhaḥ

original: na seveta tathā śayyāṃ vyāyāmaṃ ca nareśvara // ViP_3,12.17 //
analyzed: na seveta tathā śayyām vyāyāmam ca nareśvara
daṃṣṭriṇaḥ śṛṅgiṇaḥ ca eva prājñaḥ dūreṇa varjayet

original: avaśyāyaṃ ca rājendra purovātātapau tathā // ViP_3,12.18 //
analyzed: avaśyāyam ca rāja indra purovāta ātapau tathā
na snāyāt na svapet nagnaḥ na ca eva upaspṛśet budhaḥ

original: muktakeśaś ca nācāmeddevādyarcāṃ ca varjayet // ViP_3,12.19 //
analyzed: mukta keśaḥ ca na ācāmet deva ādi arcām ca varjayet
homa deva arcana ādyāsu kriyāsu ācamane tathā
na eka vastraḥ pravarteta dvija pāda avanejane
na asamañjasa śīlaiḥ tu saha āsīta kathañcana
hi kṣaṇa ardham api śasyate

original: virodhaṃ nottamair gacchennādhamaiś ca sadā budhaḥ /
analyzed: virodham na uttamaiḥ gacchet na adhamaiḥ ca sadā budhaḥ

original: vivāhaś ca vivādaś ca tulyaśīlair nṛpeṣyate // ViP_3,12.22 //
analyzed: vivāhaḥ ca vivādaḥ ca tulya śīlaiḥ nṛpa iṣyate

original: nārabheta kalaṃ prājñaḥ śuṣkavairaṃ ca varjayet /
analyzed: na ārabheta kalam prājñaḥ śuṣka vairam ca varjayet
api alpa hāniḥ soḍhavyā vaireṇa artha āgaman tyajet
snātaḥ na aṅgāni saṃmārjet snāna śāṭyā na pāṇinā
na ca nirdhūtayet keśān na ācāmet ca eva ca utthitaḥ
pādena na ākramet pādam na nayet
na ucca āsanam guroḥ agre bhajeta avinaya anvitaḥ
apasavyam na gacchet ca devāgāra catuṣpathān

original: māṅgalyapūjyāṃś ca tathā viparītānna dakṣiṇam // ViP_3,12.26 //
analyzed: māṅgalya pūjyān ca tathā viparītān na dakṣiṇam
soma arka agni aṃbu vāyūnām pūjyānām ca na saṃmukham
kuryāt niṣṭhīva viṣ mutra samutsargam ca paṇḍitaḥ
tiṣṭhat na mūtrayet tadvat pathiṣu api na mūtrayet
śleṣma viṣ mūtra raktāni sarvadā eva na laṅghayet
śleṣma śiṅghāṇika utsargau na anna kāle praśasyate

original: balimaṅgalajapyādau na home na mahājane // ViP_3,12.29 //
analyzed: bali maṅgala japya ādau na home na mahājane
yopitaḥ na avamanyeta na ca āsām viśvaset budhaḥ

original: na caiverṣyā bhavettāsu na dhikkuryātkadācana // ViP_3,12.30 //
analyzed: na ca eva īrṣyā bhavet tāsu na dhik kuryāt kadācana
maṅgalya pūrva ratna ājya pūjyān an abhivādya ca
na niṣkramet gṛhāt prājñaḥ sat ācāra paraḥ naraḥ
catuṣpathān namaskuryāt kāle homa paraḥ bhavet
dīnān abhyuddharet sādhūn upāsīta bahu śrutān

original: satkartā cātithīnāṃ yaḥ sa lokānuttamānvrajet // ViP_3,12.33 //
analyzed: satkartā ca atithīnām yaḥ sa lokān uttamān vrajet

original: hitaṃ mitaṃ priyaṃ kāle vaśyātmā yobhibhāṣate /
analyzed: hitam mitam priyam kāle vaśya ātmā yaḥ abhibhāṣate
sa yāti lokān āhlāda hetu bhūtān nṛpa akṣayān
dhīmān hrī pān kṣamā yuktaḥ hi āstikaḥ vinaya anvitaḥ
vidyā abhijana vṛddhānām yāti lokān anuttamān
ca parvasu āśaucaka ādiṣu
anadhyāyam budhaḥ kuryāt uparāga ādike tathā
samam nayati yaḥ krudvān sarva bandhuḥ amatsarī
bhīta āśvāsana kṛt sādhuḥ svargaḥ tasya alpakam phalam
varṣa ātapa ādiṣu chatrī daṇḍī rātri aṭavīṣu ca
śarīra trāṇa kāmaḥ vai sa upānatkaḥ sadā vrajet

original: nordhvaṃ na tiryagdūraṃ vā na paśyanparyaṭedbudhaḥ /
analyzed: na ūrdhvam na tiryak dūram vā na paśyan paryaṭet budhaḥ
yuga mātram mahīṣṭaṣṭham naraḥ gacchet vilokayan
doṣa hetūn aśeṣān ca vaśya ātmā yaḥ nirasyati
tasya dharma artha kāmānām hāniḥ na alpā api jāyate
pāpe ipi apāpaḥ paruṣe hi abhidhatte priyāṇi yaḥ

original: maitrīdravāntaḥ karaṇastasya muktiḥ kare sthitā // ViP_3,12.41 //
analyzed: maitrī drava antar karaṇaḥ tasya muktiḥ kare sthitā
ye kāma krodha lobhānām vīta rāgāḥ na gocare
sat ācāra sthitāḥ teṣām anubhāvaiḥ dhṛtā mahī
tasmāt satyam vadet prājñaḥ yat para prīti kāraṇam

original: satyaṃ yatparaduḥkhāya tadā maunaparo bhavet // ViP_3,12.43 //
analyzed: satyam yat para duḥkhāya tadā mauna paraḥ bhavet

original: priyamuktaṃ hitaṃ naitaditi matvā na tadvadet /
analyzed: priyam uktam hitam na etat iti matvā na tat vadet
śreyaḥ tatra hitam vācyam yadi api atyantam apriyam
prāṇīnām upakārāya yathā evā iha paratra ca

original: karmaṇā manasā vācā tadeva matīmānvadet // ViP_3,12.44 //
analyzed: karmaṇā manasā vācā tat eva matīmān vadet
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe dvādaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
aurvaḥ uvāca

original: sacailasya pituḥ snānaṃ jāte putre vidhīyate /
analyzed: sa cailasya pituḥ snānam jāte putre vidhīyate

original: jātakarma tadā kuryācchrāddhamabhyudaye ca yat // ViP_3,13.1 //
analyzed: jātakarma tadā kuryāt śrāddham abhyudaye ca yat
yugmān devān ca vitryān ca samyak savya kramāt dvijān
pūjāyet bhojayet ca eva tad manāḥ na anya mānasaḥ
dadhi akṣataiḥ sa badaraiḥ prāc mukha udak mukhaḥ api vā

original: devatīrthena vai piṇḍāndadyātkāyena vā nṛpa // ViP_3,13.3 //
analyzed: deva tīrthena vai piṇḍān dadyāt kāyena vā nṛpa
nāndīmukhaḥ pitṛ gaṇaḥ tena śrāddhena pārthiva

original: prīyate tattu kartavyaṃ puruṣaiḥ sarvavṛddhiṣu // ViP_3,13.4 //
analyzed: prīyate tat tu kartavyam puruṣaiḥ sarva vṛddhiṣu
kanyā putra vivāheṣu praveśeṣu ca veśmanaḥ
nāmakarmaṇi bālānām cūḍākarma ādike tathā
sīmantonnayane ca eva putra ādi mukha darśane
nāndīmukham pitṛ gaṇam pūjayet prayataḥ gṛhī
pitṛ pūjā kramaḥ proktaḥ vṛddhau eṣa sanātanaḥ
śrūyatām avanīpāla preta karma kriyā vidhiḥ
preta deham snānaiḥ snāpitam sraj vibhūṣitam
dagdhvā grāmāt bahis snātvā sa cailaḥ salilāśaye
yatra tatra sthitāya etat amukāya iti vādinaḥ
dakṣiṇa abhimukhāḥ dadyuḥ bāndhavāḥ salila añjalīn

original: praviṣṭāś ca samaṃ gobhir grāmaṃ nakṣatradarśane /
analyzed: praviṣṭāḥ ca samam gobhiḥ grāmam nakṣatra darśane

original: kaṭakarma tataḥ kuryād bhūmau prastaraśāyinaḥ // ViP_3,13.10 //
analyzed: kaṭa karma tatas kuryāt bhūmau prastara śāyinaḥ
dātavya ūna dinam piḍaḥ pretāya bhuvi pārthiva

original: divā ca bhaktaṃ bhoktavyamamāṃsaṃ manujarṣabha // ViP_3,13.11 //
analyzed: divā ca bhaktam bhoktavyam amāṃsam manuja ṛṣabha
dināni tāni ca icchātaḥ kartavya vipra bhojanam

original: pretā yānti tathā tṛptiṃ bandhuvargeṇa bhuñjatā // ViP_3,13.12 //
analyzed: pretāḥ yānti tathā tṛptim bandhu vargeṇa bhuñjatā

original: prathamehni tṛtīye ca saptame navame tathā /
analyzed: prathamehni tṛtīye ca saptame navame tathā
vastra tyāga bahiḥsnāne kṛtvā dadyāt tila udakam
caturthe ihni ca kartavyam tasya asthi cayanam nṛpa
tad ūrdhvam aṅga saṃsparśaḥ sapiṇḍānām api iṣyate
yogyāḥ sarva kriyāṇām tu samana salilāḥ tathā
anulepana puṣpa ādi bhogāt anyatra pārthiva
śayyā āsana upabhogaḥ ca sapiṇḍānām api iṣyate

original: bhasmāsthicayanādūrdhvaṃ saṃyogo na tu yoṣitām // ViP_3,13.16 //
analyzed: bhasma asthi cayanāt ūrdhvam saṃyogaḥ na tu yoṣitām

original: bāle deśāntarasthe ca patite ca munau mṛte /
analyzed: bāle deśa antara sthe ca patite ca munau mṛte
sadyas śaucam tathā icchātaḥ jala agni udbandhana ādiṣu
mṛta bandhoḥ daśa ahāni kulasya annam na bhujyate

original: dānaṃ pratigraho homaḥ svādhyāyaś ca nivartate // ViP_3,13.18 //
analyzed: dānam pratigrahaḥ homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ ca nivartate
viprasya etat dvādaśa aham rājanyasya api aśaucakam

original: ardhamāsaṃ tu vaiśyasya māsaṃ śūdrasya śuddhaye // ViP_3,13.19 //
analyzed: ardha māsam tu vaiśyasya māsam śūdrasya śuddhaye
ayujaḥ bhojayet kāmam dvijān ante tatas dine
dadyāt darbhaṣu piṇḍam ca pretāya ucchiṣṭa sannidhau
vāri āyudha pratodāḥ tu daṇḍaḥ ca dvija bhojanāt

original: spraṣṭavyonantaraṃ varṇaiḥ śuddherate tataḥ kramāt // ViP_3,13.21 //
analyzed: spraṣṭavyaḥ ūnantaram varṇaiḥ śuddhā īrate tatas kramāt
ye
tān kurvīta pumān jīvet nija dharma arjanaiḥ tathā
mṛta āhati ca kartavyam ekoddiṣṭam atas param
āhvāna ādi kriyā daiva niyoga rahitena yat
eka ūrdhyaḥ tatra dātavyaḥ tathā eva eka pavitrakam

original: pretāya piṇḍo dātavyo bhuktavatsu dvijātiṣu // ViP_3,13.24 //
analyzed: pretāya piṇḍaḥ dātavyaḥ bhuktavatsu dvijātiṣu
praśnaḥ ca tatra abhiratiḥ yajamāna dvijanmanām
akṣayyam amukasya iti vaktavyam viratau tathā
ekoddiṣṭa mayaḥ dharmaḥ ittham ā vatsarāt smṛtaḥ
sapiṇḍīkaraṇam tasmin kāle rāja indra cat śṛṇu
ekoddiṣṭa vidhānena kāryam tat api pārthiva

original: saṃvatsaretha ṣaṣṭhe vā māse vā dvādaśehni tat // ViP_3,13.27 //
analyzed: saṃvatsaretha ṣaṣṭhe vā māse vā dvādaśa ihni tat
tila gandha udakaiḥ yuktam tatra pātra catuṣṭayam

original: pātraṃ pretasya tatraikaṃ paitraṃ pātratrayaṃ tathā /
analyzed: pātram pretasya tatra ekam paitram pātra trayam tathā
secayet pitṛpātreṣu pretapātram tatas triṣu
tatas pitṛ tvam āpanne tasmin prete mahīpate
śrāddha dharmaiḥ aśaṣaḥ tu tad pūrvān arcayet pitṝn

original: putraḥ pautraḥ prapautro vā bhrātā vā bhrātṛsaṃtatiḥ /
analyzed: putraḥ pautraḥ prapautraḥ vā bhrātā vā bhrātṛ saṃtatiḥ

original: sapiṇḍa saṃtatirvāpi kriyārhe nṛpa jāyate // ViP_3,13.31 //
analyzed: sapiṇḍa saṃtatiḥ vā api kriyā arhe nṛpa jāyate
teṣām abhāve sa vā eṣām samāna udaka satatiḥ

original: mātṛpakṣamapiṇḍena saṃbandhā ye jalena vā // ViP_3,13.32 //
analyzed: mātṛ pakṣama piṇḍena saṃbandhāḥ ye jalena vā

original: kuladvayepi cocchinne strībhiḥ kāryāḥ kriyā nṛpa /
analyzed: kula dvaye api ca ucchinne strībhiḥ kāryāḥ kriyāḥ nṛpa
pitṛ mātṛ sapiṇḍaiḥ tu samāna salilaiḥ tathā

original: saṃghātāntargatair vāpi kāryāḥ pretasya ca kriyāḥ /
analyzed: saṃghāta antargataiḥ vā api kāryāḥ pretasya ca kriyāḥ
utsanna bandhu rikthāt vā kārayet avanīpatiḥ

original: pūrvāḥ kriyā madhyamāś ca tathā caivottarāḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: pūrvāḥ kriyāḥ madhyamāḥ ca tathā ca eva uttarāḥ kriyāḥ
tris prakārāḥ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ tāsām bhedam śṛṇuṣva me
ādāha ādya adaśa ahāḥ ca sparśa ādi antāḥ tu yāḥ kriyāḥ

original: tāḥ pūrvā madhyamā māsi māsyekoddiṣṭasaṃjñitāḥ // ViP_3,13.36 //
analyzed: tāḥ pūrvāḥ madhyamāḥ māsi māsi ekoddiṣṭa saṃjñitāḥ
prete pitṛ tvam āpanne sapiṇḍi karaṇāt anu

original: kriyante yāḥ kriyāḥ pitryāḥ procyante tā nṛpottarāḥ // ViP_3,13.37 //
analyzed: kriyante yāḥ kriyāḥ pitryāḥ procyante tāḥ nṛpa uttarāḥ
pitṛ mātṛ sapiṇḍaiḥ tu samānāsalilaiḥ tathā
saṃghāta antargataiḥ vā api rājñā tad dhana hāriṇā

original: pūrvāḥ kriyāś ca kartavyāḥ putrādyair eva cottarāḥ /
analyzed: pūrvāḥ kriyāḥ ca kartavyāḥ putra ādyaiḥ eva ca uttarāḥ

original: dauhitrair vā nṛpaśreṣṭha kāryāstattanayais tathā // ViP_3,13.39 //
analyzed: dauhitraiḥ vā nṛpa śreṣṭha kāryāḥ tad tanayaiḥ tathā
mṛta ahani ca kartavyā a strīṇām api uttarāḥ kriyā
pratisaṃvatsaram rājan ekoddiṣṭa vidhānataḥ
tasmāt uttara saṃjñāyāḥ kriyāḥ tāḥ śṛṇu pārthiva

original: ya thāyathā ca kartavyā vidhinā yena cānagha // ViP_3,13.41 //
analyzed: ca kartavyāḥ vidhinā yena ca anagha
iti śri viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe trayodaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
aurvaḥ uvāca
brahma indra rudra nāsatya sūrya agni vasu mārutān
viśvedevān pitṛ gaṇān vayāṃsi manujān paśun
sarīsṛpa anṛṣi gaṇān yat ca anyat bhūta saṃjñitam
śrāddham śraddhā anvitaḥ kurvan prīṇayati akhilam jagat
māsi māsi asite pakṣe pañcadaśyām nareśvara
kurvīta kāmyān kālān śṛṇuṣva me
śrāddha arham āgatam dravyam viśiṣṭam atha vā dvijam

original: śrāddhaṃ kurvīta vijñāya vyatīpāte 'yate tathā // ViP_3,14.4 //
analyzed: śrāddham kurvīta vijñāya vyatīpāte tathā

original: viṣuve cāpi saṃprāpte grahaṇe śaśi sūryayoḥ /
analyzed: viṣuve ca api saṃprāpte grahaṇe śaśi sūryayoḥ

original: samasteṣveva bhūpāla rāśiṣvarke ca gacchati // ViP_3,14.5 //
analyzed: samasteṣu eva bhūpāla rāśiṣu arke ca gacchati
nakṣatra graha pīḍāsu duṣṭa svapna avalokane
icchāśrāddhāni kurvīta nava sasya āgame tathā
amāvāsyā yadā maitra viśākhā svāti yoginī
śrīddhaiḥ pitṛ gaṇaḥ tṛptim tathā āpnoti aṣṭa vārṣikīm
amavāsyā yadā puṣye raudrā itha ṛkṣe punarvasau

original: dvādaśābdaṃ tadā tṛptiṃ prayānti piratorcitāḥ // ViP_3,14.8 //
analyzed: dvādaśa abdam tadā tṛptim prayānti
vāsava aja ekapāda ṛkṣe pitaṇām tṛptim icchatām
vāruṇe vā api amāvāsyā devānām api durlabhā
nava su ṛkṣeṣu amāvāsyā yadā eteṣu avanīpate

original: tadā hi tṛptidaṃ śrāddhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ śṛṇu cāparam // ViP_3,14.10 //
analyzed: tadā hi tṛpti dam śrāddham pitṝṇām śṛṇu ca aparam
gītam sanatkumāreṇa yathā ailāna mahātmane
pṛcchate pitṛ bhaktāya praśraya avanātāya ca
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca

original: vaiśākhamāsasya ca yā tṛtīyā navamyasau kartikaśuklapakṣe /
analyzed: vaiśākha māsasya ca yā tṛtīyā navamī asau kartika śukla pakṣe

original: nabhasyamāsasya ca kṛṣṇapakṣe trayodaśī pañcadaśī ca māghe // ViP_3,14.12 //
analyzed: nabhasya māsasya ca kṛṣṇa pakṣe trayodaśī pañcadaśī ca māghe
etāḥ yuga ādyāḥ kathitāḥ purāṇeṣu ananta puṇyāḥ

original: upaplave candramaso raveś ca triṣvaṣṭakāsvapyayanadvaye ca // ViP_3,14.13 //
analyzed: upaplave candramasaḥ raveḥ ca triṣu aṣṭakāsu api ayana dvaye ca

original: pānīyamapyatra tilair vimiśraṃ dadyātpitṛbhyaḥ prayato manuṣyaḥ /
analyzed: pānīyam api atra tilaiḥ vimiśram dadyāt pitṛbhyaḥ prayataḥ manuṣyaḥ

original: śrāddhaṃ kṛte tena samāsahasraṃ rahasyametatpitaro vadanti // ViP_3,14.14 //
analyzed: śrāddham kṛte tena samā sahasram rahasyam etat pitaraḥ vadanti

original: māghe 'siti pañcadaśī kadācidupaiti yogaṃ yadi vāruṇena /
analyzed: māghe asiti pañcadaśī kadācid upaiti yogam yadi vāruṇena

dakṣiṇābhiḥ dvijātayaḥ
marutaḥ pariveṣṭāraḥ sadasyāḥ ca divaukasaḥ
sa maruttaḥ cakravarti nariṣyanta nāmānam putram avāpa
tasmāt ca damaḥ
damasya putraḥ rājavardhanaḥ jajñe
rājavardhanāt suvṛddhiḥ
su vṛddheḥ kevalaḥ
kevalāt sudhṛtiḥ abhūt
tatas ca naraḥ
tasmāt candraḥ
tatas kevalaḥ bhūt
tatas kevalaḥ bhūt
bandhumataḥ gṛvegavān
vegavataḥ budhaḥ
tatas ca tṛṇa binduḥ
tasya api ekā kanyā ilavilā nāma
tatas ca alaṃbusā nāma vara apsarāḥ tṛṭaṇabindum bheje

original: tasyāmapyasya viśālo jajñe yaḥ purīṃ viśālaṃ nirmame // ViP_4,1.49 //
analyzed: tasyām api asya viśālaḥ jajñe yaḥ purīm viśālam nirmame
hemacandraḥ ca viśālasya putraḥ bhavat
tatas candraḥ
tad tanayaḥ dhūmrākṣaḥ

sṛṃjayāt sahadevaḥ

original: tataś ca kṛśāśvo nāma putrobhavat // ViP_4,1.55 //
analyzed: tatas ca kṛśāśvaḥ nāma putraḥ bhavat

janamejayāt sumatiḥ
ete vaiśālikāḥ bhūbhṛtaḥ
ślokaḥ upi atra gīyate

śaryāteḥ kanyā su kanyānām ābhavat yām upayeme cyavan
ānarta nāmā parama dhārmikaḥ śaryāti putraḥ bhavat

original: ānartasyāpi revatanāmā putro jajñe yo 'sāvānarttaviṣayaṃ bubhuje purīṃ ca kuśasthalīmadhyuvāsa // ViP_4,1.64 //
analyzed: ānartasya api revata nāmā putraḥ jajñe yaḥ asau ānartta viṣayam bubhuje purīm ca kuśasthalīm adhyuvāsa

original: revatāsyāpi raivataḥ putraḥ kakudmināmā dharmātmā bhrātṛśatasya jyoṣṭho 'bhavat // ViP_4,1.65 //
analyzed: revatā asya api raivataḥ putraḥ kakudmi nāmā dharma ātmā bhrātṛ śatasya jyoṣṭhaḥ abhavat

original: sa tāmādāya kasyoyamarhatīti bhagavantamabjayoniṃ praṣṭuṃ brahmalokaṃ jagām // ViP_4,1.67 //
analyzed: sa tām ādāya kasya uyam arhati iti bhagavantam abjayonim praṣṭum brahma lokam jagām

original: tāvacca brahmaṇontike hāhāhūhūsaṃjñābhyāṃ gandharvābhyāmatitānaṃ nāma divyaṃ gāndharvamagīyata // ViP_4,1.68 //
analyzed: tāvat ca brahmaṇaḥ untike hāhā hūhū saṃjñābhyām gandharvābhyām atitānam nāma divyam gāndharvam agīyata

original: tacca trimārgaparivṛttair anekayugaparivṛttiṃ tiṣṭhannapi raivataḥ śṛṇvanmuhūrttamiva mene // ViP_4,1.69 //
analyzed: tat ca tri mārga parivṛttaiḥ aneka yuga parivṛttim tiṣṭhan api raivataḥ śṛṇvan muhūrttam iva mene

original: gītāvasāne caja bhagavantamabjayoniṃ praṇamya raivataḥ kanyāyogyaṃ varamapṛcchat // ViP_4,1.70 //

original: punaś ca praṇamya bhagavate tasmai yathābhimatānātmanaḥsa varān kathayāmāsa /
analyzed: punar ca praṇamya bhagavate tasmai yathā abhimatān ātmanaḥ sa varān kathayāmāsa

original: ka eṣāṃ bhagavatobhimata iti yasmai kanyāmimāṃ prayacchāmīti // ViP_4,1.72 //

original: ya ete bhavatobhimatā naiteṣāṃ sāṃprataṃ putrapautrāpatyāpatyasaṃtatirastyavanītale // ViP_4,1.74 //

ye ete bhavataḥ abhimatāḥ mahī tala ṣṭāviṃśatitama manoḥ caturyugam atīta prāyat ca vartate
āsannaḥ hi kaliḥ
anyasmai kanyā ratnam idam bhavatā ekākinā abhimatāya deyam

original: tataḥ punarapyutpannasādhvaso rājā bhagavantaṃ praṇamya papraccha // ViP_4,1.80 //

original: bhagavannevamavasthite ma yeyaṃ kasmai deyeti // ViP_4,1.81 //

brahmā uvāca

original: na hyādimadhyāntamajasya yasya vidmo vayaṃ sarvamayasya dhātuḥ /
