original: tasyāṃ ca madhyārātrau nivṛttāyāṃ mantrapūtajalapūrṇaṃ kalaśaṃ vedimadhye nivesya te munayaḥ suṣupuḥ // ViP_4,2.50 //
analyzed: tasyām ca madhyārātrau nivṛttāyām mantra pūta jala pūrṇam kalaśam vedi madhye nivesya te munayaḥ suṣupuḥ

original: supteṣu teṣu atīva tṛṭparītaḥsa bhūpālastamāśramaṃ viveśa // ViP_4,2.51 //
analyzed: supteṣu teṣu atīva tṛṣ parītaḥ sa bhūpālaḥ tam āśramam viveśa
tān ṛṣīn na eva utthāpayāmāsa
tat ca kalaśam aparimeyam āhat maya mantra pūtam papau

original: prabuddhāś ca ṛṣayaḥ paprachuḥ kenaitaṃ mantrapūtaṃ vāri pītam // ViP_4,2.54 //
analyzed: prabuddhāḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ papracchuḥ kena etam mantra pūtam vāri pītam

original: atra hi rājño yuvanāsvasya patnī mahābalaparākramaṃ putraṃ janayiṣyati /
analyzed: atra hi rājñaḥ yuvanāsvasya patnī mahā bala parākramam putram janayiṣyati

original: ityākarṇya sa rājā ajānatā mayā pītamityāha // ViP_4,2.55 //
analyzed: iti ākarṇya sa rājā a jānatā mayā pītam iti āha

original: garbhaś ca yuvanāśvasyodare abhavat krameṇa ca vavṛdhe // ViP_4,2.56 //
analyzed: garbhaḥ ca yuvanāśvasya udare abhavat krameṇa ca vavṛdhe

original: prāptasamayaś ca dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhena kukṣimavanipaternirbhidya niścakrāma // ViP_4,2.57 //
analyzed: prāpta samayaḥ ca dakṣiṇa aṅguṣṭhena kukṣim avanipateḥ nirbhidya niścakrāma
sa ca asau rājā mamāra

original: jāto nāmaiṣa kaṃ dhāsyatīti te munayaḥ procuḥ // ViP_4,2.59 //
analyzed: jātaḥ nāma eṣa kam dhāsyati iti te munayaḥ procuḥ
atha āgatya devarājaḥ ubrajīt mām ayam dhāsyati iti
tatas mādhātṛ nāmā saḥ bhavat

original: vakre cāsya pradeśinī nyastā devendreṇa nyastātāṃ papau // ViP_4,2.61 //
analyzed: vakre ca asya pradeśinī nyastā deva indreṇa nyasta tām papau
tām ca amṛta strāviṇīm āsvādya ahnā eva sa vyavardhata

original: tatastu māndhātā cakravartī saptadvīpāṃ mahīṃ vubhuje // ViP_4,2.63 //
analyzed: tatas tu māndhātā cakravartī sapta dvīpām mahīm vubhuje
tatra ayam śvokaḥ
yāvat sūryaḥ udeti astam yāvat ca pratitiṣṭhati
sarvam tat yauvanāśvasya māndhātupaḥ kṣetram ucyate
māndhātā śatabindoḥ duhitaram bundumatīm upayem

original: purukutsamaṃbarīṣaṃ mucukundaṃ ca tasyāṃ putratrayamutpādayāmāsa // ViP_4,2.67 //
analyzed: purukutsam aṃbarīṣam mucukundam ca tasyām putra trayam utpādayāmāsa
pañcāśat duhitaraḥ tasyām eva tasya nṛpateḥ babhūvuḥ

original: ekasminnantare bahūvṛcaścaja saubharirnāma maharṣirantarjale dvādaśābdaṃ kālamuvāsa //
analyzed: ekasmin antare bahūvṛcaḥ caja saubhariḥ nāma mahā ṛṣiḥ antar jale dvādaśa abdam kālam uvāsa

original: tatra cāntarjale saṃmado nāmātibabahu prajotimātrapramāṇo mīnādhipatirāsīt // 70 //
analyzed: tatra ca antar jale saṃmadaḥ nāma ati babahu mīna adhipatiḥ āsīt  /

original: tasya ca putrapautradauhitrāḥ pṛṣṭhato 'grataḥ pārśvayoḥ pakṣapucchaśirasāṃ copari bhramantastenaiva sadāharniśamatinirvṛttā remire // ViP_4,2.71
analyzed: tasya ca putra pautra dauhitrāḥ pṛṣṭhatas agratas pārśvayoḥ pakṣa puccha śirasām ca upari bhramantaḥ tena eva sadā aharniśam ati nirvṛttāḥ remire  /

original: sa cāpatyasparśopacīyamānapraharṣaprakarṣo bahuprakāraṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ paśyatastair ātmajaputrapautradauhitrādibhiḥ sahānudinaṃ surāṃ reme // ViP_4,2.72
analyzed: sa ca apatya sparśa upacīyamāna praharṣa prakarṣaḥ bahu prakāram tasya ṛṣeḥ paśyataḥ taiḥ ātmaja putra pautra dauhitra ādibhiḥ saha anudinam surām reme  /
atha antar jala avasthitaḥ saubhariḥ ekāgrataḥ samādhim apahāya anudinam tasya satsyasya ātmaja putra pautra dauhitra ādibhiḥ saha ati ramaṇīya tām avekṣya acintayat

original: aho dhanyoyamīdṛśamanabhimataṃ yonyantaramavāpyaibhir ātmajaputrapautradauhitrādibhiḥ saha ramamāṇodīvāsmākaṃ spṛhāmutpādayati // ViP_4,2.74
analyzed: aho dhanyaḥ yam īdṛśam anabhimatam yoni antaram avāpya ebhiḥ ātmaja putra pautra dauhitra ādibhiḥ saha ramamāṇā udīva asmākam spṛhām utpādayati

original: vayamapyevaṃ putrādibhiḥ saha lalitaṃ ramiṣyāma ityevamabhikāṅkṣan sa tasmādantarja-lānniṣkramya saṃtānāya niveṣṭukāmaḥ kanyārthaṃ māndhātāraṃ  #
analyzed: vayam api evam putra ādibhiḥ saha lalitam ramiṣyāmaḥ iti evam abhikāṅkṣan sa tasmāt antar jalāt niṣkramya saṃtānāya niveṣṭu kāmaḥ kanyā artham māndhātāram
rājānam agacchat

original: āgamanaśravaṇasamanantaraṃ cotthāya tena rājñā samyagarghyādinā saṃpūjitaḥ kṛtāsanaparigrahaḥ saubhariruvāca rājānam // ViP_4,2.76 //
analyzed: āgamana śravaṇa samanantaram ca utthāya tena rājñā samyak arghya ādinā saṃpūjitaḥ kṛta āsana parigrahaḥ saubhariḥ uvāca rājānam

original: anyepi saṃtyeva nṛpāḥ pṛthivyāṃ māndhātareṣāṃ prayaccha me mā praṇayaṃ vibhāṅkṣiḥ /
analyzed: anye api saṃti eva nṛpāḥ pṛthivyām māndhāta reṣām prayaccha me mā praṇayam vibhāṅkṣiḥ

original: na hyarthinaḥ kāryavaśādupetāḥ kakutsthavaṃśe vimukhāḥ prayānti // ViP_4,2.77 //
analyzed: na hi arthinaḥ kārya vaśāt upetāḥ kakutstha vaṃśe vimukhāḥ prayānti

original: anyepi saṃtyeva nṛpāḥ pṛtivyāṃ māndhātareṣāṃ tanayāḥ prasūtāḥ /
analyzed: anye api saṃti eva nṛpāḥ pṛtivyām māndhātareṣām tanayāḥ prasūtāḥ
kim tu arthinām arthita dāna dīkṣā kṛta vrata ślāghyam idam kulam te

original: śatārdhasaṃkhyā stava saṃti kanyāstāsāṃ mamaikāṃ nṛpate prayaccha /
analyzed: śatārdha saṃkhyāḥ stava saṃti kanyāḥ tāsām mama ekām nṛpate prayaccha
yad prārthanā bhaṅga bhayāt bibhemi tasmāt aham rāja vara ādi duḥkhāt
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: iti ṛṣivacanamākarṇya sa rājā jarārjaritadehamṛṣimālokya pratyākhyānakātarastasmāccaca śāpabhīto bibhyatkiñcidadhomukhaściraṃ dadhyau ca //
analyzed: iti ṛṣi vacanam ākarṇya sa rājā jarā ārjarita deham ṛṣim ālokya pratyākhyāna kātaraḥ tasmāt caca śāpa bhītaḥ bibhyat kiñcid adhomukhaḥ ciram dadhyau ca
saubhariḥ uvāca
cīntā mahyam uktam na mayā atra kiñcid

original: yāvaśyadeyā tanayā tayaiva kṛtārthatā no yadi kiṃ na labdhā // ViP_4,2.81 //
analyzed: yā avaśya deyā tanayā tayā eva kṛtārtha tā naḥ yadi kim na labdhā
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: atha tasya bhagavataḥ śāpabhītaḥsapraśrayastamuvācāsau rājā // ViP_4,2.82 //
analyzed: atha tasya bhagavataḥ śāpa bhītaḥ sa praśrayaḥ tam uvāca asau rājā
rājā uvāca

original: bhagavan asmatkulasthitiriyaṃ ya eva kanyābhir ucito 'bhijavānvarastasmai kanyā pradīyate
analyzed: bhagavan asmad kula sthitiḥ iyam yaḥ eva kanyābhiḥ ucitaḥ abhijavān varaḥ tasmai kanyā pradīyate
bhagavat yācñā ca asmad manorathānām api ati gocajara vartinī katham api eṣā saṃjātā tat evam upasthite

original: na vidmaḥ kiṃ kurma ityetanmayācintyata ityabhihite ca tena bhūbhujā muniracintayat // ViP_4,2.83 //
analyzed: na vidmaḥ kim kurmaḥ iti etat mayā acintyate iti abhihite ca tena bhūbhujā muniḥ acintayat

original: ayamanyo 'smatpratyākhyānopāyo vṛddhoyamanabhimataḥ strīṇāṃ kimata kanyākānāmityamunā saṃcintyaitadabhihitamevamastu tathā kariṣyāmīti saṃcintya  #
analyzed: ayam anyaḥ asmad pratyākhyāna upāyaḥ vṛddhaḥ yaḥ anabhimataḥ strīṇām kanyākānām iti amunā saṃcintya etat abhihitam evam astu tathā kariṣyāmi iti saṃcintya
māndhātāram uvāca
yadi evam tat ādiśyatām asmākam praveśāya

original: kaṃnyāntaḥpuraṃ varṣavaro yadi kanyaiva kācinmāmabhilaṣati tadāhaṃ dārasaṃgrahaṃ kariṣyāmi anyathā cettadalamasmākametenātītakālāraṃbhaṇenetyuktvā  #
analyzed: kaṃnyā antaḥpuram varṣavaraḥ yadi kanyā eva kācid mām abhilaṣati tadā aham dāra saṃgraham kariṣyāmi anyathā ced tat alam asmākam etena atīta kāla āraṃbhaṇena iti uktvā
virarāma

original: tataś ca māndhātrā muniśāpaśaṃ kitena kanyāntaḥpuravarṣadharaḥsamājñaptaḥ // ViP_4,2.86 //
analyzed: tatas ca māndhātrā kanyā antaḥpura varṣadharaḥ samājñaptaḥ

original: tena saha kanyāntaḥpuraṃ praviśānneva bhagavānakhilasiddhagandharvebhyotiśayena kamanīyaṃ rūpamakarot // ViP_4,2.87 //
analyzed: tena saha kanyā antaḥpuram praviśān eva bhagavān akhila siddha gandharvebhyaḥ atiśayena kamanīyam rūpam akarot

original: praveśya ca tamṛṣimantaḥpure varṣadharastāḥ kanyāḥ prāha // ViP_4,2.88 //
analyzed: praveśya ca tam ṛṣim antaḥpure varṣadharaḥ tāḥ kanyāḥ prāha
bhavatīnām janayitā mahā rājaḥ samājñāpayati
ayam asmān brahmarṣiḥ kanyā artham samabhyāgataḥ

original: mayā cāsya pratijñātaṃ yadyasmatkanyā yā kācidbhagavantaṃ varayati tatkanyācchande
analyzed: mayā ca asya pratijñātam yadi asmad kanyā yā kācid bhagavantam varayati tat kanyā chande

original: nāhaṃ paripaṃṣathānaṃ kariṣyāmītyākarmya sarvā eva tāḥ kanyāḥ sānurāgāḥ sapramadāḥ
analyzed: na aham paripaṃṣathānam kariṣyāmi iti ākarmya sarvāḥ eva tāḥ kanyāḥ sa anurāgāḥ sa pramadāḥ

original: keṇava iva mṛgayūthapatiṃ tamṛṣimahamahamikayā varayāṃbabhūvurūcuś ca // ViP_4,2.91 //
analyzed: keṇavaḥ iva mṛga yūtha patim tam ṛṣi mahamahamikayā varayāṃbabhūvuḥ ūcuḥ ca

original: alaṃ bhaginyohamimaṃ vṛṇomi vṛṇomyahaṃ naiṣa tavānurūpaḥ /
analyzed: alam bhaginyā uham imam vṛṇomi vṛṇomi aham na eṣa tava anurūpaḥ

original: mamaiṣa bhartā vidhinaiva sṛṣṭaḥsṛṣṭāhamasyopaśamaṃ prayāhi // ViP_4,2.92 //
analyzed: mama eṣa bhartā vidhinā eva sṛṣṭaḥ sṛṣṭā aham asya upaśamam prayāhi

original: vṛto mayāyaṃ prathamaṃ mayāyaṃ gṛhaṃ viśanneva vihanyase kim /
analyzed: vṛtaḥ mayā ayam prathamam mayā ayam gṛham viśan eva vihanyase kim
mayā mayā uti kṣitipa ātmajānām tad artham atyartha kaliḥ babhūva

original: yadā munis tābhir atīvahārdāddhṛtaḥsa kanyābhir anindyakīrtiḥ /
analyzed: yadā muniḥ tābhiḥ atīva hārdāt hṛtaḥ sa kanyābhiḥ anindya kīrtiḥ

original: tadā sa kanyādhikṛto nṛpāya yathāvajācaṣṭa vinamramūrtiḥ // ViP_4,2.94 //
analyzed: tadā sa kanyā adhikṛtaḥ nṛpāya vinamra mūrtiḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: tadavagamātkiṅkibhetatkathadhametatkiṃ kiṃ karomi kiṃ mayābhihitamityākulamatiranicchannapi kathamapi rājānumene // ViP_4,2.95 //
analyzed: tad avagamāt kim kim karomi kim mayā abhihitam iti ākula matiḥ an icchan api katham api rājā anumene

original: kṛtānurūpavivāhaś ca maharṣiḥsakalā eva tāḥ kanyāḥsvamāśramamanayat // ViP_4,2.96 //
analyzed: kṛta anurūpa vivāhaḥ ca mahā ṛṣiḥ sakalāḥ eva tāḥ kanyāḥ svam āśramam anayat

original: tatra cāseṣaśilpakalpapraṇetāraṃ dhātāramivānyaṃ viśvakarmāṇamāhūya sakalakanyānāmekaikasyāḥ protphullapaṅkajāḥ kūjatkalahaṃsakāraṇḍavādivihaṅgamābhirāmajalāśayāḥsopadhānāḥ
analyzed: tatra ca a seṣa śilpa kalpa praṇetāram dhātāram iva anyam viśvakarmāṇam āhūya sakala kanyānām ekaikasyāḥ protphulla paṅkajāḥ kūjat kalahaṃsa kāraṇḍava ādi vihaṅgama abhirāma jalāśayāḥ sa upadhānāḥ
sa avakāsāḥ sādhu śayyā paricchadāḥ prāsādāḥ kriyantām iti ādideśa
tat ca tathā eva anuṣṭhitam aśeṣa śilpa viseṣa ācāryaḥ tvaṣṭā darśitavān
tatas parama ṛṣiṇā saubhariṇā ājñaptaḥ teṣu gṛheṣu a nivārya ānanda kunda mahā nidhiḥ āsāṃcakre
tatas bhakṣya bhojya lehya ādi upabhoga aura āgata anugata bhṛtya ādīn aharniśam aśeṣa gṛheṣu tāḥ bhojayāmāmuḥ

original: ekadātu duhitṛsnehākṛṣṭahṛdayaḥsa mahīpatiratiduḥkhitāstā uta sukhitā vā iti vicintya
analyzed: ekadā tu duhitṛ sneha ākṛṣṭa hṛdayaḥ sa mahīpatiḥ ati duḥkhitāḥ tāḥ uta sukhitāḥ vā iti vicintya
tasya mahā ṛṣeḥ āśrama samīpam upetya sphurat aṃśumālā lalāmām sphaṭika maya prāsāda mālām ati ramya upavana jalāśayām
dadarśa

original: praviśya caikaṃ prāsādamātmajāṃ pariṣvajya kṛtāsanaparigrahaḥ pravṛddhasnehanayanāṃbugarbhanayanobravīt // ViP_4,2.102 //
analyzed: praviśya ca ekam prāsādam ātmajām pariṣvajya kṛta āsana parigrahaḥ pravṛddha sneha nayana aṃbu garbha nayanaḥ bravīt

original: apyatra vatse bhavatyāḥsukhamuna kiñcidamukhamapi te maharṣiḥsnehavānuta na smaryatesmadguhavāsa ityuktā taṃ tanayā pitaramāha // ViP_4,2.103
analyzed: api atra vatse bhavatyāḥ sukham una kiñcid amukham api te mahā ṛṣiḥ snehavān uta na smaryate smat guha vāsaḥ iti uktā tam tanayā pitaram āha
tāta ati ramaṇīyaḥ prāsādaḥ utra ati manojñam upavanam ete kala vākya vihaṅgama abhirutāḥ protphulla padma ākara jalāśayāḥ
manonurūla bhakṣya bhojya anulepana vastra bhūṣaṇa ādi bhogaḥ mṛdūni śayana āsanāni sarva saṃpad sametam
me gārhasthyam

original: tathāpi kena vā janmabhūmirna smaryate // ViP_4,2.105 //
analyzed: tathā api kena vā janma bhūmiḥ na smaryate
tvad prasādāt idam aśeṣam ati śobhanam

original: kiṃ tvekaṃ mamaitadduḥkhakāraṇaṃ yadasmadgṛhānmaharṣirayaṃmadbhartā na viṣkrāmati mamaiva kevalamatiprītyā samīpaparivartinīnāmanyāsāmasmadbhaginīnām
analyzed: kim tu ekam mama etat duḥkha kāraṇam yat asmad gṛhāt mahā ṛṣiḥ ayam mad bhartā na viṣkrāmati mama eva kevalam ati prītyā samīpa parivartinīnām anyāsām asmad bhaginīnām

original: evaṃ ca mama sodaryotiduḥkhitā ityevamatiduḥkhakāraṇamityuktastayā dvitīyaṃ prāsādamupetya svatanayāṃ pariṣvajyopiṣṭastathaiva vṛṣṭavān //
analyzed: evam ca mama sodaryā uti duḥkhitā iti evam ati duḥkha kāraṇam iti uktaḥ tayā dvitīyam prāsādam upetya sva tanayām pariṣvajya upiṣṭaḥ tathā eva vṛṣṭavān

original: tayāpi ca sarvametattatprāsādādyupabhogasukhaṃ bhṛśamākhyātaṃ mamaiva kevalamatiprītyā
analyzed: tayā api ca sarvam etat tat prāsāda ādi upabhoga sukham bhṛśam ākhyātam mama eva kevalam ati prītyā
pārśvaparivartinīnām anyāsām asmad bhaginīnām iti evamādi śrutvā samasta prāsādeṣu rājā
praviveśa tanayām tanayām tathā eva avṛcchat

original: sarvābhiś ca tābhis tathaivābhihitaḥ paritoṣavismayanirbhavavivaśahṛdayo bhagavantaṃ saubharikekāntāvasthitamupetya kṛtapṛjobravīt // ViP_4,2.110
analyzed: sarvābhiḥ ca tābhiḥ tathā eva abhihitaḥ paritoṣa vismaya nirbhava vivaśa hṛdayaḥ bhagavantam saubharika ikānta avasthitam upetya kṛta pṛjaḥ bravīt

original: dṛṣṭaste bhagavan sumahāneṣa siddhiprabhāvo naivaṃvidhamanyasya kasyacidasmābhir
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ te bhagavan su mahān eṣa siddhi prabhāvaḥ na evaṃvidham anyasya kasyacid asmābhiḥ
vibhūtibhiḥ vilāsitam upalakṣitam yat etat bhagavataḥ tapasaḥ phalam iti abhipūjya tam ṛṣim

original: tatraiva tena ṛṣivaryeṇa casaha kiñcitkālamabhimatopabhogān bubhuje svapuraṃ ca jagām // ViP_4,2.111 //
analyzed: tatra eva tena ṛṣi varyeṇa ca saha kiñcid kālam abhimata upabhogān bubhuje sva puram ca

original: kālena gacchatā tasya tāsu rājatanayāsu putraśataṃ sārdhamabhavat // ViP_4,2.112 //
analyzed: kālena gacchatā tasya tāsu rāja tanayāsu putra śatam sa ardham abhavat
anu dina anurūḍha sneha prasāḥ ca sa tatra atīva mamatā ākṛṣṭa hṛdayaḥ abhavat

original: apyete 'smatputrāḥ kalabhāṣiṇaḥ pabhdyāṃ gaccheyuḥ apyete yauvanino bhaveyuḥ api
analyzed: api ete asmad putrāḥ kala bhāṣiṇaḥ pabhdyām gaccheyuḥ api ete yauvaninaḥ bhaveyuḥ api
kṛtadārān etān paśyeyam api eṣām putrāḥ bhaveyuḥ api etad putrān putra samanvitān pasyāmi ityādi manorathān anudinam
kāla saṃpatti pravṛddhān upekṣya etat cintayāmāsa
aho me mohasya ati vistāraḥ

original: manorathānāṃ na samāptirasti varṣāyutenāpyatha vāpi lakṣaiḥ /
analyzed: manorathānām na samāptiḥ asti varṣā ayutena api atha vā api lakṣaiḥ
pūrṇeṣu pūrṇeṣu manorathānām utpattayaḥ saṃti punarnavānām

original: padbhyāṃ gatā yauvaninaś ca jātā dāraiś ca saṃyogamitāḥ prasūtāḥ /
analyzed: padbhyām gatāḥ yauvaninaḥ ca jātāḥ dāraiḥ ca saṃyoga mitāḥ prasūtāḥ
dṛṣṭāḥ sutāḥ tad tanaya prasūtin draṣṭum punar vāñcchati meṃ atarātmā

original: drakṣyāmi teṣāmiti cetprasūtiṃ manoratho me bhavitā tatonyaḥ /
analyzed: drakṣyāmi teṣām iti ced prasūtim manorathaḥ me bhavitā tatonyaḥ

original: purṇopi tatrāpyaparasya janma nivaryate kena manorathasya // ViP_4,2.118 //
analyzed: tatra api aparasya janma nivaryate kena manorathasya
ā mṛtyutaḥ nā eva manorathānām antaḥ asti vijñātam idam mayā adya

original: manorthāsaktiparasya cittaṃ na jāyate vai paramārthasaṃgi // ViP_4,2.119 //
analyzed: manortha āsakti parasya cittam na jāyate vai paramārtha saṃgi

original: sa me samādhirjalavāsamitramatsyasya saṃgātsa hasaiva naṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: sa me samādhiḥ jala vāsa mitra matsyasya saṃgāt sa hasā eva naṣṭaḥ

original: parigrahaḥsaṃgakṛto mayāyaṃ parigrahotthā ca mamātilipsā // ViP_4,2.120 //
analyzed: parigrahaḥ saṃga kṛtaḥ mayā ayam parigraha utthā ca mama ati lipsā
duḥkham yadā evā eka śarīra janma śata ardha saṃkhyākam idam prasūtam

original: parigraheṇa kṣitipātmajānāṃ sutair anekair bahulīkṛtaṃ tata // ViP_4,2.121 //
analyzed: parigraheṇa kṣitipa ātmajānām sutaiḥ anekaiḥ bahulīkṛtam tata

original: mutātmajais tattanayaiś ca bhūyo bhūyaś ca teṣāṃ parigraheṇa /
analyzed: muta ātmajaiḥ tad tanayaiḥ ca bhūyas bhūyas ca teṣām parigraheṇa
vistāram eṣyati adi duḥkha hetuḥ parigrahaḥ vai mamatā abhidhānaḥ

original: cīrṇaṃ tapo yattu jalāśrayeṇa tasyārdhireṣā tapasoṃtarāyaḥ /
analyzed: cīrṇam tapaḥ yat tu jalāśrayeṇa tasya ārdhiḥ eṣā tapasaḥ antarāyaḥ

original: matsyasya saṃgādabhavacca yo me sutādirāgo muṣitosmi nena // ViP_4,2.123 //
analyzed: matsyasya saṃgāt abhavat ca yaḥ me suta ādi rāgaḥ muṣitaḥ asmi nena

original: niḥsaṃgatā muktipadaṃ yatīnāṃ saṃgādaśeṣāḥ prabhavanti doṣāḥ /
analyzed: niḥsaṃga tā mukti padam yatīnām saṃgāt aśeṣāḥ prabhavanti doṣāḥ
ārūḍha yogaḥ vinipātyate idhaḥ saṃgena yogī kim uta alpa buddhiḥ
aham cariṣyāmi tat ātmanā ṛthe paripraha grāha gṛhīta buddhiḥ

original: yadā hi bhūyaḥ parihinadoṣo janasya duḥkhair bhavitā na duḥkhī // ViP_4,2.125 //
analyzed: yadā hi bhūyas parihina doṣaḥ janasya duḥkhaiḥ bhavitā na duḥkhī
sarvasya dhātāram a cintya rūpam aṇoḥ aṇīyāṃsam atipramāṇam
sita asitam ca īśvaram īśvarāṇām ārādhayiṣye tapasā eva viṣṇum
tasmin aśeṣa ojasi sarva rūpaṇi avyakta vispaṣṭa tanau anante

original: mamācalaṃ cittamapetadoṣaṃ sadāstu viṣṇāvamavāya bhūyaḥ // ViP_4,2.127 //
analyzed: mama acalam cittam apeta doṣam sadā astu viṣṇau amavāya bhūyas
samasta bhūtāt amalāt anantāt sarva īśvarāt anyat anādi madhyāt

original: yasmānna kiñcittamahaṃ gurūṇāṃ paraṃ guruṃ saṃśrayamemi viṣṇumā // ViP_4,2.128 //
analyzed: yasmāt na kiñcid tam aham gurūṇām param gurum saṃśrayam emi
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: ityātmānimātmanaivābidāyāsau saubharirapahāya putragṛhāsanaparigrahādikamaśeṣamarthajātaṃ sakalabhāryāsamanvitoṃ vanaṃ praviveśa // ViP_4,2.129
analyzed: iti ātmānam ātmanā eva a bidāya asau saubhariḥ apahāya putra gṛha āsana parigraha ādikam aśeṣam artha jātam sakala bhāryā samanvitā ūm vanam praviveśa

original: tatrāpyanudinaṃ vaikhānasaniṣpādyamaśeṣakriyākalāpaṃ niṣpādya kṣapitasakalapāpaḥ paripakvamanovṛttirātmanyagnīnsamāropya bhikṣurabhavat //
analyzed: tatra api anudinam vaikhānasa niṣpādyam aśeṣa kriyā kalāpam niṣpādya kṣapita sakala pāpaḥ paripakva manaḥ vṛttiḥ ātmani agnīn samāropya bhikṣuḥ abhavat

original: bhagavatyāsajyākhilaṃ karmakalāpaṃ hitvānaṃ tamajamanādinidhanamavikāramaraṇādidharmamavāpa paramanantaṃ paravatatmacyutaṃ padam // ViP_4,2.131
analyzed: bhagavati āsajya akhilam karma kalāpam tam ajam anādinidhanam avikāra maraṇa ādi dharmam avāpa param anantam padam
iti etat māndhātṛ duhitṛ saṃbandhāt ākhyātam

original: yaścaitatsaubharicaritamanusmarati paṭhati pāṭhayati śṛṇoti śrāvayati dharatyavadhārayati
analyzed: yaḥ ca etat saubhari caritam anusmarati paṭhati pāṭhayati śṛṇoti śrāvayati dharati avadhārayati

original: likhati lekhayati śikṣayatyadhyāpayatyupadiśati vā tasya ṣaṭ janmāni duḥsaṃtatirasaddharmo
analyzed: likhati lekhayati śikṣayati adhyāpayati upadiśati vā tasya ṣaḍ janmāni duḥsaṃtatiḥ asaddharmaḥ

original: vāḍmanasorasanmārgācaraṇasaśeṣahetuṣu vā mamatvaṃ na bhavati // ViP_4,2.133 //
analyzed: vāc manasoḥ asat mārga ācaraṇa sa śeṣa hetuṣu vā mamatvam na bhavati
iti śri viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe caturtha āśe dvitīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ
atas ca mādhātuḥ putra saṃtatiḥ abhidhīyate
aṃbarīṣasya māndhātṛ tanayasya yuvanāśvaḥ putraḥ abhūt
tasmāt hārītaḥ yatas uṅgirasaḥ hārītā

original: rasātale mauneyā nāma gandharvā babhūvuḥṣaṭkoṭisaṃkhyātāstair aśeṣāṇi nāgakulānyapahṛtapradhānaratnādhipatyānyakriyanta // ViP_4,3.4 //
analyzed: rasātale mauneyāḥ nāma gandharvāḥ babhūvuḥ ṣaṣ koṭi saṃkhyātāḥ taiḥ aśeṣāṇi nāga kulāni apahṛta pradhāna ratna ādhipatyāni akriyanta

original: taiś ca gandharvavīryāvabūtair urageśvaraiḥ stūyamāno bhagavānaśeṣadeveśa āste tacchravaṇonmīlilonnidrapuṇḍarīkanayano jalaśayano nidrāvasānapravṛddhaḥ  #
analyzed: taiḥ ca gandharva vīrya avabūtaiḥ uraga īśvaraiḥ stūyamānaḥ bhagavān aśeṣa deva īśaḥ āste tad śravaṇa unmīlila unnidra puṇḍarīka nayanaḥ jala śayanaḥ nidrā avasāna pravṛddhaḥ
praṇipatya abhihitaḥ
bhagavan asmākam etebhyaḥ gandharvebhyaḥ bhayam utpannam katham upaśamam eṣyati iti

original: āha ca bhagavānanādinidhanapuruṣottamo yosau yauvanāśvasya māndhātuḥ purukutsanāmā putrastamahāmanupraviśya tānaśeṣān duṣṭagandharvānupaśamaṃ  #
analyzed: āha ca bhagavān anādinidhana puruṣottamaḥ yaḥ asau yauvanāśvasya māndhātuḥ purukutsa nāmā putraḥ tam ahām anupraviśya tān aśeṣān duṣṭa gandharva anupaśamam
nayiṣyāmi iti

original: tadākarṇya bhagavate jalaśāyine kṛtapraṇāmāḥ punarnāgalokamāgatāḥ pannagādhipatayo narmadāñca purukutsānayanāya codayāmāsuḥ // ViP_4,3.7 //
analyzed: tat ākarṇya bhagavate jalaśāyine kṛta praṇāmāḥ punar nāga lokam āgatāḥ pannaga adhipatayaḥ narmadām ca purukutsa ānayanāya codayāmāsuḥ
sā ca enam rasātalam nītavatī
rasātala gataḥ ca asau yad bhagavat tejasā āpyāyita ātma vīryaḥ sakala gandharvān nijaghāna
punar ca sva puram ājagāma
sakala pannaga adhipatayaḥ ca narmadāyai varam daduḥ

original: yattenusmaraṇasamavetaṃ nāmagrahaṇaṃ kariṣyati na tasya sarpaviṣabhayaṃ bhaviṣyatīti // ViP_4,3.11 //
analyzed: yat tenusmaraṇa samavetam nāmagrahaṇam kariṣyati na tasya sarpa viṣa bhayam bhaviṣyati iti
atra ca ślokaḥ
narmadāyai namaḥ prātar narmadāyai namaḥ niśi

original: namostu narmade tubhyaṃ trāhi māṃ viṣasarpataḥ // ViP_4,3.13 //
analyzed: namaḥ astu narmade tubhyam trāhi mām viṣa sarpataḥ

original: ityuccāryāharniśamandhakārapraveśe vā sarpair na daśyate na cāpi kṛtānusmaraṇabhujo viṣamapi bhuktamupaghātāya bhavati // ViP_4,3.14 //
analyzed: iti uccārya aharniśam andhakāra praveśe vā sarpaiḥ na daśyate na ca api kṛta anusmaraṇa bhujaḥ viṣam api bhuktam upaghātāya bhavati

original: purukutsāya saṃtativicchedo na bhaviṣyatītyuragapatayo paraṃ daduḥ // ViP_4,3.15 //
analyzed: purukutsāya saṃtati vicchedaḥ na bhaviṣyati iti uraga patayaḥ param daduḥ
purukutsaḥ narmadāyām trasaddasyum ajījanat
trasat dasyutaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ anaraṇyaḥ yam rāvaṇaḥ digvijaye jaghān

original: anaraṇyasya pṛṣaṭaśvaḥ pṛṣadaśvasya haryaśvaḥ putro 'bhavat // ViP_4,3.18 //
analyzed: anaraṇyasya pṛṣaṭaśvaḥ pṛṣadaśvasya haryaśvaḥ putraḥ abhavat
tasya ca hastaḥ putraḥ abhavat

original: tataś ca sumanāstasyāpi tridhanvā tridhanvanastrayyāruṇiḥ // ViP_4,3.20 //
analyzed: tatas ca sumanāḥ tasya api tridhanvā tridhanvanaḥ trayyāruṇiḥ
trayyāruṇeḥ satyavrataḥ yaḥ asau triśaṅku saṃjñām avāpa
sa caṇḍāla tām upagataḥ ca

original: dvādaśavarṣikyāmanāvṛṣṭyāṃ viśvāmitrakalatrāpatyapoṣaṇārthaṃ caṇḍālapratigraharaṇāya ca jāhnavītīranyagrodhe mṛgamāṃsamanudinaṃ babandha //
analyzed: dvādaśa varṣikyām anāvṛṣṭyām viśvāmitra kalatra apatya poṣaṇa artham caṇḍāla pratigraharaṇāya ca jāhnavī tīra nyagrodhe mṛga māṃsam anudinam babandha

original: sa tu parituṣṭena viśvāmitreṇa saśarīraḥsvargamāropitaḥ // ViP_4,3.24 //
analyzed: sa tu parituṣṭena viśvāmitreṇa sa śarīraḥ svargam āropitaḥ

original: triśaṅkorhariścandrastasmācca rohitāśvastataś ca harito haritasya cañcuścañcorvijayavasudevau ruruko vijayādrukasya vṛkaḥ // ViP_4,3.25 //
analyzed: triśaṅkoḥ hariścandraḥ tasmāt ca rohitāśvaḥ tatas ca haritaḥ haritasya cañcuḥ cañcoḥ vijaya vasudevau rurukaḥ vijayāt rukasya vṛkaḥ

original: tato vṛkasya bāhuḥ yo 'sau haihayatālajaṅghādibhiḥ parājitontarvatnyā mahiṣyā saha vanaṃ praviveśa // ViP_4,3.26 //
analyzed: tatas vṛkasya bāhuḥ yaḥ asau haihaya tālajaṅgha ādibhiḥ parājitaḥ antarvatnyā mahiṣyā saha vanam praviveśa

original: tasyāścā sapatnyā garbhastaṃbhanāya garo dattaḥ // ViP_4,3.27 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca sapatnyāḥ garbha staṃbhanāya garaḥ dattaḥ

original: tenāsya garbhaḥsaptavarṣāṇi jaṭhara eva tasthau // ViP_4,3.28 //
analyzed: tena asya garbhaḥ sapta varṣāṇi jaṭhare eva tasthau
sa ca bāhuḥ vṛddha bhāvāt aurva āśramam amīpe mamāra

original: sā tasya bhāryā citāṃ kṛtvā tamāropyānuparaṇakṛtaniścayābhūt // ViP_4,3.30 //
analyzed: sā tasya bhāryā citām kṛtvā tam āropya anuparaṇa kṛta niścayā bhūt
atha etām atīta anāgata vartamāna kāla traya vedī bhagavān aurvacaḥ sva āśramāt nirgatya abravīt

original: alamalamanenāsadgrāheṇākhilabhūmaṃ ḍalapatirativīryaparākramo naikayajñakṛdarātipakṣakṣayakartā tavodare cakravartī tiṣṭhati // ViP_4,3.32
analyzed: alam alam anena asat grāheṇa akhila bhūmam ḍala patiḥ ati vīrya parākramaḥ na eka yajña kṛt arāti pakṣa kṣaya kartā tava udare cakravartī tiṣṭhati

original: naivamatisāhasādhyavasāyinī bhavatī tena tyuktā sā tasmādanumaraṇanirbandhādvirarāma // ViP_4,3.33 //
analyzed: na evam ati sāhasa adhyavasāyinī bhavatī tena tyuktā sā tasmāt anumaraṇa nirbandhāt virarāma
tena eva ca bhagavatā sva āśramam ānītā

original: tatra kativayadinābhyantare ca sahaiva tena gareṇātitejasvī bālako jajñe // ViP_4,3.35 //
analyzed: tatra kati vaya dina abhyantare ca saha eva tena gareṇa ati tejasvī bālakaḥ jajñe

original: tasyaurvo jātakarmādikriyā niṣpādya sagara iti nāma cakāra // ViP_4,3.36 //
analyzed: tasya aurvaḥ jātakarma ādi kriyāḥ niṣpādya sagaraḥ iti nāma cakāra
kṛta upanayanam ca enam aurvaḥ veda śāstrāṇi astram ca āgneyam bhārgava ākhyam adhyāpayāmāsa
utpanna buddhiḥ ca mātaram abravīt

original: aṃba kathayātra vayaṃ kva tātosmākamitye vamādipṛcchantaṃ mātā sarvamevāvocat // ViP_4,3.39 //
analyzed: aṃba kathaya atra vayam kva tātaḥ usmākam iti e vam ādi pṛcchantam mātā sarvam eva avocat

original: tataś ca pitṛrājyapaharaṇādamarṣito haihayatālajaṅghādivadhāya pratijñāmakarot // ViP_4,3.40 //
analyzed: tatas ca pitṛ rājī apaharaṇāt amarṣitaḥ haihaya tālajaṅgha ādi vadhāya pratijñām akarot
prāyaśas ca haihaya tālajaṅghān jaghāna

original: śakayavanakāṃbho0japāradapaplavāḥ hanyamānāstatkulaguruṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmuḥ // ViP_4,3.42 //
analyzed: hanyamānāḥ tad kula gurum vasiṣṭham śaraṇam jagmuḥ
atha enān vasiṣṭhaḥ jīvana mṛtakān kṛtvā sagaram āha
vatsa alam ebhiḥ jīvat mṛtakaiḥ anumṛtaiḥ

original: ete ca mayaiva tvatpratijñāpāripālanāya nijadharmadvijasaṃgaparityāgaṃ kāritāḥ // ViP_4,3.45 //
analyzed: ete ca mayā eva tvad pratijñā pāripālanāya nija dharma dvija saṃga parityāgam kāritāḥ
tathā iti tad guru vacan abhinandya teṣām veṣa anya tvam akārayat

original: yavanānmuṇḍitaśirasordhamuṇḍitāñcchakān pralaṃbakeśān pāradān paplavāñ śmaśrudharān niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkārānetānanyāṃś ca kṣatriyāṃścakāra //
analyzed: yavanān muṇḍita śirasā ūrdha muṇḍitān śakān pralaṃba keśān pāradān paplavām śmaśru dharāt niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkārān etān anyān ca kṣatriyān cakāra

original: ete cātmadharmaparityāgādbāhyaṇaiḥ parityaktā mlecchatāṃ yayuḥ // ViP_4,3.48 //
analyzed: ete ca ātma dharma parityāgāt bāhyaṇaiḥ parityaktāḥ mleccha tām yayuḥ
sagaraḥ upi sma adhiṣṭhānam āgamya askhalita cakraḥ sapta dvīpavatīm imām urvīm praśaśāsa
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe caturtha aṃśe tṛtīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: kāśyapaduhitā mumatirvidarbharājatanayā keśinī ca dve bhārye sagarasyāstām // ViP_4,4.1 //
analyzed: kāśyapa duhitā mumatiḥ vidarbha rāja tanayā keśinī ca dve bhārye sagarasya āstām

original: tābhyāṃ cāpatyārthamaurvaḥ parameṇa samādhinārādhito varamadāt // ViP_4,4.2 //
analyzed: tābhyām ca apatya artham aurvaḥ parameṇa samādhinā ārādhitaḥ varam adāt

original: ekā vaṃśakaramekaṃ putramaparā ṣaṣṭiṃ putrasahasrāṇāṃ janayiṣyatīti yasyā yadabhimataṃ tadicchayā gṛhyatāmityukte keśinyekaṃ varayāmāsa //
analyzed: ekā vaṃśa karam ekam putram aparā ṣaṣṭim putra sahasrāṇām janayiṣyati iti yasyāḥ yat abhimatam tat icchayā gṛhyatām iti ukte keśinī ekam varayāmāsa
sumatiḥ putra sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭim vavre

original: tathetyukte alpair ahobhiḥ keśinī putramekamasamañjasanāmānaṃ vaṃśakaramasūta // ViP_4,4.5 //
analyzed: tathā iti ukte alpaiḥ ahobhiḥ keśinī putram ekam asamañjasa nāmānam vaṃśa karam asūta
kāśyapa tanayāyāḥ tu sumatyāḥ ṣaṣṭim putra sahasrāṇi abhavan
tasmāt asamañjasāt aṃśumān nāma kumāraḥ jajñe
sa tu asasaṃjasaḥ bālaḥ bālyāt eva asat vṛttaḥ bhūt
pitā ca asya acintayat ayam atīta bālyaḥ su buddhimān bhaviṣyati iti

original: atha tatrāpi ca vayasyatīte asaccārītamenaṃ pitā tatyāja // ViP_4,4.10 //
analyzed: atha tatra api ca vayasi atīte asat cārītam enam pitā tatyāja
tāni api ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi asamañjasa cāritam eva anucakruḥ
tatas ca asa samajasa carita anukāribhiḥ sāgaraiḥ apadhvasta yajñaiḥ sat mārge jagati devāḥ sakala vidyā mayam a saṃspṛṣṭam aśeṣa doṣaiḥ

original: bhagavataḥ puruṣottamasyāṃśabhūta kapilaṃ praṇamya tadarthamūcuḥ // ViP_4,4.12 //
analyzed: bhagavataḥ puruṣottamasya aṃśa bhūta kapilam praṇamya tad artham ūcuḥ
bhagavan ebhiḥ sagara tanayaiḥ asamañjasa caritam anugamyate

original: katham ebhir asadvṛttamanusaradbhir jagad bhaviṣyatīti // ViP_4,4.14 //
analyzed: katham ebhiḥ asat vṛttam anusaradbhiḥ jagat bhaviṣyati iti

original: atyārta jagatparitrāṇāya ca bhagavatotra śarīragrahaṇamityākarṇya bhagavānāhālpair eva dinair vinaṅkṣyantīti // ViP_4,4.15 //
analyzed: ati ārta jagat paritrāṇāya ca bhagavatā utra śarīra grahaṇam iti ākarṇya bhagavān āha alpaiḥ eva dinaiḥ vinaṅkṣyanti iti
atrā antare ca sagaraḥ hayamedham ārabhata

original: tasya ca putrair adhiṣṭhitamasyāśvaṃ kopyapahṛtya bhuvo bilaṃ praviveśa // ViP_4,4.17 //
analyzed: tasya ca putraiḥ adhiṣṭhitam asya aśvam kopī apahṛtya bhuvaḥ bilam praviveśa
tatas tad tanayāḥ ca aśva khura gati nirvandhena avanīm ekaikaḥ yojanam cakhnuḥ

original: pātāle cāśvaṃ paribhramantaṃ tamavanīpatitanayāste dadṛśuḥ // ViP_4,4.19 //
analyzed: pātāle ca aśvam paribhramantam tam avanīpati tanayāḥ te dadṛśuḥ

original: nātidūre 'vasthitaṃ ca bhagavantamapaghane śaratkālerkamiva tejobhir avanatamūrdhamadhaścāśeṣadiśaścodbhāsayamānaṃ hayahartāraṃ kapilarṣimapaśyan
analyzed: na atidūre avasthitam ca bhagavantam apaghane śarad kāla irkam iva tejobhiḥ avanata mūrdham adhas ca aśeṣa diśaḥ ca udbhāsayamānam haya hartāram kapila ṛṣim apaśyan

original: tataścodyatāyudhā durātmāno 'yamasmadapakārī yajñavidhnakārī hanyatāṃ hayahartā hanyatāmītyavocnnabhyadhāvaṃś ca // ViP_4,4.21 //
analyzed: tatas ca udyata āyudhāḥ durātmānaḥ ayam asmad apakārī yajña vidhna kārī hanyatām haya hartā hanyatāmi iti avocnn abhyadhāvan ca
tatas tena api bhagavatā kiñcid īṣat parivartita locanena avalokitāḥ sva śarīra samutthena agninā a dahyamānāḥ vineśuḥ

original: sagaropyavagamyāśvānusāri tatputrabalamaśeṣaṃ paramarṣiṇā kapilena tejasā dagdhaṃ tatoṃśumantamasamañjasaputramaśvānayanāyayuyoja // ViP_4,4.23
analyzed: sagaraḥ upi avagamya aśva anusāri tad putra balam aśeṣam parama ṛṣiṇā kapilena tejasā dagdham tatas uṃśumantam asamañjasa putram aśva ānayanāyayuyoja  /

original: sa tu sagarakatayakhātamārgeṇa kapilamupagamya bhaktinamrastadā tṛṣṭāva // ViP_4,4.24 //
analyzed: sa tu kapilam upagamya bhakti namraḥ tadā tṛṣṭāva
atha enam bhagavān āha

original: gacchainaṃ pitāmahāyāśvaṃ prāpaya varaṃ vṛṇīṣva ca putraka pautrāś ca cate svargādgaṅgāṃ bhuvamāneṣyanta iti // ViP_4,4.26 //
analyzed: gaccha enam pitāmahāya aśvam prāpaya varam vṛṇīṣva ca putraka pautrāḥ ca ca te svargāt gaṅgām bhuvam āneṣyante iti

original: athāṃśumānapi svaryātānāṃ brahmadaṇḍahatānāmasmatpitṝṇāmasvargayogyānāṃ svargaprāptikaraṃ varamasmākaṃ prayaccheti pratyāha // ViP_4,4.27 //
analyzed: atha aṃśumān api svaryātānām brahma daṇḍa hatānām asmad pitṝṇām a svarga yogyānām svarga prāpti karam varam asmākam prayaccha iti pratyāha

original: tadākarṇya taṃ ca bhagavānāha uktamevaitanmayādya pautraste tridivādgaṅgāṃbhuvamānayiṣyatīti // ViP_4,4.28 //
analyzed: tat ākarṇya tam ca bhagavān āha uktam eva etat mayā adya pautraḥ te tridivāt gaṅgāṃbhuvam ānayiṣyati iti

original: tadaṃbhasā ca saṃspṛṣṭeṣvasthibhasmāsu ete ca svargamārokṣyanti // ViP_4,4.29 //
analyzed: tad aṃbhasā ca saṃspṛṣṭeṣu asthi bhasma āsu ete ca svargam ārokṣyanti
bhagavat viṣṇu pāda aṅguṣṭha nirgatasya hi jalasya etat māhātmyam
yat na kevalam abhisaṃdhi pūrvakam snāna ādi upabhogeṣu upakārakam anabhisāṃdhitam api asyām
preta prāṇasya asthi carma snāyu keśa ādi upaspṛṣṭam śarīra jam api patitam sadyas śarīriṇam

original: svargaṃ nayatītyuktaḥ praṇamya bhavagate 'śvamādāya pitāmahāyajñamājagām // ViP_4,4.31 //
analyzed: svargam nayati iti uktaḥ praṇamya bhava gate aśvam ādāya pitāmahāyajñam ājagām
sagaraḥ upi aśvam āsādya tam yajñam samāpayāmāsa
sāgaram ca ātmaja prītyā putra tve kalpitavān
tasya aṃśumataḥ dilīpaḥ putraḥ bhavat

original: dilīpasya bhagīrathaḥ yo 'sau gaṅgāṃ svargādihānīya bhagīrathīsaṃjñāṃ cakāra // ViP_4,4.35 //
analyzed: dilīpasya bhagīrathaḥ yaḥ asau gaṅgām svargāt iha ānīya bhagīrathī saṃjñām cakāra

original: bhagīrathātsuhotraḥsuhotrācchutaḥ tasyāpi nābhāgaḥ tatoṃbarīṣaḥ tatputraḥsiṃdhudvīpaḥ siṃdhudvīpādayutāyuḥ // ViP_4,4.36 //
analyzed: bhagīrathāt suhotraḥ suhotrāt śutaḥ tasya api nābhāgaḥ tatas uṃbarīṣaḥ tad putraḥ siṃdhudvīpaḥ siṃdhudvīpāt ayutāyuḥ

original: tatputraś ca ṛtuparṇaḥ yo 'sau nalasahāyokṣahṛdayajñobhūt // ViP_4,4.37 //
analyzed: tad putraḥ ca ṛtuparṇaḥ yaḥ asau
ṛtuparṇa putraḥ sarvakāmaḥ
tad tanayaḥ sudāsaḥ
sudāsāt saudāsaḥ mitra saha nāmā

original: sa cāṭavyāṃ mṛgayārtho paryaṭan vyāgradvayamapaśyat // ViP_4,4.41 //
analyzed: sa ca aṭavyām mṛgayā arthaḥ paryaṭan vyāgra dvayam apaśyat

original: tābhyāṃ tadvanamapamṛgaṃ kṛtaṃ matvaikaṃ tayorbāṇena jaghāna // ViP_4,4.42 //
analyzed: tābhyām tat vanam apamṛgam kṛtam matvā ekam tayoḥ bāṇena jaghāna
mriyamāṇaḥ ca asau ati bhīṣaṇa ākṛtiḥ ati karāla vadanaḥ rākṣasaḥ abhūt

original: dvitīyopi pratikriyāṃ te kariṣyāmītyuktvāntardhānaṃ jagāma // ViP_4,4.44 //
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ upi pratikriyām te kariṣyāmi iti uktvā antardhānam jagāma
kālena gacchatā saudāsaḥ yajñam ayajat

original: pariniṣṭhitayajñe ācārye vasiṣṭhe niṣkrānte tadrakṣo vasiṣṭharūpamāsthāya yajñāvasāne
analyzed: pariniṣṭhita yajñe ācārye vasiṣṭhe niṣkrānte tat rakṣaḥ vasiṣṭha rūpam āsthāya yajña avasāne

original: mama naramāṃsabhojanaṃ deyamiti tatsaṃskriyatāṃ kṣaṇādāgamiṣyāmītyuktvā niṣkrāntaḥ // ViP_4,4.46 //
analyzed: mama nara māṃsa bhojanam deyam iti tat saṃskriyatām kṣaṇāt āgamiṣyāmi iti uktvā niṣkrāntaḥ

original: bhūyaś ca sūdaveṣaṃ kṛtvā rājājñayā mānuṣaṃ māṃsaṃ saṃskṛtya rājñe nyavedayat //
analyzed: bhūyas ca sūda veṣam kṛtvā rāja ājñayā mānuṣam māṃsam saṃskṛtya rājñe nyavedayat
asau api hiraṇya pātre māṃsam ādāya vasiṣṭha āgamana pratīkṣakaḥ abhavat  /
āgatāya vasiṣṭhāya niveditavān

original: sa cāpyacintayadahosya rājño dauḥśīlyaṃ yenaitanmāṃsamasmākaṃ prayacchati kimetaddravyajātamiti dhyānaparobhavat // ViP_4,4.50 //
analyzed: sa ca api acintayat aho sya rājñaḥ dauḥśīlyam yena etat māṃsam asmākam prayacchati kim etat dravya jātam iti dhyāna paraḥ bhavat
apaśyat ca tat māṃsam mānuṣam
atas krodha kaluṣīkṛta cetāḥ rājani sāpam utsasarja

original: yasmādabhojyametadasmadvidhānāṃ tapasvināmavagacchannapi vānmahyaṃ dadāti tasmāttavaivātra lolupatā bhaviṣyatīti // ViP_4,4.53 //
analyzed: yasmāt abhojyam etat asmadvidhānām tapasvinām avagacchan api vān mahyam dadāti tasmāt tava eva atra lolupa tā bhaviṣyati iti

original: anantaraṃ ca tenāpi bhagavataivābhihitosmītyukte kiṃ mayābhahitamiti muniḥ punarapi samādhau tasthau // ViP_4,4.54 //
analyzed: anantaram ca tena api bhagavatā eva abhihitaḥ asmi iti ukte kim mayā abhahitam iti muniḥ punar api samādhau tasthau

original: samādhivijñānavigatārthaścānugrahaṃ tasmai cakāra nātyantikametaddvādaśābdaṃ tava bhojanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti // ViP_4,4.55 //
analyzed: samādhi vijñāna vigata arthaḥ ca anugraham tasmai cakāra na ātyantikam etat dvādaśa abdam tava bhojanam bhaviṣyati iti
asau api pratigṛhya udaka añjalim muni śāpa pradānāya udyataḥ bhagavan ayam asmad guruḥ na arhasi enam
kuladevatā bhūtam ācāryam śaptum iti madayantyā sva patnyā prasāditaḥ sasya aṃbuda rakṣaṇa artham

original: tacchāpāṃvu norvyāṃ na cākāse cikṣepa kiṃ tu tenaiva svapadau siṣeca // ViP_4,4.56 //
analyzed: tad śāpa aṃvu nā urvyām na ca ākāse cikṣepa kim tu tena eva sva padau siṣeca

original: tena ca kvodhāśritenāṃ cabunā dagdhacchāyau tatpādau kalmāṣatāmupagatau tataḥsa kalmāṣapādasaṃjñāmavāpa // ViP_4,4.57 //
analyzed: tena ca cabunā dagdha chāyau tad pādau kalmāṣa tām upagatau tatas sa kalmāṣapāda saṃjñām avāpa

original: vasiṣṭhaśāpācca ṣaṣṭheṣaṣṭhe kāle rākṣasasvabhāvametyā ṭavyāṃ paryaṭannanekaśo mānuṣānabhakṣayat // ViP_4,4.58 //
analyzed: vasiṣṭha śāpāt ca ṣaṣṭhe ṣaṣṭhe kāle rākṣasa svabhāvam etya ṭavyām paryaṭan anekaśas mānuṣān abhakṣayat

original: ekadā tu kañcinmunimṛtukāle bhāryāsaṃgataṃ dadarśa // ViP_4,4.59 //
analyzed: ekadā tu kañcid munim ṛtu kāle bhāryā saṃgatam dadarśa

original: tayoś ca tamatibhīṣaṇaṃ rākṣasasvarūpamavalokya trāsāddaṃpatyoḥ pradhāvitayorbrahmaṇaṃ jagraha // ViP_4,4.60 //
analyzed: tayoḥ ca tam ati bhīṣaṇam rākṣasa svarūpam avalokya trāsāt daṃpatyoḥ pradhāvitayoḥ brahmaṇam jagraha
tatas sā brahmaṇī bahuśas tam abhiyācitavatī

original: prasīdekṣvākukulatilakabhūtastvaṃ mahārājo miyatrasaho na rākṣasaḥ // ViP_4,4.62 //
analyzed: prasīda ikṣvāku kula tilaka bhūtaḥ tvam mahā rājaḥ miyatrasahaḥ na rākṣasaḥ

original: nārhasi strīdharmasukhābhijño mayyakṛtārthāyāmasmadbhartāraṃ hantumityevaṃ bahuprakāraṃ vilapantyāṃ vyāghraḥ paśumivāraṇye 'bhimataṃ taṃ brāhmaṇamabhakṣayat
analyzed: na arhasi strī dharma sukha abhijñaḥ mayi akṛtārthāyām asmad bhartāram hantum iti evam bahu prakāram vilapantyām vyāghraḥ paśum iva araṇye abhimatam tam brāhmaṇam abhakṣayat

original: tataścātikopasamanvitā brāhmaṇī taṃ rājānaṃ śaśāpa // ViP_4,4.64 //
analyzed: tatas ca ati kopa samanvitā brāhmaṇī tam rājānam śaśāpa

original: yasmādevaṃ mayyatṛṣaptāyāṃ tvayāyaṃ matpatirbhakṣitaḥ tasmāttvamapi kāmopabhogapravṛttontaṃ prāpsyasīti // ViP_4,4.65 //
analyzed: yasmāt evam mayi atṛṣaptāyām tvayā ayam mad patiḥ bhakṣitaḥ tasmāt tvam api kāma upabhoga pravṛttaḥ ūntam prāpsyasi iti
śaptvā ca eva sā agnim praviveśa

original: tatastasya dvādaśābdaparyaye vimuktaśāpasya strīviṣayābhilāṣiṇo madayantī taṃ smārayāmāsa // ViP_4,4.67 //
analyzed: tatas tasya dvādaśa abda paryaye vimukta śāpasya strī viṣaya abhilāṣiṇaḥ madayantī tam smārayāmāsa
tatas param asau strī bhogam tatyāja

original: vasiṣṭhaścāputreṇa rājñā putrārthamabhyarthito madayantyāṃ garbhādhānaṃ cakāra // ViP_4,4.69 //
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ ca aputreṇa rājñā putra artham abhyarthitaḥ madayantyām garbhādhānam cakāra

original: yadā ca saptavarṣāṇyasau garbheṇa jajñe tatastaṃ garbhamaśmanā sā devī jaghāna // ViP_4,4.70 //
analyzed: yadā ca sapta varṣāṇi asau garbheṇa jajñe tatas tam garbham aśmanā sā devī jaghāna
putraḥ ca ajāyata
tasya ca aśmakaḥ iti eva nāma abhavat
aśmasya mūlakaḥ nāma putraḥ abhavat

original: yosau niḥkṣatre kṣmātalesmin kriyamāṇe strībhir vivastrabhiḥ parivārya rakṣitaḥ tatastaṃ nārīkavacamudāharanti // ViP_4,4.74 //
analyzed: yaḥ asau niḥkṣatre kṣmā tale smin kriyamāṇe strībhiḥ vivastrabhiḥ parivārya rakṣitaḥ tatas tam nārīkavacam udāharanti
mūlakāt daśarathaḥ tasmāt ilivilaḥ tatas ca viśvasahaḥ

original: tasmācca khaṭvāṅgaḥ yosau devāsurasaṃgrāme devair abhyarthito 'surāñjaghāna // ViP_4,4.76 //
analyzed: tasmāt ca khaṭvāṅgaḥ yaḥ asau devāsura saṃgrāme devaiḥ abhyarthitaḥ asurān jaghāna

original: svarge ca kṛtapriyair devair varagrahaṇāya coditaḥ prāha // ViP_4,4.77 //
analyzed: svarge ca kṛta priyaiḥ devaiḥ vara grahaṇāya coditaḥ prāha

original: yadyavaśyaṃ varo grāhyaḥ tanmamāyuḥ kathyatāmiti // ViP_4,4.78 //
analyzed: yadi avaśyam varaḥ grāhyaḥ tat mama āyuḥ kathyatām iti

original: anantaraṃ ca tair uktaṃ muhūrtam ekaṃ pramāṇaṃ tavāyurityuktothāḥsvalitagatinā vimānena laghimādiguṇo martyalokamāgamyedamāha // ViP_4,4.79
analyzed: anantaram ca taiḥ uktam muhūrtam ekam pramāṇam tava āyuḥ iti ukta uthāḥsvalita gatinā vimānena laghima ādi guṇaḥ martya lokam āgamya idam āha  /

original: yathā na brāhmaṇebhyaḥ sakāśādātmāpi me priyataraḥ na ca sva dharmollaṅghanaṃ mayā
analyzed: yathā na brāhmaṇebhyaḥ sakāśāt ātmā api me priyataraḥ na ca sva dharma ullaṅghanam mayā
kadaṭa cit api anuṣṭhitam na ca sakala deva mānuṣa paśu pakṣi vṛkṣa ādikeṣu acyuta vyatirekavatī

original: dṛṣṭirmamābhūt tathā tamevaṃ munijanānusmṛtaṃ bhagavantamaskhalitagatiḥ prāpayeyamityaśeṣadevagurau
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ mama abhūt tathā tam evam muni jana anusmṛtam bhagavantam askhalita gatiḥ prāpayeyam iti aśeṣa deva gurau

original: bhagavatyanirdeśyavapuṣi sattāmātrātmanyātmānaṃ paramātmani vāsudevākhye yuyoja tatraiva
analyzed: bhagavati anirdeśya vapuṣi sattā mātra ātmani ātmānam parama ātmani vāsudeva ākhye yuyoja tatra eva
ca layam avāpa
atrā api śrūyate ślokaḥ gītaḥ saptarṣibhiḥ purā

original: khaṭvāṅgena samo nānyaḥ kaścidurvyāṃ bhaviṣyati // ViP_4,4.81 //
analyzed: khaṭvāṅgena samaḥ nā anyaḥ kaścid urvyām bhaviṣyati
yena svargāt iha āgamya muhūrtam prāpya jīvitam

original: trayotisaṃdhitā lokā buddhyā satyena caiva hi // ViP_4,4.82 //
analyzed: trayotisaṃdhitāḥ lokāḥ buddhyā satyena ca eva hi
khaṭvāṅgāt dīrghabāhuḥ putraḥ abhavat
tatas raghuḥ abhavat
tasmāt api ajaḥ
ajāt daśarathaḥ

original: tasyāpi bhagavānabjanābho jagataḥ sthityarthamātmāṃśena rāmalakṣmaṇabharataśatrughnarūpeṇa caturdhā putratvamāyāsīt // ViP_4,4.87 //
analyzed: tasya api bhagavān abjanābhaḥ jagataḥ sthiti artham ātma aṃśena rāma lakṣmaṇa bharata śatrughna rūpeṇa caturdhā putra tvam āyāsīt

original: rāmopi bāla eva viśvamitrayāgarakṣaṇāya gacchaṃstāṭakāṃ jaghāna // ViP_4,4.88 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ api bālaḥ eva viśvamitra yāga rakṣaṇāya gacchan tāṭakām jaghāna

original: yajñe ca mārīcamiṣuvātāhataṃ samudre cikṣepa // ViP_4,4.89 //
analyzed: yajñe ca mārīcam iṣu vāta āhatam samudre cikṣepa
subāhu pramukhān ca kṣayam anayat
darśana mātreṇa ahalyām apāpām cakāra

original: janakagṛhe ca māheśvaraṃ cāpamanāyāsena babhañja // ViP_4,4.92 //
analyzed: janaka gṛhe ca māheśvaram cāpam anāyāsena babhañja
sītām ayoni jām janaka rāja tanayām vīrya śulkām lebhe
sakala kṣatriya kṣaya kāriṇam aśeṣa haihaya kula dhūmaketu bhūtam ca paraśurāmam apāsta vīrya bala avalepam cakāra
pitṛ vacanāt ca agaṇita rājya abhilāṣaḥ bhrātṛ bhāryā sametaḥ vanam praviveśa
virādha khara dūṣaṇa ādīn kabandha vālinau ca nijaghāna
baddhā ca aṃbhonidhim aśeṣa rākṣasa kula kṣayam kṛtvā daśānana apahṛtām bhāryam tad vadhāt apahṛta kalaṅkām api anala praveśa śuddhām aśeṣa deva saṅghaiḥ
stūyamāna śīlām janaka rāja kanyām ayodhyām āninye

original: tataścābhiṣekamaṅgalaṃ maitreya varṣaśatenāpi vaktuṃ na śakyate saṃkṣepeṇa śrūyatām // ViP_4,4.98 //
analyzed: tatas ca abhiṣeka maṅgalam maitreya varṣa śatena api vaktum na śakyate saṃkṣepeṇa śrūyatām
lakṣmaṇa bharata śatrughna vibhīṣaṇa sugrīva aṅgada jāmbavat hanumat prabhṛtibhiḥ samutphulla vadanaiḥ
chatra cāmara ādi yutaiḥ sevyamānaḥ daśarathiḥ brahma indra agni ja ṛti varuṇa vāyu kubera īśāna prabhṛtibhiḥ
sarva amaraiḥ vasiṣṭha vāmadeva vālmīki mārkaṇḍeya viśvāmitra bharadvāja agastaya prabhṛtibhiḥ
muni varaiḥ ṛk yaju sāma atharvaiḥ saṃstūyamānaḥ nṛtya gīta vādya ādi akhila loka maṅgala vādya aurvīṇā veśu mṛdaṅga bherī paṭaha śaṅkha kāhala gomukha prabhṛtibhiḥ

original: sunādaiḥ samastabhūbhaṭatāṃ madhye sakalalokarakṣārthaṃ yathocitamabhiṣikto dāśarathiḥ
analyzed: su nādaiḥ samasta bhū bhaṭatām madhye sakala loka rakṣā artham yathocitam abhiṣiktaḥ dāśarathiḥ
kosala indraḥ raghu kula tilakaḥ jānakī priyaḥ bhrātṛ traya priyaḥ siṃhāsana gataḥ
rājyam akarot

original: bharatopi gandharvaviṣayasādhanāya gacchan saṃgrāme gandharvakoṭīstistro jaghāna // ViP_4,4.100 //
analyzed: bharataḥ upi gandharva viṣaya sādhanāya gacchan saṃgrāme gandharva koṭīḥ tistraḥ jaghāna

original: śatrughnenāpyamitabalaparākramo madhuputro lavaṇo nāma rābhaso nihāto mathurā ca niveśitā // ViP_4,4.101 //
analyzed: śatrughnena api amita bala parākramaḥ madhu putraḥ lavaṇaḥ nāma rābhasaḥ nihātaḥ mathurā ca niveśitā

original: ityevamādyatibalaparākramavikramaṇeradituṣṭasaṃhāriṇośeṣasya jagato niṣpāditasthitayo rāmalakṣamaṇa bharataśatrughnāḥ punarapi divamārūḍhāḥ
analyzed: iti evamādi ati bala parākrama vikramaṇeḥ adi tuṣṭa saṃhāriṇaḥ ūśeṣasya jagataḥ niṣpādita sthitayaḥ bharata śatrughnāḥ punar api divam ārūḍhāḥ

original: ye 'pi teṣu bhagavadaṃśeṣvanurāgiṇaḥ kosalanagarajānapadāstepi tanmanasastatsālokyatā mavāpuḥ // ViP_4,4.103 //
analyzed: ye api teṣu bhagavat aṃśeṣu anurāgiṇaḥ kosala nagara jānapadāḥ te api tad manasaḥ tad sālokya tāḥ mavāpuḥ

original: atiduṣṭasaṃhāriṇo rāmasya kuśalavo dvau putrau lakṣmaṇasyāṅgadacandraketū takṣapuṣkalau bharatasya subāhuśurasenau śatrughnasya // ViP_4,4.104
analyzed: ati duṣṭa saṃhāriṇaḥ rāmasya kuśalavaḥ dvau putrau lakṣmaṇasya aṅgada candraketū takṣa puṣkalau bharatasya subāhu śurasenau śatrughnasya
kuśasya atithiḥ atitheḥ api niṣadhaḥ putraḥ abhūt

original: niṣadhasyāpyanalastasmādapi nabhaḥ nabhasaḥ puṇḍarīkastattanayaḥ kṣemadhanvā tasya
analyzed: niṣadhasya api analaḥ tasmāt api nabhaḥ nabhasaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ tad tanayaḥ kṣemadhanvā tasya

original: ca devānīkastasyāpyahīnako 'hīnakasyāpi rurustasya ca pāriyātrakaḥ pāriyātrāddevalo
analyzed: ca devānīkaḥ tasya api ahīnakaḥ ahīnakasya api ruruḥ tasya ca pāriyātrakaḥ pāriyātrāt devalaḥ
devalāt vat calaḥ tasya api utkaḥ utkāt ca vajranābhaḥ ta smāt śaṅkhaṇaḥ tama ādi uṣitāsvaḥ tatas
ca viśvasahaḥ jajñe
tasmāt hiraṇyanābhaḥ yaḥ mahāyogīsvarāt jaimineḥ

original: hiraṇyanābhasya putraḥ puṣyastasmād dhruvasaṃdhistataḥsudarśanastasmādagnivarmastataḥ śīghragastasmādapi maruḥ putro 'bhavat // ViP_4,4.108
analyzed: hiraṇyanābhasya putraḥ puṣyaḥ tasmāt dhruvasaṃdhiḥ tatas sudarśanaḥ tasmāt agnivarmaḥ tatas śīghragaḥ tasmāt api maruḥ putraḥ abhavat  /
yaḥ asau yogam āsthāya adya api kalāpa grāmam aśritya tiṣṭhati
āgāmi yuge sūryaśakṣatravrate āvartayitā bhaviṣyati

original: tasyātmajaḥ praśuśrukastasyapi susaṃdhistataścāpyamarṣastasya ca sahasvāṃstataś ca viśvabhavaḥ // ViP_4,4.111 //
analyzed: tasya ātmajaḥ praśuśrukaḥ tasi api susaṃdhiḥ tatas ca api amarṣaḥ tasya ca sahasvān tatas ca viśvabhavaḥ
tasya bṛhadbalaḥ yaḥ ūrjuna tanayena abhimanyunā ābhārata yuddhe kṣayam anīyata
ete ikṣvāku bhūpālāḥ prādhānyena mayā īritāḥ

original: eteṣāṃ caritaṃ śṛṇvan sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // ViP_4,4.113 //
analyzed: eteṣām caritam śṛṇvan sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe caturtha aṃśe caturathaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: ikṣvākutinayo yosau nimirnāmnā sahasraṃ vatsaraṃ satramārebhe // ViP_4,5.1 //
analyzed: ikṣvāku tinayaḥ yaḥ asau nimiḥ nāmnā sahasram vatsaram satram ārebhe
vasiṣṭhim ca hotāram varayāmāsa

original: tamāha vasiṣṭhohamindreṇa pañcavarṣaśatayāgārthaṃ prathamaṃ vṛtaḥ // ViP_4,5.3 //
analyzed: tam āha vasiṣṭhaḥ ūham indreṇa pañca varṣa śata yāga artham prathamam vṛtaḥ

original: tadanantaraṃ pratipālyatāmāgatastavāpi ṛtvik bhaviṣyamītyukte sa pṛthivīpatirna kiñciduktavān // ViP_4,5.4 //
analyzed: tad anantaram pratipālyatām āgataḥ tava api ṛtvij bhaviṣyami iti ukte sa pṛthivīpatiḥ na kiñcid uktavān
vasiṣṭhaḥ upi anena samanvicchitam iti amāra pateḥ yāgam akarot

original: so 'pi tatkāla evānyair gautamādibhir yāgam akarot // ViP_4,5.6 //
analyzed: saḥ api tad kāle eva anyaiḥ gautama ādibhiḥ yāgam akarot

original: samāpte cāmarapateryāge tvarayā vasiṣṭhonimiyajñaṃ kariṣyāmītyājagām // ViP_4,5.7 //
analyzed: samāpte ca amarapateḥ yāge tvarayā vasiṣṭhonimi yajñam kariṣyāmi iti ājagām

original: tatkarmakartṛtvaṃ ca gautamasya dṛṣṭvā svapate tasmai rājñe māṃ pratyākhyāyaiva tadanena
analyzed: tad karma kartṛ tvam ca gautamasya dṛṣṭvā svapate tasmai rājñe mām pratyākhyāya eva tat anena

original: gautamāya karmāntaraṃ samarpitaṃ yasmāttasmādayaṃ videho bhaviṣyatīti śāpaṃ dadau // ViP_4,5.8 //
analyzed: gautamāya karmāntaram samarpitam yasmāt tasmāt ayam videhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti śāpam dadau
prabuddhaḥ ca asau avanipatiḥ api praha

original: yasmānmāmasaṃbhāṣyājñānata eva śayānasya śāpotsargamasau duṣṭaguruścakāra tasmāttasyāpi dehaḥ patiṣyatīti śāpaṃ dattvā dehamatyajat // ViP_4,5.10
analyzed: yasmāt mām a saṃbhāṣya ajñānataḥ eva śayānasya śāpa utsargam asau duṣṭa guruḥ cakāra tasmāt tasya api dehaḥ patiṣyati iti śāpam dattvā deham atyajat  /

original: tacchāpācca mitrāvaruṇayostejasi vasiṣṭhasya cetaḥ praviṣṭam // ViP_4,5.11 //
analyzed: tad śāpāt ca mitrāvaruṇayoḥ tejasi vasiṣṭhasya cetaḥ praviṣṭam
ruśī darśanāt udbhuta bīja prapātayoḥ tayoḥ sakāśāt vasiṣṭhaḥ deham aparam lebhe

original: nimerapi taccharīramatimanoharagandhatailādibhir upasaṃskriyamāṇaṃ naiva kledādikaṃ doṣamavāpa sadyo mṛta iva tasthau // ViP_4,5.13 //
analyzed: nimeḥ api tat śarīram ati manohara gandha taila ādibhiḥ upasaṃskriyamāṇam nā eva kleda ādikam doṣam avāpa sadyas mṛtaḥ iva tasthau
yajña samāptau bhāga grahaṇāya devān āgatān ṛtvijaḥ ūcuḥ
yajamānāya varaḥ dīyatām iti
devaiḥ ca chanditā usau nimiḥ āha
bhagavantaḥ akhila sa sāra duḥkha hantāraḥ
na hi etādṛś anyat duḥkham asti yat śarīra ātmanoḥ viyoge bhavati

original: tadahamicchāmi sakalalokalocaneṣu vastuṃ na punaḥ śarīragrahaṇaṃ kartumityevamuktair devair asāvaśeṣabhūtānāṃ netreṣvavatāritaḥ // ViP_4,5.18
analyzed: tat aham icchāmi sakala loka locaneṣu vastum na punar śarīra grahaṇam kartum iti evam uktaiḥ devaiḥ asau aśeṣa bhūtānām netreṣu avatāritaḥ  /
tatas bhūtāni unmeṣa nimeṣam cakruḥ

original: aputrasya ca tasya bhūbhujaḥ śarīramarājakabhīravo munayo 'raṇyā mamanthuḥ // ViP_4,5.20 //
analyzed: aputrasya ca tasya bhūbhujaḥ śarīram arājaka bhīravaḥ munayaḥ araṇyā mamanthuḥ
tatra ca kumāraḥ jajñe
jananāt janaka saṃjñām ca avāpa
abhūt videhaḥ sya pitā iti vaidehaḥ mathanāt mithiḥ iti
tasya udāvasuḥ putraḥ abhavat

original: udāvasornadivardhanastataḥsuketuḥ tasmāddevarātastataś ca bṛhadukthaḥ tasya ce mahāvīryastasyāpi sudhṛti // ViP_4,5.25 //
analyzed: udāvasoḥ nadivardhanaḥ tatas suketuḥ tasmāt devarātaḥ tatas ca bṛhadukthaḥ tasya mahāvīryaḥ tasya api sudhṛti
tatas ca dhṛṣṭaketuḥ ajāyata

original: dhṛṣṭaketorharyaśvastasya ca manuḥ manoḥ patikaḥ tasmātkṛtarathastasya devamīḍhaḥ
analyzed: dhṛṣṭaketoḥ haryaśvaḥ tasya ca manuḥ manoḥ patikaḥ tasmāt kṛtarathaḥ tasya devamīḍhaḥ

original: tasya ca vibudhaḥ vibudhasya mahādhṛtistataś ca kṛtarātaḥ tato mahāromā tasya svarṇaromā
analyzed: tasya ca vibudhaḥ vibudhasya mahādhṛtiḥ tatas ca kṛtarātaḥ tatas mahāromā tasya svarṇaromā
tad putraḥ hrasvaroṇā hrasvaromṇaḥ sīradhvajaḥ abhavat

original: tasya putrarthaṃ yajanabhuvaṃ kṛṣataḥ sīre sītā duhitā samutpannā // ViP_4,5.28 //
analyzed: tasya putra artham yajana bhuvam kṛṣataḥ sīre sītā duhitā samutpannā
sīradhvajasya bhrātā saṃkāśi adhipatiḥ kuśadhvaja nāmā āsīt

original: sīradhvajasyāpatyaṃ bhānumān bhānumataḥ śatadyumnaḥ tasya tu śuciḥ tasmāccorjanāmā putro jajñe // ViP_4,5.30 //
analyzed: sīradhvajasya apatyam bhānumān bhānumataḥ śatadyumnaḥ tasya tu śuciḥ tasmāt ca ūrja nāmā putraḥ jajñe

original: tasyāpi śatadhvajaḥ tataḥ kṛtiḥ kṛterañjanaḥ tatputraḥ kurujit tato 'riṣṭanemiḥ tasmācchutāyuḥ
analyzed: tasya api śatadhvajaḥ tatas kṛtiḥ kṛteḥ añjanaḥ tad putraḥ kurujit tatas ariṣṭanemiḥ tasmāt śutāyuḥ

original: śrutāyuṣaḥ supārśvāḥ tasmātsṛṃjayaḥ tataḥ kṣemāvī kṣemāvino 'nenāḥ tasmādbhaumarathaḥ
analyzed: śrutāyuṣaḥ supārśvāḥ tasmāt sṛṃjayaḥ tatas kṣemāvī kṣemāvinaḥ anenāḥ tasmāt bhaumarathaḥ

original: tasya satyarathaḥ tasmādupaguḥ upagor upaguptaḥ tatputraḥ svāgatastasya ca svānandaḥ
analyzed: tasya satyarathaḥ tasmāt upaguḥ upagoḥ upaguptaḥ tad putraḥ svāgataḥ tasya ca svānandaḥ

original: tasmācca suvarcāḥ tasya supārśvaḥ tasyāpisubhāṣaḥ suśrutaḥ tasmāsuśrutājjayaḥ tasya
analyzed: tasmāt ca suvarcāḥ tasya supārśvaḥ tasya api subhāṣaḥ suśrutaḥ tasmā suśrutāt jayaḥ tasya

original: putro vijayaḥ vijayasya ṛtaḥ ṛtātsunayaḥ sunayādvītahavyaḥ tasmāddhūtiḥ dhṛtervabahulāsvaḥ
analyzed: putraḥ vijayaḥ vijayasya ṛtaḥ ṛtāt sunayaḥ sunayāt vītahavyaḥ tasmāt dhūtiḥ dhṛteḥ va bahula asvaḥ
tasya putraḥ kṛtiḥ

iti ete maithilāḥ

maitreyaḥ uvāca

śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
śrūyatām muni śārdūla vaṃśaḥ pratitha tejasaḥ
somasya anukramāt khyātāḥ yatra urvīpatayaḥ abhavan

original: ayaṃ hi vaṃśotibalaparākramadyutiśīlaceṣṭavadbhir atiguṇānvitair nahuṣayayātikārtavīryārjunādibhir bhūpālair alaṅkṛtaḥ tamahaṃ kathayāmi śrūyatām
analyzed: ayam hi vaṃśa uti bala parākrama dyuti śīla ceṣṭavadbhiḥ ati guṇa anvitaiḥ nahuṣa yayāti kārtavīrya arjuna ādibhiḥ bhūpālaiḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ tam aham kathayāmi śrūyatām
akhila jagat straṣṭuḥ bhagavataḥ nārāyaṇasya nābhi kaloja samudbhava abjayoneḥ brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ atriḥ
atreḥ somaḥ
tam ca bhagavān abjayoniḥ aśeṣa oṣadhī dvija nakṣatrāṇām ādhipatye abhyaṣecayat
sa ca rājasūyam akarot
tad prabhāvāt ati utkṛṣṭa ādhipatya adhiṣṭhātṛ tvāt ca enam madaḥ āviveśa

original: madāvalepācca sakaladevagurorbṛspatestārāṃ nāma patnīṃ jahāra // ViP_4,6.10 //
analyzed: mada avalepāt ca sakala deva guroḥ bṛspateḥ tārām nāma patnīm jahāra

original: bahuśaś ca bṛhaspaticoditena bhagavatā brahmaṇā codyamānasakalaiś ca devarṣibhir yācamāno 'pi na mumoca // ViP_4,6.11 //
analyzed: bahuśas ca bṛhaspati coditena bhagavatā brahmaṇā codyamāna sakalaiḥ ca devarṣibhiḥ yācamānaḥ api na mumoca

original: tasya candrasya ca bṛhaspaterdvaṣāduśānā pārṣṇigrāhobhūt // ViP_4,6.12 //
analyzed: tasya candrasya ca bṛhaspateḥ dvaṣāt uśānā pārṣṇigrāhaḥ bhūt

original: aṅgīrasaś ca sakāśādupalabdhavidyo bhagavānrudro bṛhaspateḥ sahāyyamakarot // ViP_4,6.13 //
analyzed: aṅgīrasaḥ ca sakāśāt upalabdha vidyaḥ bhagavān rudraḥ bṛhaspateḥ sahāyyam akarot

original: yataścośanā tato jaṃbhakuṃbhādyāḥ samastā eva daityadānavanikāyā mahāntamudyamaṃ cakruḥ // ViP_4,6.14 //
analyzed: yatas ca uśanā tatas jaṃbha kuṃbha ādyāḥ samastāḥ eva daitya dānava nikāyāḥ mahāntam udyamam cakruḥ
bṛhaspateḥ api sakala deva sainya yutaḥ sahāyaḥ śakraḥ
evam ca tayoḥ atīva ugra saṃgrāmaḥ tārā nimittaḥ tārakā mayaḥ nāma abhūt

original: tataś ca samastaśastraṇyamureṣu rudrapurogamā devā deveṣu cāśeṣdānavā mumucuḥ //
analyzed: tatas ca samasta śastraṇi amureṣu rudra purogamāḥ devāḥ deveṣu ca aśeṣ dānavāḥ mumucuḥ
evam deva asura āhava saṃkṣobha kṣubdha dṛdayam aśeṣam eva jagat brahmaṇam śaraṇam jagām

original: tataś ca bhagavānabjayonirapyuśanasaṃ saṃkaramasurāndevāṃś ca nivārya bṛhaspataye tārāmadāpayat // ViP_4,6.19 //
analyzed: tatas ca bhagavān abjayoniḥ api uśanasam saṃkaram asurān devān ca nivārya bṛhaspataye tārām adāpayat
tām ca antar prasavām avalokya bṛhaspatiḥ api āha

original: naiṣa mama kṣetre bhavatyānyasya suto dhāryaḥsamutsṛjainamalamalamatidhāṣṭaryeneti // ViP_4,6.21 //
analyzed: na eṣa mama kṣetre bhavatyā anyasya sutaḥ dhāryaḥ samutsṛja enam alam alam ati dhāṣṭaryena iti

original: sa ca tenaivamuktātipativratā bhartṛvacanānantaraṃ tamiṣīkāstaṃbe garbhamutsasarja // ViP_4,6.22 //
analyzed: sa ca tena evam uktā ati pativratā bhartṛ vacana anantaram tam iṣīkā staṃbe garbham utsasarja

original: sa cotsṛṣṭamātra evātitejasā devānāṃ tejāṃsyācikṣepa // ViP_4,6.23 //
analyzed: sa ca utsṛṣṭa mātraḥ eva ati tejasā devānām tejāṃsi ācikṣepa

original: bṛhaspatiminduṃ ca tasya kumārasyāticārutayā sābhalāṣau dṛṣṭvā deviḥsamutpannasaṃdehāstārāṃ papracchuḥ // ViP_4,6.24 //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim indum ca tasya kumārasya ati cāru tayā sa ābhalāṣau dṛṣṭvā deviḥ samutpanna saṃdehāḥ tārām papracchuḥ

original: satyaṃ kathayāsmākamiti subhage somasyātha vā bṛhaspaterayaṃ putra iti // ViP_4,6.25 //
analyzed: satyam kathaya asmākam iti subhage somasya atha vā bṛhaspateḥ ayam putraḥ iti

original: evaṃ tair uktā sā tārā hriyā kiñcinnovāca // ViP_4,6.26 //
analyzed: evam taiḥ uktā sā tārā hriyā kiñcid nā uvāca

original: bahuśopyabhihitā yadāsau devebhyo nāccakṣe tataḥsa kumārastāṃ śaptumudyataḥ prāha // ViP_4,6.27 //
analyzed: bahuśas upi abhihitā yadā asau devebhyaḥ na āccakṣe tatas sa kumāraḥ tām śaptum udyataḥ prāha

original: adyaiva te vyalīkalajjāvatyās tathā śāstimahaṃ karomi // ViP_4,6.29 //
analyzed: adyā eva te vyalīka lajjāvatyāḥ tathā śāstim aham karomi
yathā ca nā evam adya api ati manthara vacanā bhaviṣyasi iti

original: athāha bhagavān pitāmahaḥ taṃ kumāraṃ sannivārya svayamapṛcchattāṃ tārām // ViP_4,6.31 //
analyzed: atha āha bhagavān pitāmahaḥ tam kumāram san nivārya svayam apṛcchat tām tārām

original: vatse kasyāyamātmajaḥ somasya vā bṛhaspatervā ityuktā lajjamānāha somasyeti // ViP_4,6.32 //
analyzed: vatse kasya ayam ātmajaḥ somasya vā bṛhaspateḥ vā iti uktā lajjamānā āha somasya iti

original: tataḥ prasphuraducdhvāsitāmalakapolakāntirbhagavānuḍupatiḥ kumāramāliṅgya sādhu sādhu vatsa prājñosītibudha iti tasya ca nāma cakre // ViP_4,6.33
analyzed: tatas prasphurat ucdhvāsita amala kapola kāntiḥ bhagavān uḍupatiḥ kumāram āliṅgya sādhu sādhu vatsa prājñaḥ asi iti budhaḥ iti tasya ca nāma cakre  /

original: tadākhyātamevaitat sa ca yathelāyāmātmajaṃ purūravamamutpādayāmāsa // ViP_4,6.34 //
analyzed: tad ākhyātam eva etat sa ca yathā ilāyām ātmajam purūravamam utpādayāmāsa

original: purūravāstvatidānaśīlo 'tiyajvātitejasvī yaṃ satyavādinamatirūpasvitaṃ manasvinaṃ mitrāvaruṇaśāpānmānuṣe loke mayā vastavyamiti kṛtamatirurvaśī  #
analyzed: purūravāḥ tu ati dāna śīlaḥ ati yajvā ati tejasvī yam satya vādinam ati rūpasvitam manasvinam mitrāvaruṇa śāpāt mānuṣe loke mayā vastavyam iti kṛta matiḥ urvaśī  /
dadarśa

original: dṛṣṭamātre ca tasminnapahāya mānamaśeṣamapāsya svargasukhābhilāṣaṃ tanmanaskā bhūtvā tamevopatasthe // ViP_4,6.36 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭa mātre ca tasmin apahāya mānam aśeṣam apāsya svarga sukha abhilāṣam tad manaskā bhūtvā tam eva upatasthe
saḥ api ca tām atiśayita sakala loka strī kānti saukumārya lāvaṇya gati vilāsa hāsa ādi gumām avalokya tad āyatta cittavṛttiḥ babhūva
ubhayam api tad manaskam ananya dṛṣṭi parityakta sa masta anya prayojanam abhūt
rājā tu prāgalbhyāt tām āha

original: subhru tvāmahamabhikāmo 'smi prasīdānurāgamudvahetyuktā lajjāvakhaṇḍitamurvaśī taṃ prāha // ViP_4,6.40 //
analyzed: subhru tvām aham abhikāmaḥ asmi prasīda anurāgam udvaha iti uktā lajjā avakhaṇḍitam urvaśī tam prāha

original: bhavatvevaṃ yadi me samayaparipālanaṃ bhavān karotītyākhyāte punapi tāmāha // ViP_4,6.41 //
analyzed: bhavatu evam yadi me samaya paripālanam bhavān karoti iti ākhyāte punar api tām āha
ākhyāhi me samayam iti
atha pṛṣṭā punar api abravīt
śayana samīpe mama uraṇaka dvayam putra bhūtam na apaneyam

original: bhavāṃś ca mayā na nagnodraṣṭavyaḥ // ViP_4,6.45 //
analyzed: bhavān ca mayā na nagna udraṣṭavyaḥ
ghṛta mātram ca mama āhāraḥ iti
evam eva iti bhūpātiḥ api āha

original: tayā saha sa cāvanipatiralākayāṃ caitrarathādivaneṣvamalapadmakhaṇḍeṣu mānasādisaraḥsvatiramaṇīyeṣu ramamāṇa ekaṣaṣṭivarṣāṇyanudinapravardadhamānapramodo  #
analyzed: tayā saha sa ca avanipatiḥ alākayām caitraratha ādi vaneṣu amala padma khaṇḍeṣu mānasa ādi saraḥsu ati ramaṇīyeṣu ramamāṇaḥ eka ṣaṣṭi varṣāṇi anu dina pravardadhamāna pramodaḥ
anayat

original: urvaśī ca tadupabhogātpratidinapravardhamānānu rāgā amaralokavāse 'pi na spṛhāṃ cakāra // ViP_4,6.49 //
analyzed: urvaśī ca tad upabhogāt prati dina pravardhamānā anu rāgāḥ amara loka vāse api na spṛhām cakāra

original: vinā corvaśyā suraloko 'psarasāṃ siddhagandharvāṇāṃ ca nātiramaṇīyo 'bhavat // ViP_4,6.50 //
analyzed: vinā ca urvaśyā sura lokaḥ apsarasām siddha gandharvāṇām ca na ati ramaṇīyaḥ abhavat
tatas ca urvaśī purūravasoḥ samaya vid viśvāsuḥ gandharva samavetaḥ niśi śayana abhyāśāt ekam uraṇakam jahāra
tasya ākāśe nīyamānasya urvaśī śabdam aśṛṇot

original: evamuvāca ca mamānāthāyāḥ putraḥ kenāpahriyate kaṃ śaraṇamupayāmīti // ViP_4,6.53 //
analyzed: evam uvāca ca mama anāthāyāḥ putraḥ kena apahriyate kam śaraṇam upayāmi iti

original: tadākarṇya rājā māṃ devī vīkṣyatīti na yayau // ViP_4,6.54 //
analyzed: tat ākarṇya rājā mām devī vīkṣyati iti na yayau
atha anyam api uraṇakam ādāya gandharvāḥ yayuḥ

original: tasyāpyapahriyamāṇasyākarṇya śabdamākāśe punarapyanāthāsmyahamabhartṛkā kāpuruṣā śrayetyārtarāviṇī babhūva // ViP_4,6.56 //
analyzed: tasya api apahriyamāṇasya ākarṇya śabdam ākāśe punar api anāthā asmi aham abhartṛkā kāpuruṣā śraya iti ārta rāviṇī babhūva

original: rājāpyamarṣavaśādandhakārametaditi khaḍgamādāya duṣṭaduṣṭa hatosīti vyāharannabhyadhāvat // ViP_4,6.57 //
analyzed: rājā api amarṣa vaśāt andhakāram etat iti khaḍgam ādāya duṣṭa duṣṭa hataḥ asi iti vyāharan abhyadhāvat
tāvat ca gandharvaiḥ rapi atīva ujjvalā vidyut janitā

original: tatprabhayā corvaśī rājānamapagatāṃbaraṃ dṛṣṭvāpavṛttasamayā tatkṣaṇādevāpakrāntā // ViP_4,6.59 //
analyzed: tad prabhayā ca urvaśī rājānam apagata aṃbaram dṛṣṭvā apavṛtta samayā tad kṣaṇāt eva apakrāntā
parityajya tau api uraṇakau gandarvāḥ sura lokam upagatāḥ

original: rājāpi ca tau meṣāvādāyātihṛṣṭamanāḥ svaśayanamāyāto norvaśīṃ dadarśa // ViP_4,6.61 //
analyzed: rājā api ca tau meṣau ādāya ati hṛṣṭa manāḥ sva śayanam āyātaḥ nā urvaśīm dadarśa

original: tāṃ cāpaśyan vyapagatāṃbara evonmattarūpo babhrāma // ViP_4,6.62 //
analyzed: tām ca apaśyan vyapagata aṃbaraḥ evā unmatta rūpaḥ babhrāma

original: kurukṣetre cāṃbhojasarasyanyābhiścatasṛbhir apsarobhiḥ samavetāmurvaśīṃ dadarśa // ViP_4,6.63 //
analyzed: kurukṣetre ca aṃbhoja sarasi anyābhiḥ catasṛbhiḥ apsarobhiḥ samavetām urvaśīm dadarśa

original: tataśconmattarūpo jāye he tiṣṭha manasi dhore tiṣṭha vacasi kapaṭike tiṣṭhetyevamanekaprakāraṃ sūktamavocat // ViP_4,6.64 //
analyzed: tatas ca unmatta rūpaḥ jāye he tiṣṭha manasi dhore tiṣṭha vacasi kapaṭike tiṣṭha iti evam aneka prakāram sūktam avocat
āha ca urvaśī
mahā rāja alam anena aviveka ceṣṭitena

original: antarvatnyahamabdānte bhavatātrāgantavyaṃ kumāraste bhabiṣyati ekāṃ ca niśāmahaṃ tvayā saha vatsyāmītyuktaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥsvapuraṃ jagāma // ViP_4,6.67
analyzed: antarvatnī aham abda ante bhavatā atra āgantavyam kumāraḥ te bhabiṣyati ekām ca niśām aham tvayā saha vatsyāmi iti uktaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ sva puram jagāma  /
tāsām ca apsarasām ūrvaśī kathayāmāsa

original: ayaṃ sa puruṣotkṛṣṭo yenāhametāvantaṃ kālamanurāgākṛṣṭamānasā sahoṣiteti // ViP_4,6.69 //
analyzed: ayam sa puruṣa utkṛṣṭaḥ yena aham etāvantam kālam anurāga ākṛṣṭa mānasā saha uṣitā iti
evam uktāḥ tāḥ ca apsarasaḥ ūcuḥ

original: sādhusādhvasya rūpamapyanena sahāsmākamapi sarvakālamāsyā bhavediti // ViP_4,6.71 //
analyzed: sādhu sādhu asya rūpam api anena saha asmākam api sarvakālam āsyā bhavet iti

original: abde ca pūrṇe sa rājā tatrājagāma // ViP_4,6.72 //
analyzed: abde ca pūrṇe sa rājā tatra ājagāma
kumāram ca āyuṣam asmai ca urvaśī dadau

original: dattvā caikāṃ niśāṃ tena rājñā sahoṣitvā pañca putrotpattaye garbhamavāpa // ViP_4,6.74 //
analyzed: dattvā ca ekām niśām tena rājñā saha uṣitvā pañca putra utpattaye garbham avāpa

original: uvāca cainaṃ rājānamasmatprītyā mahārājāya sarva eva gandharvā varadāḥsaṃvṛttāḥ vriyatāṃ ca vara iti // ViP_4,6.75 //
analyzed: uvāca ca enam rājānam asmad prītyā mahā rājāya sarve eva gandharvāḥ vara dāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ vriyatām ca varaḥ iti
āha ca rājā
vijita sakala arātiḥ avihata indriya sāmarthyaḥ bandhumān amita bala kośaḥ asmi na anyat asmākam urvaśī sālokyāt prāptavyam asti tat aham anayā

original: sahorvaśyā kālaṃ netumabhilaṣāmītyukte gandharvā rājñe 'gnisthālīṃ daduḥ // ViP_4,6.77 //
analyzed: saha urvaśyā kālam netum abhilaṣāmi iti ukte gandharvāḥ rājñe agni sthālīm daduḥ

original: ūcuścainamagnimāmnāyānusārī bhūtvā tridhā kṛtvervaśī salokatāmanorathamuddiśya samyagyajethāḥ tato 'vasyamabhilaṣitamavāpsyatītyuktastāmagnistālīmādāya  #
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca enam agnim āmnāya anusārī bhūtvā tridhā kṛtvā irvaśī salokatā manoratham uddiśya samyak yajethāḥ tatas avasyam abhilaṣitam avāpsyati iti uktaḥ tām agniḥ tālīm ādāya
jagāma

original: antaraṭavyāmacitayat aho me 'tīva muḍhatā kimahamakaravam // ViP_4,6.79 //
analyzed: antar aṭavyām acitayat aho me atīva muḍha tā kim aham akaravam
vahni sthālī mayā eṣā ānītā na urvaśī iti

original: athaināmaṭavyāmevāgnisthālīṃ tatyāja svapuraṃ ca jagām // ViP_4,6.81 //
analyzed: athā enām aṭavyām evā agni sthālīm tatyāja sva puram ca jagām
vyatīteḥ addharātre vinidraḥ ca acintayat

original: mamorvaśīsālokyaprāptayarthamagnisthālī gandharvair dattā sā ca mayāṭavyāṃ parityaktā // ViP_4,6.83 //
analyzed: mama urvaśī sālokya prāptaya artham agni sthālī gandharvaiḥ dattā sā ca mayā aṭavyām parityaktā

original: tadahaṃ tatra tadāharaṇāya yāsyāmītyutthāya tatrāpyupagato nāgnisthālīmapaśyat // ViP_4,6.84 //
analyzed: tat aham tatra tad āharaṇāya yāsyāmi iti utthāya tatra api upagataḥ na agni sthālīm apaśyat
śamīgarbham ca aśvāttham agni sthālī sthāne dṛṣṭvā acintayat

original: mayātrāgnisthālī nikṣiptā sā cāśvatthaḥ śamīgarbho 'bhūt // ViP_4,6.86 //
analyzed: mayā atrā agni sthālī nikṣiptā sā ca aśvatthaḥ śamīgarbhaḥ abhūt

original: tadenamevāhamagnirūpamādāya svapuramabhigamyāraṇīṃ kṛtvā tadutpannāgnerupāstiṃ kariṣyāmīti // ViP_4,6.87 //
analyzed: tat enam eva aham agni rūpam ādāya sva puram abhigamya araṇīm kṛtvā tad utpanna agneḥ upāstim kariṣyāmi iti
evam eva sva puram abhigamya araṇim cakāra
tad pramāṇam ca aṅgulaiḥ kurvan gāyatrīm apaṭhat
paṭhataḥ ca akṣara saṃkhyāni eva aṅgulāni araṇī abhavat
tatra agnim nirmathya agnitrayam āmnāya anusārī bhūtvā juhāva
urvaśī sālokyam phalam abhisaṃdhitavān

original: tenaiva cāgnividhinā bahuvidhān yajñāniṣṭvā gāndharvalokāna vāpyorvaśyā sahāviyogamavāpa // ViP_4,6.93 //
analyzed: tena eva ca agni vidhinā bahuvidhān yajñān iṣṭvā gāndharva lokān vāpya urvaśyā saha aviyogam avāpa

original: eko 'gnirādāvabhavat ekena tvatra manvantare tredhā pravartitāḥ // ViP_4,6.94 //
analyzed: ekaḥ agniḥ ādau abhavat ekena tu atra manvantare tredhā pravartitāḥ
iti śri viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe caturtha aṃśe ṣaṣṭhaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
tasya api āyuḥ dhīmān amāvasuḥ vaniśvāvasuḥ śrutāyuḥ śayuḥ ayutāyuḥ iti saṃjñāḥ ṣaṭ putrāḥ abhavan
tathā amāvasoḥ bhīma nāmā putraḥ abhavat

original: bhīmasya kāñcanaḥ kāñcanātsuhotraḥ tasyāpi jahnuḥ // ViP_4,7.3 //
analyzed: bhīmasya kāñcanaḥ kāñcanāt suhotraḥ tasya api jahnuḥ

original: yo 'sau yajñavāṭamakhilaṃ gaṅgāṃbhasā plāvitamavalokya krodhasaṃraktalocano bhagavantaṃ yajñapuruṣamātmani parameṇa samādhinā samāropyākhilameva  #
analyzed: yaḥ asau yajña vāṭam akhilam gaṅgā aṃbhasā plāvitam avalokya krodha saṃrakta locanaḥ bhagavantam yajñapuruṣam ātmani parameṇa samādhinā samāropya akhilam eva
gaṅgām apibat
atha enam deva ṛṣayaḥ prasādayāmāsuḥ
duhitṛ tve ca asya gaṅgām anayan
jahnoḥ ca sumanduḥ nāma putraḥ abhavat

original: tasyāpyajakastato balākāśvastasmātkuśastasyāpi kuśāṃbukuśanābhādhūrtarajaso vasuśceti catvāraḥ putrā babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,7.8 //
analyzed: tasya api ajakaḥ tatas balākāśvaḥ tasmāt kuśaḥ tasya api kuśāṃbu kuśanābha ādhūrtarajasaḥ vasuḥ ca iti catvāraḥ putrāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: teṣāṃ kuśāṃbaḥ śakratulyo mutro bhavedititapaścakāra // ViP_4,7.9 //
analyzed: teṣām kuśāṃbaḥ śakra tulyaḥ mutraḥ bhavet iti tapaḥ cakāra

original: taṃ cogratapasamavalokya mā bhavatvanayo 'mattulyo vīrya ityātmanaivāsyendraḥ putratvamagacchat // ViP_4,7.10 //
analyzed: tam ca ugra tapasam avalokya mā bhavatu anayaḥ amad tulyaḥ vīryaḥ iti ātmanā eva asya indraḥ putra tvam agacchat
sa gādhiḥ nāma putraḥ kauśikaḥ abhavat
gādhiḥ ca satyavatīm kanyām ajanayat

original: tāṃ ca bhārgavaḥ ṛcīko vavre // ViP_4,7.13 //
analyzed: tām ca bhārgavaḥ ṛcīkaḥ vavre
gādhiḥ api ati roṣaṇāya ati vṛddhāya brāhmaṇāya dātum an icchan ekatas śyāma karmānām indu varcasām anila raṃhasām aśvānām sahasram kanyā śulkam ayācata

original: tenāpyṛṣiṇā varumasakāśādu palabhyāśvatīrthotpannaṃ tādṛśamaśvasahasraṃ dattam // ViP_4,7.15 //
analyzed: tena api ṛṣiṇā varuma sakāśāt u palabhya aśvatīrtha utpannam tādṛśam aśva sahasram dattam
tatas tām ṛcīkaḥ kanyām upayeme
ṛcīkaḥ ca tasyāḥ carum apatya ārtam cakāra

original: tatprasāditaś ca tanmātre kṣatravaraputrotpattaye caramaparaṃ sādhayāmāsa // ViP_4,7.18 //
analyzed: tad prasāditaḥ ca tad mātre kṣatra vara putra utpattaye caram aparam sādhayāmāsa

original: eṣa carurbhavatyā ayamaparaścarustvanmātrā samya gupayojya ityuktvā vanaṃ jagāma // ViP_4,7.19 //
analyzed: eṣa caruḥ bhavatyāḥ ayam aparaḥ caruḥ tvad mātrā samyak upayojyaḥ iti uktvā vanam jagāma
upayoga kāle catām mātā satyavatīm āha

original: putri sarva evātmaputramatiguṇamabhilaṣati nātmajāyābhrātṛguṇeṣvatīvādṛto bhavatīti // ViP_4,7.21 //
analyzed: putri sarvaḥ eva ātma putra mati guṇam abhilaṣati na ātma jāyā bhrātṛ guṇeṣu atīva ādṛtaḥ bhavati iti

original: torhasi mamātmīyaṃ caruṃ madīyaṃ carumātmanopayoktum // ViP_4,7.22 //
analyzed: mama ātmīyam carum madīyam carum ātmanā upayoktum

original: matputreṇa hi sakalabhūmaṇḍalaparipālanaṃ kāryaṃ kiyadvā brāhmaṇasya balavīryasaṃpadetyuktā sā svacaruṃ mātre dattavatī // ViP_4,7.23 //
analyzed: mad putreṇa hi sakala bhū maṇḍala paripālanam kāryam kiyat vā brāhmaṇasya bala vīrya saṃpadā iti uktā sā sva carum mātre dattavatī
atha vanāt āgatya satyavatīm ṛṣiḥ apaśyat

original: āha caināmatipāpe kimidamakāryaṃ bhavatyā kṛtam atiraudraṃma te vapurlakṣyate // ViP_4,7.25 //
analyzed: āha ca enām ati pāpe kim idam akāryam bhavatyā kṛtam ati raudraṃma te vapuḥ lakṣyate

original: nīnaṃ tvāyā tvanmātṛsātkṛtaścārurūpayukto na yuktāmetat // ViP_4,7.26 //
analyzed: tvad mātṛsāt kṛtaḥ cāru rūpa yuktaḥ na yuktām etat

original: mayā hi tatra carau sakalaiśvaryavīryasauryabalasaṃpadāropitā tvadīyacarāvapyakhilaśāntijñānatitikṣādibrāhmamaguṇasaṃpat // ViP_4,7.27 //
analyzed: mayā hi tatra carau sakala aiśvarya vīrya saurya bala saṃpad āropitā tvadīya carau api akhila śānti jñāna titikṣā ādi brāhmama guṇa saṃpad

original: tacca viparītaṃ kurvantyāstavātiraudrāstradhāraṇapālananiṣṭhaḥ kṣatriyācāraḥ putro bhaviṣyati tasyāścopaśamarucirbrāhmaṇācāra ityākarṇyaiva  #
analyzed: tat ca viparītam kurvantyāḥ tava ati raudra astra dhāraṇa pālana niṣṭhaḥ kṣatriya ācāraḥ putraḥ bhaviṣyati tasyāḥ ca upaśama ruciḥ brāhmaṇa ācāraḥ iti ākarṇya eva
sā tasya pādau jagrāha
praṇipatya ca enam āha

original: bhagavanmayaitadajñānādanuṣṭhitaṃ prasādaṃ me kuru maivaṃvidhaḥ putro bhavatu kāmamevaṃvidhaḥ pautro bhavatvityukte munirapyāha // ViP_4,7.30
analyzed: bhagavat mayā etat ajñānāt anuṣṭhitam prasādam me kuru mā evaṃvidhaḥ putraḥ bhavatu kāmam evaṃvidhaḥ pautraḥ bhavatu iti ukte muniḥ api āha
evam astu iti
anantaram ca sā jamadagnim ajījanat
tad mātā ca viśvāmitram janayāmāsa
satyavatī api kauśikī nāma nadī abhavat
jamadagniḥ ikṣvāku vaṃśa udbhavasya reṇoḥ tanayām reṇukām upayeme

original: tasyāṃ cāśeṣakṣatrahantāraṃ paraśurāmasaṃjñaṃ bhagavataḥsakalalokagurornārāyaṇasyāṃśaṃ jamadagnirajījanat // ViP_4,7.36 //
analyzed: tasyām ca aśeṣa kṣatra hantāram paraśurāma saṃjñam bhagavataḥ sakala loka guroḥ nārāyaṇasya aṃśam jamadagniḥ ajījanat

original: viśvāmītraputrastu bhārgava eva śunaḥśepo daivair dattaḥ tataś ca devarātanāmābhavat // ViP_4,7.37 //
analyzed: viśvāmītra putraḥ tu bhārgavaḥ eva śunaḥśepaḥ daivaiḥ dattaḥ tatas ca devarāta nāmā bhavat
tatas ca anye madhuśchandaḥ dhanañjaya kṛtadeva aṣṭaka kacchapa hariḥ ākhyāḥ viśvāmitra putrāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca bahūni kauśikagotrāṇi ṛṣyantareṣu vivāhyānyabhavat // ViP_4,7.39 //
analyzed: teṣām ca bahūni kauśika gotrāṇi ṛṣi antareṣu vivāhyāni abhavat
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe caturtha aṃśe saptamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: purūravaso jyeṣṭhaḥ putro yastvāyurnāmā sa rāhorduhitaramupayeme // ViP_4,8.1 //
analyzed: purūravasaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ putraḥ yaḥ tu āyuḥ nāmā sa rāhoḥ duhitaram upayeme
tasyām ca pañca putrān utpādayāmāsa
nahuṣa kṣatravṛddha raṃbha raji saṃjñāḥ tathā eva anenāḥ pañcamaḥ putraḥ abhūt
kṣatravṛddhāt suhotraḥ putraḥ abhavat
kāśyapa kāśa gṛtsamadāḥ trayaḥ tasya putrāḥ babhūvuḥ
gṛtsamadasya śonakaḥ cāturvarmya pravartayitā abhūt

original: kāśyasya kāśeyaḥ kāśīrājaḥ tasmādrāṣṭraḥ rāṣṭrasya dīrghatapāḥ putro 'bhavat // ViP_4,8.7 //
analyzed: kāśyasya kāśeyaḥ kāśī rājaḥ tasmāt rāṣṭraḥ rāṣṭrasya dīrghatapāḥ putraḥ abhavat
dhanvantariḥ tu dīrghatapasaḥ putraḥ abhavat

original: sa hi saṃsiddhakāryakaramaḥsakalasaṃbhūtiṣvaśeṣajñānavidā bhagavatā nārāyaṇena cātīta saṃbhūtau tasmai varo dattaḥ // ViP_4,8.9 //
analyzed: sa hi saṃsiddha kārya karamaḥ sakala saṃbhūtiṣu aśeṣa jñāna vidā bhagavatā nārāyaṇena ca atīta saṃbhūtau tasmai varaḥ dattaḥ

original: kāśīrājagotre 'vatīrya tvamaṣṭadhā samyagāyurvedaṃ kariṣyasi yajñabhāgabhugbhaviṣyasīti // ViP_4,8.10 //
analyzed: kāśī rāja gotre avatīrya tvam aṣṭadhā samyak āyurvedam kariṣyasi yajña bhāga bhuj bhaviṣyasi iti

original: tasya ca dhanvantareḥ patraḥ ketumān ketumato bhīmarathaḥ tasyāpi divodāsaḥ tasyāpi pratardanaḥ // ViP_4,8.11 //
analyzed: tasya ca dhanvantareḥ patraḥ ketumān ketumataḥ bhīmarathaḥ tasya api divodāsaḥ tasya api pratardanaḥ

analyzed: tatas ca svātiḥ tatas ruśaṅkuḥ ruśaṅkoḥ citrarathaḥ
