original: tasya ca śatasahasraṃ patnī nāmabhavat // ViP_4,12.4 //
analyzed: tasya ca śata sahasram patnī nāma bhavat
daśa lakṣa saṃkhyāḥ ca putrāḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca pṛthuśravāḥ pṛthukarmā pṛthukīrtiḥ pṛthuyaśāḥ pṛthujayaḥ pṛthudānaḥ ṣaṭputrāḥ pradhānāḥ // ViP_4,12.6 //
analyzed: teṣām ca pṛthuśravāḥ pṛthukarmā pṛthukīrtiḥ pṛthuyaśāḥ pṛthujayaḥ pṛthudānaḥ ṣaṣ putrāḥ pradhānāḥ
pṛthuśravasaḥ ca putraḥ pṛthutamaḥ
tasmāt uśanāḥ yaḥ vājimedhānām śatam ājahāra
tasya ca śitapuḥ nāma putraḥ abhavat
tasya api rukmakavacaḥ tatas paravṛt
tasya parāvṛtaḥ rukmeṣu pṛthu jyāmagha valita harita saṃjñāḥ tasya pañca ātmajāḥ babhūvuḥ
tasmāt adya api jyāmaghasya ślokaḥ gīyate
bhāryā vaśyāḥ tu ye kecid bhaviṣyanti atha vā mṛtāḥ

original: teṣāṃ tu jyāmaghaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śaivyāpatirabhūnnṛpaḥ // ViP_4,12.13 //
analyzed: teṣām tu jyāmaghaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śaivyā patiḥ abhūt nṛpaḥ

original: aputrā tasya sā patnī śaivyā nāma tathāpyasau /
analyzed: aputrā tasya sā patnī śaivyā nāma tathā api asau
apatya kāmaḥ api bhayāt na anyām bhāryām avindata

original: sa tvekadā prabhūtarathaturagagajasaṃmardātidāruṇe mahāhave yuddhyamānaḥca sakalamevāricakramajayat // ViP_4,12.15 //
analyzed: sa tu ekadā prabhūta ratha turaga gaja saṃmarda ati dāruṇe mahā āhave yuddhyamānaḥ ca sakalam eva ari cakram ajayat
tat ca ari cakram apāsta putra kalatra bandhu bala kośam svam adhiṣṭhānam parityajya diśaḥ pratividrutam

original: tasmiṃś ca vidrutetitrāsalolāyatalocanayugalaṃ trāhitrāhi māṃ tātāṃba bhratarityākulavilāpavidhuraṃ sa rājakanyāratnamadrākṣīt // ViP_4,12.17
analyzed: tasmin ca vidruta iti trāsa lola āyata locana yugalam trāhi trāhi mām tāta aṃba bhratar iti ākula vilāpa vidhuram sa rāja kanyā ratnam adrākṣīt
tad darśanāt ca tasyām anurāga anugata antarātmā sa nṛpaḥ acintayat

original: sādhvidaṃ mamāpatyarahitasya vandhyābhartuḥ sāṃprataṃ vidhināpatyakāraṇaṃ kanyāratnamupapāditam // ViP_4,12.19 //
analyzed: sādhu idam mama apatya rahitasya vandhyā bhartuḥ sāṃpratam vidhinā apatya kāraṇam kanyā ratnam upapāditam
tat etat samudvahāmi iti

original: atha vaināṃ syandanamāropya svamadhiṣṭhānaṃ nayāmi // ViP_4,12.21 //
analyzed: atha vā enām syandanam āropya svam adhiṣṭhānam nayāmi
tayā eva devyā aśaivyayā aham anujñātaḥ samudvahāmi iti
atha enām ratham āropya sva nagaram agacchat
vijayinam ca rājānam aśeṣa paura bhṛt vayari jana amātya sametā śaivyā draṣṭum adhiṣṭhana dvāram āgatā

original: sā cāvalokya rājñaḥ savyapārśavavarttinīṃ kanyāmīṣadudbhūtāmarṣasphuradadharapallavā rājānamavocat // ViP_4,12.25 //
analyzed: sā ca avalokya rājñaḥ savya pārśava varttinīm kanyām īṣat udbhūta amarṣa sphurat adhara pallavā rājānam avocat
ati capala cittā atra syandane kā iyam āropitā iti
asau api anālocita uttara vacana uti bhayāt tām āha snuṣā mama iyam iti
atha enam śaivyā uvāca
na aham prasūtā putreṇa nā anyā patnī abhavat tava

original: snuṣāsaṃbandhatā hyoṣā katamena sutena te // ViP_4,12.29 //
analyzed: snuṣā saṃbandha tā hi oṣā katamena sutena te
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti ātma īrṣyā kopa kaluṣita vacana muṣita vivekaḥ bhayāt durukta a parihāra artham idam avanīpatiḥ āha

original: yaste janiṣyatyātmajastasyeyamanāgatasyaiva bhāryā nirūpitetyākarṇyodbhūtamṛduhāsā tathetyāha // ViP_4,12.31 //
analyzed: yaḥ te janiṣyati ātmajaḥ tasya iyam anāgatasya eva bhāryā nirūpitā iti ākarṇya udbhūta mṛdu hāsā tathā iti āha
praviveśa ca rājñā saha adhiṣṭhānam

original: anantaraṃ cātiśuddhalagnahorāṃśakāvayavoktakṛtaputrajanmalābhaguṇādvayasaḥ pariṇāmamupagatāpi śaivyā svalpair evāhobhir garbhamavāpa // ViP_4,12.33
analyzed: anantaram ca ati śuddha lagna horā aṃśaka avayava ukta kṛta putra janma lābha guṇāt vayasaḥ pariṇāmam upagatā api śaivyā su alpaiḥ evā ahobhiḥ garbham avāpa
kālena ca kumāram ajījanat

original: tasya ca vidarbha iti pitā nāma cakre // ViP_4,12.35 //
analyzed: tasya ca vidarbhaḥ iti pitā nāma cakre
sa ca tām snuṣām upayeme
tasyām ca asaukratha kaiśika saṃjñau putrau ajanayat

original: punaś ca tṛtīyaṃ romapādasaṃjñaṃ putramajījanadyo nāradādavāptajñānavānbhaviṣyatīti // ViP_4,12.38 //
analyzed: punar ca tṛtīyam romapāda saṃjñam putram ajījanat yaḥ nāradāt avāpta jñānavān bhaviṣyati iti

original: romapādādbabhruḥ babhrordhṛtirḥ dhṛteḥ kaiśikaḥ kaiśikasyāpi cediḥ putro 'bhavat yasya saṃtatau caidyā bhūpālāḥ // ViP_4,12.39 //
analyzed: romapādāt babhruḥ babhroḥ dhṛtiḥ dhṛteḥ kaiśikaḥ kaiśikasya api cediḥ putraḥ abhavat yasya saṃtatau caidyāḥ bhūpālāḥ
krathasya snaṣā putrasya kuntiḥ abhavat

original: kunterdhṛṣṭiḥ dhṛṣṭernidhṛtiḥ nidhṛterdaśārhastataś ca vyomaḥ tasyāpi jīmūtaḥ tataś
analyzed: kunteḥ dhṛṣṭiḥ dhṛṣṭeḥ nidhṛtiḥ nidhṛteḥ daśārhaḥ tatas ca vyomaḥ tasya api jīmūtaḥ tatas

original: ca vikṛtiḥ tataś ca bhībharathaḥ tasmānnavarathaḥ tasyāpi daśarathaḥ tataś ca śakuniḥ
analyzed: ca vikṛtiḥ tatas ca bhībharathaḥ tasmāt navarathaḥ tasya api daśarathaḥ tatas ca śakuniḥ
tad tanayaḥ karaṃbhiḥ karaṃbheḥ devarātaḥ abhavat

original: tasmāddevakṣatraḥ tasyāpi madhuḥ madhoḥ kumāravaṃśaḥ kumāravaṃśādanuḥ anoḥ purumitraḥ pṛthivīpatirabhavat // ViP_4,12.42 //
analyzed: tasmāt devakṣatraḥ tasya api madhuḥ madhoḥ kumāravaṃśaḥ kumāravaṃśāt anuḥ anoḥ purumitraḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ abhavat
tatas ca aṃśuḥ tasmāt ca satvataḥ
satvatāt ete sātvatāḥ

original: ityetāṃ jyāmaghasya saṃtatiṃ samyakchraddhāsamanvitaḥ śrutvā pumān maitreya svapāpaiḥ pramucyate // ViP_4,12.45 //
analyzed: iti etām jyāmaghasya saṃtatim samyak śraddhā samanvitaḥ śrutvā pumān maitreya sva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
iti śrī viṣṇu māhāpurāṇe caturtha aṃśe dvādaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
bhajana bhajamāna divya andhaka devāvṛdha mahābhoja vṛṣṇi saṃjñāḥ satvatasya putrāḥ babhūvuḥ
bhajamānasya nimi kṛkaṇa vṛṣmayaḥ tathā anye dvaimātrāḥ śatajit sahasrajit ayutajit saṃjñāḥ trayaḥ
devāvṛdhasya api babhruḥ putraḥ abhavat
tayoḥ ca ayam ślokaḥ gīyate
yathā eva śṛṇumaḥ

original: babhruḥ śroṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ devair devāvṛdhaḥsamaḥ // ViP_4,13.5 //
analyzed: babhruḥ śroṣṭhaḥ manuṣyāṇām devaiḥ devāvṛdhaḥ samaḥ

original: puruṣāḥ ṣaṭ ca ṣaṣṭiś ca sahasrāṇi tathāṣṭa ye /
analyzed: puruṣāḥ ṣaṭ ca ṣaṣṭiḥ ca sahasrāṇi tathā aṣṭa ye
te amṛta tvam anuprāptāḥ babhroḥ devāvṛdhāt api

original: mahābhojastvatidharmātmā tasyānvaye bhojāḥ mṛtti kāvarapuranivāsino mārtikāvarā babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,13.7 //
analyzed: mahābhojaḥ tu ati dharma ātmā tasya anvaye bhojāḥ mṛtti kāvara pura nivāsinaḥ mārtikāvarāḥ babhūvuḥ
vṛṣṇe sumitraḥ yudhājit ca putrau abhūtām
tatas ca anamitraḥ tathā anamitrāt nighnaḥ
nighnasya prasena satrājitau

original: tasya ca satrājito bhagavānādityaḥ sakhābhavat // ViP_4,13.11 //
analyzed: tasya ca satrājitaḥ bhagavān ādityaḥ sakhā bhavat

original: ekadā tvaṃbhonidhitīrasaṃśrayaḥ sūryaṃ satrājittuṣṭāva tanmanaskatayā ca bhāsvānabhiṣṭūyamāno 'gratastasthau // ViP_4,13.12 //
analyzed: ekadā tu aṃbhonidhi tīra saṃśrayaḥ sūryam satrājit tuṣṭāva tad manaska tayā ca bhāsvān abhiṣṭūyamānaḥ agratas tasthau
tatas tu aspaṣṭa mūrtiḥ ca enam ānokya satrājit sūryam āha

original: yathaiva vyomni bahnipiṇḍopamantvāmahamapaśyaṃ tathaivādyāgrato gatamapyatra bhagavatā
analyzed: yathā eva vyomni bahni piṇḍa upaman tvām aham apaśyam tathā eva adya agratas gatam api atra bhagavatā

original: kiñcinna prasādīkṛtaṃ viśeṣamupalakṣayāmītyevamukte bhagavatā sūryeṇa nijakaṇṭhādunmucya
analyzed: kiñcid na prasādīkṛtam viśeṣam upalakṣayāmi iti evam ukte bhagavatā sūryeṇa nija kaṇṭhāt unmucya
syamantakam nāma mahā maṇi varam avatārya ekānte nyastam
tatas tam ātāmra ujjvalam hrasva vapuṣam īṣat āpiṅgala nayanam ādityam adrākṣīt

original: kṛtapraṇipātastavādikaṃ ca satrājitamāha bhagavānādityaḥsahasradīdhitiḥ varamasmattobhimataṃ vṛṇīṣveti // ViP_4,13.16 //
analyzed: kṛta praṇipāta stava ādikam ca satrājitam āha bhagavān ādityaḥ sahasradīdhitiḥ varam asmattaḥ abhimatam vṛṇīṣva iti
sa ca tat eva maṇi ratnam ayācata

original: sa cāpi tasmai taddattvā dīdhitipatirviyati svadhiṣmyamāruroha // ViP_4,13.18 //
analyzed: sa ca api tasmai tat dattvā dīdhitipatiḥ viyati sva dhiṣmyam āruroha

original: satrājito 'pyamalamaṇiratnasanāthakaṇṭhatayā sūrya iva tejobhir aśeṣadigantarāṇyudbhāsayan dvārakāṃ viveśa // ViP_4,13.19 //
analyzed: satrājitaḥ api amala maṇi ratna sanātha kaṇṭha tayā sūryaḥ iva tejobhiḥ aśeṣa digantarāṇi udbhāsayan dvārakām viveśa

original: dvārakāvāsī janastu tamāyāntamavekṣya bhagavantamādipuruṣaṃ puruṣottamamavanibhārāvataraṇāyāṃśena mānuṣarūpadhārimaṃ praṇipatyāha // ViP_4,13.20
analyzed: dvārakā vāsī janaḥ tu tam āyāntam avekṣya bhagavantam ādipuruṣam puruṣottamam avani bhāra avataraṇāya aṃśena mānuṣa rūpa dhārimam praṇipatya āha

original: bhagavan bhavantaṃ draṣṭraṃ nūnamayamāditya āyātītyukto bhagavānuvāca // ViP_4,13.21 //
analyzed: bhagavan bhavantam draṣṭram nūnam ayam ādityaḥ āyāti iti uktaḥ bhagavān uvāca
bhagavān na ayam ādityaḥ satrājitaḥ ayam āditya datta syamantaka ākhyam mahā maṇi ratnam bibhrat atra upayāti

original: tadenaṃ vistrabdhāḥ paśyatetyuktāste tathaiva dadṛśuḥ // ViP_4,13.23 //
analyzed: tat enam vistrabdhāḥ paśyata iti uktāḥ te tathā eva dadṛśuḥ

original: sa ca taṃ syamantakamaṇimātmaniveśane cakre // ViP_4,13.24 //
analyzed: sa ca tam syamantaka maṇim ātma niveśane cakre
pratidinam tat maṇi ratnam aṣṭau kanaka bhārān stravati

original: tatprabhāvācca sakalasyaiva rāṣṭrasyopasargānāvṛṣṭivyālāgnito yaddurbhikṣādibhayaṃ na bhavati // ViP_4,13.26 //
analyzed: tad prabhāvāt ca sakalasya eva rāṣṭrasya upasarga anāvṛṣṭi vyāla agnitaḥ yat durbhikṣa ādi bhayam na bhavati

original: acyuto 'pi taddivyaṃ ratnamugrasenasya bhūpateryogyametaditi lipsāṃ cakre //
analyzed: acyutaḥ api tat divyam ratnam ugrasenasya bhūpateḥ yogyam etat iti lipsām cakre
gotra bheda bhayāt śaktaḥ api na jahāra

original: satrājidapyacyuto māmetadyācayiṣyatītyavagamya ratnalobhādbhrātre prasenāya tadratnamadāt // ViP_4,13.29 //
analyzed: satrājit api acyutaḥ mām etat yācayiṣyati iti avagamya ratna lobhāt bhrātre prasenāya tat ratnam adāt

original: tacca śucinā dhriyamāṇamaśeṣameva suvarṇastravādikaṃ guṇajātamutpādayati anyathā
analyzed: tat ca śucinā dhriyamāṇam aśeṣam eva suvarṇa strava ādikam guṇa jātam utpādayati anyathā
dhārayantam eva hanti iti a jānan asau api prasenaḥ tena kaṇṭha saktena syamantakena aśvam āruhya aṭavyām
mṛgayām agacchat
tatra ca siṃhāt vadham avāpa

original: sāśvaṃ ca taṃ nihatya siṃhopyamalamaṇiratnamāsyāgreṇādāṃya gantumabhyudyataḥ ṛkṣādhipatinā jāṃbavatā dṛṣṭo ghātitaś ca // ViP_4,13.32 //
analyzed: sa aśvam ca tam nihatya siṃhaḥ upi amala maṇi ratnam āsya agreṇa ādāṃya gantum abhyudyataḥ ṛkṣa adhipatinā jāṃbavatā dṛṣṭaḥ ghātitaḥ ca
jāṃbavān api amala maṇi ratnam ādāya sva bilam praviveśa
sukumāra saṃjñāya bālakāya ca krīḍanakam akarot

original: anāgacchati tasminprasene kṛṣṇo maṇiratnamabhilaṣitavānsa ca prāptanānnūnametadasya karmetyakhila eva yadulokaḥ parasparaṃ karmākarṇyākathayat
analyzed: an āgacchati tasmin prasene kṛṣṇaḥ maṇi ratnam abhilaṣitavān sa ca prāpta nāt nūnam etat asya karma iti akhilaḥ eva yadu lokaḥ parasparam karma ākarṇya akathayat

original: viditalokāpavādavṛttāntaś ca bhagavān sarvayadusainyaparivāraparivṛtaḥ prasenāśvapadavīmanusasāra // ViP_4,13.36 //
analyzed: vidita loka apavāda vṛttāntaḥ ca bhagavān sarva yadu sainya parivāra parivṛtaḥ prasena aśva padavīm anusasāra

original: dadarśa cāśvasamavetaṃ prasenaṃ siṃhena vinihatam // ViP_4,13.37 //
analyzed: dadarśa ca aśva samavetam prasenam siṃhena vinihatam
akhila jana madhye siṃha pada darśana kṛta pariśuddhaḥ siṃha padam anusasāra

original: ṛkṣapatinihataṃ ca siṃhamapyalpe bhūmibhāge dṛṣṭvā tataścatadratnagauravādṛkṣasyāpi padānyanuyayau // ViP_4,13.39 //
analyzed: ṛkṣa pati nihatam ca siṃham api alpe bhūmi bhāge dṛṣṭvā tatas ca tad ratna gauravāt ṛkṣasya api padāni anuyayau

original: giritaṭe ca sakalameva tadyadusainyamavasthāpya tatpadānusārī ṛkṣabilaṃ praviveśa // ViP_4,13.40 //
analyzed: giri taṭe ca sakalam eva tat yadu sainyam avasthāpya tad pada anusārī ṛkṣa bilam praviveśa

original: antaḥ praviṣṭaś ca dhātryāḥ sukumārakamullālayantyā vāṇīṃ śuśrāva // ViP_4,13.41 //
analyzed: antar praviṣṭaḥ ca dhātryāḥ sukumārakam ullālayantyāḥ vāṇīm śuśrāva
siṃhaḥ prasenam avadhīt siṃhaḥ jāmbavatā hataḥ
sukumārakam ā rodīḥ tava hi eṣa syamantakaḥ

original: ityākarṇyopalabdhasyamantakontaḥpraviṣṭaḥ kumārakrīḍanakīkṛtaṃ ca dhātryā haste tejobhir jājvacalyamānaṃsyamantakaṃ dadarśa // ViP_4,13.43
analyzed: iti ākarṇya upalabdha syamantakaḥ antar praviṣṭaḥ kumāra krīḍanakīkṛtam ca dhātryāḥ haste tejobhiḥ dadarśa  /

original: taṃ ca syamantakābhilaṣitacakṣuṣamapūrvapuruṣamāgataṃ samavekṣya dhātrī trāhitrāhīti vyājahāra // ViP_4,13.44 //
analyzed: tam ca syamantaka abhilaṣita cakṣuṣam apūrva puruṣam āgatam samavekṣya dhātrī trāhi trāhi iti vyājahāra
tadā ārta rava śravaṇa anantaram ca āmarṣūrṇa hṛdayaḥ sa jāṃbavān ājagāma
tayoḥ ca parasparam uddhata amarṣayoḥ yuddham akaviṃśati dināni abhavat

original: te ca yadusainikāstatra maptāṣṭādināni tanniṣkrāntimudikṣamāṇāstasthuḥ // ViP_4,13.47 //
analyzed: te ca yadu sainikāḥ tatra mapta aṣṭa dināni tad niṣkrāntim udikṣamāṇāḥ tasthuḥ

original: aniṣkramaṇe ca madhuripurasāvavaśyamatra bile 'tyantaṃ nāśamavāpto bhaviṣyatyanyathā
analyzed: a niṣkramaṇe ca madhuripuḥ asau avaśyam atra bile atyantam nāśam avāptaḥ bhaviṣyati anyathā

original: tasya jīvataḥ kathametāvanti dināni śatrujaye vyākṣepo bhaviṣyatīti kṛtādhyavasāyā
analyzed: tasya jīvataḥ katham etāvanti dināni śatru jaye vyākṣepaḥ bhaviṣyati iti kṛta adhyavasāyā

original: dvārakāmāgamya hataḥ kṛṣṇa iti kathayāmāsuḥ // ViP_4,13.48 //
analyzed: dvārakām āgamya hataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti kathayāmāsuḥ
tad vāndhavāḥ ca tad kāla ucitam akhilam uttarakriyā kalāpam cakruḥ
tatas ca asya yuddhyamānasya ati śraddhā datta viśiṣṭa upapātra yukta anna toya ādinā śrī kṛṣṇasya bala prāṇa puṣṭa ciḥ abhūt
itarasya anudinam ati guru puruṣa bhedyamānasya ati niṣṭhura prahāra pāta pījita akhila avayavasya nirāhāra tayā bala hāniḥ abhūt

original: nirjitaś ca bhagavatā jāṃbavānapraṇipatya vyājahāra // ViP_4,13.52 //
analyzed: nirjitaḥ ca bhagavatā jāṃbavān a praṇipatya vyājahāra

original: surāsuragandharvayakṣarākṣalasādibhir apyakhilair bhavān na jetuṃ śakyaḥ kimutāvanigocarair
analyzed: sura asura gandharva yakṣa rākṣa lasādibhiḥ api akhilaiḥ bhavān na jetum śakyaḥ kim uta avani gocaraiḥ

original: alpavīryair narernarāvayavabhūtaiś ca tiryagyonyanusṛtibhiḥ kiṃ punarasmadvidhair
analyzed: alpa vīryaiḥ nareḥ nara avayava bhūtaiḥ ca tiryagyoni anusṛtibhiḥ kim punar asmadvidhaiḥ

original: avaśyaṃ bhavatāsmatsvāminā rāmeṇena nārāyaṇasya sakalajagatparāyaṇasyāṃśena bhagavatā
analyzed: avaśyam bhavatā asmad svāminā rāmeṇena nārāyaṇasya sakala jagat parāyaṇasya aṃśena bhagavatā
bhavitavyam iti uktaḥ tasmai bhagavān akhila avani bhāra avataraṇa artham avataraṇam ācacakṣe
prīti abhivyañjita kara tala sparśanena ca enam apagata yuddha khedam cakāra

original: sa ca praṇipatya punarapyenaṃ prasādya jāṃbavatīṃ nāma kanyāṃ gṛhāgatāyārghyabhūtāṃ grāhayāmāsa // ViP_4,13.55 //
analyzed: sa ca praṇipatya punar api enam prasādya jāṃbavatīm nāma kanyām gṛhāgatāya arghya bhūtām grāhayāmāsa
syamantaka maṇi ratnam api praṇipatya tasmai pradadau
acyutaḥ upi ati praṇatāt tasmāt agrāhyam api tat maṇi ratnam ātma saṃśodhanāya jagrāha
saha jāṃbavatyā sa dvārakām ājagāma
bhagavat āgamana udbhūta harṣa utkarṣasya dvārakā vāsi janasya kṛṣṇa avalokanāt tad kṣaṇam eva ati pariṇata vayasaḥ api nava yauvanam iva abhavat

original: diṣṭyādiṣṭyeti sakalayādavāḥ striyaś ca sabhājayāmāsuḥ // ViP_4,13.60 //
analyzed: diṣṭyā a diṣṭyā iti sakala yādavāḥ striyaḥ ca sabhājayāmāsuḥ
bhagavān api yathā anubhūtam aśeṣam yādava samāje

original: syamantakaṃ ca satrājitāya dattvā mithyābhiśastipariśuddhimavāpa // ViP_4,13.62 //
analyzed: syamantakam ca satrājitāya dattvā mithyā abhiśasti pariśuddhim avāpa
jāṃbavatīm ca antaḥpuram niveśayāmāsa

original: satrājitopi mayāsyābhūtamalinamāropitamiti jātasaṃtrāsātsvasutāṃ satyabhāmāṃ bhagavate bhāryārthaṃ dadau // ViP_4,13.64 //
analyzed: satrājitaḥ upi mayā asya abhūta malinam āropitam iti jāta saṃtrāsāt sva sutām satyabhāmām bhagavate bhāryā artham dadau
tām ca akrūra kṛtavarma śatadhanva pramukhāḥ yādavāḥ prāk varayāmbabhūvuḥ

original: tatastatpradānādavajñātamevātmānaṃ manyamānāḥ satrājite vairānubandhaṃ cakruḥ // ViP_4,13.66 //
analyzed: tatas tad pradānāt avajñātam eva ātmānam manyamānāḥ satrājite vaira anubandham cakruḥ
akrūra kṛtavarma pramukhāḥ ca śatadhanvānam ūcuḥ

original: ayamatīva durātmā satrājito yo 'smābhir bhavatā ca prārthito 'pyātmajāmasmān bhavantaṃ cāvigaṇayya kṛṣṇāya dattavān // ViP_4,13.68 //
analyzed: ayam atīva durātmā satrājitaḥ yaḥ asmābhiḥ bhavatā ca prārthitaḥ api ātmajām asmān bhavantam ca a vigaṇayya kṛṣṇāya dattavān

original: tadalamanena jīvatā ghātayitvainaṃ tanmahāratnaṃ syamantakākhyaṃ tvayā kiṃ na gṛhyate
analyzed: tat alam anena jīvatā ghātayitvā enam tat mahā ratnam syamantaka ākhyam tvayā kim na gṛhyate
vayam abhyupapatsyāmaḥ yadi acyutaḥ tava upari vaira anubandham kariṣyati iti evam uktaḥ tathā iti asau api āha

original: jatugṛhadagdhānāṃ pāṇḍutanayānāṃ viditaparamārtho 'pi bhagavān duryodhanaprayatnaśauthilyakaraṇārtha pārthānukūlyakaraṇāya vāraṇāvataṃ gataḥ
analyzed: jatu gṛha dagdhānām pāṇḍu tanayānām vidita parama arthaḥ api bhagavān duryodhana prayatna śauthilya karaṇa artha pārtha ānukūlya karaṇāya vāraṇāvatam gataḥ

original: gate ca tasmin suptameva satrājitaṃ śatadhanvā jaghāna maṇiratnaṃ cādadāt // ViP_4,13.71 //
analyzed: gate ca tasmin suptam eva satrājitam śatadhanvā jaghāna maṇi ratnam ca ādadāt

original: pitṛvadhāmarṣapūrṇā ca satyabhāmā śīghraṃ syandanamārūḍhā vāraṇāvataṃ gatvā bhagavate
analyzed: pitṛ vadha āmarṣa pūrṇā ca satyabhāmā śīghram syandanam ārūḍhā vāraṇāvatam gatvā bhagavate
aham pratipāditā iti akṣāntimatā śatadhanvanā asmad pitā vyāpāditaḥ tat ca syaṃmantaka maṇi ratnam apahṛtam
yasya avabhāsanena apahṛta timiram trailokyam bhaviṣyati

original: tadīyaṃ tvadīyāpahāsanā tadālocya yadatra yuktaṃ tatkriyatāmiti kṛṣṇamāha // ViP_4,13.73 //
analyzed: tadīyam tvadīya apahāsanā tat ālocya yat atra yuktam tat kriyatām iti kṛṣṇam āha

original: tayā caivamuktāḥ parītuṣṭāntaḥ karaṇo 'pi kṛṣṇaḥ satyabhāmāmamarṣatāmranayanaḥ prāha // ViP_4,13.74 //
analyzed: tayā ca evam uktāḥ parītuṣṭa antaḥ karaṇaḥ api kṛṣṇaḥ satyabhāmām amarṣa tāmra nayanaḥ prāha

original: satye mamaivaiṣāpahāsanā nāhametāṃ tasya durātmanaḥsahiṣye // ViP_4,13.75 //
analyzed: satye mama eva eṣā apahāsanā na aham etām tasya durātmanaḥ sahiṣye

original: na hyanullaṅghya parapādapaṃ tatkṛtanīḍāśrayiṇo vihaṅgamā vadhyante tadalamamunāsmatpurataḥ
analyzed: na hi an ullaṅghya para pādapam tad kṛta nīḍa āśrayiṇaḥ vihaṅgamāḥ vadhyante tat alam amunā asmad puratas

original: saukaproritavākyaparikareṇetyuktvā dvārakāmabhyetyai kānte baladevaṃ vāsudevaḥ prāha // ViP_4,13.76 //
analyzed: sauka prorita vākya parikareṇa iti uktvā dvārakām abhyetyai kānte baladevam vāsudevaḥ prāha
mṛgayā gatam prasenam aṭavyām mṛgapatiḥ jaghāna
satrājitaḥ api adhunā śatadhanvanā nidhanam prāpitaḥ
tad ubhaya vināśāt tat maṇi ratnam āvābhyām sāmānyam bhaviṣyati

original: taduttiṣṭhāruhyatāṃ rathaḥ śatadhanvanidhanāyodyamaṃ kurvityabhihitastatheti samanvicchitavān // ViP_4,13.80 //
analyzed: tat uttiṣṭha āruhyatām rathaḥ śatadhanva nidhanāya udyamam kuru iti abhihitaḥ tathā iti

original: kṛtodyamau ca tāvubhāvupalabhya śatadhanvā kṛtavarmāṇamupetya pārṣṇipūramakarmanimittamacodayat // ViP_4,13.81 //
analyzed: kṛta udyamau ca tau ubhau upalabhya śatadhanvā kṛtavarmāṇam upetya pārṣṇi pūram akarma nimittam acodayat
āha ca enam kṛtavarmā
na aham baladeva vāsudevābhyām saha virodhāya alam iti uktaḥ ca akrūram acodayat
asau api āha
na hi kaścid bhagavatā pāda prahāra parikaṃpita jagattrayeṇa sura riṣu vanitā vaidhavya kāriṇā
prabala ripu cakra apratihata cakreṇa cakriṇā mada mudita nayana avalokana akhila niśātanena ati guru vairi vāraṇa apakarṣaṇa avikṛta mahima uru sīreṇa

original: sīriṇā ca saha sakalajagadvandyānāmamaravarāṇāmapi yoddhuṃ samarthaḥ // ViP_4,13.85 //
analyzed: sīriṇā ca saha sakala jagat vandyānām amara varāṇām api yoddhum samarthaḥ
kim uta aham tad anyaḥ śaraṇam abhilaṣyatām iti uktaḥ śatadhanuḥ āha

original: yadyasmatparitrāṇāsamarthaṃ bhavānātmanamadhigacchati tadayamasmattastāvanmaṇiḥ saṃgṛhya rakṣyatāmiti // ViP_4,13.87 //
analyzed: yadi asmad paritrāṇa asamartham bhavān ātmanam adhigacchati tat ayam asmattaḥ tāvat maṇiḥ saṃgṛhya rakṣyatām iti
eka muktaḥ saḥ api āha

original: yadyantyayāmapyavasthāyāṃ na kasmaicidbhavān kathayiṣyati tadahametaṃ grahīṣyāmīti // ViP_4,13.89 //
analyzed: yadi antyayām api avasthāyām na kasmaicid bhavān kathayiṣyati tat aham etam grahīṣyāmi iti
tathā iti ukte ca akrūraḥ tat maṇi ratnam jagrāha
tula vegām śata yojana vāhinīm vaḍavām āruhya apakrāntaḥ
śaivya sugrīva mghapuṣpa balāhaka aśva catuṣṭaya yukta ratha sthitau baladeva vāsudevaiḥ tam anuprayātau

original: sā ca vaḍavā śatayojanapramāṇamārgamatītā punarapi vāhyamānā mithilāvanoddeśe prāṇānutsasarja // ViP_4,13.93 //
analyzed: sā ca vaḍavā śata yojana pramāṇa mārgam atītā punar api vāhyamānā mithilā vana uddeśe prāṇān utsasarja
śatadhanuḥ api tām parityajya padātiḥ eva adravat
kṛṣṇaḥ upi balabhadram āha

original: tāvadatra syandane bhavatā stheyamahamenamadhamācāraṃ padātireva padātimanugamya
analyzed: tāvat atra syandane bhavatā stheyam aham enam adhama ācāram padātiḥ eva padātim anugamya

original: yāvaddhātayāmi atra hi bhūbhāge dṛṣṭadoṣāḥsabhayā ato naiteśvā bhavatemaṃ bhūmibhāgamullaṅghanīyāḥ // ViP_4,13.96 //
analyzed: yāvat dhātayāmi atra hi bhū bhāge dṛṣṭa doṣāḥ sabhayā atas na ete śvāḥ bhavatā imam bhūmi bhāgam ullaṅghanīyāḥ

original: tathetyuktva baladevo ratha eva tasthau // ViP_4,13.97 //
analyzed: tathā iti uktvā baladevaḥ rathe eva tasthau

original: kṛṣṇopi dvikrośamātraṃ bhūmibhāgamanusṛtya dūrasthitasyaiva cakraṃ kṣiptvā śatadhanuṣaḥ śiraściccheda // ViP_4,13.98 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ api dvi krośa mātram bhūmi bhāgam anusṛtya dūra sthitasya eva cakram kṣiptvā śatadhanuṣaḥ śiraḥ ciccheda

original: taccharīrāṃbarādiṣu ca bahuprakāramanvicchannapi syamantakamaṇiṃ nāvāpa padā tadopagamya balabhadramāha // ViP_4,13.99 //
analyzed: tad śarīra aṃbara ādiṣu ca bahu prakāram anvicchan api syamantaka maṇim nā avāpa padā tadā upagamya balabhadram āha

original: vṛthaivāsmābhiḥ śatadhanurghātitaḥ na prāptamaśilajagatsārabhūtaṃ tanmahāratnaṃ syamantakākhyamityākarṇyodbhūtakopo baladevo vāsudevamāha //
analyzed: vṛthā eva asmābhiḥ śatadhanuḥ ghātitaḥ na prāptam aśila jagat sāra bhūtam tat mahā ratnam syamantaka ākhyam iti ākarṇya udbhūta kopaḥ baladevaḥ vāsudevam āha

original: dhiktvāṃ yastvamevamarthalipsuretacca te bhrātṛtvānmayā kṣāntaṃ tadayaṃ panthāḥsvecchayā
analyzed: dhik tvām yaḥ tvam evam artha lipsuḥ etat ca te bhrātṛ tvāt mayā kṣāntam tat ayam panthāḥ sva icchayā

original: gamyatāṃ na me dvārakayā na tvayā na cāśeṣabandhubhiḥ kāryamalamalamebhir mamāgrato
analyzed: gamyatām na me dvārakayā na tvayā na ca aśeṣa bandhubhiḥ kāryam alam alam ebhiḥ mama agratas

original: 'līkaśapathair ityākṣipya tatkathāṃ kathañcitprasādyamānopi na tasthau // ViP_4,13.101 //
analyzed: alīka śapathaiḥ iti ākṣipya tad kathām kathañcid prasādyamānaḥ api na tasthau
sa videha purīm praviveśa
janaka rājaḥ ca arghya pūrvakam enam gṛham praveśayāmāsa
sa tatra eva ca tasthau
vāsudevaḥ api dvārakām ājagāma

original: yāvacca janakarājagṛhe balabhadro 'vatasthe tāvaddhārtarāṣṭro duryodhanastatsakāśādgadāśikṣāmaśikṣayat // ViP_4,13.106 //
analyzed: yāvat ca janaka rāja gṛhe balabhadraḥ avatasthe tāvat dhārtarāṣṭraḥ duryodhanaḥ tad sakāśāt gadā śikṣām aśikṣayat

original: varṣatrayānte ca babhrūgrasenaprabhṛtibhir yādavair na tadratnaṃ kṛṣṇenāpahṛtamiti kṛtāvagatibhir videhanagarīṃ gatvā baladevaḥsaṃpratyāyya  #
analyzed: varṣa traya ante ca babhru ugrasena prabhṛtibhiḥ yādavaiḥ na tat ratnam kṛṣṇena apahṛtam iti kṛta avagatibhiḥ videha nagarīm gatvā baladevaḥ saṃpratyāyya
dvārakām ānītaḥ
akrūraḥ api uttama maṇi samudbhuta suvarṇena bhagavat dhyāna paraḥ anavaratam yajñān iyāja

original: savanagatau hi kṣatriyavaiśyau nighnanbrahyāhā bhavatītyevaṃprakāraṃ dīkṣākavacaṃ praviṣṭaḍa eva tasthau // ViP_4,13.109 //
analyzed: savana gatau hi kṣatriya vaiśyau nighnan brahyāhā bhavati iti evaṃprakāram dīkṣā kavacam praviṣṭaḍaḥ eva tasthau
dvi ṣaṣṭi varṣāṇi eva tad maṇi prabhāvāt tatra upasarga durbhikṣa mārikā maraṇa ādikam

original: athākrūrapakṣīyair bhojaiḥ śatrughne sātvatasya prapautre vyāpādite bhojaiḥ sahākrūro dvārakāmapahāyāpakrāntaḥ // ViP_4,13.111 //
analyzed: atha akrūra pakṣīyaiḥ bhojaiḥ śatrughne sātvatasya prapautre vyāpādite bhojaiḥ saha akrūraḥ dvārakām apahāya apakrāntaḥ
tad apakrānti dināt ārabhya tatra upasarga durbhikṣa vyāla anāvṛṣṭi mārikā ādi upadravāḥ babhūvuḥ
atha yādavāḥ balabhadra ugrasena samavetāḥ mantram amantrayan
bhagavān uraga ari ketanaḥ kim idam ekadā eva pracura upadrava āgamanam etat ālocyatām iti ukta indhaka nāmā yadu vṛddhaḥ prāha

original: asyākrūrasya pitṛśvaphalko yatra yatrābhūttatratatra durbhikṣamārikānāvṛṣṭyādikaṃ nābhūt // ViP_4,13.115 //
analyzed: asya akrūrasya pitṛ śvaphalkaḥ yatra yatra abhūt tatra tatra durbhikṣa mārikā anāvṛṣṭi ādikam

original: kāśīrājasya viṣaye tvanāvṛṣṭyā ca śvaphalko nītaḥ tataś ca tatkṣaṇāddevo vavarṣa // ViP_4,13.116 //
analyzed: kāśī rājasya viṣaye tu anāvṛṣṭyā ca śvaphalkaḥ nītaḥ tatas ca tad kṣaṇāt devaḥ vavarṣa

original: kāśīrājapatnyāś ca garbhe kanyāratnaṃ pūrvamāsīt // ViP_4,13.117 //
analyzed: kāśī rāja patnyāḥ ca garbhe kanyā ratnam pūrvam āsīt

original: sā ca kanyā pūrṇepi prasūtikāle naiva niścakrāma // ViP_4,13.118 //
analyzed: sā ca kanyā pūrṇā ipi prasūti kāle na eva niścakrāma

original: evaṃ ca tasya garbhasya dvādaśavarśaṇyaniṣkrāmato yayuḥ // ViP_4,13.119 //
analyzed: evam ca tasya garbhasya dvādaśa varśaṇya niṣkrāmataḥ yayuḥ
kāśī rājaḥ ca tām ātmajām garbha sthām āha

original: putri kasmānna jāyase niṣkramya tāmāsyaṃ te draṣṭumicchāmi etāṃ ca mātaraṃ kimiticiraṃ kleśayiṣyasītyuktā garbhasthaiva vyājahāra // ViP_4,13.121
analyzed: putri kasmāt na jāyase niṣkramya tām āsyam te draṣṭum icchāmi etām ca mātaram kim iti ciram kleśayiṣyasi iti uktā garbha sthā eva vyājahāra

original: tāta yadyekaikāṃ gāṃ dinedine brāhmaṇāya prayacchasi tadahamanyais tribhir varṣair
analyzed: tāta yadi ekaikām gām dine dine brāhmaṇāya prayacchasi tat aham anyaiḥ tribhiḥ varṣaiḥ
asmāt garbhāt tatas avaśyam niṣkramiṣyāmi iti ed vacanam ākarṇya rājā dine dine brāhmaṇāya
gām prādāt
sā api tāvatā kālena jātā

original: tatastasyāḥ pitā gāndinīti nāma cakāra // ViP_4,13.124 //
analyzed: tatas tasyāḥ pitā gāndinī iti nāma cakāra

original: tāṃ ca gāndinīṃ kanyāṃ śphalakāyopakāriṇe gṛhamāgatāyārghya bhūtāṃ prādāt // ViP_4,13.125 //
analyzed: tām ca gāndinīm kanyām śphalakāya upakāriṇe gṛham āgatāya arghya bhūtām prādāt
tasyām ayam akrūraḥ śvaphalakāt jajñe
tasya evaṅguṇa mithunāt utpattiḥ

original: tatkathamasminnapakrānte atra durbhikṣamārikādyupadravā na bhaviṣyanti // ViP_4,13.128 //
analyzed: tat katham asmin apakrānte atra durbhikṣa mārikā ādi upadravāḥ na bhaviṣyanti
tat ayam ātrā ānīyatām alam ati guṇavatī aparādha anveṣaṇena iti yadu vṛddhasya andhakasya etat vacanam ākarmya
keśava ugrasena balabhadra purogamaiḥ yadubhiḥ kṛta aparādha titikṣubhiḥ abhayam dattvā
śvaphalaka putraḥ śvapumān ītaḥ

original: tatra cāgatamātra eva tasya syamantakamaṇeḥ prabhāvādanāvṛṣṭimārikādurbhikṣavyālādyupadravopaśamā babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,13.130 //
analyzed: tatra ca āgata mātraḥ eva tasya syamantaka maṇeḥ prabhāvāt anāvṛṣṭi mārikā durbhikṣa vyāla ādi upadrava upaśamāḥ babhūvuḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ cintayāmāsa

original: svalpametatkāraṇaṃ yadayaṃ gāndinyāṃ śvaphalakenākrūro janitaḥ // ViP_4,13.132 //
analyzed: su alpam etat kāraṇam yat ayam gāndinyām śvaphalakena akrūraḥ janitaḥ
su mahān ca ayam anāvṛṣṭi durbhikṣa mārikā ādi upadrava a pratiṣedha kārī prabhāvaḥ

original: tannṛna masya sarāśe sa mahāmaṇiḥ syamantakākhyastiṣṭhati // ViP_4,13.134 //
analyzed: sa mahā maṇiḥ syamantaka ākhyaḥ tiṣṭhati
tasya hi ovaṃvidhāḥ prabhāvāḥ śruyante

original: ayamapi ca yajñādanantaramanyatkratvantaraṃ tasyānantaramanyadyajñāntaraṃ cājastramavicchinnaṃ yajatīti // ViP_4,13.136 //
analyzed: ayam api ca yajñāt anantaram anyat kratu antaram tasya anantaram anyat yajña antaram ca ajastram avicchinnam yajati iti

original: analpopādānaṃ cāsyāsaṃśayamatra'sau maṇivarastiṣṭhitīti kṛtādhyavasāyo 'nyatprayojanamuddiśya sakalayādavasamājamātmagṛha evācīkarat // ViP_4,13.137
analyzed: analpa upādānam ca asya asaṃśayam atra asau maṇi varaḥ tiṣṭhiti iti kṛta adhyavasāyaḥ anyat prayojanam uddiśya sakala yādava samājam ātma gṛhe eva acīkarat  /

original: tatra copaviṣṭoṣvakhileṣu yaduṣu pūrvaṃ prayojanamupanyasya paryavasite ca tasmin prasaṃgāntaraparihāsakathāmakrūreṇa kṛtvā janārdanastamakrūramāha

original: dānapate jānīma eva vaya yathā śatadhanvanā tadidamakhilajagatsārabhūtaṃ syamantakaṃ

analyzed: bṛṃhadrathāt ca anyaḥ śakala dvaya janmā jarayā saṃdhitaḥ jarāsaṃdha nāmā
tasmāt sahadevaḥ sahadevāt somapaḥ tatas ca śrutiśravāḥ

original: ityete mayā māgadhā bhūpālāḥ kathitāḥ // ViP_4,19.85 //
analyzed: iti ete mayā māgadhāḥ bhūpālāḥ kathitāḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe caturtha aṃśe ekonaviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
parīkṣitaḥ ca janamejaya śrutasena ugrasena bhīmasenāḥ cātvāraḥ putrāḥ
jahnoḥ tu surathaḥ nāma ātmajaḥ babhūva
tasya api vidūrathaḥ
tasmāt sārvabhomaḥ sārvabhaumāt jayatsenaḥ tasmāt ārādhitaḥ tatas ca ayutāyuḥ ayutāyoḥ akrodhanaḥ
tasmāt devātithiḥ
tatas ca ṛkṣaḥ anyaḥ bhavat
ṛkṣāt bhīmasenaḥ tatas ca dilīpaḥ
dilīpāt pratīpaḥ
tasya api devāpi śantanu bāhlīka saṃjñāḥ trayaḥ putrāḥ babhūvuḥ
devāpiḥ bālaḥ eva araṇyam viveśa
śantanuḥ tu mahīpālaḥ abhūt

original: ayaṃ ca tasya ślokaḥ pṛthivyāṃ gīyate // ViP_4,20.12 //
analyzed: ayam ca tasya ślokaḥ pṛthivyām gīyate

original: yaṃyaṃ karābhyāṃ spṛśati vīrṇaṃ yauvanameti saḥ /
analyzed: yaṃyam karābhyām spṛśati vīrṇam yauvanam eti saḥ

original: śāntiṃ cāpnoti yenāgryāṃ karmaṇā tena śantanuḥ // ViP_4,20.13 //
analyzed: śāntim ca āpnoti yena agryām karmaṇā tena śantanuḥ

original: tasya ca śantano hāṣṭre dvādaśavarṣāṇi devo na vavarṣa // ViP_4,20.14 //
analyzed: tasya ca śantano hāṣṭre dvādaśa varṣāṇi devaḥ na vavarṣa

original: tataścāśeṣarāṣṭravināśamavekṣyāsau rājā brāhmaṇānapṛcchat kasmādasmākaṃ rāṣṭre devo na varṣati ko mamāparādha iti // ViP_4,20.15 //
analyzed: tatas ca aśeṣa rāṣṭra vināśam avekṣya asau rājā brāhmaṇān apṛcchat kasmāt asmākam rāṣṭre devaḥ na varṣati kaḥ mama aparādhaḥ iti
tatas ca tam ūcuḥ brāhmaṇāḥ

original: agrajasya te hīyamavanistvayā saṃbhujyate ataḥ parivettā tvamityuktaḥsa rājā punastānapṛcchat // ViP_4,20.17 //
analyzed: agrajasya te hi iyam avaniḥ tvayā saṃbhujyate atas parivettā tvam iti uktaḥ sa rājā punar tān apṛcchat
kim mayā atra vidheyam iti
tatas te punar api ūcuḥ

original: yāvaddevāpirna patanādibhir deṣair abhibhūyate tāvadetattasyārhaṃ rājyam // ViP_4,20.20 //
analyzed: yāvat devāpiḥ na patana ādibhiḥ deṣaiḥ abhibhūyate tāvat etat tasya arham rājyam

original: tadalametena tu tasmaidīyatāmityukte tasyaṃ mantripravareṇāśmarāviṇā tatrāraṇye tapasvino vedavādavirodhavaktāraḥ prayuktāḥ // ViP_4,20.21
analyzed: tat alam etena tu tasmai dīyatām iti ukte tasyam mantri pravareṇa aśmarāviṇā tatra araṇye tapasvinaḥ veda vāda virodha vaktāraḥ prayuktāḥ

original: tair asyāpy atiṛjumater mahīpatiputrasya buddhir vedavādavirodhamārgānusāriṇyakriyata // ViP_4,20.22 //
analyzed: taiḥ asya api ati ṛju mateḥ mahīpati putrasya buddhiḥ veda vāda virodha mārga anusāriṇī akriyata

original: rājā ca śantanurdvijavacanotpannaparidevanaśokastān brāhmaṇānagrataḥ kṛtvāgrajasya pradānāyāraṇyaṃ jagāma // ViP_4,20.23 //
analyzed: rājā ca śantanuḥ dvija vacana utpanna paridevana śokaḥ tān brāhmaṇān agratas kṛtvā agrajasya pradānāya araṇyam jagāma

original: te brāhmaṇā vedavādānubandhīni vacāṃsi rājyamagrajena kartavyamityarthavanti tamūcuḥ // ViP_4,20.25 //
analyzed: te brāhmaṇāḥ veda vāda anubandhīni vacāṃsi rājyam agrajena kartavyam iti arthavanti tam ūcuḥ
asau api devāpiḥ veda vāda virodha yukti dūṣitam aneka prakāram tān āha
tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ śantanum ūcuḥ

original: āgaccha he rājannalamatrātinirbadhena praśānta evāsāvanā vṛṣṭidoṣaḥ patitoyamanādikālamabhihitavedavacanadūṣaṇoccaraṇāt // ViP_4,20.28 //
analyzed: āgaccha he rājan alam atra ati nirbadhena praśāntaḥ eva asau anāḥ vṛṣṭi doṣaḥ patitaḥ uyam anādi kālam abhihita veda vacana dūṣaṇa uccaraṇāt

original: patite cāgraje naiva te parivetṛtvaṃ bhavatītyuktaḥ śantanuḥsvapuramāgamya rājyamakarot // ViP_4,20.29 //

analyzed: veda vāda virodha vacana uccāraṇa dūṣite ca tasmin devāpau tiṣṭhati api jyeṣṭha bhrātari akhila sasya niṣpattaye vavarṣa bhagavān parjanyaḥ
bāhlīkāt somadattaḥ putraḥ abhūt

original: satyavatyāṃ ca citrāṅgadavicitravīryau dvau putrāvutpādayāmāsa śantanuḥ // ViP_4,20.34 //
analyzed: satyavatyām ca citrāṅgada vicitravīryau dvau putrau utpādayāmāsa śantanuḥ

analyzed: citrāṅgadaḥ tu bālaḥ eva citrāṅgadena eva gandharvoṇā āhave nihataḥ

original: tadupabhogātikhedācca yakṣmaṇā gṛhītaḥ sa pañcatvamagamat // ViP_4,20.37 //
analyzed: tad upabhoga ati khedāt ca yakṣmaṇā gṛhītaḥ sa pañcatvam agamat

original: satyavatīniyogācca matputraḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano māturvacanamanatikramaṇīyamiti kṛtvā vicitravīryakṣetre dhṛtarāṣṭrapāṇḍutatprahitabhujiṣyāyāṃ  #
analyzed: satyavatī niyogāt ca mad putraḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ mātuḥ vacanam an atikramaṇīyam iti kṛtvā vicitravīrya kṣetre dhṛtarāṣṭra pāṇḍu tad prahita bhujiṣyāyām
viduram ca utpādayāmāsa

original: dhatarāṣṭropi gāndhāryāṃ duryodhanaduḥ śāsanapradhānaṃ putraśatamutpādayāmāsa // ViP_4,20.39 //

original: yudhiṣṭhirabhīmasenārjunāḥ kuntyāṃ nakulasahadevau cāśvibhyāṃ mādrayāṃ pañcaputrāḥsamutpāditāḥ // ViP_4,20.40 //
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhira bhīmasena arjunāḥ kuntyām nakula sahadevau ca aśvibhyām mādrayām pañca putrāḥ samutpāditāḥ

analyzed: yudhiṣṭhirāt prativindhyaḥ bhīmasenāt śutasenaḥ śrutakīrtiḥ arjunāt śutānīkaḥ nakulāt śutakarmā sahadevāt

analyzed: kāśī ca bhīmasenāt eva sarvagam sutam avāpa

atas param bhaviṣyān aham bhūpālān kīrtayiṣyāmi

original: yo 'sau yājñavalkyādvedamadhītya kṛpādastrāmyavāpya viṣamaviṣayaviraktacittavṛttiś ca śaunakopadeśādātmajñānapravīṇaḥ paraṃ nirvāṇamavāpsyati
analyzed: yaḥ asau yājñavalkyāt vedam adhītya kṛpāt as trāmi avāpya viṣama viṣaya virakta cittavṛttiḥ ca śaunaka upadeśāt ātma jñāna pravīṇaḥ param nirvāṇam avāpsyati
śatānīkāt aśvamedhadattaḥ bhavitā

adhi sīma kṛṣṇān nicaknuḥ

tasyāḥ pyuṣmaḥ putraḥ bhavitā
uṣṇāt vicitrarathaḥ
tatas śucirathaḥ

original: tasmādvṛṣṇimāṃstataḥsuṣeṇastasyāpi sunīthaḥsunīthānnṛpacakṣustasmādapi sukhibalastasya ca pāriplavastataś ca sunayastasyāpi medhāvī // ViP_4,21.12
analyzed: tasmāt vṛṣṇimān tatas suṣeṇaḥ tasya api sunīthaḥ sunīthāt nṛpacakṣuḥ tasmāt api sukhibalaḥ tasya ca pāriplavaḥ tatas ca sunayaḥ tasya api medhāvī
medhāvinaḥ ripuñjayaḥ tatas ūrvaḥ tasmāt ca tigmaḥ tasmāt bṛhadrathaḥ bṛhadrathāt vasudāsaḥ

tasmāt ca udayanaḥ udayanāt vihīnaraḥ tatas ca daṇḍapāṇiḥ tatas nimittaḥ

atra ayam ślokaḥ
brahma kṣatrasya yaḥ yaḥ nirvaṃśaḥ deva ṛṣi satkṛtaḥ

atas ca ikṣvākavaḥ bhaviṣyāḥ pārthivāḥ kathyante

original: tasmātsahadevaḥ sahadevādbṛhadaśvastatsūnurbhānurathastasya caja pratītāśvastasyāpi supratīkastataś ca marudevastataḥ sunakṣatrastamātkinnaraḥ
analyzed: tasmāt sahadevaḥ sahadevāt bṛhadaśvaḥ tad sūnuḥ bhānurathaḥ tasya caja pratītāśvaḥ tasya api supratīkaḥ tatas ca marudevaḥ tatas sunakṣatraḥ tamāt kinnaraḥ
kinnarāt antarikṣaḥ tasmāt suparṇaḥ tatas ca amitrajit

original: tataś ca bṛhadbhājastasyāpi dharmī dharmīṇaḥ kṛtañjayaḥ // ViP_4,22.6 //
analyzed: tatas ca bṛhadbhājaḥ tasya api dharmī dharmīṇaḥ kṛtañjayaḥ

raṇañjayāt saṃjayaḥ tasmāt śākyaḥ śākyāt śuddhodanaḥ tasmāt rāhulaḥ tatas prasenajit

original: tataś ca kṣudrakastataścaja kuṇḍakastasmādapi surathaḥ // ViP_4,22.9 //
analyzed: tatas ca kṣudrakaḥ tatas ca ja kuṇḍakaḥ tasmāt api surathaḥ

atra anuvaṃśa ślokaḥ

original: yatastaṃ prāpya rājānaṃ saṃsthāṃ prāpsyati vai kalau // ViP_4,22.13 //
analyzed: yatas tam prāpya rājānam saṃsthām prāpsyati vai kalau
iti śrī mahāviṣṇupurāṇe cuturtha aṃśe dvāviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

māgadhānām bārhadrathānām bhāvinām anukramam kathayiṣyāmi

original: atra hi vaṃśe mahābalaparākramā jarāṃsaṃdhapradhānā babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,23.2 //
analyzed: atra hi vaṃśe mahā bala parākramāḥ jarāṃsaṃdha pradhānāḥ babhūvuḥ
jarāsaṃdhasya putraḥ sahadevaḥ
sahadevāt somāpiḥ tasya anuśrutaśravāḥ tasya api ayutāyuḥ tatas ca niramitraḥ tad tanayaḥ sunetraḥ tasmāt api bṛhatkarmā

original: tataś ca senajittataś ca śrutañjayastato viprastasya ca putraḥ śucināmā bhaviṣyati // ViP_4,23.5 //
analyzed: tatas ca senajit tatas ca śrutañjayaḥ tatas vipraḥ tasya ca putraḥ śuci nāmā bhaviṣyati
tasya api kṣemyaḥ tatas ca suvrataḥ suvratāt dharmaḥ tatas suśravā
tatas dṛḍhasenaḥ
tasmāt subalaḥ
subalāt sunītaḥ bhavitā
tatas satyajit
tasmāt viśvajit
tasya api ripuñjayaḥ

original: ityete bārhadrathā bhūpatayo varṣasahasramekaṃ bhaviṣyanti // ViP_4,23.13 //

original: yo 'yaṃ ripuñjayo nāma bārhadrathontyaḥ tasyāmātyo muniko nāma bhaviṣyati // ViP_4,24.1 //

original: sa cainaṃ svāminaṃ hatvā svuputraṃ pradyotanāmānamabhiṣekṣyati // ViP_4,24.2 //
analyzed: sa ca enam svāminam hatvā sva putram pradyota nāmānam abhiṣekṣyati
tasya api balāka nāmā putraḥ bhavitā
tatas ca viśākhu yūpaḥ
tad putraḥ janakaḥ
tasya ca nandivardhanaḥ

original: ityeteṣṭitriṃśaduttaramaṣṭaśataṃ pañca pradyotāḥ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanti // ViP_4,24.8 //
analyzed: iti ete iṣṭi triṃśat uttaram aṣṭaśatam pañca pradyotāḥ pṛthivīm bhokṣyanti
tatas ca śiśunābhaḥ
tad putraḥ kākavarṇaḥ bhavitā
tasya ca putraḥ kṣemadharmā
tasya api kṣataujāḥ
tad putraḥ vidhisāraḥ
tatas ca ajātaśatruḥ
tasmāt arbhakaḥ
tasmāt ca udayanaḥ
tasmāt apinandivardhanaḥ

original: ityete śaiśanābhā bhūpālāstrīṇi varṣaśatāni dviṣaṣṭyadhikāni bhaviṣyanti // ViP_4,24.19 //
analyzed: iti ete śaiśanābhāḥ bhūpālāḥ trīṇi varṣa śatāni dviṣaṣṭi adhikāni bhaviṣyanti

original: mahānandi nastataḥ śūdragarbhodbhavotilubdhotibalo mahāpadmanāmā nandaḥ paraśurāma ivārapo 'khilakṣatrāntakarī bhaviṣyati // ViP_4,24.20 //
analyzed: mahānandi naḥ tatas śūdra garbha udbhava utilubdha utibalaḥ mahāpadma nāmā nandaḥ paraśurāmaḥ akhila kṣatra anta karī bhaviṣyati

original: tataḥ prabhṛti śudrā bhūpālā bhaviṣyanti // ViP_4,24.21 //
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti śudrāḥ bhūpālāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: sa caikacchatrāmanullaṅghitaśāsano mahāpadmaḥ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyate // ViP_4,24.22 //
analyzed: sa ca eka chatrām an ullaṅghita śāsanaḥ mahāpadmaḥ pṛthivīm bhokṣyate

tasya mahāpadmasya anu pṛthivīm bhokṣyanti

original: tataś ca navacaitānnandān kauṭilyo brāhmaṇaḥsamuddhariṣyati // ViP_4,24.26 //
analyzed: tatas ca nava caitān nandān kauṭilyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ samuddhariṣyati

kauṭilyaḥ eva candraguptaḥ utpannam rājye abhiṣekṣyati

original: tasyāpyaśokavardhanastataḥsuyaśāstataś ca daśarathastataś ca saṃyutastataḥ śaliśukastasmātsomaśarmā tasyāpi somaśarmamaḥ śatadhanvā // ViP_4,24.30
analyzed: tasya api aśokavardhanaḥ tatas suyaśāḥ tatas ca daśarathaḥ tatas ca saṃyutaḥ tatas śaliśukaḥ tasmāt somaśarmā tasya api somaśarmamaḥ śatadhanvā  /

original: devabhūtiṃ tu śuṅgarājānaṃ vyasaninaṃ tasyaivāmātyaḥ kaṇvo vasudevanāmā taṃ nihatya svayamavanīṃ bhokṣyati // ViP_4,24.39 //

original: tasyāpi śāntakarṇistataḥ śiviśritastaś ca śivaskandhastasmādapi yajñaśrīstato dviya5stasmāccandraśrīḥ // ViP_4,24.48 //

original: utsādyākhilakṣatrajātiṃ nava nāgāḥ padmavatyāṃ nāma puryāmanugaṅgāprayāgaṃ gayā dguptāṃś ca māgadhā bhokṣyanti // ViP_4,24.63 //

balam eva aśeṣa dharma hetuḥ

original: ityevamanekadoṣottare tu bhūmaṇḍale sarvāvarṇeṣveva yoyo balavānsasa bhūpatirbhaviṣyati // ViP_4,24.93 //

analyzed: mama api bālakaḥ tatra rohiṇī prabhavaḥ hi yaḥ

original: sa rakṣaṇīyo bhavatā yathāyaṃ tanayo nijaḥ // ViP_5,5.5 //
analyzed: sa rakṣaṇīyaḥ bhavatā yathā ayam tanayaḥ nijaḥ
iti uktāḥ prayayuḥ gopāḥ nanda gopa purogamāḥ

original: śakaṭāropitair bhāḍaiḥ karaṃ dattvā mahābalāḥ // ViP_5,5.6 //
analyzed: śakaṭa āropitaiḥ bhāḍaiḥ karam dattvā mahā balāḥ
vasatām gokule teṣām pūtanā bāla ghātinī

original: suptaṃ kṛṣṇamupādāya rātrau tasmai stanaṃ dadau // ViP_5,5.7 //
analyzed: suptam kṛṣṇam upādāya rātrau tasmai stanam dadau

original: yasmai yasmai stanaṃ rātrau pūtanā saṃprayacchati /
analyzed: yasmai yasmai stanam rātrau pūtanā saṃprayacchati
kṣaṇena aṅgam bālakasya upahanyate
kṛṣṇaḥ tu tad stanam gāḍham karābhyām atipīḍitam
gṛhītvā prāṇa sahitam papau krodha samanvitaḥ
sā ati mukta mahā rāvā vicchinna strāyu bandhanā
papāta pūtanā bhūmau mriyamāṇā ati bhīṣaṇā
tad nāda śruti saṃtrastāḥ pravuddhāḥ te vraja okasaḥ

original: dadṛśuḥ pūtanotsaṃge kṛṣṇaṃ tāṃ ca nipātitām // ViP_5,5.11 //
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ pūtanā utsaṃge kṛṣṇam tām ca nipātitām
ādāya kṛṣṇam saṃtrastā yaśodā api dvijottama
go puccha bhrāmaṇena atha bāla doṣam apākarot
go karīṣam upādāya nanda gopaḥ api mastake
kṛṣṇasya pradadaḥ rakṣām kurvaḥ ca etat udīrayan
nanda gopaḥ uvāca
rakṣatu tvām aśeṣāṇām bhūtānām prabhavaḥ hariḥ
yasya nābhi samudbhūta paṅkajāt abhavat jagat
yena daṃṣṭra agra vidhṛtā dhārayati avaniḥ jagat
varāha rūpa dhṛk devaḥ sa tvām rakṣatu keśavaḥ

original: nṛsiṃharūpī sarvatra rakṣatu tvāṃ janārdanaḥ // ViP_5,5.16 //
analyzed: nṛsiṃha rūpī sarvatra rakṣatu tvām janārdanaḥ

original: vāmano rakṣatu sadā bhavantaṃ yaḥ kṣaṇādabhūt /
analyzed: vāmanaḥ rakṣatu sadā bhavantam yaḥ kṣaṇāt abhūt

original: śiraste pātu govindaḥ kaṇṭhaṃ rakṣatu keśavaḥ /
analyzed: śiraḥ te pātu govindaḥ kaṇṭham rakṣatu keśavaḥ

original: guhyaṃ ca jaṭharaṃ viṣṇurjaghe pādau janārdanaḥ // ViP_5,5.18 //
analyzed: guhyam ca jaṭharam viṣṇuḥ jaghe pādau janārdanaḥ

original: mukhaṃ bāhū prabāhū ca manaḥ sarvedriyāṇi ca /
analyzed: mukham bāhū prabāhū ca manaḥ sarva idriyāṇi ca
rakṣatu avyāhata aiśvaryaḥ tava nārāyaṇaḥ avyayaḥ
śārṅga cakra gadā pāṇeḥ śaṅkha nāda hatāḥ kṣayam
gacchantu preta kūṣmāṇḍa rākṣasāḥ ye tava ahitāḥ

original: tvāṃ pātu dikṣu vaikuṇṭho vidikṣu madhusūdanaḥ /
analyzed: tvām pātu dikṣu vaikuṇṭhaḥ vidikṣu madhusūdanaḥ

original: hṛṣīkeśoṃ'bare bhūmau rakṣatu tvāṃ mahīdharaḥ // ViP_5,5.21 //
analyzed: hṛṣīkeśa uṃ'bare bhūmau rakṣatu tvām mahīdharaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
evam kṛta svastyayanaḥ nanda gopena bālakaḥ
śāyitaḥ śakaṭasya adhas bāla paryaṅkikā tale

original: te ca gopā mahaddṛṣṭvā pūtanāyāḥ kalevaram /
analyzed: te ca gopāḥ mahat dṛṣṭvā pūtanāyāḥ kalevaram

original: mṛtāyāḥ paramaṃ trāsaṃ vismayaṃ ca tadā yayuḥ // ViP_5,5.23 //
analyzed: mṛtāyāḥ paramam trāsam vismayam ca tadā yayuḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe pañcamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
kadācid śakaṭasya adhas śayānaḥ madhusūdanaḥ

original: cikṣepa caraṇāvūrdhvaṃ stanyārthī praruroda ha // ViP_5,6.1 //
analyzed: cikṣepa caraṇau ūrdhvam stanya arthī praruroda ha
tasya pāda prahāreṇa śakaṭam parivartitam
vidhvasta kuṃbha bhāṇḍam tad viparītam papāta vai
tatas hāhākṛtaḥ sarvaḥ gopa ropī janaḥ dvija
ājagāma atha dadṛśe bālam utāna śāyinam
gopāḥ kena iti kena idam śakaṭam parivartitam
tatra eva bālakāḥ procuḥ bālena anena pātitam
rudatā dṛṣṭam asmābhiḥ pāda vikṣepa pātitam

original: śakaṭaṃ parivṛttaṃ vai naitadanyasya ceṣṭitam // ViP_5,6.5 //
analyzed: śakaṭam parivṛttam vai na etat anyasya ceṣṭitam
tatas punar atīva āsan gopāḥ vismaya cetasaḥ
nanda gopaḥ upi jagrāha bālam atyanta vismitaḥ
yaśodā śakaṭa ārūḍha bhagna bhāṇḍa kapālikā
śakaṭam ca arcayāmāsa dadhi puṣpa phala akṣataiḥ
gargaḥ ca gokule tatra vasudeva pracoditaḥ

original: pracchanna eva gopānāṃ saṃskārāna karottayoḥ // ViP_5,6.8 //
analyzed: pracchannaḥ eva gopānām saṃskārān a karot tayoḥ

original: jyeṣṭhaṃ ca rāmamityāha kṛṣṇaṃ caiva tathāvaram /
analyzed: jyeṣṭham ca rāmam iti āha kṛṣṇam ca eva tathā avaram

original: gargo matimatāṃ śreṣṭho nāma kurvanmahāmatiḥ // ViP_5,6.9 //
analyzed: gargaḥ matimatām śreṣṭhaḥ nāma kurvan mahāmatiḥ

original: svalpenaiva tu kālena raṅgiṇau tau tadā vrahe /
analyzed: su alpena eva tu kālena raṅgiṇau tau tadā vrahe
ghṛṣṭa jānu karau vipra babhūvatuḥ ubhau api
karīṣa bhasma digdha aṅgau bhramamāṇau itas tatas

original: na nivārayituṃ sehe yaśodā tau na rohiṇī // ViP_5,6.11 //
analyzed: na nivārayitum sehe yaśodā tau na rohiṇī
go vāṭa madhye krīḍantau vatsa vāṭam gatau punar
tad ahar jāta go vatsa puccha ākarṣaṇa tatparau
yadā yaśodā tau bālau eka sthāna carau ubhau
śaśāka naḥ vārayitum krīḍantau ati cañcalau

original: dāmnā madhye tato baddhā babandha tamulūkhale /
analyzed: dāmnā madhye tatas baddhā babandha tam ulūkhale
kṛṣṇam akliṣṭa karmāṇam āha ca idam amarṣitā
yadi śaknoṣi gaccha tvam ati cañcala ceṣṭita

original: ityuktvātha nijaṃ karma sā cakāra kuṭuṃbinī // ViP_5,6.15 //
analyzed: iti uktvā atha nijam karma sā cakāra kuṭuṃbinī
vyāgrāyām atha tasyām sa karṣam āmaḥ ulūkhalam
yamala arjuna madhyena jagāma kamala īkṣaṇaḥ
karṣatā vṛkṣayoḥ madhye tiryak gatam ulūkhalam
bhagnau uttuṅga śākhā agrau tena tau yamala arjunau
tatas kaṭakaṭa śabda samākarmana tatparaḥ

original: ājagāma vrajajano dadarśa ca mahādrumau // ViP_5,6.18 //
analyzed: ājagāma vraja janaḥ dadarśa ca mahā drumau
nava udgata alpa danta aṃśu sita hāsam ca bālakam

original: tayormadhyagataṃ dāmnā baddhaṃ gāḍhaṃ tathodare // ViP_5,6.19 //
analyzed: tayoḥ madhya gatam dāmnā baddham gāḍham tathā udare

original: tataś ca tāmodaratāṃ sa yayau dāmabandhanāt // ViP_5,6.20 //
analyzed: tatas ca tāmodara tām sa yayau dāma bandhanāt
gopa vṛddhāḥ tatas sarve nanda gopa purogamāḥ
mantrayāmāsuḥ udvignāḥ mahā utpāta ati bhīravaḥ
sthānena iha na naḥ kāryam vrajāmaḥ nyat mahā vanam

original: utpātā bahavo hyatra dṛśyante nāśahetavaḥ // ViP_5,6.22 //
analyzed: utpātāḥ bahavaḥ hi atra dṛśyante nāśa hetavaḥ
pūtanāyāḥ vināśaḥ ca śakaṭasya viparyayaḥ
vinā vāta ādi doṣeṇa drumayoḥ patanam tathā
vṛndāvanam itas sthānāt tasmāt gacchāma mā ciram
yāvat bhauma mahā utpāta doṣaḥ

original: iti kṛtvā matiṃ sarve gamane te vrajaukasaḥ /
analyzed: iti kṛtvā matim sarve gamane te vraja okasaḥ

original: ūcuḥ svaṃ svaṃ kulaṃ śīghraṃ gamyatāṃ mā vilaṃbatha // ViP_5,6.25 //
analyzed: ūcuḥ svam svam kulam śīghram gamyatām mā vilaṃbatha

original: tataḥ kṣaṇena prayayuḥ śakaṭair godhanais tathā /
analyzed: tatas kṣaṇena prayayuḥ śakaṭaiḥ go dhanaiḥ tathā

original: yūthaśo vatsapālāś ca kālayanto vrajaukasaḥ // ViP_5,6.26 //
analyzed: yūthaśas vatsa pālāḥ ca kālayantaḥ vraja okasaḥ
dravya avayava nirdhūtam kṣaṇa mātreṇa tat tathā
kāka bhāsa samākīrṇam vraja sthānam abhūt dūja
vṛndāvanam bhagavatā kṛṣṇena kliṣṭa karmaṇā

original: śubhena manasā dhyātaṃ gavaṃ siddhimabhīpsatā // ViP_5,6.28 //
analyzed: śubhena manasā dhyātam gavam siddhim abhīpsatā
tatas tatra ati rūkṣe api gharma kāle dvijottama
prāvṛṣ kāle iva udbhūtam nava śaṣpam samantataḥ

original: sa samāvāsitaḥ sarvo vrajo vṛndāvane tataḥ /
analyzed: sa samāvāsitaḥ sarvaḥ vrajaḥ vṛndāvane tatas
śakaṭa āvāṭa paryantaḥ candra ardha ākāra saṃsthitaḥ
vatsa pālau ca saṃvṛttau rāma dāmodarau tatas
eka sthana sthitau goṣṭhe ceratuḥ bāla līlayā
barhi patra kṛta āpīḍau vanya puṣpa avataṃsakau
gopa veṇu kṛta ātodya patra vādya kṛta svanau
kākapakṣa dharau bālau kumārau iva pāvakī

original: hasaṃtau ca ramantau ca ceratuḥ sma mahāvanam // ViP_5,6.33 //
analyzed: hasaṃtau ca ramantau ca ceratuḥ sma mahā vanam
kvacid vahantau anyonyam krīḍamānau tathā paraiḥ
gopa putraiḥ samam vatsān cārayantau viceratuḥ

original: kālena gacchatā tau tu saptavarṣau mahāvraje /
analyzed: kālena gacchatā tau tu sapta varṣau mahāvraje

original: sarvasya jagataḥ pālau vatsapālau babhūvatuḥ // ViP_5,6.35 //
analyzed: sarvasya jagataḥ pālau vatsa pālau babhūvatuḥ
megha ogha sthagita aṃbaraḥ
babhūva vāri dhārābhiḥ aikyam kurvan diśām iva
prarūḍha nava śaṣpa āḍhyā śakragopa ācitā mahī
tathā mārakatī iva āsīt padmarāga vibhūṣitā
ūhuḥ unmārga vāhīni nimnagā aṃbhāṃsi sarvatas

original: manāṃsi durvinītānāṃ prāpya lakṣmīṃ navāmiva // ViP_5,6.38 //
analyzed: manāṃsi durvinītānām prāpya lakṣmīm navām iva
na reje intaritaḥ candraḥ nirmalaḥ malinaiḥ ghanaiḥ
sat vādi vādaḥ mūrkhaṇām pragalbhābhiḥ iva uktibhiḥ
nirguṇena api cāpena śakrasya gagane padam
avāpya tā vivekasya nṛpasya eva parigrahe
megha pṛṣṭhe balākānām rarāja vimalā tatiḥ
durvatte vṛtta ceṣṭā iva kulīnasya ati śaubhanā
na bandha aṃbare sthairyam vidyut atyanta cañcalā

original: maitrīva pravare puṃsi durjanena prayojitā // ViP_5,6.42 //
analyzed: maitrī iva pravare puṃsi durjanena prayojitā
mārgāḥ babhūvuḥ aspaṣṭāḥ tṛṇa śaṣpa caya āvṛtāḥ
artha antaram anuprāptāḥ prajaḍānām iva uktayaḥ
unmatta śikhi sāraṅge tasmin kāle mahā vane

original: kṛṣṇarāmau mudāyuktau gopālaiś ceratuḥ saha // ViP_5,6.44 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāmau mudā yuktau gopālaiḥ ceratuḥ saha
kvicid gobhiḥ samam ramyam go yata ana ratau ubhau
ceratuḥ kvacid atyartham śītavṛkṣa tala āśritau
kvacid kadaṃba sraj citrau mayūra sraj virājitau
viliptau kvacid āsātām vividhaiḥ giri dhātubhiḥ
parṇa śayyāsu saṃsuptau kvacid nidrā antara eṣiṇau
kvacid garjati jīmūte hāhākāra rava ākulau
gāyatām anya gopānām praśaṃsā paramau kvacid
mayūra kekā anugatau gopa veṇu pravādakau
iti nānāvidhaiḥ bhāvaiḥ uttama prīti saṃyutau
krīḍantau tau vane tasmin ceratuḥ tuṣṭa mānasau
vikāle ca samam gobhiḥ gopa vṛnda samanvitau
vihṛtya atha yathāyogam vrajam etya mahā balau
gopaiḥ samānaiḥ sahitau krīḍantau amarau iva
evam tau ūṣatuḥ tatra rāma kṛṣṇau mahā dyutī
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe ṣaṣṭhaḥ udhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: ekadā tu vinā rāmaṃ kṛṣṇo vṛndāvanaṃ yayau /
analyzed: ekadā tu vinā rāmam kṛṣṇaḥ vṛndāvanam yayau
vicacāra vṛtaḥ gopaiḥ vanya puṣpa sraj ujjvalaḥ
sa jagāma atha kālindīm lola kallola śālinīm
tīra saṃlagna phena oghaiḥ hasantīm iva sarvatas
tasyāḥ ca ti mahā bhīmam viṣa agni śrita vāriṇam
hradam kālīya nāgasya dadarśa ati vibhīṣaṇam
viṣa agninā prasaratā dagdha tīram mahīruham
vāta āhata aṃbu vikṣepa sparśa dagdha vihaṅgamam
tam atīva mahā raudram mṛtyu vakram iva aparam
vilokya cintayāmāsa bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
asmin vasati duṣṭa ātmā kālīyaḥ asau viṣa āyudhaḥ

original: yo mayā nirjitastyaktvā duṣṭo gacchetpayonidhim // ViP_5,7.6 //
analyzed: yaḥ mayā nirjitaḥ tyaktvā duṣṭaḥ gacchet payonidhim
tena iyam dūṣitā sarvā yamunā sāgaraṅgamā

original: na naraigodhanaiś cāpi tṛṣārtair upabhujyate // ViP_5,7.7 //
analyzed: na nara egodhanaiḥ ca api tṛṣā ārtaiḥ upabhujyate
tat asya nāga rājasya kartavyaḥ nigrahaḥ mayā
nistrāsāḥ tu sukham yena careyuḥ vraja vāsinaḥ
etad artham tu loke ismin avatāraḥ kṛtaḥ mayā
yat eṣām utpatha sthānām kāryā śāntiḥ durātmanām
tat etam na ati dūra stham kadaṃbam uru śākhinam
adiḥ udya patiṣyāmi hrade asmin anilāśinaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: itthaṃ vicintya baddhā ca gāḍhaṃ parikaraṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: ittham vicintya baddhā ca gāḍham parikaram tatas

original: nipapāta hrade tatra nāgarājasya vegataḥ // ViP_5,7.11 //
analyzed: nipapāta hrade tatra nāga rājasya vegataḥ
tena atipatatā tatra kṣobhitaḥ sa mahā hradaḥ
atyartham dūra jātān tu samasiṃcat mahīruhān
te hi duṣṭa viṣa jvālā tapta aṃbu pavana ukṣitāḥ
jajvaluḥ pādāpāḥ sadyas jvālā vyāpta digantarāḥ
āsphoṭayāmāsa tadā kṛṣṇaḥ nāga hrane bhujam
tad śabda śravaṇāt ca āśu nāga rājaḥ abhyupāgamat
ātāmra nayanaḥ kopāt viṣa jvālā ākulaiḥ mukhaiḥ

original: vṛto mahāviṣaiś cānyair uragair anilāśanaiḥ // ViP_5,7.15 //
analyzed: vṛtaḥ mahāviṣaiḥ ca anyaiḥ uragaiḥ anilāśanaiḥ
nāga patnyaḥ ca śataśas hāri hāra upaśobhitāḥ
prakaṃpita tanu kṣepa calat kuntasa kāntayaḥ
tatas praveṣṭitaḥ sarpaiḥ sa kṛṣṇe bhoga bandhanaiḥ

original: dadaṃśuste 'pi taṃ kṛṣṇaṃ viṣajvālākulair mukhaiḥ // ViP_5,7.17 //
analyzed: dadaṃśuḥ te api tam kṛṣṇam viṣa jvālā ākulaiḥ mukhaiḥ
tam tatra patitam dṛṣṭvā sarpa bhogauḥ nipīḍitam
gopāḥ vrajam upāgamya cukruśuḥ śoka lālasāḥ
gopāḥ ūcuḥ

original: eṣa mohaṃ gataḥ kṛṣṇo magnau vai kāliyahrade /
analyzed: eṣa moham gataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ magnau vai kāliya hrade
bhakṣyate nāga rājena tam āgacchata paśyata

original: tacchutvā tatra te gopā vajrapā topamaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: tat śutvā tatra te gopāḥ vajrapāḥ vacaḥ

original: gopyaś ca tvarītā jagmuryaśodāpramukhā hradam // ViP_5,7.20 //
analyzed: gopyaḥ ca tvarītāḥ jagmuḥ yaśodā pramukhāḥ hradam
hāhā kva asau iti janaḥ gopīnām ati vihvalaḥ

original: yaśodayā samaṃ bhrānto drutapraskhalitaṃ yayau // ViP_5,7.21 //
analyzed: yaśodayā samam bhrāntaḥ druta praskhalitam yayau
nanda gopaḥ ca gopāḥ ca rāmaḥ ca adbhuta vikramaḥ
tvaritam yamunām jagmuḥ kṛṣṇa darśana lālāsāḥ
dadṛśuḥ ca api te tatra sarpa rāja vaśaṅgatam
niṣprayatnīkṛtam kṛṣṇam sarpa bhoga viveṣṭitam
nanda gopaḥ upi niśceṣṭaḥ nyasya putra mukhe dṛśam

original: yaśodā ca mahābhāgā babhūva munisattama // ViP_5,7.24 //
analyzed: yaśodā ca mahābhāgā babhūva muni sattama

original: gopyas tvanyā rudantyaś ca dadṛśuḥ śokakātarāḥ /
analyzed: gopyaḥ tu anyāḥ rudantyaḥ ca dadṛśuḥ śoka kātarāḥ

original: procuś ca keśavaṃ prītyā bhayakātaryagadgadam // ViP_5,7.25 //
analyzed: procuḥ ca keśavam prītyā bhaya kātarya gadgadam
gopyaḥ ūcuḥ
sarvāḥ yaśodayā sārdha viśāmaḥ utra mahā hradam

original: sarparājasya no gantumasmābhir yujyate vrajam // ViP_5,7.26 //
analyzed: sarpa rājasya naḥ gantum asmābhiḥ yujyate vrajam

original: divasaḥ so vinā sūryaṃ vinā candreṇa kā niśā /
analyzed: divasaḥ saḥ vinā sūryam vinā candreṇa kā niśā

original: vinā vṛṣeṇa kā gāvo vinā kṛṣṇena ko vrajaḥ // ViP_5,7.27 //
analyzed: vinā vṛṣeṇa kāḥ gāvaḥ vinā kṛṣṇena kaḥ vrajaḥ
vinākṛtāḥ na yāsyāmaḥ kṛṣṇena anena gokulam

original: aramyaṃ nātisevyaṃ ca vārihīnaṃ yathā saraḥ // ViP_5,7.28 //
analyzed: aramyam na atisevyam ca vāri hīnam yathā saraḥ
yatra na indīvara śyāma kāya kāntiḥ ayam hariḥ
tena api pātuḥ vāsena ratiḥ asti iti vismayaḥ
utphulla paṅkaja dala spaṣṭa kānti vilocanam

original: apaśyanto hariṃ dīnāḥ kathaṃ goṣṭhe bhaviṣyatha // ViP_5,7.30 //
analyzed: a paśyantaḥ harim dīnāḥ katham goṣṭhe bhaviṣyatha
atyanta madhura ālāpa hṛta aśeṣa manoratham

original: na vinā puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ yāsyāmo nandagokulam // ViP_5,7.31 //
analyzed: na vinā puṇḍarīkākṣam yāsyāmaḥ nanda gokulam

original: gopāṃś ca trāsavidhurānvi lokya stimitekṣaṇān // ViP_5,7.33 //
analyzed: gopān ca trāsa vidhurān vi lokya stimita īkṣaṇān

original: vyajyatetyantamātmānaṃ kimanantaṃ na votsi yat // ViP_5,7.35 //
analyzed: vyajyate iti antam ātmānam kim anantam na votsi yat

analyzed: kartā apahartā pātā ca traulokyam tvam trayī mayaḥ

original: cintyase tvamacintyātman samastaiś caiva yogibhiḥ // ViP_5,7.37 //
analyzed: cintyase tvam acintya ātman samastaiḥ ca eva yogibhiḥ

original: viḍambayantastvallīlāṃ sarva eva sahā sate // ViP_5,7.39 //
analyzed: viḍambayantaḥ tvad līlām sarve eva sahā sate

original: atrāvatīrṇayoḥ kṛṣṇa gopā eva hi bāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: atra avatīrṇayoḥ kṛṣṇa gopāḥ eva hi bāndhavāḥ

original: tadayaṃ damyatāṃ kṛṣṇa duṣṭatmā daśanāyudhaḥ // ViP_5,7.42 //

ānamya ca api hastābhyām ubhābhyām madhyamam śiraḥ

original: yatronnatiṃ ca kurute nanāmāsya tataḥ śiraḥ // ViP_5,7.45 //
analyzed: yatra unnatim ca kurute nanāma asya tatas śiraḥ

original: paramārthamaṇoralpaṃ sthūlātsthūlaṃ natāḥ sma tam // ViP_5,7.51 //

analyzed: kāraṇam kāliya sya asya damane śruyatām vacaḥ
striyaḥ anukaṃpyāḥ sādhūnām mūḍhāḥ dīnāḥ ca jantavaḥ

tvad pāda pīḍitaḥ jahyāt muhūrtārdhana jīvitam
kva pannagaḥ alpa vīryaḥ ayam kva bhavān bhuvana āśrayaḥ
prīti dveṣau sama utkṛṣṭa gocarau bhavataḥ avyaya

prāṇān tyajati nāgaḥ ayam bhartṛ bhikṣā pradīyatām

iti ukte tābhiḥ āśvasya klānta dehaḥ api pannagaḥ

original: prasīda devadeveti prāha vākyaṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // ViP_5,7.60 //
analyzed: prasīda devadeva iti prāha vākyam śanais śanais
kāliyaḥ uvāca

original: nirastātiśayaṃ yasya tasya stoṣyāmi kitrvaham // ViP_5,7.61 //

original: vasavaś ca sahādityais tasya stoṣyāmi kitrvaham // ViP_5,7.63 //
analyzed: vasavaḥ ca saha ādityaiḥ tasya stoṣyāmi kitru aham

original: paramārthaṃ na jānanti tasya stoṣyāmi kitrvaham // ViP_5,7.65 //
analyzed: parama artham na jānanti tasya stoṣyāmi kitru aham

original: gopā mūrdhani hārdena siṣicur netrajair jalaiḥ // ViP_5,7.81 //

original: daitya gardabhadehaiś ca maitreya śuśubhe 'dhikam // ViP_5,8.12 //
analyzed: daitya gardabha dehaiḥ ca maitreya śuśubhe adhikam

iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe aṣṭamaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: saumyaṃ tadgopagopīnāṃ ramyaṃ tālavanaṃ babhau // ViP_5,9.1 //

original: cārayantau ca gā dūre vyāharantau ca nāmabhiḥ // ViP_5,9.3 //
analyzed: cārayantau ca gāḥ dūre vyāharantau ca nāmabhiḥ
niryoga pāśa skandhau tau vanamālā vibhūṣitau
śuśubhāte mahātmānau balāśṛṅgau iva ṛṣabhau
suvarṇa añjana cūrṇābhyām tau tadā rūṣita aṃbarau
mahā indrāyudha saṃyuktau śveta kṛṣṇau iva aṃbudau
ceratuḥ lauka siddhābhiḥ krīḍābhiḥ itaretaram
samasta loka nāthānām nātha bhūtau bhuvam gatau
manuṣya dharma abhiratau mānayantau manuṣya tām
tad jāti guṇa yuktābhiḥ kriḍābhiḥ ceratuḥ vanam
tatas tu āndolikābhiḥ ca niyuddhaiḥ ca mahā balau
vyāyāmam cakratuḥ tatra kṣepaṇīyaiḥ tathā aśmabhiḥ
tad lipsuḥ asuraḥ tatra hi ubhayoḥ ramamāṇayoḥ
ājagāma pralaṃba ākhyaḥ gopa veṣa tirohitaḥ
saḥ avagāhata niḥśaṅkaḥ teṣām madhyama mānuṣaḥ
mānuṣam vapuḥ āsthāya pralaṃbaḥ dānava uttamaḥ

original: kṛṣṇaṃ tato rauhiṇeyaṃ hantuṃ cakre manoratham // ViP_5,9.11 //

original: prakurvanto hi te sarve dvaudvau yugapadutthitau // ViP_5,9.12 //
analyzed: prakurvantaḥ hi te sarve dvau dvau yugapad utthitau

original: śrīdāmnā saha govindaḥ pralaṃbena tathā balaḥ /
analyzed: śrīdāmnā saha govindaḥ pralaṃbena tathā balaḥ
gopālauḥ aparaiḥ ca anye gopālāḥ pupluvuḥ tatas
śrīdāmānam tatas kṛṣṇaḥ pralaṃbam rohiṇīsutaḥ
jitavān kṛṣṇa pakṣīyaiḥ gopaiḥ anye parājitāḥ
te vāhayantaḥ tu anyonyam bhāṇḍīram vaṭam etya vai
punar nivavṛtuḥ sarve ye ye tatra parijitāḥ

original: nabhaḥsthalaṃ jagāmāśu sacandra iva vāridaḥ // ViP_5,9.16 //
analyzed: nabhaḥ sthalam jagāma āśu sa candraḥ iva vāridaḥ

original: vavṛdhe sa mahākāyaḥ prāvṛṣīva balāhakaḥ // ViP_5,9.17 //
analyzed: vavṛdhe sa mahā kāyaḥ prāvṛṣi iva balāhakaḥ
saṃkarṣaṇaḥ tu tam dṛṣṭvā dagdha śaila upama ākṛtim
makuṭa āṭopa mastakam
raudram śakaṭa cakra akṣam pāda nyāsa calat kṣitim
a bhīta manasā tena rakṣasā rohiṇīsutaḥ
hriyamāmaḥ tatas kṛṣṇam idam vacanam abravīt
kṛṣṇa akṛṣṇa hriyāmi eṣa parvata udagra mūrtinā
kena api paśya daityena gopāla chadma rūpiṇā
yat atra sāṃpratam kāryam mayā madhuniṣūdana
tat kathyatām prayāti eṣa durātmā ati tvarā anvitaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
tam āha rāmam govindaḥ smita bhinna uṣṭha saṃpuṭaḥ
mahātmā rauhiṇeyasya bala vīrya pramāma āvid
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
kim ayam mānuṣaḥ bhāvaḥ vyaktam eva avalaṃbyate
sarva ātman sarva guhyānām guhya guhya ātmanā tvayā
smara aśeṣa jagat bīja kāraṇam kāraṇa agraja

original: ātmānamekaṃ tadvacca jagatyekārṇave ca yat // ViP_5,9.24 //
analyzed: ātmānam ekam tadvat ca jagati ekārṇave ca yat

original: kiṃ na vetsi yathāhaṃ ca tvaṃ caikaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhuvaḥ /
analyzed: kim na vetsi yathā aham ca tvam ca ekam kāraṇam bhuvaḥ
bhāra avatāraṇa arthāya martya lokam upāgatau

original: somo manaste śvasitaṃ samīraṇo diśaścatasro 'vyaya bāhavaste // ViP_5,9.26 //
analyzed: somaḥ manaḥ te śvasitam samīraṇaḥ diśaḥ catasraḥ avyaya bāhavaḥ te
sahasrabatrkraḥ bhagavān mahātmā sahasra hasta aṅghri śarīra bhedaḥ
sahasra padma udbhava yoniḥ ādyaḥ sahasraśas tvām munayaḥ gṛṇanti

original: divyaṃ hi rūpaṃ tava vetti nānyo devair aśeṣair avatārarūpam /

original: prītyā sapraśrayaṃ vākyaṃ punarāha śacīpatiḥ // ViP_5,12.15 //

kaṃsaḥ uvāca

original: bho bho dānapate vākyaṃ kriyatāṃ prītaye mama /
analyzed: bho bho dānapate vākyam kriyatām prītaye mama
itas syandanam āruhya gamyatām nanda gokulam
vasudeva sutau tatra viṣṇoḥ aṃśa samudbhavau

original: nāśāya kila saṃbhūtau mama duṣṭau pravardhataḥ // ViP_5,15.14 //
analyzed: nāśāya kila saṃbhūtau mama duṣṭau pravardhataḥ
dhanuḥ mahaḥ mama api atra caturdaśyām bhaviṣyati

original: āneyau bhavatā gatvā mallayuddhāya tatra tau // ViP_5,15.15 //
analyzed: āneyau bhavatā gatvā malla yuddhāya tatra tau
cāṇūra muṣṭikau mallau niyuddha kuśalau mama
tābhyām saha anayoḥ yuddham sarva lokaḥ atra paśyatu
gajaḥ kuvalayāpīḍaḥ mahāmātra pracoditaḥ

original: sa vā haniṣyate pāpau vasudevātmajau śiśu // ViP_5,15.17 //
analyzed: sa vā haniṣyate pāpau vasudeva ātmajau

original: tau hatvā vasudevaṃ ca nandagopaṃ ca durmatim /
analyzed: tau hatvā vasudevam ca nanda gopam ca durmatim
haniṣye pitaram ca enam ugrasenam su durmatim
tatas samasta gopānām go dhanāni akhilāni aham
vittam ca apahariṣyāmi duṣṭānām mad vadha eṣiṇām
tvām ṛte yādavāḥ ca ete dviṣaḥ dānapate mama
eteṣām ca vadhāya aham yatiṣye anukramāt tatas
tadā niṣkaṇṭakam sarvam rājyam etat ayādavam

original: prasādhiṣye tvayā tasmānmatprītyai vīra gamyatām // ViP_5,15.21 //
analyzed: prasādhiṣye tvayā tasmāt mad prītyai vīra gamyatām
yathā ca māhiṣam sarpiḥ dadhi ca api upahārya vai

original: gopāḥsamānayantvāśu tathā vācyāstvayā ca te // ViP_5,15.22 //
analyzed: gopāḥ samānayantu āśu tathā vācyāḥ tvayā ca te
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti ājñaptaḥ tadā akrūraḥ mahā bhāgavataḥ dvaja
prītimān abhavat kṛṣṇam śvas udrakṣyāmi iti sa tvaraḥ
tathā iti aktvā ca rājānam ratham āruhya śobhanam

original: niścakrāma tataḥ puryā mathurāyā madhupriyaḥ // ViP_5,15.24 //
analyzed: niścakrāma tatas puryāḥ mathurāyāḥ madhupriyaḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañca māse pañcadaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
keśī ca api bala udagraḥ kaṃsa dūtaḥ pracoditaḥ
kṛṣṇasya nidhana ākāṅkṣī vṛndāvanam upāgamat
sa khura kṣata bhū pṛṣṭhaḥ saṭā ākṣepa dhuta aṃbudaḥ
druta vikrānta candra arka mārgaḥ gopān upādravat
tasya deṣita śabdena gopālāḥ daitya vājinaḥ

original: gopyaś ca bhayasaṃvignā govindaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // ViP_5,16.3 //
analyzed: gopyaḥ ca bhaya saṃvignāḥ govindam śaraṇam yayuḥ
trāhi trāhi ti govindaḥ śrutvā teṣām tatas vacaḥ
sa toya jalada dhvāna gaṃbhīram idam uktavān

original: alaṃ trāsena gopālāḥ keśinaḥ kiṃ bhayāturaiḥ /
analyzed: alam trāsena gopālāḥ keśinaḥ kim bhaya āturaiḥ

original: bhavidbhir gopajātī yair vīravīryaṃ vilopyate // ViP_5,16.5 //
analyzed: bhavidbhiḥ gopa jātī yaiḥ vīra vīryam vilopyate
kim anonā alpa sāreṇa haṣita āṭopa kāriṇā
daiteya bala vāhyena valgatā duṣṭa vājinā
ehi ehi duṣṭa kṛṣṇaḥ aham pūṣṇaḥ tu iva pināka dhṛt
pātayiṣyāmi daśanān vadanāt akhilān tava
iti uktvā āsphoṭya govindaḥ keśinaḥ saṃmukham yayau

original: vivṛtāsyaś ca so 'py enaṃ daiteyāśva upādravat // ViP_5,16.8 //
analyzed: vivṛta āsyaḥ ca saḥ api enam daiteya aśvaḥ upādravat
bāhum ābhogitam kṛtvā makhe tasya janārdanaḥ
praveśayāmāsa tadā keśinaḥ duṣṭa vājinaḥ
keśinaḥ vadanam tena viśatā kṛṣṇa bāhunā

original: śātitā daśanāḥ petuḥ sitābbrāvayavā iva // ViP_5,16.10 //
analyzed: śātitāḥ daśanāḥ petuḥ sita abbra avayavāḥ iva
kṛṣṇasya vavṛdhe bāhuḥ keśi deha gataḥ dvija
vināśāya yathā vyādhiḥ āsaṃbhūteḥ upekṣitaḥ
vipāṭita uṣṭhaḥ bahulam sa phenam rudhiram vaman

original: sokṣiṇī vivṛte cakre viśiṣṭe muktabandhane // ViP_5,16.12 //
analyzed: sa ukṣiṇī vivṛte cakre viśiṣṭe mukta bandhane
jadhāna dharaṇīm pādaiḥ śakṛt mūtram samutsṛjan
sveda ārdra gātraḥ śāntaḥ ca niryatnaḥ saḥ abhavat tadā
vyādita āsya mahāṃrandhraḥ saḥ asuraḥ kṛṣṇa bāhunā

original: nipātito dvidhā bhūmau vaidyutena yathā drumaḥ // ViP_5,16.14 //
analyzed: nipātitaḥ dvidhā bhūmau vaidyutena yathā drumaḥ
dvi pāde pṛṣṭha puccha ardha śravaṇa eka akṣi nāsike

original: keśinaste dvidhā bhūte śakale dve virejatuḥ // ViP_5,16.15 //
analyzed: keśinaḥ te dvidhā bhūte śakale dve virejatuḥ

original: hatvā tu keśinaṃ kṛṣṇo gopālair muditair vṛtaḥ /
analyzed: hatvā tu keśinam kṛṣṇaḥ gopālaiḥ muditaiḥ vṛtaḥ
an āyasta tanuḥ svasthaḥ hasan tatra eva tasthivān

original: tato gopyaś ca gopāś ca hate keśini vismitāḥ /
analyzed: tatas gopyaḥ ca gopāḥ ca hate keśini vismitāḥ
tuṣṭuvuḥ puṇḍarīkākṣam anurāga manoramam
athā āha antarhitaḥ vipra nāradaḥ jalade sthitaḥ
keśinam nihatam dṛṣṭvā harṣa nirbhara mānasaḥ
sādhu sādhu jagannātha līlayā eva yat acyuta
nihataḥ ayam tvayā keśī kleśa daḥ tridivaukāsām
yuddha utsuka ūham atyartham nara vāji mahā āhavam
a bhūta pūrvam anyatra draṣṭum svargāt iha āgataḥ
karmāṇi atra avatāre te kṛtāni madhusūdana

original: yāni tair vismitaṃ cetastoṣametena me gatam // ViP_5,16.21 //
analyzed: yāni taiḥ vismitam cetaḥ toṣam etena me gatam

original: turaṅgasyāsya śakropi kṛṣṇa devāś ca bibhyati /
analyzed: turaṅgasya asya kṛṣṇa devāḥ ca bibhyati
dhuta kesāra jālasya hreṣataḥ abhra avalokinaḥ
yasmāt tvayā eṣa duṣṭa ātmā hataḥ keśī janārdana

original: tasmātkeśavanāmnā tvaṃ loke khyāto bhaviṣyasi // ViP_5,16.23 //
analyzed: tasmāt keśava nāmnā tvam loke khyātaḥ bhaviṣyasi
svasti astu te gamiṣyāmi kaṃsa yuddhe adhunā punar
paraśvas aha sameṣyāmi tvayā keśiniṣūdana
ugrasena sute kaṃse sa anuge vinipātite
bhāra avatāra kartā tvam pṛthivyā pṛthivīdhara
tatra aneka prakārāṇi yuddhāni pṛthivīkṣitām
draṣṭavyāni mayā yuṣmad praṇītāni janārdana
saḥ aham yāsyāmi govinda deva kāryam mahat kṛtam

original: tvayaiva viditaṃ sarvaṃ svasti te 'stu vrajāmyaham // ViP_5,16.27 //
analyzed: tvayā eva viditam sarvam svasti te astu vrajāmi aham

original: nārade tu gate kṛṣṇaḥ saha gopaiḥ sabhājitaḥ /
analyzed: nārade tu gate kṛṣṇaḥ saha gopaiḥ sabhājitaḥ
viveśa gokulam gopī netra pāna eka bhājanam
iti śrī viṣṇumāhapurāṇe pañcama aṃśe ṣoṭaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
akrūraḥ api viniṣkramya syandanena āśu gāminā
kṛṣṇa saṃdarśana ākāṅkṣī prayayau nanda gokulam
cintayāmāsa ca akrūraḥ nā asti dhanyataraḥ mayā

original: yo 'ham aṃśāvatīrṇasya mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi cakriṇaḥ // ViP_5,17.2 //
analyzed: yaḥ aham aṃśa avatīrṇasya mukham drakṣyāmi cakriṇaḥ
adya me saphalam janma su prabhātā abhavat niśā
yat unnidra ābha patra akṣam viṣṇoḥ drakṣyāmi aham mukham
pāpam harati yat puṃsām smṛtam saṃkalpanā mayam
tat puṇḍarīka nayanam viṣṇoḥ drakṣyāmi aham mukham
vinirjagmuḥ yatas vedāḥ vedāṅgāni akhilāni ca

original: drakṣyāmi tatparaṃ dhāma dhāmrāṃ bhagavato mukham // ViP_5,17.5 //
analyzed: drakṣyāmi tat param dhāma dhāmrām bhagavataḥ mukham
yajñeṣu yajñapuruṣaḥ puruṣaiḥ puruṣottamaḥ
ijyate yaḥ akhila ādhāraḥ tam drakṣyāmi jagatpatim
iṣṭvā yam indraḥ yajñānām śatena amara rāja tām
avāpa tam ananta ādim aham drakṣyāmi keśavam
na brahma na indra rudra aśvi vasu āditya marut gaṇāḥ

original: yasya svarūpaṃ jānanti pratyakṣaṃ yāti me hariḥ // ViP_5,17.8 //
analyzed: yasya sva rūpam jānanti pratyakṣam yāti me hariḥ
sarva ātmā sarva vid sarvaḥ sarva bhūteṣu avasthitaḥ

original: yohya'cintyo 'vyayo vyāpī sa vakṣyati mayā saha // ViP_5,17.9 //
analyzed: yaḥ hi a cintyaḥ avyayaḥ vyāpī sa vakṣyati mayā saha
matsya kūrma varāha aśva siṃha rūpa ādibhiḥ sthitim

original: cakāra jagato yo 'jaḥ jagato yo 'jaḥ so 'dya māṃ pralapiṣyati // ViP_5,17.10 //
analyzed: cakāra jagataḥ yaḥ ajaḥ jagataḥ yaḥ ajaḥ saḥ adya mām pralapiṣyati
sāṃpratam ca jagatsvāmī kāryam ātma hṛdi sthitam
kartum manuṣya tām prāptaḥ sva icchā deha dhṛt avyayaḥ
pṛthivīm dhatte śekhara sthiti saṃsthitām

original: so 'vatīrṇo jagatyarthe māma krūreti vakṣyati // ViP_5,17.12 //
analyzed: saḥ avatīrṇaḥ jagatī arthe māma krūra iti vakṣyati
pitṛ putra suhṛd bhrātṛ mātṛ bandhu mayīm imām
yat māyām na alam uttartum jagat tasmai namaḥ namaḥ
tarati avidyām vitatām hṛdi yasmin niveśite
yoga māyām ameyāya tasmai vidyā ātmane namaḥ
yajvabhiḥ yajñapuruṣaḥ vāsudevaḥ ca sāttvataiḥ

original: vedāntavedibhir viṣṇuḥ procyate yo natosmi tam // ViP_5,17.15 //
analyzed: vedānta vedibhiḥ viṣṇuḥ procyate yaḥ nataḥ asmi tam
yathā yatra jagat dhāmni dhātari etat pratiṣṭhitam

original: sadasattena satyena mayyasau yātu saumyātām // ViP_5,17.16 //
analyzed: sat asat tena satyena mayi asau yātu
smṛte sakala kalyāṇa bhājanam yatra jāyate

original: puruṣastamajaṃ nityaṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ harim // ViP_5,17.17 //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ tam ajam nityam vrajāmi śaraṇam harim
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
ittham saṃcintayan viṣṇum bhakti namra ātma mānasaḥ

original: akrūro gokulaṃ prāptaḥ kiñcitsūrye virājati // ViP_5,17.18 //
analyzed: akrūraḥ gokulam prāptaḥ kiñcid sūrye virājati
sa dadarśa tadā kṛṣṇam ādau ādohane gavām
vatsa madhyāgatam phulla nī la utpala dala chavim
praphulla padma patra akṣam śrīvatsa aṃkita vakṣasam
pralaṃba bāhu māyāma tuṅga urasthalam unnasam
sa vilāsa smita ādhāram bibhrāṇam mukha paṅkajam
juṅga rakta nakham padibhām dharaṇyām su pratiḥṣitam
bibhrāṇam vāsasī pīte vanya puṣpa vibhūṣitam
sa iṃdu nīla acala ābham tam sita aṃbhoja avataṃsakam
haṃsa kunda indu dhavalam nīla aṃbara dharam dvija

original: tasyānu balabhadraṃ ca dadarśa yadunandanam // ViP_5,17.23 //
analyzed: tasya anu balabhadram ca dadarśa yadu nandanam
prāṃśum uttuṅga bāhu aṃsam vikāsi mukha paṅkajam
megha mālā parivṛtam kailāsa adrim iva aparam
tau dṛṣṭvā vikasat vaktra sarojaḥ sa mahāmatiḥ
pulaka āñcita sarva aṅgaḥ tadā akrūraḥ ajagat dhātari bhavat mune
tat etat paramam dhāma tat etat paramam padam
bhagavat vāsudeva aṃśaḥ dvidhā yaḥ ayam vyavasthitaḥ
sāphalyam akṣṇoḥ yugam etat atra dṛṣṭe jagaddhātari yātam uccais
api aṅgam etat bhagavat prasādāt tad aṅga saṃge phalavat mama syāt

original: apyeṣa pṛṣṭhe mama hastapadmaṃ kariṣyati śrīmadanantamūrtiḥ /
analyzed: api eṣa pṛṣṭhe mama hasta padmam kariṣyati śrīmat ananta mūrtiḥ
yasya aṅguli sparśa hata akhila aghaiḥ avāpyate siddhiḥ apāsta doṣā
yena agni vidyut ravi raśmi mālā karālam ati ugram apeta caktram

original: cakraṃ ghnatā daityapaterhṛtāni daityāṅganānāṃ nayanāñjanāni // ViP_5,17.29 //
analyzed: cakram ghnatā daitya pateḥ hṛtāni daitya aṅganānām nayana añjanāni
yatra aṃbu vinyasya baliḥ manojñān avāpa bhogān vasudhā tavala sthaḥ
tathā amara tvam tridaśa adhipa tvam manvantaram pūrṇam apeta śatrum
api eṣa mām kaṃsa parigraheṇa doṣa āspadībhūtam a doṣa duṣṭam
kartā māna upahatam dhik astu tat janma yat sādhu bahiṣkṛtasya
jñāna ātmakasya amala sattva rāśeḥ apeta doṣasya sadā sphuṭasya

original: kiṃ vā jagatyatra samastapuṃsāmajñātamasyāsti hṛdi sthitasya // ViP_5,17.32 //
analyzed: kim vā jagati atra samasta puṃsām ajñātam asya asti hṛdi sthitasya
tasmāt aham bhakti vinamra cetāḥ vrajāmi sarveśvam īśvarāṇām
aṃśa avatāram puruṣottamasya hi anādi madhya antam ajasya viṣṇoḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe saptaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
cintayan iti govindam upagamya sa yādavaḥ

original: akrurosmīti caraṇau nanāma śirasā hareḥ // ViP_5,18.1 //
analyzed: akrurā asmi iti caraṇau nanāma śirasā hareḥ
saḥ api enam dhvaja vajra abja kṛta cihnena pāṇinā

original: saṃspṛśyākṛṣya ca prītya sugāḍhaṃ pariṣasvaje // ViP_5,18.2 //
analyzed: saṃspṛśya ākṛṣya ca prītya su gāḍham pariṣasvaje
kṛta saṃvandanau tena yathāvat bala keśavau
tatas pravīṣṭau saṃhṛṣṭau tam ādāya ātma mandiram
saha tābhyām tadā akrūraḥ kṛta saṃvandana ādikaḥ
bhukta bhojyaḥ yathānyāyyam ācacakṣe tatas tayoḥ
yathā nirbhatsitaḥ tena kaṃsena ānakadundubhiḥ

original: yathā ca devakī devī dānavena durātmanā // ViP_5,18.5 //
analyzed: yathā ca devakī devī dānavena durātmanā

original: ugrasene yathā kaṃsaḥsa durātmā ca vartate /
analyzed: ugrasene yathā kaṃsaḥ sa durātmā ca vartate

original: yaṃ caivārthaṃ samuddiśya kaṃsena tu visarjitaḥ // ViP_5,18.6 //
analyzed: yam ca eva artham samuddiśya kaṃsena tu visarjitaḥ
tat sarvam vistarāt śutvā bhagavān devakī sutaḥ
uvāca akhilam api etat jñātam dānapate mayā
kariṣye tat māhabhāga yat atra aupayikam matam

original: vicintyaṃ nānyathaitatte viddhi kaṃsaṃ hataṃ mayā // ViP_5,18.8 //
analyzed: vicintyam na anyathā etat te viddhi kaṃsam hatam mayā

original: ahaṃ rāmaś ca mathurāṃ śvo yāsyāvaḥsaha tvayā /
analyzed: aham rāmaḥ ca mathurām śvas yāsyāvaḥ saha tvayā

original: gopavṛddhāś ca yāsyanti hyādāyopāyanaṃ bahu // ViP_5,18.9 //
analyzed: gopa vṛddhāḥ ca yāsyanti hi ādāya upāyanam bahu

original: niśeyaṃ nīyatāṃ vīra na cintāṃ kartumarhasi /
analyzed: niśā iyam nīyatām vīra na cintām kartum arhasi
tri rātra abhyantare kaṃsam nihanaṣyāmi sa anugam
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
samādiśya tatas gopān akrūraḥ api ca keśavaḥ

original: suṣvāpa balabhadraś ca nandagopagṛhe tataḥ // ViP_5,18.11 //
analyzed: suṣvāpa balabhadraḥ ca nanda gopa gṛhe tatas
tatas prabhāte vimale kṛṣṇa rāmau mahā dyutī

original: akrūreṇa samaṃ gantumudyatau mathurāṃ purīm // ViP_5,18.12 //
analyzed: akrūreṇa samam gantum udyatau mathurām purīm
dṛṣṭvā gopī janaḥ sa asraḥ ślathat valaya bāhukaḥ
niśaśvasa ati duḥkha ārtaḥ prāha parasparam
mathurām prāpya govindaḥ katham gokulam eṣyati
nagara strī kalā ālāpa madhu śrotreṇa pāsyati
vilāsi vākya pāneṣu nāgarīṇām kṛta āspadam

original: cittamasya kathaṃ bhūyo grāmyagopīṣu yāsyati // ViP_5,18.15 //
analyzed: cittam asya katham bhūyas grāmya gopīṣu yāsyati
sāram samasta goṣṭhasya vidhinā haratā harim
prahṛtam gopa yoṣitsu nirghṛṇena durātmanā
bhā varga bhasmitam vākyam vilāsa lalitā gatiḥ
nāgarīṇām atīva etat kaṭākṣa īkṣitam eva ca
grāmyaḥ hariḥ ayam tāsām vilāsa nigaḍaiḥ yutaḥ

original: bhavatīnāṃpunaḥ pārśvaṃ kayā yuktyā sameṣyati // ViP_5,18.18 //
analyzed: bhavatīnām punar pārśvam kayā yuktyā sameṣyati
eṣa eṣa ratham āruhya mathurām yāti keśavaḥ
krūreṇa akrūrakeṇa atra nirghṛṇena pratāritaḥ
kim na vetti nṛśaṃsaḥ yam anurāga param janam
yena evam akṣṇoḥ āhlādam nayati anyatra no harim
eṣa rāmeṇa sahitaḥ prayāti atyanta nirghṛṇaḥ
ratham āruhya govindaḥ tvaryatām asya vāraṇe

original: gurūṇāmagrato vaktuṃ viṃ bravītha na naḥ kṣamam /
analyzed: gurūṇām agratas vaktum vim bravītha na naḥ kṣamam
guravaḥ kim kariṣyanti dagdhānām viraha agninā
nadaṅga upama ikhāḥ gopāḥ gantum ete samudyatāḥ
na udyamam kurute kaścid govinda vinivartane
su prabhātā adya rajanī mathurā vāsa yoṣitām
pāsyanti acyuta vaktra abjam yāsām netra ali paṅktayaḥ
dhanyāḥ te pathi ye kṛṣṇam itas yānti anivāritāḥ
udvahiṣyanti paśyantaḥ sva deham pulaka añcitam
mathurā nagarī paura nayanānām mahā utsavaḥ
govinda avayavaiḥ dṛṣṭaiḥ atīva adya bhaviṣyati
kaḥ nu svapraḥ sabhāgyābhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tābhiḥ adhokṣajam
vistārikām tinayanāḥ yāḥ drakṣyanti anivāritāḥ
aho gopī janasya asya darśayitvā mahā nidhim

anurāgeṇa śaithilyam asmāsu vrajite harauḥ
śaithilyam upayānti āśu kareṣu valayāni api
akrūraḥ krūra hṛdayaḥ śīvram prerayate hayān

original: eva mārtāsu yoṣitsu kṛpā kasya na jāyate // ViP_5,18.30 //
analyzed: eva mā ārtāsu yoṣitsu kṛpā kasya na jāyate

iti evam ati hārdena gopī jana nirīkṣitaḥ

original: tatyāja vrajabhūbhāgaṃ saha rāmeṇa keśavaḥ // ViP_5,18.32 //
analyzed: tatyāja vraja bhū bhāgam saha rāmeṇa keśavaḥ
gacchantaḥ javana aśvena rathena yamunā taṭam

yāvat karomi kālindyāḥ āhnika arhaṇam aṃbhasi
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
tathā iti uktaḥ tatas snātaḥ su ācāntaḥ sa mahāmatiḥ

original: dadhyau brahma paraṃ vipra graviṣṭo yamunājale // ViP_5,18.35 //
analyzed: dadhyau brahma param vipra graviṣṭaḥ yamunā jale
phaṇā sahasra mālā āḍhyam balabhadram dadarśa saḥ

vṛtam vāsuki raṃbha ādyaiḥ mahadbhiḥ pavanā śibhiḥ
saṃstūyamānam udgandhi vanamālā vibhūṣitam
dadhānam asite vastre cāru rūpa avataṃsakam
cāru kuṇḍalinam bhāntam antar jala tale sthitam
tasya utsaṃge ghanaśyāmam ātāmra āyata locanam
catur bāhum udāra aṅgam cakra ādi āyudha bhūṣaṇam
pīte vasānam vasane citra mālya upaśobhitam
śakracāpa taḍit mālā vicitram iva toyadam
śrīvatsa vakṣasam cāru sphurat makara kuṇḍalam
dadarśa kṛṣṇam akliṣṭam puṇḍarīka avataṃsakam
sanandana ādyaiḥ munibhiḥ saddha yogaiḥ akalmaṣaiḥ
saṃcintyamānam tatrasthaiḥ nāsā agra nyasta locanaiḥ
bala kṛṣṇau tathā akrūraḥ pratyabhijñāya vismitaḥ
acintayat rathāt śīghram katham atrā āgatau iti
vivakṣoḥ taṃbhayāmāsa vācam tasya janārdanaḥ
tatas niṣkramya salilāt ratham abhyāgataḥ punar
dadarśa tatra ca eva ubhau rathasya upari niṣṭhitau
rāma kṛṣṇau yathāpūrvam manuṣya vapuṣā anvitau

original: nimagnaś ca punas toye dadarśa ca tathaiva tau /
analyzed: nimagnaḥ ca punar toye dadarśa ca tathā eva tau

akrūraḥ uvāca
paramātmane
vyāpine na eka rūpa eka svarūpāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: namo vijñānapārāya parāya prakṛteḥ prabhoḥ // ViP_5,18.49 //
analyzed: namaḥ vijñāna pārāya parāya prakṛteḥ prabhoḥ

original: bhūtātmā cendriyātmā ca pradhānātmā tathā bhavān /
analyzed: bhūtātmā ca indriyātmā ca pradhānātmā tathā bhavān

original: ātmā ca paramātmā ca tvamekaḥ pañcadhā sthitaḥ // ViP_5,18.50 //
analyzed: ātmā ca parama ātmā ca tvam ekaḥ pañcadhā sthitaḥ
prasīda sarva sarva ātmna kṣara akṣara maya īśvara

original: anākhyena bhidhānaṃ tvāṃ natosmi parameśvara // ViP_5,18.52 //
analyzed: an ākhyena bhidhānam tvām nataḥ asmi parameśvara
na yatra nātha vidyante nāma jāti ādi kalpanāḥ

original: sarvārthastvamaja vikalpanābhir etair vādyair bhavati hi yair anantaviśvam /
analyzed: sarva arthaḥ tvam aja vikalpanābhiḥ etaiḥ vādyaiḥ bhavati hi yaiḥ ananta viśvam

original: viśvātmā tvamiti vikārahīnametatsarvasminna hi bhavatosti kiñcidanyat // ViP_5,18.55 //
analyzed: viśva ātmā tvam iti vikāra hīnam etat sarvasmin na hi bhavatoḥ sti kiñcid anyat

original: tvaṃ brahmā paśupatiryamā vidhātā dhātā tvaṃ tridaśapatiḥsamīraṇo 'gniḥ /

original: viśvaṃ bhavānsṛjati sūryagabhastirūpo viśveśa te guṇamayoyamataḥ prapañcaḥ /
analyzed: viśvam bhavān sṛjati sūrya gabhasti rūpaḥ viśveśa te guṇa mayaḥ yam atas prapañcaḥ

original: rūpaṃ paraṃ saditi vācakamakṣaraṃ yajjñānātmane sadasate praṇato 'smi tasmai // ViP_5,18.57 //
analyzed: rūpam param sat iti vācakam akṣaram yat jñāna ātmane sat asate praṇataḥ asmi tasmai

original: brahmabhūte ciraṃ sthitvā virarāma samādhinaḥ // ViP_5,19.2 //

original: ājagāma rathaṃ bhūyo nirgamya yamunāṃbhasaḥ // ViP_5,19.3 //

original: tadatrāpi hi paśyāmi mūrtimatpurataḥ sthitam // ViP_5,19.6 //
analyzed: tat atrā api hi paśyāmi mūrtimat puratas sthitam

original: saṃprāptaścāpi sāyāhne so 'krūro mathurāṃ purīm // ViP_5,19.9 //

original: padybhāṃ yātaṃ mahāvīrau rathenaiko viśāmyaham // ViP_5,19.10 //

original: pātayāmāsa roṣeṇa rajakasya śiro bhuvi // ViP_5,19.16 //

iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe ekonaviśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

rājamārge tatas kṛṣṇaḥ sa anulepana bhājanām

original: sakāmeneva sā proktā sānurāgā hariṃ prati /

original: prāha sā lalitaṃ kubjā taddarśanabalātkṛtā // ViP_5,20.3 //
analyzed: prāha sā lalitam kubjā tad darśana balātkṛtā

sugandham etat rāja arham ruciram rucira ānane
āvayoḥ gātra sadṛśam dīyatām anulepanam
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
śrutvā etat āha sā kubjā gṛhyatām iti sādaram

utpāṭya tolayāmāsa vdyaṅgulena agra pāṇinā

original: cakarṣa padybhāṃ ca tadā ṛjutvaṃ keśavo 'nayat /

original: vastre pragṛhya govindaṃ mama gehaṃ vrajeti vai // ViP_5,20.11 //
analyzed: vastre pragṛhya govindam mama geham vraja iti vai
evam uktaḥ tayā śauriḥ rāmasya ālokya ca ānanam

āyāsye bhavatī geham iti tām prahasan hariḥ
visasarja jahāsa uccais rāmasya ālokya ca ānanam
bhakti bheda anunipta aṅgau nīla pīta aṃbarau tu tau
dhanuḥ śālām tatas yātau citra mālya upasobhitau

original: āyāgaṃ taddhanūratnaṃ tābhyāṃ pṛṣṭais tu rakṣibhiḥ /

original: ākhyāte sahasā kṛṣṇo gṛhītvā pūrayaddhanuḥ // ViP_5,20.15 //
analyzed: ākhyāte sahasā kṛṣṇaḥ gṛhītvā pūrayat dhanuḥ

original: cakāra sumahacchabdaṃ mathurā yena pūritā // ViP_5,20.16 //

original: bhagnaṃ śrutvā ca kaṃso 'pi prāha cāṇūramuṣṭikau // ViP_5,20.18 //

kaṃsaḥ uvāca
gopāla dārakau prāptau bhavat ybhām tu mama agratas

original: mallayuddhena hantavyau mama prāṇaharau di tau // ViP_5,20.19 //
analyzed: malla yuddhena hantavyau mama tau

original: niyuddhe tadvināśena bhavadbhyāṃ toṣito hy aham /

original: hantāvyau tadvadhādrājyaṃ sāmānyaṃ vāṃ bhaviṣyati // ViP_5,20.21 //

original: ityādiśya sa tau mallau tataścāhūya hastipam /

provāca uccais tvayā malla samāja dvāri kuñjaraḥ

ghātanīyau niyuddhāya raṅga dvāram upāgatau
tam api ājñāpya dṛṣṭvā ca sarvān mañcān upākṛtān
āsanna maraṇaḥ kaṃsaḥ sūrya udayam udaikṣata
tatas samasta mañceṣu nāgaraḥ sa tadā janaḥ
rāja mañceṣu ca ārūḍhāḥ saha bhṛtyaiḥ narādhipāḥ
malla prāśrika vargaḥ ca raṅga madhya samīpa gaḥ

original: kṛtaḥ kaṃsena kaṃso 'pi tuṅgamañce vyavasthitaḥ // ViP_5,20.26 //
analyzed: kṛtaḥ kaṃsena kaṃsaḥ api tuṅga mañce vyavasthitaḥ
antaḥpurāṇām mañcāḥ ca tathā anye parikalpitāḥ

nanda gopa ādayaḥ gopāḥ mañceṣu anyeṣu avasthitāḥ
akrūra vasudevau ca mañca prānte vyavasthitau
nāgarī yoṣitām madhye devakīputra gardhinī

original: antakāle 'pi putrasya drakṣyāmīti mukhaṃ sthitā // ViP_5,20.29 //
analyzed: anta kāle api putrasya drakṣyāmi iti mukham sthitā
vādyamāneṣu turyeṣu cāṇūre ca ati valgati

īṣat hasaṃtau tau vīrau balabhadra janārdanau
gopa veṣa dhārau vālau raṅga dvāram upāgatau
tatas kuvalayāpīḍaḥ mahāmātra pracoditaḥ
abhyadhāvata vegena hantum gopa kumārakau
hāhākāraḥ mahān jajñe raṅga madhye dvijottama

original: baladevo 'nujaṃ dṛṣṭvā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // ViP_5,20.33 //

original: hantavyo hi mahābhāga nāgo 'yaṃ śatrucoditaḥ // ViP_5,20.34 //
analyzed: hantavyaḥ hi mahābhāga nāgaḥ ayam śatru coditaḥ
iti uktaḥ saḥ agrajena atha baladevena vai dvija
siṃhanādam tatas cakre mādhavaḥ para vīra hā

original: bhramayāmāsa taṃ śairir airāvatasamaṃ bale // ViP_5,20.36 //
analyzed: bhramayāmāsa tam śairiḥ airāvata samam bale
īśaḥ api sarva jagatām bāla līlā anusārataḥ

utpāṭya vāma dantam tu dakṣiṇena eva pāṇinā

sa roṣaḥ tena pārśva sthān gaja pālān apothayat
