original: jaghāna vāmapādena mastake hastinaṃ ruṣā // ViP_5,20.40 //
analyzed: jaghāna vāma pādena mastake hastinam ruṣā
sa papāta hataḥ tena balabhadreṇa līlayā

original: sahasrākṣeṇa vajreṇa tāḍitaḥ parvato yathā // ViP_5,20.41 //
analyzed: sahasrākṣeṇa vajreṇa tāḍitaḥ parvataḥ yathā
hatvā kuvalayāpīḍam hasti āroha pracoditam
mada asṛj anulipta aṅgau hasti danta vara āyudhau
mṛga madhye yathā siṃhau garva līlā avalokinau

hāhākāraḥ mahān jajñe mahā raṅge tu anantaram

original: so 'yaṃ yena hatā ghorā pūtanā bālaghātinī /
analyzed: saḥ ayam yena hatā ghorā pūtanā bāla ghātinī

original: kṣiptaṃ tu śakaṭaṃ yena bhagnau tu yamalārjunau // ViP_5,20.45 //
analyzed: kṣiptam tu śakaṭam yena bhagnau tu yamalārjunau

original: soyaṃ yaḥ kāliyaṃ nāgaṃ mamardāruhya vālakaḥ /

original: dhṛto govardhano yena saptarātraṃ mahāgiriḥ // ViP_5,20.46 //

original: nihatā yena durvṛttā dṛśyatāmeṣa so 'cyutaḥ // ViP_5,20.47 //
analyzed: nihatāḥ yena durvṛttāḥ dṛśyatām eṣa saḥ acyutaḥ
ayam ca asya mahā bāhuḥ balabhadraḥ agratas agrajaḥ

ayam sa kathyate prājñaiḥ purāṇa artha viśāradaiḥ

original: avatīrṇo mahīmaṃśo nūnaṃ bhāraharo bhuvaḥ // ViP_5,20.50 //
analyzed: avatīrṇaḥ mahīm aṃśaḥ nūnam bhāra haraḥ bhuvaḥ

original: ityevaṃ varṇite paurai rāme kṛṣṇe ca tatkṣaṇāt /
analyzed: iti evam varṇite pauraiḥ rāme kṛṣṇe ca tad kṣaṇāt
uraḥ tatāpa devakyāḥ sneha snuta payodharam

original: nāgārastrīsamūhaś ca draṣṭuṃ na virarāma tam // ViP_5,20.53 //
analyzed: na āgāra strī samūhaḥ ca draṣṭum na virarāma tam

original: paribhūyaṃ sthitaṃ janma saphalaṃ kriyatāṃ dṛśaḥ // ViP_5,20.55 //
analyzed: paribhūyam sthitam janma saphalam kriyatām dṛśaḥ

original: vipakṣakṣapaṇaṃ vakṣo bhujayugyaṃ ca bhāmīni // ViP_5,20.56 //
analyzed: vipakṣa kṣapaṇam vakṣaḥ bhuja yugyam ca bhāmīni

original: samupaiti na saṃtyatra kiṃ vṛddhā muktakārimaḥ // ViP_5,20.59 //

original: padepade tathā bhūmiryanna śīrṇā tadadbhutam // ViP_5,20.64 //
analyzed: pade pade tathā bhūmiḥ yat na śīrṇā tat adbhutam

original: gāvo nigṛhya tāmeṣāṃ yaccāsti vasu kiñcana // ViP_5,20.84 //

original: vāyunā cāhṛtāṃ divyāṃ sabhāṃ te yadupuṅgavāḥ /

veda abhyāsa kṛta prīti saṃkarṣaṇa janārdanau

analyzed: baladevaḥ ca balavān jitvā vaivasvatam yamam

original: pitre pradattavānkṛṣṇo balaś ca balināṃ varaḥ // ViP_5,21.31 //
analyzed: pitre pradattavān kṛṣṇaḥ balaḥ ca balinām varaḥ
mathurām ca punar prāptau ugrasenena pālitām

iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe evaviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
jarāsaṃdham ute kase upayeme mahā balaḥ

original: astiṃ prāptiṃ ca maitreya cayorbhartṛhaṇaṃ harim // ViP_5,22.1 //
analyzed: astim prāptim ca maitreya cayoḥ bhartṛ haṇam harim

hantum abhyāyayau kopāt jarāsaṃdhaḥ sa yādavam

akṣauhiṇībhiḥ sainyasya trayoviṃśatibhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: yuyudhāte samaṃ tasya balinau balisainikaiḥ // ViP_5,22.4 //
analyzed: yuyudhāte samam tasya balinau bali sainikaiḥ

original: tato rāmaś ca kṛṣṇaś ca matiṃ cakraturañjasā /
analyzed: tatas rāmaḥ ca kṛṣṇaḥ ca matim cakratuḥ añjasā
āyudhānām purāṇānām ādāne muni sattama

original: ākāśādāgatau vipra tathā kaumodakī gadā // ViP_5,22.6 //
analyzed: ākāśāt āgatau vipra tathā kaumodakī gadā

jīvamāne gate kṛṣṇaḥ tena amanyata na ajitam

original: yadubhir māgadho rājā cakre kṛṣṇapurogamaiḥ // ViP_5,22.11 //
analyzed: yadubhiḥ māgadhaḥ rājā cakre kṛṣṇa purogamaiḥ

original: tat tu saṃnidhimāhātmyaṃ viṣṇor aṃśasya cakriṇaḥ // ViP_5,22.13 //
analyzed: tat tu saṃnidhi māhātmyam viṣṇoḥ aṃśasya cakriṇaḥ

original: manasaiva jagatsṛṣṭiṃ saṃhāraṃ ca karoti yaḥ /

iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcamāśe dvāviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: taṃ kālayavanaṃ nāma rāye sve yavaneśvaraḥ /

original: mayi matte pramatte vā supte pravasite 'pi vā /

iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe ca pañcama aṃśe trayoviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

ittham stutaḥ tadā tena mucukundena dhīmatā

original: tataḥ kaliyugaṃ matvā prāptaṃ taptuṃ nṛpastapaḥ /

original: parābhibhavaniḥ śaṅkaṃ babhūva ca yadoḥ kulam // ViP_5,24.7 //

asmad ceṣṭām apahasan na kaccit pura yoṣitām

original: atha vā kiṃ tadālāpaiḥ kriyantāmaparāḥ kathāḥ /

original: yasyāsmabhir vinā tena vināsmākaṃ bhaviṣyati // ViP_5,24.15 //

original: karoti kṛṣṇo vaktavyaṃ bhavatā rāma nānṛtam // ViP_5,24.17 //
analyzed: karoti kṛṣṇaḥ vaktavyam bhavatā rāma na anṛtam

jahasuḥ sasvaram gopyaḥ hariṇā hṛta cetasaḥ

original: kathāścakāra reme ca saha tair vrajabhūmiṣu // ViP_5,24.21 //

iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe caturviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: vane vicaratas tasya saha gopair mahātmanaḥ /

original: abhīṣṭā sarvadā yasya madire tvaṃ mahaujasaḥ /

original: anantasyopabhogāya tasya gaccha mude śubhe // ViP_5,25.3 //
analyzed: anantasya upabhogāya tasya gaccha mude śubhe

vicaran baladevaḥ api madirā gandham uttamam
āghrāya madirā tarṣam avāpa atha varānanaḥ

original: patantīṃ vīkṣya maitreya prayayau paramāṃ mudam // ViP_5,25.6 //
analyzed: patantīm vīkṣya maitreya prayayau paramām mudam

original: tasya vācaṃ nadī sā tu mattoktāmavamatya vai /
analyzed: tasya vācam nadī sā tu matta uktām avamatya vai

original: nājagāma tataḥ ktruddho halaṃ jagrāha lāṅgalī // ViP_5,25.9 //
analyzed: na ājagāma tatas ktruddhaḥ halam jagrāha lāṅgalī
gṛhītvā tām hala antena cakarṣa mada vihvalaḥ

original: sākṛṣṭā sahasā tena mārgaṃ saṃtyajya nimragā /
analyzed: sā ākṛṣṭā sahasā tena mārgam saṃtyajya nimragā
yatra āste balabhadraḥ asau plāvayāmāsa tat vanam

tatas tasyāḥ su vacanam ākarṇya sa halā yudhaḥ

original: so 'haṃ tvāṃ halapātena nayiṣyāmi sahasradhā // ViP_5,25.13 //
analyzed: saḥ aham tvām hala pātena nayiṣyāmi sahasradhā
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti uktayā ati saṃtrāsāt tayā prasāditaḥ

original: bhūbhāge plāvite tasminmumoca yamunāṃ balaḥ // ViP_5,25.14 //
analyzed: bhū bhāge plāvite tasmin mumoca yamunām balaḥ

original: tataḥ snātasya vai kāntir ajāyata mahātmanaḥ // ViP_5,25.15 //
analyzed: tatas snātasya vai kāntiḥ ajāyata mahātmanaḥ

original: samudrābhe tathā vastre nīle lakṣmīrayacchata // ViP_5,25.16 //
analyzed: samudra ābhe tathā vastre nīle lakṣmīḥ ayacchata

original: itthaṃ vibhūṣito reme tatra rāmas tathā vraje /
analyzed: ittham vibhūṣitaḥ reme tatra rāmaḥ tathā vraje

original: māsadvayena yātaś ca sa punardvārakāṃ purīm // ViP_5,25.18 //
analyzed: māsa dvayena yātaḥ ca sa punar dvārakām purīm
revatīm nāma tanayām raivatasya mahīpateḥ
upayeme balaḥ tasyām jajñāte niśita ulmukau
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe pañcaviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: rukmiṇīṃ cakame kṛṣṇaḥsā ca taṃ cāruhīsini /
analyzed: rukmiṇīm cakame kṛṣṇaḥ sā ca tam ca aruhīsini

original: na dadau yācate caināṃ rukmī dveṣeṇa cakriṇe // ViP_5,26.2 //
analyzed: na dadau yācate ca enām rukmī dveṣeṇa cakriṇe

bhīṣmakasya puram jagmuḥ śiśupāla priya eṣiṇaḥ

original: prayayau kuṇḍinaṃ draṣṭuṃ vivāhaṃ caidyabhūbhṛtaḥ // ViP_5,26.5 //

original: śvo bhāvini vivāhe tu tāṃ kanyāṃ hṛtavānhariḥ /

original: vipakṣabhāram āsajya rāmādiṣv atha bandhuṣu // ViP_5,26.6 //
analyzed: vipakṣa bhāram āsajya rāma ādiṣu atha bandhuṣu

original: kuṇḍinaṃ na pravekṣyāmi hyahatvā yudhi keśavam /

original: kṛtvā pratijñāṃ rukmī ca hantuṃ kṛṣṇamanudrutaḥ // ViP_5,26.9 //

original: nirjitaḥ pātitaścorvyāṃ līlayaiva sa cakriṇā // ViP_5,26.10 //
analyzed: nirjitaḥ pātitaḥ ca urvyām līlayā eva sa cakriṇā

original: jahāra śaṃbaro yaṃ vai yo jaghāna ca śaṃbaram // ViP_5,26.12 //
analyzed: jahāra śaṃbaraḥ yam vai yaḥ jaghāna ca śaṃbaram
iti śri viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe ṣaḍviśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: saṃbareṇahṛto vīraḥ pradyumnaḥ sa kathaṃ mune /

original: śaṃbaraḥ sa mahāvīryaḥ pradyumnena kathaṃ hataḥ // ViP_5,27.1 //

original: yastenāpahṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ sa kathaṃ vijaghāna tam /

original: pātitaṃ tatra caivaiko matsyo jagrāha bālakam /

original: na mamāra ca tasyāpi jaṭharāgnipradīpitaḥ // ViP_5,27.5 //
analyzed: na mamāra ca tasya api jaṭhara agni pradīpitaḥ

original: matsyabandhaiś ca matsyo 'sau matsyair anyaiḥ saha dvaja /

original: tasya māyā vatī nāma patnī sarvagṛheśvarī /

original: ityevaṃ kaunupāviṣṭāṃ nanvīṃ prāhātha nāradaḥ // ViP_5,27.9 //
analyzed: iti evam kaunupa āviṣṭām prāha atha nāradaḥ
ayam samasta jagataḥ sthiti saṃhāra kāriṇaḥ
śaṃbareṇa hṛtaḥ viṣṇoḥ tanayaḥ sūtikāgṛhāt
kṣiptaḥ samudre matsyena nigīrṇaḥ te gṛham gataḥ
nara ratnam idam subhru visrabdhā paripālaya

original: nāradenaivam uktā sā pālayāmāsa taṃ śiśum /

original: sabhāgyā jananī vatsa sā tvāyā kā vibhīṣitā // ViP_5,27.23 //

original: nagarī ca samastā sā sādhusādhvityabhāṣata // ViP_5,27.31 //

original: cārudeṣṇaṃ sudeṣṇaṃ ca cārudehaṃ ca vīryavān /

original: cāruvindaṃ sucāruṃ ca cāruṃ cabalināṃ varam /

original: anyāś ca bhāryāḥ kṛṣṇasya babhūvuḥ sapta śobhanāḥ /
analyzed: anyāḥ ca bhāryāḥ kṛṣṇasya babhūvuḥ sapta śobhanāḥ

original: kālidī mitravindā ca satyā cāgnajitī tathā // ViP_5,28.3 //
analyzed: kālidī mitravindā ca satyā ca agnajitī tathā
devī jāmbavatī ca api rohiṇī kāmarūpiṇī

original: svayaṃbare tāṃ jagrāha sā ca taṃ tanayaṃ hareḥ // ViP_5,28.6 //

tasyām asya a bhakta putraḥ mahā bala parākramaḥ

original: dauhitrāya dadau rakmī tāṃ spardhannapi cakriṇā // ViP_5,28.8 //
analyzed: dauhitrāya dadau rakmī tām spardhan api cakriṇā

original: tasyā vivāhe rāmādyā yādavā hariṇā saha /

original: kalyāṇārthaṃ tataḥsarve ye cānye bhūbhṛtas tathā /
analyzed: kalyāṇa artham tatas sarve ye ca anye bhūbhṛtaḥ tathā

original: rukmiṇī nagaraṃ jagmurnāmnā bhojakaṭaṃ dvija // ViP_5,28.9 //
analyzed: rukmiṇī nagaram jagmuḥ nāmnā bhojakaṭam dvija
vivāhe tatra nirvṛtte pradyumnasya mahātmanaḥ

original: anakṣajño halī dyute tathāsya vyasanaṃ mahat /
analyzed: an akṣa jñaḥ halī dyute tathā asya vyasanam mahat
tat jayāmaḥ balam kasmāt dyutena enam mahā balam
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: sabhāyāṃ saha rāmeṇa cakre dyūtaṃ ca vai tadā // ViP_5,28.12 //
analyzed: sabhāyām saha rāmeṇa cakre dyūtam ca vai tadā
sahasram ekam niṣkāṇām rukmiṇā vijitaḥ balaḥ
dvitīye apipaṇe ca anyat sahasram rukmiṇā jitaḥ
tatas daśa sahasrāṇi niṣkāṇām paṇam ādade
balabhadraḥ ajayat tāni rukmī dyuta vidām varaḥ
tatas jahāsa svanavat kaliṅga adhipatiḥ dhija

original: dantān vidarśayan mūḍho rukmī cāha madoddhataḥ // ViP_5,28.15 //
analyzed: dantān vidarśayan mūḍhaḥ rukmī ca āha mada uddhataḥ
avidyaḥ ayam mayā dyūte balabhadraḥ parājitaḥ
bhudhā eva akṣa avalepa andhaḥ yaḥ avamene akṣa kovidān

original: rikmiṇaṃ cāpi durvākyaṃ kopaṃ cakre halāyudhaḥ // ViP_5,28.17 //
analyzed: rikmiṇam ca api durvākyam kopam cakre halāyudhaḥ

original: glahaṃ jagrāha rukmī ca tadarthekṣānapātayat // ViP_5,28.18 //
analyzed: glaham jagrāha rukmī ca tad artha īkṣān apātayat

original: mayeti rukmī prāhoccair alīkokter alaṃ bala // ViP_5,28.19 //
analyzed: mayā iti rukmī prāha uccais alīka ukteḥ alam bala

original: evaṃ tvayā cedvijitaṃ vijitaṃ na mayā katham // ViP_5,28.20 //
analyzed: evam tvayā ced vijitam vijitam na mayā katham
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
atha antarikṣe vāc ucceḥ prāha gaṃbhīra nādinī

original: baladevasya taṃ kopaṃ vardhayantī mahātmanaḥ // ViP_5,28.21 //
analyzed: baladevasya tam kopam vardhayantī mahātmanaḥ

original: jitaṃ balena dharmeṇa rukmiṇā bhāṣitaṃ mṛṣā /
analyzed: jitam balena dharmeṇa rukmiṇā bhāṣitam mṛṣā

original: anuktvāpi vacaḥ kiñcit kṛta bhavati karmaṇā // ViP_5,28.22 //
analyzed: an uktvā api vacaḥ kiñcid kṛta bhavati karmaṇā
tatas balaḥ samutthāya kopa saṃrakka locanaḥ
jaghāna aṣṭa padena eva rikmiṇam sa mahā balaḥ

original: babhañja dantānkupito yaiḥ prakāśair jahāsa saḥ // ViP_5,28.24 //
analyzed: babhañja dantān kupitaḥ yaiḥ prakāśaiḥ jahāsa saḥ

original: jaghāna tānye tatpakṣe bhūbhṛtaḥ kupito bhṛśam // ViP_5,28.25 //
analyzed: jaghāna tān ye tad pakṣe bhūbhṛtaḥ kupitaḥ bhṛśam

original: tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ palāyana paraṃ dvija /
analyzed: tatas hāhākṛtam sarvam palāyana param dvija

original: tadrājamaṇḍalaṃ bhītaṃ babhūva kupite bale // ViP_5,28.26 //
analyzed: tad rāja maṇḍalam bhītam babhūva kupite bale
balena nihatam dṛṣṭvā rukmiṇam madhusūdanaḥ
nā uvāca kiñcid maitreya rukmiṇī balayoḥ bhayāt
tatas niruddham ādāya kṛtadāram dvijottama
dvārakām ājagāma atha yadu cakram ca keśavaḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe aṣṭāviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
dvāravatyām sthite kṛṣṇe śakraḥ tribhuvana īśvaraḥ
ājagāma atha maitreya matta airāvata pṛṣṭha gaḥ

original: praviśya dvārakāṃ so 'tha sametya hariṇā tataḥ /
analyzed: praviśya dvārakām saḥ atha sametya hariṇā tatas

original: bhakṣayaṃstāḍayan devān dārayaṃś ca cacāra vai // ViP_5,30.64 //
analyzed: bhakṣayan tāḍayan devān dārayan ca cacāra vai

original: parasparaṃ vavarṣāte dhārābhir iva toyadau // ViP_5,30.65 //
analyzed: parasparam vavarṣāte dhārābhiḥ iva toyadau

original: devaiḥ samastair yuyudhe śakreṇa ca janārdanaḥ // ViP_5,30.66 //
analyzed: devaiḥ samastaiḥ yuyudhe śakreṇa ca janārdanaḥ

original: jagrāha vāsavo vajraṃ kṛṣṇaścakraṃ sudarśanam // ViP_5,30.67 //

original: na mumoca tadā cakraṃ śakraṃ tiṣṭheti cābravīt // ViP_5,30.69 //
analyzed: na mumoca tadā cakram śakram tiṣṭha iti ca abravīt

original: trailokyeśa na te yuktaṃ śacībhartuḥ palāyanam /
analyzed: trailokya īśa na te yuktam śacī bhartuḥ palāyanam
pārijāta sraj ābhogā tvām upasthāsyate śacī

apakyetaḥ yathāpūrvam graṇaya abhyāgatām śacīm

original: alaṃ śakra prayāsena na vrīḍāṃ gantumarhasi /
analyzed: alam śakra prayāsena na vrīḍām gantum arhasi
nīyatām pārijātaḥ yam devāḥ saṃtu gata vyathāḥ

original: na dadarśa gṛhaṃ yātāmupacāreṇa māṃ śacī // ViP_5,30.74 //
analyzed: na dadarśa gṛham yātām upacāreṇa mām śacī

original: tataḥ kṛtavatī śakra bhavatā saha vigraham // ViP_5,30.75 //
analyzed: tatas kṛtavatī śakra bhavatā saha vigraham

original: rūpeṇa garvitā sā tu bhartrā kā strī na garvitā // ViP_5,30.76 //
analyzed: rūpeṇa garvitā sā tu bhartrā kā strī na garvitā
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti uktaḥ vai nivavṛte devarājaḥ tayā dvija

original: prāha caināmalaṃ caṇḍi sakhyuḥ khe doktivistaraiḥ // ViP_5,30.77 //
analyzed: prāha ca enām alam caṇḍi sakhyuḥ khe da ukti vistaraiḥ
indraḥ uvāca

original: jitasya tena me vrīḍā jāyate viśvarūpiṇā // ViP_5,30.78 //
analyzed: jitasya tena me vrīḍā jāyate viśva rūpiṇā

original: tenodbhavapralayapālanakāraṇena vrīḍā kathaṃ bhavati devi nirākṛtasya // ViP_5,30.79 //
analyzed: tena udbhava pralaya pālana kāraṇena vrīḍā katham bhavati devi nirākṛtasya

original: tamajamakṛtamīśaṃ śāśvataṃ svecchayainaṃ jagadupakṛtimartyaṃ ko vijetuṃ samarthaḥ // ViP_5,30.80 //
analyzed: tam ajam akṛtam īśam śāśvatam sva icchayā enam jagat upakṛti martyam kaḥ vijetum samarthaḥ

śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: kṣantavyaṃ bhavataivedam aparādhaṃ kṛtaṃ mama // ViP_5,31.2 //
analyzed: kṣantavyam bhavatā evā idam aparādham kṛtam mama

original: vajraṃ cedaṃ gṛhāma tvaṃ yadatra prahitaṃ tvayā /
analyzed: vajram ca idam gṛhāma tvam yat atra prahitam tvayā

indraḥ uvāca

original: jānīmastvāṃ bhagavato na tu sūkṣmavido vayam // ViP_5,31.5 //
analyzed: jānīmaḥ tvām bhagavataḥ na tu sūkṣma vidaḥ vayam

original: martyaloke tvayā tyakte nāyaṃ saṃsthāsyate bhuvi // ViP_5,31.7 //

tathā iti uktvā ca deva indram ājagāma bhuvam hariḥ
prasaktaiḥ siddha gandharvaiḥ stūyamānaḥ sura ṛṣibhiḥ
tatas śaṅkham upādhmāya dvārakā upari saṃsthitaḥ
harṣam utpādayāmāsa dvārakā vāsinām dvaja
avatīrya atha garuḍāt satyabhāmā sahāyavān

original: yam abhyetya janaḥ sarvo jātiṃ smarati paurvikīm /
analyzed: yam abhyetya janaḥ sarvaḥ jātim smarati paurvikīm
vāsyate yasya puṣpa uttha gandhena urvī tri yojanam

original: dadṛśuḥ pādape tasmin kurvanto makhadarśanam // ViP_5,31.13 //
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ pādape tasmin kurvantaḥ makha darśanam

original: vibhajya pradadau kṛṣṇo bāndhavānāṃ mahāmatiḥ // ViP_5,31.14 //
analyzed: vibhajya pradadau kṛṣṇaḥ bāndhavānām mahāmatiḥ

original: kanyāś ca kṛṣṇe jagrāha narakasya parigrahān // ViP_5,31.15 //
analyzed: kanyāḥ ca kṛṣṇe jagrāha narakasya parigrahān

original: tataḥ kāle śubhe prāpte upayeme janārdanaḥ /
analyzed: tatas kāle śubhe prāpte upayeme janārdanaḥ
tāḥ kanyāḥ narakeṇa āsan sarvatas yāḥ samāhṛtāḥ

jagrāha vidhivat vāṇīn pṛthak geheṣu dharmataḥ
ṣoḍaśa strī sahasrāṇi śatam ekam tatas adhikam

ekaikam eva tāḥ kanyāḥ menire madhusūdanaḥ
mama eva pāṇigrahaṇam maitreya kṛtavān iti

original: uvāsa vipra sarvāsāṃ viśvarūpadharo hariḥ // ViP_5,31.20 //
analyzed: uvāsa vipra sarvāsām viśva rūpa dharaḥ hariḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe ekatriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

pradyumna ādyāḥ hareḥ putrāḥ rukmiṇyām kvathitāḥ tava
ca satyabhāmā vyajāyata
dīptimat tāmra pakṣa adya rohiṇyām kathitā hareḥ
babhūvuḥ jāmbavatyām ca sāṃba ādyāḥ bāhu śālinaḥ
tanayāḥ bhadravinda ādyāḥ nāgnajityām mahā balāḥ

original: vṛkādyāś ca sutā mādryāṃ gātravatpramukhān sutān /
analyzed: vṛka ādyāḥ ca sutāḥ mādryām gātravat pramukhān sutān

original: avāpa lakṣmāṇā putrānkālindyāś ca śrutādayaḥ // ViP_5,32.4 //
analyzed: avāpa lakṣmāṇā putrān kālindyāḥ ca śruta ādayaḥ

original: aṣṭāyutāni putrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇī śataṃ tathā // ViP_5,32.5 //

original: chinnaṃ sahasraṃ bāhūnāṃ yatra bāṇasya cākriṇā // ViP_5,32.8 //

original: mahatkautūhalaṃ jātaṃ kathāṃ śrotumimāṃ hareḥ // ViP_5,32.10 //

original: ityuktā sā tayā cakre kadeti matimātmanaḥ /

original: ko vā bhartā mametyāha punastāmāha pārvatī // ViP_5,32.13 //

original: kariṣyati sa te bhartā rājaputri bhaviṣyati // ViP_5,32.14 //

original: tathaivā bhibhavaṃ cakre kaścidrāgaṃ ca tatra sā // ViP_5,32.15 //

original: devyā tathaiva tatprāptau yo hyupāyaḥ kuruṣva tam // ViP_5,32.19 //

analyzed: manuṣyeṣu dadau dṛṣṭim teṣu api andhaka vṛṣṇiṣu

bāṇa surām tadā
citralekhā uvāca

original: ayaṃ kṛṣṇasya pautraste bhartā devyā prasāditaḥ /
analyzed: ayam kṛṣṇasya pautraḥ te bhartā devyā prasāditaḥ

original: aniruddha iti khyātaḥ prakhyātaḥ priyadarśanaḥ // ViP_5,32.27 //
analyzed: aniruddhaḥ iti khyātaḥ prakhyātaḥ priya darśanaḥ

original: duṣpraveśā purī pūrvaṃ dvārakā kṛṣṇapālitā // ViP_5,32.28 //
analyzed: duṣpraveśā purī pūrvam dvārakā kṛṣṇa pālitā

original: yayau dvāravatīṃ coṣāṃ samāśvāsya tataḥ sakhīm // ViP_5,32.30 //

original: bhaviṣyati vinā yuddhaṃ bhārāya mama kiṃ bhujaiḥ // ViP_5,33.2 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyati vinā yuddham bhārāya mama kim bhujaiḥ

original: piśitāśijanānandaṃ prapsyase tvaṃ tadā raṇam // ViP_5,33.3 //
analyzed: piśitāśi jana ānandam prapsyase tvam tadā raṇam

original: sabhagnaṃ dhvajamālokya hṛṣṭo harṣaṃ punaryayau // ViP_5,33.4 //
analyzed: sa bhagnam dhvajam ālokya hṛṣṭaḥ harṣam punar yayau

original: vyādiṣṭaṃ kiṅkarāṇāṃ tu sainyaṃ tena mahātmanā /

original: māyayā yuyudhe tena sa tadā mantricoditaḥ /
analyzed: māyayā yuyudhe tena sa tadā mantri coditaḥ
tatas tam pannaga astreṇa babandha yadunandanam

original: yadūnāmācacakṣe taṃ baddhaṃ bāṇena nāradaḥ // ViP_5,33.10 //
analyzed: yadūnām ācacakṣe tam baddham bāṇena nāradaḥ

original: yoṣitā pratyayaṃ jagmuryādavā nāmarair iti // ViP_5,33.11 //
analyzed: yoṣitā pratyayam jagmuḥ yādavāḥ na amaraiḥ iti

original: yayau bāṇapurābhyāśaṃ nītvā tānsaṃkṣayaṃ hariḥ // ViP_5,33.13 //

bāṇa rakṣā artham abhyetya yuyudhe śārṅgadhanvanā

avāpa baladevaḥ api śramam āmīlita īkṣaṇaḥ
tatas sa yuddhyamānaḥ tu saha devena śārṅgiṇā

original: taṃ vīkṣya kṣamyatāmasyetyāha devaḥ pitāmahaḥ // ViP_5,33.17 //
analyzed: tam vīkṣya kṣamyatām asya iti āha devaḥ pitāmahaḥ

original: tataś ca kṣāntameveti proktvā taṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ jvaram /
analyzed: tatas ca kṣāntam evā iti proktvā tam vaiṣṇavam jvaram
ātmani eva layam ninye bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
jvaraḥ uvāca

original: mama tvāya samaṃ yuddhaṃ ye smarīṣyanti mānavāḥ /
analyzed: mama tvāya samam yuddham ye smarīṣyanti mānavāḥ

original: vijvarāste bhaviṣyantī tyuktvā cainaṃ yayau jvaraḥ // ViP_5,33.19 //
analyzed: vijvarāḥ te bhaviṣyantī ti uktvā ca enam yayau jvaraḥ

dānavānām balam kṛṣṇaḥ cūrṇayāmāsa līlayā

original: yuyudhe śaṅkaraścaiva kārttikeyaś ca śauriṇā // ViP_5,33.21 //
analyzed: yuyudhe śaṅkaraḥ ca eva kārttikeyaḥ ca śauriṇā

pralayaḥ yama śeṣasya jagataḥ nūnam āgataḥ
menire tridaśāḥ tatra vartamāne mahā raṇe
jṛṃbha ka astreṇa govindaḥ jṛṃbhayāmāsa śaṅkaram

original: tataḥ praṇemurdaiteyāḥ pramathāś ca samantataḥ // ViP_5,33.24 //
analyzed: tatas praṇemuḥ daiteyāḥ pramathāḥ ca samantataḥ
haraḥ rathopasthe upāviśat

original: na śaśāka tato yoddhuṃ kṛṣṇenākliṣṭakarmaṇā // ViP_5,33.25 //
analyzed: na śaśāka tatas yoddhum kṛṣṇena akliṣṭa karmaṇā
garuja kṣata vāhaḥ ca pradyumna astreṇa pīḍitaḥ
kṛṣṇa huṅkāra nirdhūta śaktiḥ ca apayayau guhaḥ

original: jṛṃbhite śaṅkare naṣṭe daityasainye guhe jite /
analyzed: jṛṃbhite śaṅkare naṣṭe daitya sainye guhe jite

original: nīte pramathasainye ca saṃkṣayaṃ śārṅgadhanvanā // ViP_5,33.27 //
analyzed: nīte pramatha sainye ca saṃkṣayam śārṅgadhanvanā
nandinā saṃgṛhīta aśvam adhirūḍhaḥ mahā ratham
bāṇaḥ tatra āyayau yoddhum kṛṣṇa kārṣṇi balaiḥ saha
balabhadraḥ mahā vīryaḥ bāṇa sainyam anekadhā
vivyādha bāṇaiḥ prabhraśya dharmataḥ ca apalāyata
ākṛṣya lāṅgala agreṇa mukalena āśu tāḍitam

original: balaṃ balena dadṛśe bāṇo bāṇaiś ca cakriṇā // ViP_5,33.30 //
analyzed: balam balena dadṛśe bāṇaḥ bāṇaiḥ ca cakriṇā
tatas kṛṣṇena bāṇasya yuddham āsīt su dāruṇam
samasyatoḥ iṣūn dīptān kāya trāṇa vibhedinaḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ ciccheda bāṇaiḥ tān bāṇena prahitān śitān

original: vivyādha keśavaṃ bāṇo bāṇaṃ vivyādha cakradhṛk // ViP_5,33.32 //
analyzed: vivyādha keśavam bāṇaḥ bāṇam vivyādha cakradhṛk
mumucāte tathā astrāṇi bāṇa kṛṣṇau jigīṣayā
paraspara kṣati karau lāghavāt aniśam dvija
bhidyamāneṣu aśeṣeṣu śareṣu astre ca sīdati

original: prācuryeṇa tato bāṇaṃ hantuṃ cakre harirmanaḥ // ViP_5,33.34 //
analyzed: prācuryeṇa tatas bāṇam hantum cakre hariḥ manaḥ
tatas ūrka śata saṃghāta tejasā sadṛśa dyuti
jagrāha daitya cakra ariḥ hariḥ cakram sudarśanam
muñcataḥ bāṇa nāśāya tatas cakram madhudviṣaḥ
nagnā daiteya vidyā abhūt koṭarī puratas hareḥ
tām agratas hariḥ dṛṣṭvā mīlita akṣaḥ sudarśanam

original: mumoca bāṇamuddiśya cchettuṃ bāhuvanaṃ ripoḥ // ViP_5,33.37 //
analyzed: mumoca bāṇam uddiśya chettum bāhu vanam ripoḥ
krameṇa tat tu bāhūnām bāṇasya acyuta coditam
chedam cakre asura apāsta śastrau gha kṣapaṇa ādṛtam
chinne bāhu vane tat tu kara stham madhusūtanaḥ
mumukṣuḥ bāṇa nāśāya vijñātaḥ tripuradviṣā
samupetya āha govindam sāma pūrvam umāpatiḥ
vilokya bāmam dādaḍa cheda asṛksrāva varṣiṇam
śaṅkaraḥ uvāca
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa jagannātha jāne tvām puruṣottamam
para īśam paramātmānam anādinidhanam harim
deva tiryak manuṣyeṣu śarīra grahaṇa ātmikā
līlā iyam sarva bhūtasya tava ceṣṭā upalakṣaṇā
tat prasīda abhayam dattam bāṇasya asya mayā prabho

original: tattvāya nānṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yanmayā vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ // ViP_5,33.43 //
analyzed: tattvāya na anṛtam kāryam yat mayā vyāhṛtam vacaḥ
asmad saṃśraya dṛptaḥ uyam na aparādhī tava avyaya
mayā datta varaḥ daityaḥ tatas tvām kṣamayāmi aham
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti uktaḥ prāha govidaḥ śula pāṇim umāpatim
prasanna padanaḥ bhūtvā gata amarṣaḥ asuram prati
śrī bhagavān uvāca
yuṣmad datta varaḥ bāṇaḥ jīvatām eṣa śaṅkara
tvad vākya gauravāt etat mayā cakram nivartitam
tvayā yat abhayam dattam tat dattam akhilam mayā
mattaḥ avibhinnam ātmānam draṣṭum arhasi śaṅkara
yaḥ ham sa tvam jagat ca idam sa deva asura mānuṣam
mattaḥ na anyat aśeṣam yat tat tvan jñātum iha arhasi
avidyā mohita ātmānaḥ puruṣāḥ bhinna darśinaḥ

original: vadanti bhedaṃ paśyanti cāvayorantaraṃ hara // ViP_5,33.49 //
analyzed: vadanti bhedam paśyanti ca āvayoḥ antaram hara

original: prasanno 'haṃ gamiṣyāmi tvaṃ gaccha vṛṣabhadhvaja // ViP_5,33.50 //
analyzed: prasannaḥ aham gamiṣyāmi tvam gaccha vṛṣabhadhvaja
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti uktvā prayayau kṛṣṇaḥ prādyumniḥ yatra tiṣṭhati
tad bandha phaṇinaḥ neśuḥ garuḍa anila pothitāḥ
tatas aniruddham āropya sa patnīkam garutmati
ājagmuḥ dvārakām rāma kārṣṇi dāmodarāḥ purīm
putra pautraiḥ parivṛtaḥ tatra reme janārdanaḥ
devībhiḥ satatam vipra bhū bhāra tarama icchayā
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe trayastriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca
cakre karma mahat śauriḥ bībhraṇaḥ mānuṣīm tanum

original: jigāya śakraṃ śarvaṃ ca sarvāndevāṃś ca līlayā // ViP_5,34.1 //
analyzed: jigāya śakram śarvam ca sarvān devān ca līlayā
yat ca anyat akarot karma divya ceṣṭa vighāta kṛt

original: tatkathyatāṃ mahābhāga paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // ViP_5,34.2 //
analyzed: tat kathyatām mahābhāga param kautūhalam hi me
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
gadataḥ mama viprarṣe śrūyatām idam ādarāt

original: narāvatāre kṛṣṇena dagdhā vārāṇasī yathā // ViP_5,34.3 //
analyzed: nara avatāre kṛṣṇena dagdhā vārāṇasī yathā
paiṇḍrakaḥ vāsudevaḥ tu vāsudevaḥ abhavat bhuvi
avatīrmaḥ tvam iti uktaḥ janaiḥ ajñāna mohitaiḥ
sa mene vāsudevaḥ ūham avatīrṇaḥ mahī tale
naṣṭa smṛtiḥ tatas sarvam viṣṇu cihnam acīkarat
dūtam ca preṣayāmāsa kṛṣṇāya su mahātmane

original: tyaktvā cakrādikaṃ cihnaṃ madīyaṃ nāma cātmanaḥ // ViP_5,34.6 //
analyzed: tyaktvā cakra ādikam cihnam madīyam nāma ca ātmanaḥ
vāsudeva ātmakam mūḍha tyaktvā sarvam aśeṣatas

original: ātmano jīvitārthāya tato me praṇati vraja // ViP_5,34.7 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ jīvita arthāya tatas me praṇati vraja
iti uktaḥ saṃprahasya enam dūtam prāha janārdanaḥ

original: nijacihnamahaṃ cakraṃ samutsṛkṣye tvayīti vai // ViP_5,34.8 //
analyzed: nija cihnam aham cakram samutsṛkṣye tvayi iti vai

original: vācyaś ca paiṇḍrako gatvā tvayā dūta vaco mama /
analyzed: vācyaḥ ca paiṇḍrakaḥ gatvā tvayā dūta vacaḥ mama
jñātaḥ tvad vākya sadbhāvaḥ yat kāryam tat vidhīyatām
gṛhīta cihna veṣā ūham āgamiṣyāmi te puram
utsrakṣyāmi ca tat cakram nija cihnam asaṃśayam
ājñā pūrvam ca yat idam āgaccha iti tvayā uditam
saṃpādayiṣye śvas tubhyam samāgamya a vilaṃbitam

original: śaraṇaṃ te samabhyetya kartāsmi nṛpate tathā /
analyzed: śaraṇam te samabhyetya kartāsmi nṛpate tathā

original: yathā tvatto bhayaṃ bhūyo na me kiñcid bhaviṣyati // ViP_5,34.12 //
analyzed: yathā tvattaḥ bhayam bhūyas na me kiñcid bhaviṣyati
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti ukta ipagate dūte saṃsmṛtya abhyāgatam hariḥ
garutmantam athā āruhya tvaritaḥ tat puram yayau
tatas tu keśava udyogam śrutvā kāśīpatiḥ tadā
sarva sainya parivāraḥ pārṣṇigrāhaḥ upāyayau
tatas balena mahatā kāśī rāja balena ca
paiṇḍrakaḥ vāsudevaḥ asau keśava abhimukhaḥ yayau
tam dadarśa hariḥ dūrāt udāra syandane sthitam
cakra hastam gadā śārṅga bāhum pāṇi gata aṃbujam
sraj dharam pīta vasanam su parma racita dhvajam

original: vakṣasthale kṛtaṃ cāsya śrīvatsaṃ dadṛśe hariḥ // ViP_5,34.17 //
analyzed: vakṣa sthale kṛtam ca asya śrīvatsam dadṛśe hariḥ
kirīṭa kuṇḍala dharam nānā ratna upaśobhitam

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāvagaṃbhīraṃ jahāsa garuḍadhvajaḥ // ViP_5,34.18 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā bhāvagaṃbhīram jahāsa garuḍadhvajaḥ
yuyudhe ca balena asya hasti aśva balinā dvija
nistriṃśa asi gadā śūla śakti kārmuka śālinā
kṣaṇena śārṅga nirmuktaiḥ śaraiḥ ari vidāraṇaiḥ
gadā cakra nipātaiḥ ca sūdayāmāsa tat balam
kāśī rāja balam ca evam kṣayam nītvā janārdanaḥ
uvāca paiṇḍrakam mūḍham ātma cihna upalakṣitam
śrī bhagavān uvāca
paiṇḍraka uktam tvayā yattu dūta vaktreṇa mām prati
samutsṛja iti cihnāni tat te saṃpādayāmi aham
cakram etat samutsṛṣṭam gadā iyam te visarjitā
garutmān eṣa ca utsṛṣṭaḥ samārohatu te dhvajam
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti uccārya vimuktena cakreṇa asau vidāritaḥ

original: pātito gadayā bhagno dhvajaścāsya garutmatā // ViP_5,34.24 //
analyzed: pātitaḥ gadayā bhagnaḥ dhvajaḥ ca asya garutmatā
tatas hāhākṛte loke kāśīpurī adhipaḥ balī
yuyudhe vāsudevena mitrasya apacitau sthitaḥ

original: tataḥ śārṅgadhanurmuktaiś chittvā tasya śiraḥ śaraiḥ /
analyzed: tatas śārṅga dhanuḥ muktaiḥ chittvā tasya śiraḥ śaraiḥ

original: kāśīpuryāṃ sa cikṣepa kurvaṃllokasya vismayam // ViP_5,34.26 //
analyzed: kāśī puryām sa cikṣepa kurvan lokasya vismayam

original: hatvā ta pauḍrakaṃ śauri kāśīrājaṃ ca sānugam /
analyzed: hatvā pauḍrakam śauri kāśī rājam ca sa anugam

original: punardvāravatīṃ prāpto reme svargagato yatā // ViP_5,34.27 //
analyzed: punar dvāravatīm prāptaḥ reme svarga gataḥ yatā
tat śiraḥ patitam tatra dṛṣṭvā kāśīpateḥ pure

original: janaḥ kimetadityāha cchinnaṃ keneti vismitaḥ // ViP_5,34.28 //
analyzed: janaḥ kim etat iti āha chinnam kena iti vismitaḥ

original: jñātvā taṃ vāsudevena hataṃ tasya sutastataḥ /
analyzed: jñātvā tam vāsudevena hatam tasya sutaḥ tatas
purohitena sahitaḥ toṣayāmāsa śaṅkaram
avimukte mahā kṣetre toṣitaḥ tena śaṅkaraḥ

original: varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti tadā taṃ provāca nṛpātmajam // ViP_5,34.30 //
analyzed: varam vṛṇīṣva iti tadā tam provāca nṛpa ātmajam
sa vavre bhagavan kṛtyā pitṛ hantuḥ vadhāya me
samutiṣṭhatu kṛṣṇasya tvad prasādāt maheśvara
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
evam bhaviṣyati iti ukte dakṣiṇāgneḥ anantaram
mahā kṛtyā samuttasthau tasya eva agneḥ vināśanī
tatas jvālā karāla āsyā jvalat keśa kapālikā

original: kṛṣṇakṛṣṇeti kupitā kṛtyā dvāravarīṃ yayau // ViP_5,34.33 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa iti kupitā kṛtyā dvāravarīm yayau
tām avekṣya janaḥ trāsāt vicalat locanaḥ mune

original: yayau śaraṇyaṃ jagatāṃ śaraṇaṃ madhusūdanam // ViP_5,34.34 //
analyzed: yayau śaraṇyam jagatām śaraṇam madhusūdanam
kāśī rāja sutena iyam ārādhya vṛṣabhadhvajam
utpāditā mahā kṛtyā iti avagamya atha cakriṇā
jahi kṛtyām imām ugrām vahni jvālā jaṭālakām
cakram utsṛṣṭam akṣeṣu krīḍā saktena līlayā
tad agni mālā jaṭila jvālā udgāra ati bhīṣaṇām
kṛtyām anujagāma āśu viṣṇu cakram sudarśanam
cakra pratāpa nirdagdhā kṛtyā māheśvarī tadā
nanāśa veginī vegāt tat api anujagāma tām
kṛtyā vārāṇasīm eva praviveśa tvarā anvitā
viṣṇu cakra pratihata prabhāvā muni sattama

original: tataḥ kāśībalaṃ bhūri pramathānāṃ tathā balam /
analyzed: tatas kāśī balam bhūri pramathānām tathā balam
samasta śastra astra yutam cakrasya abhimukham yayau
śastra astra mokṣa caturam dagdhvā tat balam ojasā

original: kṛtyā garbhamaśeṣāṃ tāṃ tadā vārāṇasīṃpurīm // ViP_5,34.41 //
analyzed: kṛtyā garbham aśeṣām tām tadā vārāṇasīm purīm
sa bhūbhṛt bhṛtya paurām tu sa aśva mātaṅga mānavām

original: aśeṣagoṣṭhakośāṃ tāṃ durnirikṣyāṃ surair api // ViP_5,34.42 //
analyzed: aśeṣa goṣṭha kośām tām durnirikṣyām suraiḥ api
jvālā pariṣkṛta aśeṣa gṛha prākāra catvarām

original: dadāha taddhareścakraṃ sakalāmeva tāṃ purīm // ViP_5,34.43 //
analyzed: dadāha tat hareḥ cakram sakalām eva tām purīm
akṣīṇa amarṣam ati ugram sādhya sādhana sa spṛham
tat cakram prasphurat dīpti viṣṇoḥ abhyāyayau karam
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañjama aṃśe catustriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca
bhūyas eva aham icchāmi balabhadrasya dhīmataḥ
śrotum parākramam brahman tat mama ākhyātum arhasi
yamunā ākarṣaṇa ādīni śrutāni bhagavat mayā
tat kathyatām mahābhāga yat anyat kṛtavān balaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
maitreya śruyatām karma yat rāmeṇa abhavat kṛtam
anante nā aprameyena śeṣeṇa dharaṇī dhṛtā
suyodhanasya tanayām svayaṃvara kṛta kṣaṇām
balāt ādattavān vīraḥ sāṃbaḥ jāṃbavatī sutaḥ
tatas kruddha amahā vīryāḥ karṇa duryodhana ādayaḥ
bhīṣma droṇa ādayaḥ ca enam babandhuḥ yudhi nirjitam
tat śutvā yādavāḥ sarve krodham duryodhana ādiṣu

original: maitreya cakruḥ kṛṣṇaś ca tānnihantuṃ mahodyamam // ViP_5,35.6 //
analyzed: maitreya cakruḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ca tān nihantum mahā udyamam
tān nivārya balaḥ prāha mada lola kala akṣaram

original: mokṣyanti te madvacanādyāsyāmyeko hi kauravān // ViP_5,35.7 //
analyzed: mokṣyanti te mad vacanāt yāsyāmi ekaḥ hi kauravān
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
baladevaḥ tatas dṛṣṭvā nagaram nāgasāhvayam
bāhya upavana madhye abhūt na viveśa ca tat puram
balam āgatam ājñāya bhūpāḥ duryodhana ādayaḥ
gām arghyam udakam ca eva rāmāya pratyavedayan
gṛhītvā vidhivat sarvam tatas tān āha kauravān
ājñāpayati ugrasenaḥ sa aṃbam āśu vimuñcata
tatas tat vacanam śrutvā bhīṣma droṇa ādayaḥ nṛpāḥ
karma duryodhana ādyāḥ ca cukṣubhuḥ dvijasattama

original: ūcuś ca kupitāḥsarve bāhlikādyāś ca kauravāḥ /
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca kupitāḥ sarve bāhlika ādyāḥ ca kauravāḥ
a rājya arham yadoḥ vaśam avekṣya musalāyudha
bho bhoḥ kim etat bhavatā balabhadra īritam vacaḥ

original: ājñāṃ kurukulotthānāṃ yādavaḥ kaḥ pradāsyati // ViP_5,35.13 //
analyzed: ājñām kuru kula utthānām yādavaḥ kaḥ pradāsyati
ugrasenaḥ api yadi ājñām kauravāṇām pradāsyati

original: tadalaṃ pāṇḍuraiś chatrair nṛpayogyair viḍaṃbanaiḥ // ViP_5,35.14 //
analyzed: tat alam pāṇḍuraiḥ chatraiḥ nṛpa yogyaiḥ viḍaṃbanaiḥ

original: tadgaccha bala mā vā tvaṃ sāṃbamanyāyaceṣṭitam /
analyzed: tat gaccha bala mā vā tvam sa aṃbam anyāya ceṣṭitam
vimokṣyāmaḥ na bhavataḥ ca ugrasenasya śāsanāt
praṇatiḥ yā kṛtā asmākam mānyānām kukura andhakaiḥ

original: na nāma sā kṛtā keyamājñā svāmini bhṛtyataḥ // ViP_5,35.16 //
analyzed: na nāma sā kṛtā kā iyam ājñā svāmini bhṛtyataḥ
garvam āropitāḥ yūyam samāna āsana bhojanaiḥ

original: ko doṣo bhavatāṃ nītiryatprītyā nāvalokitā // ViP_5,35.17 //
analyzed: kaḥ doṣaḥ bhavatām nītiḥ yat prītyā nā avalokitā

original: asmābhir argho bhavato yoyaṃ bala niveditaḥ /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ arghaḥ bhavataḥ yaḥ yam bala niveditaḥ
premṇā etat na etat asmākam kulāt yuṣmad kula ucitam
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: ityuktvā kuravaḥ sāṃbaṃ muñcāmo na hareḥsutam /
analyzed: iti uktvā kuravaḥ sa aṃbam muñcāmaḥ na hareḥsutam
kṛta eta niścayaḥ tūrṇam viviśuḥ gajasāhvayam
mattaḥ kopena ca āghūrmaḥ tatas adhikṣepa janmanā

original: utthāya pārṣṇyā vasudhāṃ jaghāna sa halāyudhaḥ // ViP_5,35.20 //
analyzed: utthāya pārṣṇyā vasudhām jaghāna sa halāyudhaḥ
tatas vidāritā pṛthvī pārṣṇi ghātāt mahātmanaḥ

original: āsphoṭayāmāsa tadā diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan // ViP_5,35.21 //
analyzed: āsphoṭayāmāsa tadā diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan
uvāca ca ati tāmra akṣaḥ bhṛkuṭī kuṭila ānanaḥ
aha mada avalepaḥ yama sārāṇām durātmanām
kauravāṇām mahīpa tvam asmākam kila kāla jam
ugrasenasya yena ājñām manyante adi api laṅghanam
ugrasenaḥ samadhyāste sudhārmā na śacīpatiḥ
dhik mānuṣa śata ucchiṣṭe tuṣṭiḥ eṣām nṛpa āsane
pārijāta taroḥ puṣpa mañjarīḥ vanitā janaḥ

original: bibharti yasya bhatyānāṃ so 'pyeṣāṃ na mahīpatiḥ // ViP_5,35.25 //
analyzed: bibharti yasya saḥ api eṣām na mahīpatiḥ
samasta bhūbhṛtām nāthaḥ ugrasenaḥ sa tiṣṭhatu

original: adya niṣkauravāmurvī kṛtvā yāsyāmi tatpurīm // ViP_5,35.26 //
analyzed: adya niṣkauravām urvī kṛtvā yāsyāmi tad purīm
karṇam duryodhanam droṇam adya bhīṣmam sa bāhlikam
duḥśasana ādīn bhūrim ca bhūriśravasam eva ca
somadattam śalam ca eva bhīma arjuna yudhiṣṭhirān
yamau ca kauravān ca anyān hatvā sa aśva ratha dvipān

original: vīramādāya taṃ sāṃbaṃ sapatnīkaṃ tataḥ purīm /
analyzed: vīram ādāya tam sa aṃbam sa patnīkam tatas purīm
dvārakām ugrasena ādīn gatvā drakṣyāmi bāndhavān

original: atha vā kauravāvāsaṃ samastaiḥ kurubhiḥ saha /
analyzed: atha vā kaurava āvāsam samastaiḥ kurubhiḥ saha
bhāgīrathyām kṣipāmi āśu nagaram nāgasāhvayam
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti uktvā mada rakta akṣaḥ karṣaṇa adhomukham halam
prākāra vapra durgasya cakarṣa musala āyudhaḥ

original: āghūrṇitaṃ tatsahasā tato vai hāstinaṃ puram /
analyzed: āghūrṇitam tat sahasā tatas vai hāstinam puram
dṛṣṭvā saṃkṣubdha hṛdayāḥ cukṣubhuḥ sarva kauravāḥ
rāma rāma mahā bāho kṣamyatām kṣamyatām tvayā
upasaṃhriyatām kopaḥ prasīda musalāyudha
eṣa sa aṃbaḥ sapatnīka stava niryātitaḥ balāt
a vijñāta prabhāvāṇām kṣmayatām aparādhinām
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
tatas niryātayāmāsuḥ sa aṃbam patnī samanvitam
niṣkramya sva purāt tūrṇam kauravāḥ muni puṅgava
bhīṣma droṇa kṛpa ādīnām praṇamya vadatām priyam

original: kṣāntameva mayetyāha balo balavatāṃ varaḥ // ViP_5,35.36 //
analyzed: kṣāntam eva mayā iti āha balaḥ balavatām varaḥ
adyā api āghūrṇita ākāram lakṣyate tat puram dvija
eṣa prabhāvaḥ rāmasya bala śaurya upalakṣaṇaḥ

original: tatastu kauravāḥsāṃbaṃ saṃpūjya bali nā saha /
analyzed: tatas tu kauravāḥ sa aṃbam saṃpūjya saha
preṣayāmāsuḥ udvāha dhana bhāryā samanvitam
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe pañcatriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
maitreya etat balam tasya balasya bala śālinaḥ
kṛtam yat anyat tena abhūt tat api śrūyatām tvayā
deva pakṣa virodhinaḥ
sakhā bhavat mahā vīryaḥ dvividaḥ vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
vaira anubandham balavān sa cakāra surān prati
narakam hatavān kṛṣṇaḥ devarājena coditaḥ
kariṣye sarva devānām tasmāt etad pratīkriyām
yajña vidhvaṃsanam kurvan martya loka kṣayam tathā
tatas vidhvaṃsayāmāsa yajñān ajñāna mohitaḥ

original: bibheda sādhumaryādāṃ kṣayaṃ cakre ca dehinām // ViP_5,36.5 //
analyzed: bibheda sādhu maryādām kṣayam cakre ca dehinām
dadāha sa vanān deśān pura grama antarāṇi ca
kvacid ca
śailān utpāṭya toyeṣu mumoca aṃbunidhau tathā
punar cārmava madhya sthaḥ kṣobhayāmāsa sāgaram
tena vikṣobhitaḥ ca abdhiḥ udvelaḥ dvija jāyate
plāvayan tīra jān gramān pura ādīn ati vegavān
kāmarūpī mahā rūpī kṛtvā sasyāni aśeṣatas
luṭhan bhramaṇa saṃmardaiḥ saṃcūrmayati vānaraḥ
tena viprakṛtam sarvam jagat etat durātmanā
niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkāram maitreya āsīt su duḥkhitam
ekadā araivata udyāne papau pānam halā yudhaḥ

original: revatī ca mahābhāgā tathaivānyā varastriyaḥ // ViP_5,36.11 //
analyzed: revatī ca mahābhāgā tathā evā anyāḥ vara striyaḥ
udgīyamānaḥ vilasat lalanā mauli madhya gaḥ

original: reme yadukulaśreṣṭhaḥ kubera iva nandane // ViP_5,36.12 //
analyzed: reme yadu kula śreṣṭhaḥ kuberaḥ iva nandane
tatas sa vānaraḥ abhyetya gṛhītvā sīriṇaḥ halam

original: musalaṃ ca cakārāsya saṃmukhaṃ ca viḍaṃbanam // ViP_5,36.13 //
analyzed: musalam ca cakāra asya saṃmukham ca viḍaṃbanam
tathā eva yoṣitām tāsām jahāsa abhimukham kapiḥ

original: pānapūrmāś ca karakāñcikṣepāhatya vai tadā // ViP_5,36.14 //
analyzed: ca karakān cikṣepa āhatya vai tadā
tatas kopa parīta ātmā bhartsayāmāsa tam halī
tathā api tam avajñāya cakrekilakila dhvanim

original: tataḥ smayitvā sa balo jagrāha musalaṃ ruṣā /
analyzed: tatas smayitvā sa balaḥ jagrāha musalam ruṣā

original: so 'pi śailaśilāṃ bhīmāṃ jagrāha plavagottamaḥ // ViP_5,36.16 //
analyzed: saḥ api śaila śilām bhīmām jagrāha plavaga uttamaḥ

original: cikṣepa sa ca tāṃ kṣiptāṃ musalena sahasradhā /
analyzed: cikṣepa sa ca tām kṣiptām musalena sahasradhā
vibheda yādava śreṣṭhaḥ sā papāta mahī tale
atha tat musalam ca asau samullaṅghya plavaṅgamaḥ
vegena āgatya roṣeṇa kareṇa urasi atāḍayat

original: tato balena kopena muṣṭinā mūrdhni tāḍitaḥ /
analyzed: tatas balena kopena muṣṭinā mūrdhni tāḍitaḥ
papāta rudhira udgārī dvividaḥ kṣīṇa jīvitaḥ
patatā tad śarīreṇa gireḥ śṛgam aśīryata
maitreya śatadhā vajri vajra imā iva vidāritam
puṣpa vṛṣṭim tatas devāḥ rāmasya upari cikṣipuḥ
praśaśaṃsuḥ tatas abhyetya sādhu etat te mahat kṛtam
anena duṣṭa kapinā daitya pakṣa upakāriṇā

original: jagannirākṛtaṃ vīra diṣṭyā sa kṣayamāgataḥ // ViP_5,36.22 //
analyzed: jagat nirākṛtam vīra diṣṭyā sa kṣayam āgataḥ
iti uktvā divam ājagmuḥ devāḥ hṛṣṭaḥ sa guhyakāḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
evaṃvidhāni anekāni baladevasya dhīmataḥ
karmāṇi aparimeya aniśeṣasya dharaṇībhṛtaḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe pañcama aṃśe ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
evam daitya vadham kṛṣṇe baladeva sahāyavān

original: cakre duṣṭakṣitīśānāṃ tathaiva jagataḥ kṛte // ViP_5,37.1 //
analyzed: cakre duṣṭa kṣitīśānām tathā eva jagataḥ kṛte
kṣiteḥ ca bhāram bhagavān phālgunena samanvitaḥ
avatārayāmāsa vibhuḥ samasta akṣaḥ ūhiṇī vadhāt
kṛtvā bhārāvata ramam bhuvaḥ hatvā akhilān nṛpān
śāpa vyājena viprāṇām upasaṃhṛtavān kulam
utsṛjya dvārakām kṛṣṇaḥ tyaktvā mānuṣyam ātmanaḥ

original: sāṃśo viṣṇumayaṃ sthānaṃ praviveśa mune nijam // ViP_5,37.4 //
analyzed: sa aṃśaḥ viṣṇu mayam sthānam praviveśa mune nijam
maitreyaḥ uvāca
sa vipra śāpa vyājena saṃjahre sva kulam katham
katham ca mānuṣam deham utsasarja janārdanaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
viśvamitraḥ tathā kaṇvaḥ nāradaḥ ca mahā muniḥ
piṇḍārake mahārīrthe dṛṣṭvā yadu kumārakaiḥ
tatas te yauvana unmattāḥ bhāvi kārya pracoditāḥ

original: sāṃbaṃ jāṃbavatīputraṃ bhūṣayitvā striyaṃ yathā // ViP_5,37.7 //
analyzed: sa aṃbam jāṃbavatī putram bhūṣayitvā striyam yathā
praśritāḥ tān munīn ūcuḥ praṇipāta puraḥsaram

original: iyaṃ strī putrakāmā vai brūta kiṃ janayiṣyati // ViP_5,37.8 //
analyzed: iyam strī putra kāmā vai brūta kim janayiṣyati
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
divya jñāna upapannāḥ te vipralabdhāḥ kumārakaiḥ
munayaḥ kupitāḥ procuḥ musalam janayiṣyati
sarva yādava saṃhāra kāraṇam bhuvana uttaram
yena akhila kula utsādau yādavānām bhaviṣyati
iti uktāḥ te kumārāḥ tu ācacakṣuḥ yathātatham

original: ugrasenāya musalaṃ jajñe sāṃbasya codarāt // ViP_5,37.11 //
analyzed: ugrasenāya musalam jajñe sāṃbasya ca udarāt
tat ugrasenaḥ musalam ayaḥ cūrṇam akārayat

original: jajñe taderakāyūrṇaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tair mahodadhau // ViP_5,37.12 //
analyzed: jajñe tat erakā īrakā īrṇam prakṣiptam taiḥ mahā udadhau
musalasya atha lohasya pūrṇitasya tu yādavaiḥ

original: khaṇḍaṃ cūrṇitaśeṣaṃ tu tato yattomarākṛti // ViP_5,37.13 //
analyzed: khaṇḍam cūrṇita śeṣam tu tatas yat tomara ākṛti
tat api aṃbunidhau kṣiptam matsyaḥ jagrāha jālibhiḥ
ghātitasya udarāt tasya lubdhaḥ jagraha tad jārāḥ
vijñāta parama arthaḥ api bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
na aicchat tat anyathā kartum vidhinā yat samīhitam

original: devaiś ca prahito vāyuḥ praṇipattyāha keśavam /
analyzed: devaiḥ ca prahitaḥ vāyuḥ praṇipattyā āha keśavam
rajasi evam aham dūtaḥ prahitaḥ bhagavan suraiḥ
vasu aśvi marut āditya rudra sādhya ādibhiḥ saha

original: vijñāpayati śakrastvāṃ tadidaṃ śrūyatāṃ vibho // ViP_5,37.17 //
analyzed: vijñāpayati śakraḥ tvām tat idam śrūyatām vibho
bhāra avataraṇa arthāya varṣāṇām adhikam śatam
bhagavān avatīrṇaḥ utra coditaḥ
durvṛttāḥ nihatāḥ daityāḥ bhuvaḥ bhāraḥ avatāritaḥ

original: tvayā manāthāstridaśā bhavantu tridive sadā // ViP_5,37.19 //
analyzed: tvayā manāthāḥ tridaśāḥ bhavantu tridive sadā
tat atītam jagannātha varṣāṇām adhikam śatam

original: idānīṃ gamyatāṃ svargo bhavatā yadi rocate // ViP_5,37.20 //
analyzed: idānīm gamyatām svargaḥ bhavatā yadi rocate
devaiḥ vijñāpyate deva tathā atrā eva ratiḥ tava
tat sthīyatām yathākālam āstheyam anujīvibhiḥ
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: yattvamātthākhilaṃ dūta vedmy etad aham apy uta /
analyzed: yat tvam āttha akhilam dūta vedmi etat aham api uta

original: prārabdha eva hi mayā yādavānāṃparikṣayaḥ // ViP_5,37.22 //
analyzed: prārabdhaḥ eva hi mayā yādavānām parikṣayaḥ
bhuvaḥ nā adya api bhāraḥ ayam yādavaiḥ a nibarhitaiḥ
avatārya karomi etat sapta rātreṇa sa tvaraḥ
yathā gṛhītam aṃbhodheḥ dattvā aham dvārakā bhuvam
yādavān upasaṃhṛtya yāsyāmi tridaśālayam
manuṣya deham utsṛjya saṃkarṣam asahāyavān

original: prāpta evāsmi mantavyo devendreṇa tathāmaraiḥ // ViP_5,37.25 //
analyzed: prāptaḥ evā asmi mantavyaḥ deva indreṇa tathā amaraiḥ
jarāsaṃdha ādayaḥ ye anye nihatāḥ bhāra hetavaḥ
kṣiteḥ tebhyaḥ kumāraḥ api yadūnām na apacīyate
tat etam su mahā bhāram avatārya kṣiteḥ aham
yāsyāmi amara lokasya pālanāya bravīhi tān
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti uktaḥ vāsudevena deva dūtaḥ praṇamya tam

original: maitreya divyayā gatyā devarājāntikaṃ yayau // ViP_5,37.28 //
analyzed: maitreya divyayā gatyā devarāja antikam yayau
bhagavān api atha utpātān divya bhauma āntarikṣa jān
dadarśa dvārakā puryām vināśāya divāniśam
tān dṛṣṭvā yādavān āha paśyadhvam ati dāruṇān

original: mahotpātāñchamāyaiṣāṃ prabhāsaṃ yāma mā ciram // ViP_5,37.30 //
analyzed: mahā utpātān śamāya eṣām prabhāsam yāma mā ciram
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
evam ukte tu kṛṣṇena yādava pravāraḥ tatas
mahā bhāgavataḥ prāha praṇipatya uddhavaḥ harim
bhagavan yat mayā kāryam tat ājñāpaya sāṃpratam
manye kulam idam sarvam bhagavān saṃhariṣyati
nāśāya asya nimittāni kulasya acyuta lakṣaye
śrī bhagavān uvāca
gaccha tvam divyayā gatyā mad prasāda samutthayā
yat badaryāśramam puṇyam gandhamādana parvate
nara nārāyaṇa sthāne tat pavitram mahī tale
mad manāḥ mad prasādena tatra siddhim avāpsyasi

original: ahaṃ svargaṃ gamiṣyāmi hyupasaṃhṛtya vaikulam // ViP_5,37.35 //
analyzed: aham svargam gamiṣyāmi hi upasaṃhṛtya vaikulam

original: dvārakāṃ ca mayā tyaktāṃ samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati /
analyzed: dvārakām ca mayā tyaktām samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati
mad veśma ca ekam muktvā tu bhayāt mattaḥ jalāśaye
tatra sannihitaḥ ca aham bhaktānām hita kāmyayā
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti uktaḥ praṇipatya enam jagāma āśu tapevanam
nara nārāyaṇa sthānam keśavena anumoditaḥ
tatas te yādavāḥ sarve rathān āruhya śīghra gān
prabhāsam prayayuḥ sārdham kṛṣṇa rāma ādibhiḥ dvija
prabhāsam samanuprāptāḥ kukura andhaka vṛṣṇayaḥ
cakruḥ tatra mahā pānam vāsudevena coditāḥ
pibatām tatra ca eteṣām saṃgharṣeṇa parasparam
ativāda indhanaḥ jajñe kalaha agniḥ kṣaya āvahaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: svaṃsvaṃ vai bhuñjatāṃ teṣāṃ kalahaḥ kiṃnimittakaḥ /
analyzed: svam svam vai bhuñjatām teṣām kalahaḥ kiṃnimittakaḥ
saṃgharṣaḥ vā dvijaśreṣṭha tat mama ākhyātum arhasi
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: mṛṣṭaṃ madīyamannaṃ te na mṛṣṭamiti jalpatām /
analyzed: mṛṣṭam madīyam annam te na mṛṣṭam iti jalpatām
mṛṣṭa amṛṣṭa kathā jajñe saṃgharṣa kalahau tatas
tatas ca anyonyam abhyetya kridha saṃrakta locanāḥ

original: jaghnuḥ parasparaṃ te tu śastrair daivabalātkṛtāḥ // ViP_5,37.43 //
analyzed: jaghnuḥ parasparam te tu śastraiḥ daiva balātkṛtāḥ
kṣīṇa śastrāḥ ca jagṛhuḥ pratyāsannām atha erakām

original: erakā tu gṛhītā vai vajrabhūteva lakṣyate /
analyzed: erakā tu gṛhītā vai vajra bhūtā iva lakṣyate
tayā parasparam jaghnuḥ saṃprahāre su dāruṇe
pradyumna sāṃba pramukhāḥ kṛtavarmā atha sātyakiḥ
aniruddha ādayaḥ ca anye pṛthuḥ vipṛthuḥ eva ca
cāruvarmā cārukaḥ ca tathā akrūra ādayaḥ dvija

original: erakārūpibhir vajrais te nijaghnuḥ parasparam // ViP_5,37.47 //
analyzed: erakā rūpibhiḥ vajraiḥ te nijaghnuḥ parasparam
nivārayāmāsa hariḥ yādavān te ca keśavam

original: sahāyaṃ menirerīṇāṃ prāptaṃ jaghnuḥ parasparam // ViP_5,37.48 //
analyzed: sahāyam meniḥ erīṇām prāptam jaghnuḥ parasparam
kṛṣṇaḥ api kupitaḥ teṣām erakā muṣṭim ādade
vadhāya saḥ api musalam muṣṭar lauham abhūt tadā
jaghāna tena niḥśeṣān yādavān ātatāyinaḥ
jaghnuḥ te sahasā abhyetya tathā anye api parasparam
tatas ca arṇava madhyena jaitraḥ asau cakriṇaḥ rathaḥ

original: paśyato dārukasyātha prāyādaśvair dhṛto dvija // ViP_5,37.51 //
analyzed: paśyataḥ dārukasya atha prāyāt aśvaiḥ dhṛtaḥ dvija

original: cakraṃ gadā tathā śārṅga tūṇīśaṅkhosireva ca /
analyzed: cakram gadā tathā śārṅga tūṇī śaṅkha usiḥ eva ca
pradakṣiṇam harim kṛtvā jagmuḥ āditya vartmanā
kṣaṇena na abhavat kaścid yādavānām a ghātitaḥ

original: ṛte kṛṣṇaṃ mahātmānaṃ dārukaṃ ca mahāmune // ViP_5,37.53 //
analyzed: ṛte kṛṣṇam mahātmānam dārukam ca mahā mune
caṅkramyamāṇau tau rāmam vṛkṣa mūle kṛta āsanam
dadṛśāte mukhāt ca asya niṣkrāmantam mahā uragam
niṣkramya sa makhāt tasya mahā bhogaḥ bhujaṅgamaḥ
prayayau arṇavam siddhaiḥ pujyamānaḥ tathā uragaiḥ
tatas ūrghyam ādāya tadā jaladhiḥ saṃmukham yayau
praviveśa tatas toyam pūjitaḥ pannaga uttamaiḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā balasya niryāṇaṃ dārukaṃ prāha keśavaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā balasya niryāṇam dārukam prāha keśavaḥ
idam sarvam samācakṣva vasudeva ugrasenayoḥ
niryāṇam balabhadrasya yādavānām tathā kṣayam
sthitvā aham api etat parityakṣye kalevaram

original: vācyaś ca dvārakāvāsī janaḥ sarvas tathāhukaḥ /
analyzed: vācyaḥ ca dvārakā vāsī janaḥ sarvaḥ tathā āhukaḥ

original: yathomāṃ nagarīṃ sarvāṃ samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati // ViP_5,37.59 //
analyzed: yathā umām nagarīm sarvām samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati
tasmāt bhavadbhiḥ sarvaiḥ tu pratīkṣyaḥ hi arjuna āgamaḥ

original: na stheyaṃ dvārakāmadhye niṣkrānte tatra pāṇḍave // ViP_5,37.60 //
analyzed: na stheyam dvārakā madhye niṣkrānte tatra pāṇḍave

original: tenaiva saha gantavyāṃ yatra yāti sa kauravaḥ // ViP_5,37.61 //
analyzed: tena eva saha gantavyām yatra yāti sa kauravaḥ
gatvā ca brūhi kainteyam arjunam vacanāt mama
pālanīyaḥ tvayā śaktyā janaḥ ayam mad parigrahaḥ
tvam arjunena sahitaḥ dvāravatyām tathā janam

original: gṛhītvā yādi vajraś ca yadurājo bhaviṣyati // ViP_5,37.63 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā vajraḥ ca yadu rājaḥ bhaviṣyati
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: ityukto dārukaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ praṇipatya punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ dārukaḥ kṛṣṇam praṇipatya punar punar

original: pradakṣiṇaṃ ca bahuśaḥ kṛtvā prāyādyathoditam // ViP_5,37.64 //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam ca bahuśas kṛtvā prāyāt yathā uditam

original: sa ca gatvā tadācaṣṭa dvārakāyāṃ tathār'junam /
analyzed: sa ca gatvā tat ācaṣṭa dvārakāyām tathā ar'junam

original: ānināya mahābuddhirvajraṃ cakre tathā nṛpam // ViP_5,37.65 //
analyzed: ānināya mahā buddhiḥ vajram cakre tathā nṛpam
bhagavān api govindaḥ vāsudeva ātmakam param
brahma ātmani samāropya sarva bhūteṣu adhārayat
niṣprapañce mahābhāga saṃyojya ātmānam ātmani
turya avastha sa līlam ca śetesma puruṣottamaḥ

original: babhūva tatra gacchantyo dadṛśustaṃ surastriyaḥ // ViP_5,38.72 //

original: sarvāstāḥ kauravaśreṣṭha taṃ variṣṭhaṃ dvijanmanām // ViP_5,38.75 //

original: tadicchāmaḥ patiṃ prāptuṃ viprendra puruṣottama // ViP_5,38.78 //

vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā gūhamānānāṃ yāsāṃ hāsaḥ sphuṭo 'bhavat /

original: tāḥ śaśāpa muniḥ kopamavāpya kurunandana // ViP_5,38.80 //

original: bhavatībhiḥ kṛtā tasmādetaṃ śāpaṃ dadāmi vaḥ // ViP_5,38.81 //

analyzed: tat kathyatām tatas hṛd stham pṛcchāmaḥ tvām prayojanam
śrī parāśaḥ uvāca
iti uktaḥ munibhiḥ vyāsaḥ prahasya idam atha abravīt

original: śrūyatāṃ bho muniśreṣṭhā yaduktaṃ sādhusādhviti // ViP_6,2.14 //
analyzed: śrūyatām bho muni śreṣṭhāḥ yat uktam sādhu sādhu iti
vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: yatkṛte daśabhir varṣais tretāyāṃ hāyanena tat /
analyzed: yatkṛte daśabhiḥ varṣaiḥ tretāyām hāyanena tat

original: dvāpare tacca māsena hyahorātreṇa tatkalau // ViP_6,2.15 //
analyzed: dvāpare tat ca māsena hi ahorātreṇa tat kalau

original: tapaso brahmacaryasya japādeś ca phalaṃ dvijāḥ /
analyzed: tapasaḥ brahmacaryasya japa ādeḥ ca phalam dvijāḥ
prāpnoti puraṣaḥ tena kaliḥ sādhu iti bhāṣitam
dhyāyan kṛte yajan yajñaiḥ tretāyām dvāpareḥ acayan

original: yadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam // ViP_6,2.17 //
analyzed: yat āpnoti tat āpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam
dharma utkarṣam atīva atra prāpnoti puruṣaḥ kalau
alpa āyāsena dharma jñāḥ tena tuṣṭaḥ asmi aham kaleḥ
vrata caryā paraiḥ grāhyāḥ vedāḥ pūrvam dvijātibhiḥ

original: tataḥsa dharmasaṃprāptair yaṣṭavyaṃ vidhivad dhanaiḥ // ViP_6,2.19 //
analyzed: tatas sa dharma saṃprāptaiḥ yaṣṭavyam vidhivat dhanaiḥ

original: vṛthā kathā vṛthā bhojyaṃ vṛthejyā ca dvijanmanām /
analyzed: vṛthā kathā vṛthā bhojyam vṛthā ijyā ca dvijanmanām

original: patanāya tato bhāvyaṃ tais tu saṃyamibhiḥ sadā // ViP_6,2.20 //
analyzed: patanāya tatas bhāvyam taiḥ tu saṃyamibhiḥ sadā
asamyak karaṇe doṣaḥ teṣām sarveṣu vastuṣu
bhojya peya ādikam ca eṣām na icchā prāpti karam dvijāḥ

original: pāratantryaṃ samasteṣu teṣāṃ kāryeṣu vai yataḥ /
analyzed: pāratantryam samasteṣu teṣām kāryeṣu vai yatas
jayanti te nijān lokān kleśena mahatā dvijāḥ
dvija śuśrūṣayā eva eṣa pākayajña adhikāravān
nijān jayati vai lokān śūdraḥ dhanyataraḥ tatas
bhakṣya abhakṣyeṣu na asya asti peya apeyeṣu vai yatas
niyamaḥ muni śārdūlāḥ tena asau sādhu iti īritaḥ
svadharmasya avirodhena naraiḥ labdham dhanam sadā

original: pratipādanīyaṃ pātreṣu yaṣṭavyaṃ ca yathāvidhi // ViP_6,2.25 //
analyzed: pratipādanīyam pātreṣu yaṣṭavyam ca yathāvidhi
tasya arjane mahā kleśaḥ pālane ca dvijottamāḥ
tathā asat viniyogena vijñātam gahanam nṛṇām
evam anyaiḥ tathā kleśaiḥ puruṣāḥ dvijasattamāḥ
nijān jayanti vai lokān prājāpatya ādikān kramāt
yoṣit śuśrūṣaṇāt bhartuḥ karmaṇā manasā girā

original: taddhitā śubhamāpnoti tatsālokyaṃ yato dvijāḥ // ViP_6,2.28 //
analyzed: tad hitā śubham āpnoti tad sālokyam yatas dvijāḥ
na ati kleśena mahatā tān eva puruṣaḥ yathā

original: tṛtīyaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ tena mayā sādhviti yoṣitaḥ // ViP_6,2.29 //
analyzed: tṛtīyam vyāhṛtam tena mayā sādhu iti yoṣitaḥ
etat vaḥ kathitam viprāyat nimittam iha āgataḥ

original: tatpṛcchataḥ yathākāmaṃ sava bakṣyāmi vaḥ sphuṭam // ViP_6,2.30 //
analyzed: tat pṛcchataḥ yathākāmam bakṣyāmi vaḥ sphuṭam
ṛṣayaḥ te tatas procuḥ yat praṣṭavyam mahā mune

original: asminneva ca tatpraśne yathāvatkathitaṃ tvayā // ViP_6,2.31 //
analyzed: asmin eva ca tat praśne yathāvat kathitam tvayā
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
tatas prahasya tān āha kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ muniḥ
vismaya utphulla nayanān tāpasān tān upāgatān

original: mayaiṣa bhavatāṃ praśro jñāto divyena cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: mayā eṣa bhavatām praśraḥ jñātaḥ divyena cakṣuṣā

original: tatohaṃ vaḥ prasaṃgena sādhusādhviti bhāṣitam // ViP_6,2.33 //
analyzed: tatas ham vaḥ prasaṃgena sādhu sādhu iti bhāṣitam
su alpena hi vai kalau
naraiḥ ātma guṇa aṃbhobhiḥ kṣalita akhila kilbiṣaiḥ
śudraiḥ ca dvija śuśrūṣā tatparaiḥ dvijasattamāḥ

original: tathā strībhir anāyā sātpatiśuśrūṣayaiva hi // ViP_6,2.35 //
analyzed: tathā strībhiḥ an āyā sāt pati śuśrūṣayā eva hi
tatas tritayam api etat mama dhanyataram matam
dharma saṃpādane kleśaḥ dvijātīnām kṛta ādiṣu
bhavadbhiḥ yat abhipretam tat etat kathitam mayā
a pṛṣṭena api dharma jñāḥ kim anyat kriyatām dvijāḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: tataḥsaṃpūjya te vyāsaṃ praśaśaṃsuḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: tatas saṃpūjya te vyāsam praśaśaṃsuḥ punar punar
yathāgatan dvijāḥ jagmuḥ vyāsa ukti kṛta niścayāḥ
bhavataḥ api mahābhāga rahasyam kathitam mayā
atyanta duṣṭasya kaleḥ ayam ekaḥ mahān muṇaḥ
yat ca aham bhavatā pṛṣṭaḥ jagatām upasaṃhṛtim

original: prākṛtāmantarālāṃ ca tāmapyeṣa vadāmi te // ViP_6,2.40 //
analyzed: prākṛtām antarālām ca tām api eṣa vadāmi te
iti śrī viṣṇumāhapurāṇe ṣaṣṭha aṃśe dvitīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
sarveṣām eva bhūtānām trividhaḥ pratisaṃcaraḥ
naimittikaḥ prākṛtikaḥ tathā eva ātyantikaḥ layaḥ
brāhmaḥ naimittikaḥ teṣām kalpa ante pratisaṃcaraḥ
ātyantikaḥ tu mokṣa ākhyaḥ prākṛtaḥ dvi parārdhakaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca
parārdha saṃkhyām bhagavat mama ācakṣva yayā tu saḥ
dviguṇīkṛtayā jñeyaḥ prākṛtaḥ pratisaṃcaraḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
sthānāt sthānam daśaguṇam ekasmāt raṇyate dvija
tatas uṣṭādaśame bhāge parārdham abhidhīyate
parārdha dviguṇam yat tu prākṛtaḥ sa layaḥ dvija

original: tadāvyaktekhilaṃ vyaktaṃ svahetau layameti vai // ViP_6,3.5 //
analyzed: tadā avyakta ikhilam vyaktam sva hetau layam eti vai
nimeṣaḥ mānuṣaḥ yaḥ asau mātrā mātrā pramāṇataḥ

original: taiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kāṣṭhā triṃśatkāṣṭha kalā smṛtā // ViP_6,3.6 //
analyzed: taiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kāṣṭhā triṃśatkāṣṭha kalā smṛtā

original: nāḍikā tu pramāṇena sā kalā daśa pañca ca // ViP_6,3.7 //
analyzed: nāḍikā tu pramāṇena sā kalāḥ daśa pañca ca
unmānena aṃbhasaḥ sā tu palāni ardha trayodaśa

original: māgadhena tu mānena jalaprasthastu sa smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: māgadhena tu mānena jala prasthaḥ tu sa smṛtaḥ
hema māṣaiḥ kṛta chidra caturbhiḥ cāturaṅgulaiḥ
nāḍikābhyām atha dvābhyām muhūrtaḥ dvijasattama

original: ahorātraṃ muhurtāstu triṃśanmāso dinais tathā // ViP_6,3.9 //
analyzed: ahorātram muhurtāḥ tu triṃśat māsaḥ dinaiḥ tathā
māsaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ varṣam ahorātram tuta divi

original: tribhir varṣaśatair varṣaṃ ṣaṣṭyā caivāsuradviṣām // ViP_6,3.10 //
analyzed: tribhiḥ varṣa śataiḥ varṣam ṣaṣṭyā ca eva asuradviṣām
taiḥ tu dvādaśa sāhastraiḥ caturyugam udāhṛtam

original: caturyugasahasraṃ tu kathyate brahmaṇo dinam // ViP_6,3.11 //
analyzed: caturyuga sahasram tu kathyate brahmaṇaḥ dinam
sa kalpaḥ tatra manavaḥ caturdaśa mahā mune

original: tadante caiva maitreya brāhmo nemittiko layaḥ // ViP_6,3.12 //
analyzed: tad ante ca eva maitreya brāhmaḥ nemittikaḥ layaḥ
tasya svarūpam ati ugram maitreya gadataḥ mama

original: śṛṇuṣva prākṛtaṃ bhūyastava vakṣyāmyahaṃ layam // ViP_6,3.13 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva prākṛtam bhūyas tava vakṣyāmi aham layam
caturyuga sahasra ante kṣīṇa prāye mahī tale
anāvṛṣṭiḥ atīva ugrā jāyate śata vārṣikī
tatas yāni alpa sārāṇi tāni sattvāni aśeṣatas
kṣayam yānti muni śreṣṭha pārthivāni anupījanāt
tatas sa bhagavān viṣṇu rudra rūpa dharaḥ avyayaḥ
kṣayāya yatate kartum ātma sthāḥ sakalāḥ prajāḥ

original: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇur bhānoḥ saptasu raśmiṣu /
analyzed: tatas sa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ bhānoḥ saptasu raśmiṣu
sthitaḥ pibati aśeṣāṇi jalāni muni saptama
pītvā aṃbhāṃsi samastāni prāṇi bhūmi gatāni api

original: śoṣaṃ nayati maitreya samastaṃ pṛthivītalam // ViP_6,3.18 //
analyzed: śoṣam nayati maitreya samastam pṛthivī talam
samudrān sāritaḥ śaila nadī prasravaṇāni ca

original: pātāleṣu ca yattoyaṃ tatsarvaṃ nayati kṣayam // ViP_6,3.19 //
analyzed: pātāleṣu ca yat toyam tat sarvam nayati kṣayam
tatas tasya anubhāvena toya āhāra upabṛṃhitāḥ

original: ta eva raśmayaḥsapta jāyante sapta bhāskarāḥ // ViP_6,3.20 //
analyzed: te eva raśmayaḥ sapta jāyante sapta bhāskarāḥ

original: adhaścordhvaṃ ca te dīptā stataḥsapta divākarāḥ /
analyzed: adhas ca ūrdhvam ca te dīptāḥ statas sapta divākarāḥ
dahanti aśaṣam trailokyam sa pātāla talam dvija

original: dahyamānaṃ tu tair dīptais trailokyaṃ dvija bhāskaraiḥ /
analyzed: dahyamānam tu taiḥ dīptaiḥ trailokyam dvija bhāskaraiḥ
sa adri nadī arṇava ābhogam nisneham abhijāyate
tatas nirdagdha vṛkṣa aṃbu trailokyam ākhitam dvija
bhavati eṣā ca vasudhā kūrma pṛṣṭha upama ākṛtiḥ
tatas kālāgni rudraḥ asau bhūtvā sarva haraḥ analaḥ
śeṣa ahi śvāsa saṃbhūtaḥ pātālāni dahati adhas

original: pātālāni samastāni sa dagdhvā jvalano mahān /
analyzed: pātālāni samastāni sa dagdhvā jvalanaḥ mahān
bhūmim abhyetya sakalam babhasti vasudhā talam
bhuvar lokam tatas sarvam svar lokam ca su dāruṇaḥ
jvālā mālā mahā āvartaḥ tatra eva parivartate
aṃbarīṣam iva ābhāti trailokyam akhilam tadā
jvālā āvarta parivāram upakṣīṇa carācaram
tatas tāpa parītāḥ tu loka dvaya nivāsinaḥ
kṛta adhikārāḥ āgacchanti mahar lokam mahā mune
tasmāt api mahā tāpa taptā lokāt tatas param

original: gañcchanti janalokaṃ te daśāvṛttyā paraiṣiṇaḥ // ViP_6,3.29 //
analyzed: gañcchanti jana lokam te daśa āvṛttyā para eṣiṇaḥ
tatas dagdhvā jagat sarvam rudra rūpī janārdanaḥ
mukha niśvāsa jān meghān karoti muni sattama
tatas gaja kula prakhyāḥ taḍitvantaḥ ati nādinaḥ
uttiṣṭhanti tathā vyomni ghorāḥ saṃvartakāḥ ghanāḥ
kecid nīlotpala śyāmāḥ kecid kumuda sannibhāḥ

original: dhūmravarṇā ghanāḥ kecitkecitpītāḥ payo dharāḥ // ViP_6,3.32 //
analyzed: dhūmra varṇāḥ ghanāḥ kecid kecid pītāḥ payaḥ dharāḥ
kecid rāsabha varṇa ābhāḥ lākṣā rasa nibhāḥ tathā
kecid vaiḍūrya saṃkāśāḥ indranīla nibhāḥ kvacid
śaṅkha kunda nibhāḥ ca anye jātyam jana nibhāḥ pare

original: indragopanibhāḥ kecit tataḥ śakhinibhās tathā // ViP_6,3.34 //
analyzed: indragopa nibhāḥ kecid tatas śakhi nibhāḥ tathā
manaḥśilā ābhāḥ kecid vai haritāla nibhāḥ pare
cāṣa patra nibhāḥ kecid uttiṣṭhante mahā ghanāḥ
kecid puravara ākārāḥ kecid parvata sannibhāḥ
kūṭāgāra nibhāḥ ca anye kecid sthala nibāḥ ghanāḥ
mahā rāvāḥ mahā kāyāḥ pūrayanti nabhaḥ sthalam
varṣantaḥ te mahā sārāḥ tam agnim ati bhairavam
śamayanti akhilam vipra trailokya antar adhiṣṭhitam

original: naṣṭe cāgnau ca satataṃ varṣamāṇā hyaharniśam /
analyzed: naṣṭe ca agnau ca satatam varṣamāṇāḥ hi aharniśam

original: plāvayanti jagat sarvam aṃbhobir munisattama // ViP_6,3.38 //
analyzed: plāvayanti jagat sarvam aṃbhobiḥ muni sattama
dhārābhiḥ atimātrābhiḥ plāvayitvā akhilām bhuvam

original: bhuvarlokaṃ tathevordhū plāvayanti hi te dvija // ViP_6,3.39 //
analyzed: bhuvar lokam tathā iva ūrdhū plāvayanti hi te dvija
andhakārīkṛte loke naṣṭe sthāvara jaṅgame

original: varṣati te mahāmeghā varṣāṇāmadhikaṃ śatam // ViP_6,3.40 //
analyzed: varṣati te mahā meghāḥ varṣāṇām adhikam śatam
evam bhavati kalpa ante samastam muni sattama
vāsudevasya māhātmyāt nityasya paramātmanaḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭha aṃśe tṛtīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
sapta ṛśi sthānām ākramya sthita iṃbhasi mahā mune
ekārṇavam bhavati etat trailokyam akhilam tatas
mukha niśvāsa jaḥ viṣṇoḥ vāyuḥ tān jaladān tatas
nāśayan vāti maitreya varṣāṇām aparam śatam
sarva bhūta mayaḥ acintyaḥ bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
anādiḥ ādiḥ viśvasya pītvā vāyum aśeṣatas
ekārṇave tatas tasmin śeṣa śayyā gataḥ prabhuḥ
brahma rūpa dharaḥ śete bhagavān ādi kṛt hariḥ
jana loka gataiḥ siddhaiḥ samaka ādyaiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ
brahma loka gataiḥ ca eva cintyamānaḥ mumukṣubhiḥ
ātma māyā mayīm divyām yoganidrām samāsthitaḥ
ātmānam vāsudeva ākhyam cintayan madhusūdanaḥ
eṣa naimittikaḥ nāma maitreyaḥ pratisaṃcaraḥ

original: nimittaṃ tatra yacchete brahmarūpadharo hariḥ // ViP_6,4.7 //
analyzed: nimittam tatra yat śete brahma rūpa dharaḥ hariḥ

original: yadā jāgarti sarvātmā sa tadā ceṣṭate jagat /
analyzed: yadā jāgarti sarva ātmā sa tadā ceṣṭate jagat
nimīlati etat akhilam māyā śayyām gate acyute
padmayoneḥ dinam yat tu catur yuga sahasravat
ekārṇavīkṛte loke tāvatī rātriḥ iṣyate
tatas prabuddhaḥ rātri ante punar sṛṣṭim karoti ajaḥ
brahma sva rūpa dhṛk viṣṇuḥ yathā te kathitam purā
iti eṣa kalpa saṃhāraḥ avāntarapralayaḥ dvija

original: naimittikaste kathitaḥ prākṛtaḥ śṛṇvataḥ param // ViP_6,4.11 //
analyzed: naimittikaḥ te kathitaḥ prākṛtaḥ śṛṇvataḥ param
anāvṛṣṭi ādi saṃparkāt kṛte saṃkṣālane mune
samasteṣu eva lokeṣu pātāleṣu akhileṣu ca
mahat ādeḥ vikārasya viśeṣa antasya saṃkṣaye
kṛṣṇa icchā kārite tasmin pravṛtte pratisaṃcare

original: āpo grasaṃti vai pūrvaṃ bhūmergandhātmakaṃ guṇam /
analyzed: āpaḥ grasaṃti vai pūrvam bhūmeḥ gandha ātmakam guṇam

original: āttagandhā tato bhūmiḥ pralayatvāya kalpate // ViP_6,4.14 //
analyzed: ātta gandhā tatas bhūmiḥ pralaya tvāya kalpate
praṇaṣṭe gandha tanmātre bhavati urvī jala ātmikā
āpaḥ tadā pravṛddhāḥ tu vegavatyaḥ mahā svanāḥ
sarvam āpūrayanti idam tiṣṭhanti vicaranti ca
salilena ūrmi mālena āloka antāt samantataḥ

original: apāmapi guṇo yastu jyotiṣā pīyate tu saḥ /
analyzed: apām api guṇaḥ yaḥ tu jyotiṣā pīyate tu saḥ
naśyanti āpaḥ tatas tāḥ ca rasa tanmātra saṃkṣayāt
tatas ca āpaḥ hṛta rasā jyotiṣam prāpnuvanti vai

original: agnāvasthe tu salile tejasā sarvato vṛte // ViP_6,4.18 //
analyzed: agnāvasthe tu salile tejasā sarvatas vṛte

original: sa cāgniḥ sarvato vyāpya cādatte tajjalaṃ tathā /
analyzed: sa ca agniḥ sarvatas vyāpya ca ādatte tat jalam tathā
sarvam āpūryate ircirbhiḥ tadā jagat idam śanais
arcirbhiḥ saṃvṛte tasmin tiryak ūrdhvam adhas tadā

original: jyotiṣo 'pi paraṃ rūpaṃ vāyuratti prabhākaram // ViP_6,4.20 //
analyzed: jyotiṣaḥ api param rūpam vāyuḥ atti prabhākaram
pralīne ca tatas tasmin vāyu bhūte akhilātmani
pranaṣṭe rūpa tanmātre hṛta rūpaḥ vibhāvasuḥ
praśāmyati tadā jyotiḥ vāyuḥ dedhūyate mahān

original: nirā loke tathā loke vāyvavasthe ca tejasi // ViP_6,4.22 //
analyzed: nirāḥ loke tathā loke vāyu avasthe ca tejasi
tatas tu mūlam āsādya vāyuḥ saṃbhavam ātmanaḥ

original: ūrdhvaṃ cādhaś ca tiryakca dodhavīti diśo daśa // ViP_6,4.23 //
analyzed: ūrdhvam ca adhas ca tiryak ca dodhavīti diśaḥ daśa
vāyoḥ api guṇam sparśam ākāśaḥ grasate tatas

original: praśāmyati tato vāyuḥ khaṃ tu tiṣṭhatyanāvṛtam // ViP_6,4.24 //
analyzed: praśāmyati tatas vāyuḥ kham tu tiṣṭhati anāvṛtam
arūpa rasam asparśam agandham na ca mūrtimat
sarvam āpūrayat ca eva su mahāt tat prakāśate
bhūta indriyeṣu yugapad bhūta ādau saṃsthiteṣu vai
abimāna ātmakaḥ hi eṣa bhūtādiḥ tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: bhītādiṃ grasate cāpi mahānve buddhilakṣaṇaḥ // ViP_6,4.28 //
analyzed: bhīta ādim grasate ca api mahān ve buddhi lakṣaṇaḥ

original: urvī mahaṃś ca jagataḥ pratintarbāhyatas tathā // ViP_6,4.29 //
analyzed: urvī mahan ca jagataḥ pratintar bāhyatas tathā
evam sapta mahābuddhe kramāt prakṛtayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: pratyāhāre tu tāḥsarvāḥ praviśanti parasparam // ViP_6,4.30 //
analyzed: pratyāhāre tu tāḥ sarvāḥ praviśanti parasparam
yena idam āvṛtam sarvam aṇḍam apsu pralīyate
sapta dvīpa samudra antam sapta lokam sa parvatam

original: udakāvaraṇaṃ yattu jyotiṣā pīyate tu tam /
analyzed: udaka āvaraṇam yat tu jyotiṣā pīyate tu tam

original: jyotirvāyau layaṃ yāti yātyākāśe samīramaḥ // ViP_6,4.32 //
analyzed: jyotiḥ vāyau layam yāti yāti ākāśe samīramaḥ

original: ākāśaṃ caiva bhūtādirgrasate taṃ tathā mahān /
analyzed: ākāśam ca eva bhūtādiḥ grasate tam tathā mahān
mahāntam ebhiḥ sahitam prakṛtiḥ grasate dvija
guma sāmyam anudriktam anyūnam ca mahā mune
procyate prakatiḥ hetuḥ pradhānam kāraṇam param
iti eṣā prakṛtiḥ sarvā vyakta avyakta svarūpiṇī
vyakta svarūpam avyakte tasmāt maitreya līyate
ekaḥ śuddhaḥ akṣaraḥ nityaḥ sarva vyāpī tathā pumān
saḥ api aṃśaḥ sarva bhūtasya maitreya paramātmanaḥ
na saṃti yatra sarva īśe nāma jāti ādi kalpanāḥ
sattā mātra tmake jñeye jñāna ātmani ātmanaḥ pare

original: tadbrahma paramaṃ dhāma paramātmā sa ceśvaraḥ /
analyzed: tat brahma paramam dhāma paramātmā sa ca īśvaraḥ

original: sa viṣṇuḥsarvamevedaṃ yato nāvartate yatiḥ // ViP_6,4.38 //
analyzed: sa viṣṇuḥ sarvam eva idam yatas na āvartate yatiḥ
prakṛtiḥ yā mayā ākhyātā vyakta avyakta svarūpiṇī
puruṣaḥ ca api ubhau etau liyate paramātmani
paramātmā ca sarveṣām ādhāraḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: viṣṇunāmā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate // ViP_6,4.40 //
analyzed: viṣṇu nāmā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate

original: pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca dvividhaṅkarma vaidikam /
analyzed: pravṛttam ca nivṛttam ca dvividham karma vaidikam
tābhyām ubhābhyām puruṣaiḥ sarva mūrtiḥ saḥ ijyate
ṛk yajuḥ sāmabhiḥ mārgaiḥ pravṛtteḥ ijyate hi asau
jñāna ātmā jñāna yogena jñāna mūrtiḥ sa ca ijyate
nivṛtte yogibhiḥ mārge viṣṇuḥ mukti phala pradaḥ
hrasva dīrgha plutaiḥ yat tu kiñcid vastu abhidhīyate
yat ca vācām aviṣayam tat sarvam viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ
vyaktaḥ saḥ eva ca avyaktaḥ saḥ eva puruṣottamaḥ
paramātmā ca viśvātmā viśva rūpa dharaḥ hariḥ
vyakta avyakta ātmikā tasmin prakṛtiḥ saṃpralīyate
puruṣaḥ ca api maitreya vyāpini avyāhata ātmani

original: dviparārdhātmakaḥ kālaḥ kathito yo mayā tava /
analyzed: dvi parārdha ātmakaḥ kālaḥ kathitaḥ yaḥ mayā tava
tat ahar tasya maitreya viṣṇoḥ īśasya kathyate

original: vyakte ca prakṛtau līne prakṛtyāṃ puruṣe tathā /
analyzed: vyakte ca prakṛtau līne prakṛtyām puruṣe tathā

original: tatra sthite niśā cāsya tatpramāṇā mahāmune // ViP_6,4.48 //
analyzed: tatra sthite niśā ca asya tad pramāṇā mahā mune
na eva ahar tasya na niśā nityasya paramātmanaḥ
upacāraḥ tathā api eṣa tasya īśasya dvija ucyate

original: ityeṣa tava maitreya kathitaḥ prākṛto layaḥ /
analyzed: iti eṣa tava maitreya kathitaḥ prākṛtaḥ layaḥ
ātyantikam atho brahman nibodha pratisaṃcaram
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭha aṃśe caturthaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
ādhyātmika ādi maitreya jñātvā tāpa trayam budhaḥ
utpanna jñāna vairāgyam prāpnoti ātyantikam layam
ādhyātmikaḥ api dvividhaḥ śarīraḥ mānasaḥ tathā

original: śarīro bahubhir bhedair bhidyate śruyatāṃ ca saḥ // ViP_6,5.2 //
analyzed: śarīraḥ bahubhiḥ bhedaiḥ bhidyate ca saḥ
śiraḥ roga pratiśyāya jvara śūla bhagandaraiḥ
gulma arśaḥ śvayayu śvāsa chardi ādibhiḥ anekadhā
tathā akṣi roga atīsāra kuṣṭha aṅga āmaya saṃjñitaiḥ
bhidyate deha jaḥ tāpaḥ mānasam śrotum arhasi
kāma krodha bhaya dveṣa lobha moha viṣāda jaḥ
śoka asūyā avamāna īrṣyā mātsarya ādi mayaḥ tathā
mānasaḥ api dvijaśreṣṭha tāpaḥ bhavati nā ekadhā

original: ityevamādibhir bhedais tāpo hyādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ // ViP_6,5.6 //
analyzed: iti evamādibhiḥ bhedaiḥ tāpaḥ hi ādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ
mṛga pakṣi manuṣya ādyaiḥ piśāca uraga rākṣasaiḥ

original: sarīsṛpādyaiś ca nṛṇāṃ jāyate cādhibhautikaḥ // ViP_6,5.7 //
analyzed: sarīsṛpa ādyaiḥ ca nṛṇām jāyate ca ādhibhautikaḥ
tāpaḥ dvijavara śreṣṭhaiḥ kathyate ca ādhidaivikaḥ
garbha janma jarā jñāna mṛtyu nāraka jam tathā

original: duḥkhaṃ sahasraśo bhedair bhidyate munisattama // ViP_6,5.9 //
analyzed: duḥkham sahasraśas bhedaiḥ bhidyate muni sattama
su kumāra tanuḥ garbhe jantuḥ bahu mala āvṛte
ulva saṃveṣṭitaḥ bhugna pṛṣṭha grīvā asthi saṃhatiḥ
ati amla kaṭu tīkṣma uṣṇa lavaṇaiḥ mātṛ bhojanaiḥ
atyanta tāpaiḥ atyartham vardhamāna ativedanaḥ
prasāraṇa ākuñcana ādau na aṅgānām prabhuḥ ātmanaḥ
śakṛt mūtra mahā paṅka śāyī sarvatra pīḍitaḥ
nirucchvāsaḥ sa caitanyaḥ smaram janma śatāni atha
āste garbhe ati duḥkhena nija karma nibandhanaḥ
jāyamānaḥ purīṣa asṛj mūtra śukra āvila ānanaḥ
prājāpatyena vātena pīḍyamāna asthi bandhanaḥ
adhomukhaḥ vai kriyate prabalaiḥ sūtimārutaiḥ
kleśāt niṣkrāntim āpnoti jaṭharāt mātuḥ āturaḥ
murchām avāpya mahatīm saṃspṛṣṭaḥ bāhya vāyunā
vijñāna bhraṃśam āpnoti jātaḥ ca muni sattama

original: kaṇṭakair iva tunnāṅgaḥ krakacair iva dāritaḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭakaiḥ iva tunna aṅgaḥ krakacaiḥ iva dāritaḥ
pūti vraṇāt nipatitaḥ dharaṇyām krimikaḥ yathā
kaṇḍūyane api ca aśaktaḥ parivarte pi anīśvaraḥ
snāna pāna ādika āhāram api āpnoti para icchayā
aśuci prastare suptaḥ kīṭa draṃśa ādibhiḥ tathā
bhakṣyamāṇaḥ api na eva eṣām samarthaḥ vinivāraṇe
janma duḥkhāni anekāni ca

original: bālabhāve yadā pnoti hyādhibhautādikāni ca // ViP_6,5.20 //
analyzed: bāla bhāve yadā pnoti hi ādhibhauta ādikāni ca
ajñāna tamasā ācchannaḥ mūḍha antaḥkaraṇaḥ naraḥ

original: na jānāti kutaḥ kohaṃ kvāhaṃ gantā kimātmanaḥ // ViP_6,5.21 //
analyzed: na jānāti kutas kaḥ ham kva aham gantā kim ātmanaḥ
kenabandhena baddhaḥ uham kāraṇam kim akāraṇam

original: kiṃ kāryaṃ kimakāryaṃ vā kiṃ vācyaṃ kiṃ ca nocyate // ViP_6,5.22 //
analyzed: kim kāryam kim akāryam vā kim vācyam kim ca nā ucyate

original: ko dharmaḥ kaś ca vādharmaḥ kasminvarte 'tha vā katham /
analyzed: kaḥ dharmaḥ kaḥ ca vā adharmaḥ kasmin varte atha vā katham

original: kiṃ kartavyamakartavyaṃ kiṃ vā kiṅguṇadoṣavat // ViP_6,5.23 //
analyzed: kim kartavyam akartavyam kim vā kiṅguṇa doṣavat
evam paśu samaiḥ muḍhaiḥ ajñāna prabhavam mahat
avāpyate naraiḥ duḥkham śiśrodara parāyaṇaiḥ
ajñānam tāmasaḥ bhāvaḥ kārya āraṃbha pravṛttayaḥ
ajñāninām pravartante karma lopāḥ tatas dvija
narakam karmaṇām lopāt phalam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
tasmāt ajñāninām duḥkham iha ca amutra ca uttamam
jarā jarjara dehaḥ ca śithila avayavaḥ pumān
vicalat śīrṇa daśanaḥ vali snāyu sirā vṛtaḥ
dūra pranaṣṭa nayanaḥ vyoma antargata tārakaḥ
nāsā vivala niryāta loma puñjaḥ calat vapuḥ
prakaṭībhūta sarva asthiḥ nata pṛṣṭha asthi saṃhatiḥ
utsanna jaṭhara agni tvāt alpa āhāraḥ
kṛcchrāt caṅkramaṇa utthāna śayana āsana ceṣṭitaḥ
mandībhavat śrotra netraḥ sravat lālā āvila ānanaḥ
anāyattaiḥ samastaiḥ ca karaṇeḥ maraṇa unmukhaḥ
tad kṣaṇe pi anubhūtānām asmarta akhila vastunām
sakṛt uccārite vākye samudbhūta mahā śramaḥ
śvāsa kāśa samudbhūta mahā āyāsa prajāgaraḥ
anyena utthāpyate anyena tathā saṃveśyate jarī
bhṛtya ātma putra dārāṇām avāmān āspadī kṛtaḥ
prakṣīṇa akhila śaucaḥ ca vihāra āhāra sa spṛhaḥ
hāsyaḥ parijanasya api nirviṇṇa aśeṣa bāndhavaḥ
anubhūtam iva anyasmin janmani ātma viceṣṭitam
saṃsmaran yauvane dīrgham niśvasati abhitāpitaḥ
evamādīni duḥkhāni jarāyām anubūya vai

original: maraṇe yāni duḥkhāni prāpnoti śṛṇutānyapi // ViP_6,5.36 //
analyzed: maraṇe yāni duḥkhāni prāpnoti śṛṇutāni api
ślathat grīvā aṅghri haste atha vyāptaḥ vepathunā bhṛśam
muhur glāniḥ para vaśaḥ muhur jñāna lava anvitaḥ
hiraṇya dhānya tanaya bhāryā bhṛtya gṛha ādiṣu
ete katham bhaviṣyanti iti atīva mamatā ākulaḥ
marma bhidbhiḥ bhahā rogaiḥ krakacaiḥ iva dāruṇaiḥ
śaraiḥ iva antakasya ugraiḥ chadyamāna asu bandhanaḥ
parivartita tārā akṣaḥ hasta pādam muhur kṣipan
saṃśuṣyamāṇa tālu oṣṭha puṭaḥ ghuraghurāyate
niruddha kaṇṭhaḥ doṣa oghaiḥ udāna śvasa āpīḍitaḥ

original: tāpena mahatā vyāptastṛṣā cārtas tathā kṣudhā // ViP_6,5.41 //
analyzed: tāpena mahatā vyāptaḥ tṛṣā ca ārtaḥ tathā kṣudhā

original: tataś ca yātanādehaṃ kleśena pratipadyate // ViP_6,5.42 //
analyzed: tatas ca yātanā deham kleśena pratipadyate
etāni anyāni ca ugrāṇi duḥkhāni maraṇe nṛṇām

original: śṛṇuṣva narake yāni prāpyante puruṣair mṛtaiḥ // ViP_6,5.43 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva narake yāni prāpyante puruṣaiḥ mṛtaiḥ
yāmya kiṅkara pāśa ādi grahaṇam daṇḍa tāḍanam
yamasya darśanam ca ugram ugra mārga vilokanam
karaṃbha vālukā vahni yantra śastra asi bhīṣaṇe

original: pratyekaṃ narakeyāś ca yātanā dvija duḥsahāḥ // ViP_6,5.45 //
analyzed: pratyekam narakeyāḥ ca yātanāḥ dvija duḥsahāḥ
krakacaiḥ pāṭyamānānām mūṣāyām ca api dahyatām

original: kuṭhāraiḥ kṛtyamānānāṃ bhūmau cāpi nikhanyatām // ViP_6,5.46 //
analyzed: kuṭhāraiḥ kṛtyamānānām bhūmau ca api
śūleṣu āropyamāṇānam vyāghra vaktre praveśyatām
gṛdhraiḥ saṃbhakṣyamāṇānām dvīpibhiḥ ca upabhūjyatām
taila madhye ca klidyatām kṣāra kardame
uccān nipātyamānānām kṣipyatām kṣepa yantrakaiḥ
narake yāni duḥkhāni pāpa hetu udbhavāni vai

original: prāpyante nārakair vipra teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate // ViP_6,5.49 //
analyzed: prāpyante nārakaiḥ vipra teṣām saṃkhyā na vidyate
na kevalam dvijaśreṣṭha narake duḥkha paddhatiḥ
kṣayiṣṇoḥ nā asti nirvṛtiḥ

original: punaś ca garbhe bhavati jāyate ca punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: punar ca garbhe bhavati jāyate ca punar punar

original: garbhe vilīyate bhūyo jāyamāno 'stameti vai // ViP_6,5.51 //
analyzed: garbhe vilīyate bhūyas jāyamānaḥ astam eti vai
jāta mātraḥ ca mriyate bāla bhāve atha yauvane

original: madhyamaṃ vā vayaḥ prāpya vārdhake vātha vā mṛtiḥ // ViP_6,5.52 //
analyzed: madhyamam vā vayaḥ prāpya vārdhake vā atha vā mṛtiḥ
yāvat jīvati tāvat ca duḥkhaiḥ nānāvidhaiḥ plutaḥ

original: taṃ tu kāraṇapakṣmaughair āste kārpāsabījavat // ViP_6,5.53 //
analyzed: tam tu kāraṇa pakṣma oghaiḥ āste kārpāsa bīja vat

original: dravyanāśe tathotpattau pālane ca sadā nṛṇām /
analyzed: dravya nāśe tathā utpattau pālane ca sadā nṛṇām
bhavanti aneka duḥkhāni tathā evā iṣṭa vipattiṣu
yat yat prīti karam puṃsām vastu maitreya jāyate
tat eva duḥkha vṛkṣasya bīja tvam upagacchati
kalatra putra mitra artha gṛha kṣetra dhana ādikaiḥ

original: kriyate na tathā bhūri sukhaṃ puṃsāṃ yathā sukham // ViP_6,5.56 //
analyzed: kriyate na tathā bhūri sukham puṃsām yathā sukham
iti saṃsāra duḥkha arka tāpa tāpita cetasām
vimukti pādapa chāyā amṛte kutra sukham nṛṇām
tat asya duḥkha jātasya vai mama
garbha janma jarā ādyeṣu sthāneṣu prabhaviṣyataḥ
nirasta atiśaya āhlāda sukha bhāva eka lakṣaṇā
bheṣajam bhagavat prāptiḥ ekānta ātyantikī matā

original: tasmāt tatprāptaye yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ paṇḍitair naraiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tad prāptaye yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ paṇḍitaiḥ naraiḥ

original: tatprāptiheturjñānaṃ ca karma coktaṃ mahāmune // ViP_6,5.60 //
analyzed: tad prāpti hetuḥ jñānam ca karma ca uktam mahā mune

original: āgamotthaṃ vivekācca dvidhā jñānaṃ tad ucyate /
analyzed: āgama uttham vivekāt ca dvidhā jñānam tat ucyate
śabdabrahma āgama mayam param brahma viveka jam
andham tamaḥ iva ajñānam dīpa vat ca indriya udbhavam

original: yathā sūryas tathā jñānaṃ yadviprarṣe vivekajam // ViP_6,5.62 //
analyzed: yathā sūryaḥ tathā jñānam yat viprarṣe viveka jam
manuḥ api āha veda artham smṛtvā yat muni sattama
tat etat śrūyatām atra saṃbandhe gadataḥ mama

original: dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat /
analyzed: dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma param ca yat
śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ param brahma adhigacchati

original: dve vai vidye veditavye iti cātharvaṇī śrutiḥ /
analyzed: dve vai vidye veditavye iti ca ātharvaṇī śrutiḥ
parayā tu akṣara prāptiḥ ṛgveda ādi mayā aparā

original: yat tad avyaktam ajaram acintyam ajam avyayam /
analyzed: yat tat avyaktam ajaram acintyam ajam avyayam
anirdeśyam arūpam ca pāṇi pāda ādi asaṃyutam
vibhu sarva gatam nityam bhūta yoniḥ akāraṇam

original: vyāpya vyāptaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ yad vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ // ViP_6,5.67 //
analyzed: vyāpya vyāptam yatas sarvam yat vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ

original: tadbrahma tatparaṃ dhāma tad dhyeyaṃ mokṣakāṃkṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: tat brahma tat param dhāma tat dhyeyam mokṣa kāṃkṣibhiḥ

original: śrutivākyoditaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // ViP_6,5.68 //
analyzed: śruti vākya uditam sūkṣmam tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam
tat eva bhagavat vācyam svarūpam paramātmanaḥ
vācakaḥ bhagavat śabdaḥ tasya ādya sva akṣaya ātmanaḥ
evam tat tattvam tasya tattvataḥ
jñāyate yena tat jñānam param anyat trayī mayam
a śabda gocarasya api tasya vai brahmaṇaḥ dvija
pūjāyām bhagavat śabdaḥ kriyate hi upacārataḥ
śuddhe mahā vibhūti ākhye pare brahmaṇi śabdite
maitreya bhagavat śabdaḥ sarva kāraṇa kāraṇe
saṃbhartā iti tathā bhartā bhakāraḥ artha dvaya anvitaḥ

original: netā gamayatā sraṣṭā gakārārthas tathā mune // ViP_6,5.73 //
analyzed: netā gamayatā sraṣṭā gakāra arthaḥ tathā mune
aiśvaryasya samagrasya vīryasya yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ
jñāna vairāgyayoḥ ca eva ṣaṇṇām bhagaḥ iti īraṇā
vasaṃti tatra bhūtāni bhūtātmani akhilātmani
sa ca bhūteṣu aśeṣeṣu vakāra arthaḥ tatas avyayaḥ
evam eṣa mahān śabdaḥ maitreya bhagavān iti
parama brahma bhūtasya vāsudevasya na anya gaḥ
tatra pūjya padārtha ukti paribhāṣā samanvitaḥ

original: śabdo 'yaṃ nopacāreṇa tvanyatra hy upacārataḥ // ViP_6,5.77 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ ayam na upacāreṇa tu anyatra hi upacārataḥ
utpattim pralayam ca eva bhūtānām āgatim gatim

original: vetti vidyāmāvidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavāniti // ViP_6,5.78 //
analyzed: vetti vidyām āvidyām ca sa vācyaḥ bhagavān iti
jñāna śakti bala aiśvaya vīrya tejāṃsi aśeṣatas
bhagavat śabda vācyā ati vinā heyaiḥ guṇa ādibhiḥ
