original: bhūteṣu ca sa sarvātmā vāsudevastataḥ smṛtaḥ // ViP_6,5.80 //
analyzed: bhūteṣu ca sa sarva ātmā vāsudevaḥ tatas smṛtaḥ
khāṇḍikyajanakāya āha pṛṣṭaḥ keśidhvajaḥ purā
nābha vyākhyām anantasya vāsudevasya tattvataḥ

original: bhūteṣu vasate soṃ'tarvasaṃtyatra ca tāni yat /
analyzed: bhūteṣu vasate saḥ um atas vasaṃti atra ca tāni yat

original: dhātā vidhātā jagatāṃ vāsudevastataḥ prabhuḥ // ViP_6,5.82 //
analyzed: dhātā vidhātā jagatām vāsudevaḥ tatas prabhuḥ

original: sa sarvabhūtaprakṛtiṃ vikārānguṇādidośāṃś ca mune vyatītaḥ /
analyzed: sa sarva bhūta prakṛtim vikārān guṇa ādi dośān ca mune vyatītaḥ
atīta sarva āvaraṇa ukhila ātmā tena āstṛtam yat bhuvana antarāle
samasta kalyāṇa guṇa ātmakaḥ asau sva śakti leśa āvṛta bhūta vargaḥ
icchā gṛhīta abhimata uru dehaḥ saṃsādhita aśeṣa jagat vitaḥ yaḥ
tejaḥ bala aiśvarya mahā avabodha su vīrya śakti ādi guṇa eka rāśiḥ

original: paraḥ parāṇāṃ sakalā na yatra kleśādayaḥsaṃti parāvareśe // ViP_6,5.85 //
analyzed: paraḥ parāṇām sakalāḥ na yatra kleśa ādayaḥ saṃti parāvara īśe
saḥ īśvaraḥ vyaṣṭi samaṣṭi rūpaḥ vyakta svarūpaḥ
sarva īśvaraḥ sarva dṛś sarva vid ca samasta śaktiḥ parameśvara ākhyaḥ

original: saṃjñāyate yena tadastadoṣaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ nirmalamekarūpam /
analyzed: saṃjñāyate yena tat asta doṣam śuddham param nirmalam eka rūpam
saṃdṛśyate vā api avagamyate vā tat jñānam ajñānam atas nyat uktam
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭha aṃśe pañcamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
svādhyāya saṃyamābhyām sa dṛśyate puruṣottamaḥ

original: tatprāptikāraṇaṃ brahma tad etad iti paṭhyate // ViP_6,6.1 //
analyzed: tad prāpti kāraṇam brahma tat etat iti paṭhyate
svādhyāya adhyogam āsīta yogāt svādhyāyam āvaset
svādhyāya yoga saṃpattyā paramātmā prakāśate
tad īkṣaṇāya svādhyāyaḥ cakṣuḥ yogaḥ tathā param

original: na māṃ sa cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ brahmabhūtaḥsa śakyate // ViP_6,6.3 //
analyzed: na mām sa cakṣuṣā draṣṭum brahma bhūtaḥ sa śakyate
maitreyaḥ uvāca
bhagavan tam aham yogam jñātum icchāmi tam vada
jñāte yatra akhila ādhāram paśyeyam parameśvaram
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
yathā keśidhvajaḥ prāha khāṇḍikyāya mahātmane

original: najakāya purā yoga tamahaṃ kathayāmi te // ViP_6,6.5 //
analyzed: najakāya purā yoga tam aham kathayāmi te
maitreyaḥ uvāca
khāṇḍikya kaḥ abhavat brahman kaḥ vā keśidhvajaḥ kṛtī

original: kathaṃ tayoś ca saṃvādo yogasaṃbandhakāraṇāt // ViP_6,6.6 //
analyzed: katham tayoḥ ca saṃvādaḥ yoga saṃbandha kāraṇāt
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
dharmadhvajaḥ vai janakaḥ stasya putraḥ amitadhvajaḥ
kṛtadhvajaḥ ca nāmnā āsīt sadā adhyātma ratiḥ nṛpaḥ
kṛtadhvajasya putraḥ abhūt khyātaḥ keśidhvajaḥ nṛpaḥ
putraḥ umitadhvajasya api khāṇḍikyajanakaḥ abhavat
karma mārgeṇa khāṇḍikyaḥ pṛtivyām abhavat patiḥ
keśidhvajaḥ api atīva āsīt ātma vidyā viśāradaḥ
tau ubhau api ca evā āstām vijigīṣū parasparam
keśidhyajena khāṇḍikyaḥ sva rājyāt avaropitaḥ
purodhasā mantribhiḥ ca samavetaḥ alpa sādhanaḥ
rājyāt nirākṛtaḥ saḥ atha durga araṇya caraḥ abhavat
iyāha saḥ api su bahūni ajñān jñāna vyapāśrayaḥ
brahma vidyām adhiṣṭhāya tarttu mṛtyum avidyayā
ekadā varttamānasya yāgaḥ yoga vidām vara

original: gharmadhenuṃ jaghānograḥ śārdulo vijane vane // ViP_6,6.13 //
analyzed: gharmadhenum jaghāna ugraḥ śārdulaḥ vijane vane

original: tato rājā hatāṃ śrutvā dhanuṃ vyāghreṇa cartvijaḥ /
analyzed: tatas rājā hatām śrutvā dhanum vyāghreṇa ca ṛtvijaḥ

original: prāyaścitaṃ sa papraccha kimatreti vidhīyatām // ViP_6,6.14 //
analyzed: prāyaścitam sa papraccha kim atra iti vidhīyatām
te pi ūcuḥ na vayam vidma kaśeruḥ pṛcchatām iti
kaśeruḥ api tena uktaḥ tathā eva prāha bhārgavam

original: śunakaṃ pṛccha rājaindra nāhaṃ vedmi sa vetsyati /
analyzed: śunakam pṛccha rāja aindra na aham vedmi sa vetsyati

original: sa gatvā kamapṛcchacca so 'py āha śṛṇu yanmune // ViP_6,6.16 //
analyzed: sa gatvā kam apṛcchat ca saḥ api āha śṛṇu yat mune

original: na keśarurna caivāhaṃ na caikaḥsāṃprataṃ bhuvi /
analyzed: na keśaruḥ na ca eva aham na ca ekaḥ sāṃpratam bhuvi

original: vettyeka eva tvacchatruḥ khāṇḍikyo yo jitastvayā // ViP_6,6.17 //
analyzed: vetti ekaḥ eva tvad śatruḥ khāṇḍikyaḥ yaḥ jitaḥ tvayā

original: sa cāha taṃ vrajāmyeṣa praṣṭumātmarīpuṃ mune /
analyzed: sa ca āha tam vrajāmi eṣa praṣṭum ātmarīpum mune

original: prāpta eva mahāyajño yadi māṃ sa haniṣyati // ViP_6,6.18 //
analyzed: prāptaḥ eva mahā yajñaḥ yadi mām sa haniṣyati
prāyaścittam aśeṣeṇa sa ced pṛṣṭaḥ vadiṣyati
tatas ca avikalaḥ yogaḥ muni śreṣṭha bhaviṣyati
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti uktvā ratham āruhya kṛṣṇa ajina dharaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: vanaṃ jagāma yatrāste sa khāṇḍikyo mahāmatiḥ // ViP_6,6.20 //
analyzed: vanam jagāma yatra āste sa khāṇḍikyaḥ mahāmatiḥ
tam āpatantam ālokya khāṇḍikyaḥ ripum ātmanaḥ
provāca krodha tāmra akṣaḥ samāropita kārmukaḥ
khāṇḍikyaḥ uvāca
kṛṣṇa ajinam tvam kavacam ābadhya asmān haniṣyasi

original: kṛṣṇājinadhare vetsi na mayi prahariṣyati // ViP_6,6.22 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa ajina dhare vetsi na mayi prahariṣyati

original: mṛgāṇāṃ vada pṛṣṭheṣu mūḍha kṛṣṇājinaṃ na kim /
analyzed: mṛgāṇām vada pṛṣṭheṣu mūḍha kṛṣṇājinam na kim

original: yeṣāṃ mayā tvāya cogrāḥ prahitāḥ śitasāyakāḥ // ViP_6,6.23 //
analyzed: yeṣām mayā tvāya ca ugrāḥ prahitāḥ śita sāyakāḥ

original: sa tvāmahaṃ haniṣyāmi na me jīvanvimokṣyase /
analyzed: sa tvām aham haniṣyāmi na me jīvan vimokṣyase

original: ātatāyyasi durbuddhe mama rājyaharo ripuḥ // ViP_6,6.24 //
analyzed: ātatāyī asi durbuddhe mama rājya haraḥ ripuḥ
keśidhvajaḥ uvāca
khāṇḍikya saṃśayam praṣṭum bhavantam ahām āgataḥ

original: na tvāṃ hantuṃ vicāryaitatkopaṃ bāṇaṃ vimuñca vā // ViP_6,6.25 //
analyzed: na tvām hantum vicārya etat kopam bāṇam vimuñca vā
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
tatas sa mantribhiḥ sārdham ekānte sa purohitaḥ
mantrayāmāsa khāṇḍikyaḥ sarvaiḥ eva mahāmatiḥ
tam ūcuḥ matriṇaḥ vadhyaḥ ripuḥ eṣa vaśam gataḥ

original: hate 'smin pṛthivī sarvā tava vaśyā bhaviṣyati // ViP_6,6.27 //
analyzed: hate asmin pṛthivī sarvā tava vaśyā bhaviṣyati
khāṇḍikyaḥ ca āha tān sarvān evam etat na saṃśayaḥ

original: hatesminpṛtivī sarvā mama vaśyā bhaviṣyati // ViP_6,6.28 //
analyzed: hate ismin pṛtivī sarvā mama vaśyā bhaviṣyati
para loka jayaḥ tasya pṛthivī sakalā mama

original: na hanmi cellokajayo mama tasya vasuṃdharā // ViP_6,6.29 //
analyzed: na hanmi ced loka jayaḥ mama tasya vasuṃdharā
na aham manye loka jayāt adhikā syāt vasuṃdharā
para loka jayaḥ anantaḥ su alpa kālaḥ mahī jayaḥ

original: tasmānnainaṃ haniṣyāmi yatpṛcchati vadāmi tat // ViP_6,6.31 //
analyzed: tasmāt na enam haniṣyāmi yat pṛcchati vadāmi tat
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
tatas tam abyupetya āha khāṇḍikyajanakaḥ ripum

original: praṣṭavyaṃ yattvāya sarvaṃ tatpṛcchasva vadāmyaham // ViP_6,6.32 //
analyzed: praṣṭavyam yat tvāya sarvam tat pṛcchasva vadāmi aham
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
tatas sarvam yathāvṛttam gharmadhenu vadham dvija

original: kathāṃyatvā sa papraccha prāyaśtittaṃ hi tadgatam // ViP_6,6.33 //
analyzed: kathām yatvā sa papraccha prāyaśtittam hi tad gatam

original: sa cācaṣṭa yathānyāyaṃ dvija keśidhvajāya tat /
analyzed: sa ca ācaṣṭa yathānyāyam dvija keśidhvajāya tat
prāyaścittam aśeṣeṇa yat hai tatra vidhīyate

original: yāgabhūmim upāgamya cakre sarvāḥ kriyāḥ kramāt // ViP_6,6.35 //
analyzed: yāga bhūmim upāgamya cakre sarvāḥ kriyāḥ kramāt
krameṇa vidhivat yāgam nītvā saḥ avabhṛtha āplutaḥ
kṛtakṛtyaḥ tatas bhūtvā cintayāmāsa pārthivaḥ

original: pūjitāś ca dvijāḥsarve sadasyā mānitā mayā /
analyzed: pūjitāḥ ca dvijāḥ sarve sadasyāḥ mānitāḥ mayā

original: aniṣpannakriyaṃ cetastathāpi mama kiṃ yathā // ViP_6,6.38 //
analyzed: aniṣpanna kriyam cetaḥ tathā api mama kim yathā

original: khāṇḍikyāya na datteti mayā vai gurudakṣiṇā // ViP_6,6.39 //
analyzed: khāṇḍikyāya na dattā iti mayā vai guru dakṣiṇā

original: sa jagāma tadā bhūyo rathamāruhya pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: sa jagāma tadā bhūyas ratham āruhya pārthivaḥ

original: maitreya durgagahanaṃ khāṇḍikyo yatra saṃsthitaḥ // ViP_6,6.40 //
analyzed: maitreya durga gahanam khāṇḍikyaḥ yatra saṃsthitaḥ

original: tasthau hantuṃ kṛtamatistamāha sa punarnṛpaḥ // ViP_6,6.41 //
analyzed: tasthau hantum kṛta matiḥ tam āha sa punar nṛpaḥ

original: bho nāhaṃ te 'parādhāya prāptaḥ khāṇḍikya mā kruddhāḥ /
analyzed: bho na aham te aparādhāya prāptaḥ khāṇḍikya mā kruddhāḥ
guroḥ nikraya dānāya mām avehi tvam āgatam

original: so 'haṃ te dātumicchāmi vṛṇīṣva gurudakṣiṇām // ViP_6,6.43 //
analyzed: saḥ aham te dātum icchāmi vṛṇīṣva guru dakṣiṇām
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
bhūyasya mantribhiḥ sārdham mantrayāmāsa pārthivaḥ
guru niṣkraya kāmaḥ ayam kim mayā prārthyatām iti
tam ūcuḥ matriṇaḥ rājyam aśaṃṣam prārthyatām ayam
śatribhiḥ prārthyate rājya manāḥ yā asita sainikaiḥ
prahasya tān āha nṛpaḥ sa khāṇḍikyaḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: svalpakālaṃ mahīpālyaṃ mādṛśaiḥ prārthyate katham // ViP_6,6.46 //
analyzed: su alpa kālam mahīpālyam mādṛśaiḥ prārthyate katham

original: paramārthaḥ kathaṃ ko 'tra yūyaṃ nātra vicakṣaṇāḥ // ViP_6,6.47 //
analyzed: parama arthaḥ katham kaḥ atra yūyam na atra vicakṣaṇāḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: ityuktvā samupetyainaṃ sa tu keśidhvajaṃ nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktvā samupetya enam sa tu keśidhvajam nṛpaḥ

original: uvāca kimavaśyaṃ tvaṃ dadāsi gurudakṣiṇām // ViP_6,6.48 //
analyzed: uvāca kim avaśyam tvam dadāsi guru dakṣiṇām
bāḍham iti eva tena uktaḥ khāṇḍikyaḥ tam athā bravīt
bhavān adya ātma vijñāna parama artha vicakṣaṇaḥ
yadi ced dīyate mahyam bhavatā guru niṣkrayaḥ
tad kleśa praśamāya alam yat karma tat udīraya
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭha aṃśe ṣaṣṭhaḥ udhyāyaḥ
keśidhvajaḥ uvāca
na prārthitam tvayā kasmāt asmad rājyam akaṇṭakam
rājya lābhāt vinā na anyat kṣatriyāṇā mati priyam
khāṇḍikyaḥ uvāca

original: keśidhvaja nibodha tvaṃ mayā na prārthitaṃ yataḥ /
analyzed: keśidhvaja nibodha tvam mayā na prārthitam yatas
rājyam etat aśeṣam te yatra gṛdhnanti apaṇḍitāḥ
kṣatriyāṇām ayam dharmaḥ yat prajā paripālanam
vadhaḥ ca dharma yuddhena sva rājya paripanthinām
tatra aśaktasya me doṣaḥ na eva asti apahṛte tvayā
bandhāya eva bhavati eṣā hi avidyā api akrama ujjhitā
alpa upabhoga lipsā artham iyam rājya spṛhā mama

original: anyeṣāṃ doṣaja saiva dharmaṃ vai nānurudhyate // ViP_6,7.5 //
analyzed: anyeṣām doṣa ja sa eva dharmam vai na anurudhyate

original: ato na yācitaṃ rājyamavidyāntargataṃ tava // ViP_6,7.6 //
analyzed: atas na yācitam rājyam avidyā antargatam tava
rājye gṛdhnanti avidvāṃsaḥ mamatva āhṛta cetasaḥ
ahaṃmāna mahā pāna mada mattāḥ na mādṛśāḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
prahṛṣṭaḥ sādhu iti tatas prāha keśidhvajaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: khāṇḍikyajanakaṃ prītyā śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama // ViP_6,7.8 //
analyzed: khāṇḍikyajanakam prītyā śrūyatām vacanam mama
keśidhvajaḥ uvāca

original: ahaṃ hyavidyayā kṛtyuṃ tartukāmaḥ karomi vai /
analyzed: aham hi avidyayā kṛtyum tartu kāmaḥ karomi vai

original: rājyaṃ yāgāṃś ca vividhānyogaiḥ puṇyakṣayaṃ tathā // ViP_6,7.9 //
analyzed: rājyam yāgān ca vividhān yogaiḥ puṇya kṣayam tathā

original: tadidaṃ te mano diṣṭyā vivekaiśvaryatāṃ gatam /
analyzed: tat idam te manaḥ diṣṭyā viveka aiśvarya tām gatam
tat śrūyatām avidyāyāḥ svarūpam kula nandana
anātmani ātma buddhiḥ yā ca asve svam iti yā matiḥ
saṃsāra taru saṃbhūti bījam etat dvidhā sthitam
pañcabhūta ātmake dehe dehī moha tamaḥ vṛtaḥ
aham mama etat iti uccais kurute kumatiḥ matim
ākāśa vāyu agni jala pṛthivībhyaḥ pṛthak sthite

original: ātmanyātmamayaṃ bhāvaṃ kaḥ karoti kalevare // ViP_6,7.13 //
analyzed: ātmani ātma mayam bhāvam kaḥ karoti kalevare

original: adehe hyātmani prājñe mamedamiti manyate // ViP_6,7.14 //
analyzed: adehe hi ātmani prājñe mama idam iti manyate
ittham ca puttra pauttreṣu tad deha utpāditeṣu kaḥ
karoti paṇḍitaḥ svāmyam anātmani kalevare
sarvam deha upabhogāya kurute karma mānavaḥ

original: dehaścānyo yadā puṃsastadā bandhāya tatparam // ViP_6,7.16 //
analyzed: dehaḥ ca anyaḥ yadā puṃsaḥ tadā bandhāya tat param

original: mṛṇmayaṃ hi yathā gehaṃ lipyate vai mṛdaṃbhasā /
analyzed: mṛṇmayam hi yathā geham lipyate vai mṛd aṃbhasā
pārthivaḥ ayam tathā dehaḥ mṛd aṃbu ālepana sthitaḥ

original: āpyāyate yadi tataḥ puṃso bhogo 'tra kiṃ kṛtaḥ // ViP_6,7.18 //
analyzed: āpyāyate yadi tatas puṃsaḥ bhogaḥ atra kim kṛtaḥ
aneka janma sāhasrīm saṃsāra padavīm vrajan
moha śramam prayātaḥ asau vāsana remu kuṇṭhitaḥ
prakṣālyate yadā sā usya reṇu jñāna uṣṇa vāriṇā

original: tadā saṃsārapānthasya yāti mohaśramaḥ śamam // ViP_6,7.20 //
analyzed: tadā saṃsāra pānthasya yāti moha śramaḥ śamam
moha śrame śamam yāte svastha antaḥkaraṇaḥ pumān
ananya atiśaya ābādham param nirvāṇam ṛcchati
nirvāṇa mayaḥ eva ayam ātmā jñāna mayaḥ amalaḥ

original: duḥkhājñānamayā dharmāḥ prakṛtes te tu nātmanaḥ // ViP_6,7.22 //
analyzed: duḥkha ajñāna mayāḥ dharmāḥ prakṛteḥ te tu na ātmanaḥ
jalasya na agni saṃsarga sthālī saṃgāt tathā api hi
śabda udreka ādikān dharmān tat karoti yathā nṛpa
tathā ātmā prakṛteḥ saṃgāt ahaṃmāna ādi dūṣitaḥ

original: bhajate prākṛtān dharmān anyas tebhyo hi so 'vyayaḥ // ViP_6,7.24 //
analyzed: bhajate prākṛtān dharmān anyaḥ tebhyaḥ hi saḥ avyayaḥ
tat etat kathitam bījam avidyāyāḥ mayā tava

original: kleśānāṃ ca kṣayakaraṃ yogādanyanna vidyate // ViP_6,7.25 //
analyzed: kleśānām ca kṣaya karam yogāt anyat na vidyate
khāṇḍikyaḥ uvāca
tam bravīhi mahābhāga yogam yoga vid uttama
vijñāta yoga śāstra arthaḥ tvam asyām nimi saṃtatau
keśidhvajaḥ uvāca
yoga svarūpam khāṇḍikya śrūyatām gadataḥ mama

original: yatra sthito na cyavate prāpya brahmalayaṃ muniḥ // ViP_6,7.27 //
analyzed: yatra sthitaḥ na cyavate prāpya brahma layam muniḥ
manaḥ eva manuṣyāṇām kāraṇam bandha mokṣayoḥ

original: bandhāya viṣayāsaṃgi muktyai nirviṣayaṃ manaḥ // ViP_6,7.28 //
analyzed: bandhāya viṣaya āsaṃgi muktyai nirviṣayam manaḥ
viṣayebhyaḥ samāhṛtya vijñāna ātmā amanaḥ muniḥ
cintayet muktaye tena brahma bhūtam para īśvaram
ātma bhāvam nayati enam dhyāyinam munim
vikāryam ātmanaḥ śaktyā loham ākarṣakaḥ yathā
ātma prayatna sāpekṣā viśiṣṭā yā manaḥ gatiḥ

original: tasya brahmaṇi saṃyogo yoga ityabhidhīyate // ViP_6,7.31 //
analyzed: tasya brahmaṇi saṃyogaḥ yogaḥ iti abhidhīyate
evam atyanta vaiśiṣṭya yukta dharma upalakṣaṇaḥ

original: yasya yogaḥsa vai yogī mumukṣurabhidhīyate // ViP_6,7.32 //
analyzed: yasya yogaḥ sa vai yogī mumukṣuḥ abhidhīyate
yoga yuj prathamam yogī yuñjānaḥ hi abhidhīyate
viniṣpanna samādhiḥ tu param brahma upalabdhimān
yadi antarāya doṣeṇa dūṣyate ca asya mānasam

original: janmāntarair abhyasato muktiḥ purvasya jāyate // ViP_6,7.34 //
analyzed: janma antaraiḥ abhyasataḥ muktiḥ puru asya jāyate
viniṣpanna samādhiḥ tu muktim tatra eva janmani
prāpnoti yogī yoga agni dagdha karma cayaḥ acirāt
brahmacaryam ahiṃsām ca satya asteya a parigrahān

original: seveta yogī niṣkāmo yogyatāṃ svamano nayan // ViP_6,7.36 //
analyzed: seveta yogī niṣkāmaḥ yogyatām sva manaḥ nayan
svādhyāya śauca saṃtoṣa tapāṃsi niyata ātmavān
kurvīta brahmaṇi tathā parasmin pravaṇam manaḥ

original: ete yamāḥsaniyamāḥ pañca pañca ca kīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: ete yamāḥ saniyamāḥ pañca pañca ca kīrtitāḥ
viśiṣṭa phala dāḥ kāmyāḥ niṣkāmānām vimukti dāḥ
ekam bhadrāsana ādīnām samāsthāya guṇaiḥ yutaḥ

original: yamākhyair niyamākhyaiś ca yuñjīta niyato yatiḥ // ViP_6,7.39 //
analyzed: yama ākhyaiḥ niyama ākhyaiḥ ca yuñjīta niyataḥ yatiḥ
prāṇa ākhyam anilam vaśyam abhyāsāt kurute tu yat
prāṇāyāmaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sa bījaḥ abījaḥ eva ca
paraspareṇa abhibhavam prāṇa apānau yathā anilau
kurutaḥ sat vidhānena tṛtīyaḥ saṃyamāt tayoḥ
tasya ca ālaṃbanavataḥ sthūla rūpam dvijottama
ālaṃbanam anantasya yoginaḥ abhyasataḥ smṛtam
śabda ādiṣu anuraktāni nigṛhya akṣāṇi yoga vid
kuryāt citta anukārīṇi pratyāhāra parāyaṇaḥ
vaśya tā paramā tena jāyata iti cala ātmanām

original: indriyāṇāmavaśyais tair na yogī yogasādhakaḥ // ViP_6,7.44 //
analyzed: indriyāṇām avaśyaiḥ taiḥ na yogī yoga sādhakaḥ
prāṇa yāmena pavane pratyāhāreṇa ca indriye

original: vaśīkṛte tataḥ kuryātsthitaṃ cetaḥ śubhāśraye // ViP_6,7.45 //
analyzed: vaśīkṛte tatas kuryāt sthitam cetaḥ śubha āśraye
khāḍikyaḥ uvāca

original: kathyatāṃ me mahābhāgā cetaso yaḥ śubhāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: kathyatām me mahābhāgā cetasaḥ yaḥ śubha āśrayaḥ
yad ādhāram aśeṣam tat hanti doṣa mala udbhavam
keśidhvājaḥ uvāca
āśrayaḥ cetasaḥ brahma dvidhā

original: bhūpa mūrtamamūrtaṃ ca paraṃ cāparameva ca // ViP_6,7.47 //
analyzed: bhūpa mūrtam amūrtam ca param ca aparam eva ca
trividhāḥ bhāvanāḥ bhūpa viśvam etat nibodhatām

original: brahmākhyā karmasaṃjñā ca tathā caivobhayātmikā // ViP_6,7.48 //
analyzed: brahma ākhyā karma saṃjñā ca tathā ca eva ubhaya ātmikā
karma bhāva ātmikā hi ekā a brahma bhāva ātmikā parā
ubhaya ātmikā tathā evā anyā trividhā bhāva bhāvanā
sanandana ādayaḥ ye tu brahma bhāvanayā yutāḥ
karma bhāvanayā ca anye deva ādyāḥ sthāvara avarāḥ
hiraṇyagarbha ādiṣu ca brahma karma ātmikā dvidhā
bodha adhikāra yukteṣu vidyate bhāva bhāvanā
akṣīṇeṣu samasteṣu viśeṣa jñāna karmasu
viśvam etat param ca anyat bheda bhinna dṛśām nṛṇām
pratyasta mita bhedam yat sattā mātram agocaram
vacasām ātma saṃvedyam tat jñānam brahma saṃjñitam
tat ca viṣṇoḥ param rūpam arūpa ākhyam anuttamam
viśva svarūpa vairūpya lakṣaṇam paramātmanaḥ
na tat yoga yujā śakyam nṛpa cintayitum yatas
tatas sthūlam hareḥ rūpam cintayet viśva gocaram
hiraṇyagarbhaḥ bhagavān vāsudevaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: maruto vasavo rudrā bhāskarāstārakā grahāḥ // ViP_6,7.56 //
analyzed: marutaḥ vasavaḥ rudrāḥ bhāskarāḥ tārakāḥ grahāḥ
gandharva yakṣa daitya ādyaḥ sakalāḥ devayonayaḥ
manuṣyāḥ paśavaḥ śailāḥ samudrāḥ saritaḥ drumāḥ

original: bhūpa bhūtānyaśeṣāṇi bhūtānāṃ ye ca hetavaḥ /
analyzed: bhūpa bhūtāni aśeṣāṇi bhūtānām ye ca hetavaḥ
pradhāna ādi viśeṣa antam cetana acetana ātmakam
eka pādam dvi pādam ca bahu pādam apādakam
mūrtam etat hareḥ rūpam bhāvanā tritaya ātmakam
etat sarvam idam viśvam jagat etat carācaram
para brahma svarūpasya viṣṇoḥ śakti samanvitam
viṣṇu śaktiḥ parā proktā kṣetrajña ākhyā tathā aparā
avidyā karma saṃjñā anyā tṛtīyā śaktiḥ iṣyate
yayā kṣetrajña śaktiḥ sā veṣṭitā nṛpa sarva gā
saṃsāra tāpān akhilān avāproti ati saṃtatān
tayā tirohita tvāt ca śaktiḥ kṣetrajña saṃjñitā
sarva bhūteṣu bhūpāla tāratamyena lakṣyate
a prāṇa vat su su alpā sā sthāvareṣu tatas adhikā
sarīsṛpeṣu tebhyaḥ api hi atiśaktyā patattriṣu
pātat triṃbhyaḥ mṛgāḥ tebhyaḥ tad śaktyā paśavaḥ adhikāḥ
paśubhyaḥ manujāḥ ca ati śaktyā puṃsaḥ prabhāvitāḥ
tebhyaḥ api nāga gandharva yakṣa ādyāḥ devatāḥ nṛpa
śakraḥ samasta devebhyaḥ tatas ca ati prajāpatiḥ
hiraṇyagarbhaḥ api tatas puṃsaḥ śakti upalakṣitaḥ
etāni aśeṣa rūpāṇi tasya rūpāṇi pārthiva
yatas tad śakti yogena yuktāni nabhasā yathā
dvitīyam viṣṇu saṃjñasya yogi dhyeyam mahāmate

original: amūrtaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ yat sad ityu cyate budhaiḥ // ViP_6,7.69 //
analyzed: amūrtam brahmaṇaḥ rūpam yat sat iti u cyate budhaiḥ
samastāḥ śaktayaḥ ca etāḥ nṛpa yatra pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: tadviśvarūpavairūpyaṃ rūpam anyad dharer mahat // ViP_6,7.70 //
analyzed: tad viśva rūpa vairūpyam rūpam anyat hareḥ mahat
samasta śakti rūpāṇi tat karoti janeśvara
deva tiryak manuṣya ādi ceṣṭāvanti sva līlayā
jagatām upakārāya na sā karma nimitta jā
ceṣṭā tasya aprameyasya vyāpinī avyāhata ātmikā
tat rūpam viśva rūpasya tasya yoga yujā nṛpa
cintyam ātma viśuddhi artham sarva kilbiṣa nāśanam
yathā agniḥ uddhata śikhaḥ kakṣam dahati sa anilaḥ
tathā citta sthitaḥ viṣṇuḥ yoginām sarva kilbiṣam
tasmāt samasta śaktīnām ādhāre tatra cetasaḥ

original: kurvīta saṃsthitiṃ sā tu vijñeyā śuddhadhāraṇā // ViP_6,7.75 //
analyzed: kurvīta saṃsthitim sā tu vijñeyā śuddha dhāraṇā
śubha āśrayasya cittasya sarvagasya acala ātmanaḥ
tri bhāva bhāghana atītaḥ muktaye yoginaḥ nṛpa

original: anye tu puruṣavyāghra cetaso ye vyāpāśrayāḥ /
analyzed: anye tu puruṣa vyāghra cetasaḥ ye vyāpāśrayāḥ
aśuddhāḥ te samastāḥ tu deva ādyāḥ karma yonayaḥ
mūrtam bhagavataḥ rūpam sarva apāśraya nispṛham

original: eṣā vai dhāraṇa proktā yaccittaṃ tatra dhāryate // ViP_6,7.78 //
analyzed: eṣā vai dhāraṇa proktā yat cittam tatra dhāryate

original: yacca mūrtaṃ hare rūpaṃ yādṛkcintyaṃ narādhipa /
analyzed: yat ca mūrtam hareḥ rūpam yādṛś cintyam narādhipa
tat śrūyatām anādhārā dhāramā nā upapadyate
prasanna vadanam cāru padma patra upama īkṣaṇam
su kapolam su vistīrṇa lalāṭa phalaka ujjvalam
sama karṇa anta vinyasta cāru kuṇḍala bhūṣaṇam
kaṃbu grīvam su vīstīrṇa śrīvatsa aṃkita vakṣasam
vali tri bhaṅginā magna nābhinā hi udareṇa ca
pralaṃba aṣṭa bhujam viṣṇum athavā api caturbhujam
samasthita ūru jaṅgham ca susthita aṅghri vara aṃbujam
cintayet brahma bhūtam tam pīta nirmala vāsasam
kirīṭa hāra keyūra kaṭaka ādi vibhūṣitam
śārṅga śaṅkha gadā khaḍga cakra akṣa valaya anvitam
vara da abhaya hastam ca mudrikā ratna bhūṣitam
cintayet tad mayaḥ yogī samādhāya ātma mānasam
tāvat yāvat dṛḍhībhūtā tatra eva nṛpa dhāraṇā
vrajataḥ tiṣṭhataḥ nyat vā sva icchayā karma kurvataḥ

original: nāpayāti yadā cittatsiddhāṃ manyeta tāṃ tadā // ViP_6,7.87 //
analyzed: na apayāti yadā cit tad siddhām manyeta tām tadā
tatas śaṅkha gadā cakra śarṅgī di rahitam budhaḥ
cintayet bhagavat rūpam praśāntam sa akṣasūtrakam
sā yadā dhāraṇā tadvat avasthānavatī tatas
kiriṭa keyūra mukhaiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ rahitam smaret
tad eka avayavam devam cetasā hi punar budhaḥ
kuryāt tatas avayavini praṇidhāna paraḥ bhavet
tad rūpa pratyayā ca ekā saṃtatiḥ ca anya niḥspṛhā

original: taddhyānaṃ prathamair aṅgaiḥ ṣaḍbhir niṣpādyate nṛpa // ViP_6,7.91 //
analyzed: tat dhyānam prathamaiḥ aṅgaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ niṣpādyate nṛpa
tasya eva kalpanā hīnam sva rūpa grahaṇam hiyat
manasā dhyāna niṣpādyam samādhiḥ saḥ abhidhīyate

original: vijñānaṃ prāpakaṃ prāpye pare brahmaṇi pārthiva /
analyzed: vijñānam prāpakam prāpye pare brahmaṇi pārthiva
prāpaṇīyaḥ tathā eva ātmā prakṣīṇa aśeṣa bhāvanaḥ

original: kṣetrajñaḥ karaṇī jñānaṃ karaṇaṃ tasya tena tat /
analyzed: kṣetrajñaḥ karaṇī jñānam karaṇam tasya tena tat

original: niṣpādya muktikāryaṃ vai kṛtakṛtyaṃ nivartate // ViP_6,7.94 //
analyzed: niṣpādya mukti kāryam vai kṛtakṛtyam nivartate

original: bhavatyabhedī bhedaś ca tasyājñānakṛto bhavet // ViP_6,7.95 //
analyzed: bhavati abhedī bhedaḥ ca tasya ajñāna kṛtaḥ bhavet
vibheda janake jñāne nāśam ātyantikam gate

original: ātmano brahmaṇo bhedama saṃtaṃ kaḥ karīṣyati // ViP_6,7.96 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ brahmaṇaḥ bhedam saṃtam kaḥ karīṣyati
iti uktaḥ te mayā yogaḥ khāṇḍikya paripṛcchataḥ
saṃkṣepa vistarābhyām tu kim anyat kriyatām tava
khāṇḍikyaḥ uvāca
kathite yoga sadbhāve sarvam eva kṛtam mama
tava upadeśena aśeṣaḥ naṣṭaḥ citta malaḥ yatas
mama iti yat mayā ca uktam asat etat na ca anyathā
naredra gaditum śakyam api vijñeya vedibhiḥ
aham mama iti avidyā iyam vyavahāraḥ tathā anayoḥ

original: paramārthastvasaṃlāpo gocare vacasāṃ na yaḥ // ViP_6,7.100 //
analyzed: parama arthaḥ tu a saṃlāpaḥ gocare vacasām na yaḥ
tat gaccha śreyase sarvam mama etat bhavatā kṛtam
yad vimukti pradaḥ yogaḥ proktaḥ keśidhvaja avyayaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: yathārhaṃ pūjayā tena khāṇḍikyena sa pūjitaḥ /
analyzed: yathārham pūjayā tena khāṇḍikyena sa pūjitaḥ

original: ājagāma puraṃ brahmaṃstataḥ keśidhvajo nṛpaḥ // ViP_6,7.102 //
analyzed: ājagāma puram brahman tatas keśidhvajaḥ nṛpaḥ
khāṇḍikyaḥ api sutam kṛtvā rājānam yoga siddaye
vanam jagāma govinde viniveśita mānasaḥ
tatra ekānta matiḥ bhūtvā yama ādi guṇa saṃyutaḥ

original: viṣṇvākhye nirmale brahmaṇy avāpa nṛpatir layam // ViP_6,7.104 //
analyzed: viṣṇu ākhye nirmale brahmaṇi avāpa nṛpatiḥ layam
bubhuje viṣayān karma cakre ca anabhisaṃhitam
akalyāṇa upabhogaiḥ ca kṣīṇa pāpaḥ amalaḥ tathā
avāpa siddhim atyantām tāpa kṣaya phalām dvija
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭha aṃśe saptamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
iti eṣa kathitaḥ samyak tṛtīyaḥ pratisaṃcaraḥ

original: ātyantiko vimuktiryā layo brahmaṇi śāśvate // ViP_6,8.1 //
analyzed: ātyantikaḥ vimuktiḥ yā layaḥ brahmaṇi śāśvate

original: sargaś ca pratisargaś ca vaṃśamanvantarāṇi ca /
analyzed: sargaḥ ca pratisargaḥ ca vaṃśa manvantarāṇi ca

original: vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva bhavato gaditaṃ mayā // ViP_6,8.2 //
analyzed: vaṃśānucaritam ca eva bhavataḥ gaditam mayā
purāmam baiṣṇavam ca etat sarva kilbiṣa nāśanam
viśiṣṭam sarva śāstrebhyaḥ puruṣa artha upapādakam
tubhyam yathāvat maitreya proktam śuśruṣave avyayam

original: yadanyadapi vaktavyaṃ tṛtpṛcchādya vadāmi te // ViP_6,8.4 //
analyzed: yat anyat api vaktavyam tṛd pṛccha adya vadāmi te
maitreyaḥ uvāca
bhagavan kathitam sarvam yat pṛṣṭaḥ asi mayā mune

original: śrutaṃ caitanmayā bhaktyā nānyatpraṣṭavyamasti me // ViP_6,8.5 //
analyzed: śrutam ca etat mayā bhaktyā na anyat praṣṭavyam asti me
vicchinnāḥ sarva saṃdehāḥ vaimalyam manasaḥ kṛtam
tvad prasādāt mayā jñātāḥ utpatti sthiti saṃkṣayāḥ

original: jñātaś ca trividho rāśiḥ śaktiś ca trividhā guro /
analyzed: jñātaḥ ca trividhaḥ rāśiḥ śaktiḥ ca trividhā guro

original: vijñātā sā ca kārtsnyena trividhā bhāvabhāvanā // ViP_6,8.7 //
analyzed: vijñātā sā ca kārtsnyena trividhā bhāva bhāvanā
tvad prasādāt mayā jñātam jñeyam anyaiḥ alam dvija
yat etat akhilam viṣṇoḥ jagat na vyatiricyate
kṛtārthaḥ aham asaṃdehaḥ tvad prasādāt mahā mune
varṇa dharma ādayaḥ dharmāḥ viditāḥ yat aśeṣatas

original: pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca jñānaṃ karmamayākhilam /
analyzed: pravṛttam ca nivṛttam ca jñānam karma maya akhilam
prasīda vipra pravara na anyat praṣṭavyam asti me
yat asya kathana āyāsaiḥ yaḥ arjitaḥ asi mayā guro

original: tatkṣamyatāṃ viśeṣosti na satāṃ putraśiṣyayoḥ // ViP_6,8.11 //
analyzed: tat kṣamyatām viśeṣaḥ usti na satām putra śiṣyayoḥ
śrī parāśaraḥ uvāca
etat te yat mayā ākhyātam purāṇam veda saṃmatam
śrute asmin sarva doṣa utthaḥ pāpa rāśiḥ praṇaśyati

original: sargaś ca pratisargaś ca vaṃśamanvantarāmi ca /
analyzed: sargaḥ ca pratisargaḥ ca vaṃśa manvantarāmi ca

original: vaṃśānucaritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ mayātra tava kīrtitam // ViP_6,8.13 //
analyzed: vaṃśānucaritam kṛtsnam mayā atra tava kīrtitam
atra devāḥ tathā daityāḥ gandharva uraga rākṣasāḥ
yakṣa vidyādharāḥ siddhāḥ kathyante apsarasaḥ tathā
munayaḥ bhāvitātmānaḥ kathyante tapasā anvitāḥ
cāturvaṇyam tathā puṃsā viśiṣṭa caritāni ca

original: puṇyāḥ pradeśā medinyāḥ puṇyā nadyo 'tha sāgarāḥ /
analyzed: puṇyāḥ pradeśāḥ medinyāḥ puṇyāḥ nadyaḥ atha sāgarāḥ

original: parvatāś ca mahāpuṇyāścaritāni ca dhīmatām // ViP_6,8.16 //
analyzed: parvatāḥ ca mahā puṇyāḥ caritāni ca dhīmatām
varṇa dharma ādayaḥ dharmāḥ veda śāstrāṇi kṛtsnaśas
yeṣām saṃsmara mātsadyas sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
utpatti sthiti nāśānām hetuḥ yaḥ jagataḥ avyayaḥ
sa sarva bhūtaḥ sarva ātmā kathyate bhagavān hariḥ
avaśena api yad nāmni kīrtite sarva pātakaiḥ
pumān vimanacye sadyas siṃha trastaiḥ mṛgaiḥ iva
yad nāma kīrtanam bhaktyā vilāyanam anuttamam
dhātūnām iva pāvakaḥ
kali kalmaṣam ati ugram naraka ārtti pradam nṛṇām

original: prayāti vilayaṃ sadyaḥsakṛdyatra ca saṃsmṛte // ViP_6,8.21 //
analyzed: prayāti vilayam sadyas sakṛt yatra ca saṃsmṛte
hiraṇyagarbha deva indra rudra āditya aśvi vāyubhiḥ

original: pāvakair vasubhiḥ sādhyair viśvedevādibhiḥ suraiḥ // ViP_6,8.22 //
analyzed: pāvakaiḥ vasubhiḥ sādhyaiḥ viśvedeva ādibhiḥ suraiḥ
yakṣa rakṣa uragaiḥ siddhaiḥ daitya gandharva dānavaiḥ

original: apsarobhis tathā tārānakṣatraiḥ sakalair grahaiḥ // ViP_6,8.23 //
analyzed: apsarobhiḥ tathā tārā nakṣatraiḥ sakalaiḥ grahaiḥ
saptarṣibhiḥ tathā dhiṣṇyaiḥ dhiṣṇya adhipatibhiḥ tathā

original: brahmaṇādyair manuṣyaiś ca tathaiva paśubhir mṛgaiḥ // ViP_6,8.24 //
analyzed: brahmaṇā ādyaiḥ manuṣyaiḥ ca tathā eva paśubhiḥ mṛgaiḥ
sarīsṛpaiḥ vihaṅgaiḥ ca palāśa ādyaiḥ mahīruhaiḥ
vana agni sāgara sarit pātālaiḥ sa sura agnibhiḥ
śabda ādibhiḥ ca sahitam brahmāṇḍam akhilam dvija
meroḥ iva aṇuḥ yasya etat yad mayam ca dvijottama
sa sarvaḥ sarva vid sarva svarūpaḥ rūpa varjitaḥ
bhagavān kīrtitaḥ viṣṇuḥ atra pāpa praṇāśanaḥ
yat aśvamedha avabhṛthe snātaḥ prāpnoti vai phalam
mānavaḥ tat avāpnoti śrutvā etat muni sattama
prayāge kurukṣetre tathā ar'ṇave
kṛta upavāsaḥ prāpnoti tat asya śravaṇāt naraḥ
yat agnihotre su hute varṣeṇa āpnoti mānavaḥ
mahā puṇya phalam vipra tat asya śravaṇāt sakṛt
yat jyeṣṭha sukla dvādaśyām snātvā vai yamunā jale

original: mathurāyāṃ hariṃ dṛṣṭvā prāpnoti puruṣaḥ phalam // ViP_6,8.31 //
analyzed: mathurāyām harim dṛṣṭvā prāpnoti puruṣaḥ phalam
tat āpnoti akhilam samyak adhyāyam yaḥ śṛṇoti vai
purāṇasya asya vipra ṛṣa keśava arpita mānasaḥ
yamunā salila snātaḥ puruṣaḥ muni sattama

original: jyeṣṭhāmūle site pakṣe dvādaśyāṃ samupoṣitaḥ // ViP_6,8.33 //
analyzed: jyeṣṭhāmūle site pakṣe dvādaśyām samupoṣitaḥ
samabhyarcya acyutam samyak mathurāyām
aśvamedhasya yajñasya prāpnoti avikalam phalam
ālokya ṛdhim atha anyeṣām unnītānām sva vaṃśa jaiḥ
etat kila ūcuḥ api eṣām pitaraḥ sa pitāmahāḥ
kaccit asmad kule jātaḥ kālindī salila āplutaḥ
artayiṣyati govindam mathurāyām upoṣitaḥ
jyoṣṭhāmūle site pakṣe kena evam vayam api uta
parām ṛddhim avāpsyāmaḥ tāritāḥ sva kula udbhavaiḥ
jyeṣṭhāmūle site pakṣe samabhyarcya janārdanam
dhanyānām kula jaḥ piṇḍān yamunāyām pradāsyati
tasmin kāle samabhyarcya tatra kṛṣṇam samāhitaḥ

original: dattvā piṇḍaṃ pitṛbhyaś ca yamunāsalilāplutaḥ // ViP_6,8.39 //
analyzed: dattvā piṇḍam pitṛbhyaḥ ca yamunā salila āplutaḥ
yat āpnoti naraḥ puṇyam tārayan sva pitāmahān
śrutvā adhyāyam tat āpnoti purāṇasya asya śaktitaḥ
etat saṃsāra bhīrūṇām paritrāṇam anuttamam
śrāvyāṇām paramam śrāvyam pavitrāṇām anuttamam
maṅgalam maṅgalānām ca putra saṃpad pradāyakam
idam ārṣam purā prāha ṛbhave kamalodbhavaḥ

original: ṛbhuḥ priyavratāyāha sa ca bhāguraye 'bavīt // ViP_6,8.43 //
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ priyavratāya āha sa ca bhāguraye abavīt
bhāguri staṃbha mitrāya dadhīcāya sa ca uktavān
sārasvatāya tena uktam bhṛguḥ sārasvatena ca
bhṛguṇā purukutsāya narmadāyai sa ca uktavān
narmadā dhṛtarāṣṭrāya nāgāya āpūraṇāya ca

original: tābhyāṃ ca nāgarājāya proktaṃ vāsukaye dvija /
analyzed: tābhyām ca nāga rājāya proktam vāsukaye dvija

original: vāsukiḥ prāha vatsāya vatsaścāśvatarāya vai // ViP_6,8.46 //
analyzed: vāsukiḥ prāha vatsāya vatsaḥ ca aśvatarāya vai

original: kaṃbalāya ca tenoktamelāputrāya tena vai // ViP_6,8.47 //
analyzed: kaṃbalāya ca tena uktam elā putrāya tena vai
pātālam samanuprāptaḥ tatas vedaśirāḥ muniḥ

original: prāptavānetadakhilaṃ sa ca pramataye dadau // ViP_6,8.48 //
analyzed: prāptavān etat akhilam sa ca pramataye dadau
dattam pramatinā ca etat jātukarṇāya dhīmate
jātukarṇena ca evā uktam anyeṣām puṇya karmaṇām
pulastya vara dānena mama api etat smṛtim gatam

original: mayāpi tūbhyaṃ maitreya yathāvatkathitaṃ tbidam // ViP_6,8.50 //
analyzed: mayā api tu ubhyam maitreya yathāvat kathitam tbidam
tvam api etat śinīkāya kaleḥ ante vadiṣyasi
iti etat paramam guhyam kali kalmaṣa nāśanam

original: yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // ViP_6,8.52 //
analyzed: yaḥ śṛṇoti naraḥ bhaktyā sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
kṛtā tena bhavet etat yaḥ śṛṇoti dina idite
kapilā dāna janitam pumyam atyanta durlabham
śrutvā etasya daśa adhyāyān avāpnoti na saṃśayaḥ

original: yastvetatsakalaṃ śṛṇotipuruṣaḥ kṛtvā manasyacyutaṃ sarvaṃ sarvamayaṃ samastajagatāmādhāramātmāśrayam /
analyzed: yaḥ tu etat sakalam śṛṇoti puruṣaḥ kṛtvā manasi acyutam sarvam sarva mayam samasta jagatām ādhāram ātma āśrayam

original: jñānajñeyamanādimantarahitaṃ sarvāmarāṇāṃ hitaṃ sa prāpnoti na saṃśayostyavikalaṃ yadvājimedhe phalam // ViP_6,8.55 //
analyzed: jñāna jñeyam anādim anta rahitam sarva amarāṇām hitam sa prāpnoti na saṃśayaḥ asti avikalam yat vājimedhe phalam

original: yatrādau bhagavāṃścarācaragururmadhye tathānte ca sa brahmajñānamayo 'cyuto 'khilajaganmadhyāntasargaprabhuḥ /
analyzed: yatra ādau bhagavān carācara guruḥ madhye tathā ante ca sa brahma jñāna mayaḥ acyutaḥ akhila jagat madhya anta sarga prabhuḥ

original: tatasarvaṃ puruṣaḥ pavitramamalaṃ śṛṇvanpaṭhanvācayanprāpnotyasti na tatphalaṃ tribhuvaneṣvekāntasiddhirhariḥ // ViP_6,8.56 //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ pavitram amalam śṛṇvan paṭhan vācayan prāpnoti asti na tat phalam tribhuvaneṣu ekānta siddhiḥ hariḥ

original: yasminnyastamanirna yāti narakaṃ svargo 'pi yaccintane vighno yatra niveśitātmamanaso brāhmo 'pi loko 'lpakaḥ /
analyzed: yasmin nyasta maniḥ na yāti narakam svargaḥ api yat cintane vighnaḥ yatra niveśita ātma manasaḥ brāhmaḥ api lokaḥ alpakaḥ

original: muktiṃ cetasi yaḥsthito maladhiyāṃ puṃsāṃ dadātyavyayaḥ kiṃ citraṃ yadaghaṃ prayāti vilayaṃ tatrācyute kīrtite // ViP_6,8.57 //
analyzed: muktim cetasi yaḥ sthitaḥ mala dhiyām puṃsām dadāti avyayaḥ kim citram yat agham prayāti vilayam tatra acyute kīrtite

original: yajñair yajñavido yajanti satataṃ yajñeśvaraṃ karmiṇo yaṃ vai brahmamayaṃ parāvaramayaṃ dhyāyanti ca jñāninaḥ /
analyzed: yajñaiḥ yajña vidaḥ yajanti satatam yajñeśvaram karmiṇaḥ yam vai brahma mayam parāvara mayam dhyāyanti ca jñāninaḥ

original: yaṃ saṃcitya na jāyate na mriyate no vardhate hīyate naivāsanna ca sadbhavatyati tataḥ kiṃ vā hareḥ śrūyatām // ViP_6,8.58 //
analyzed: yam saṃcitya na jāyate na mriyate no vardhate hīyate na eva asat na ca sat bhavati ati tatas kim vā hareḥ śrūyatām

original: kavyaṃ yaḥ putṛrūpadhṛgvidhihutaṃ havyaṃ ca bhuktaṃ vibhurdevatve bhagavānanādinidhanaḥsāvahāsvadhāsaṃjñite /
analyzed: kavyam yaḥ putṛ rūpa dhṛk vidhi hutam havyam ca bhuktam vibhuḥ deva tve bhagavān an ādi nidhanaḥ sa avahā svadhā saṃjñite

original: yasminbrahmaṇi sarvaśaktinilaye mānāni no mānināṃ viṣṭhāyai prabhavanti hanti kaluṣaṃ śrotraṃ sa yāto hariḥ // ViP_6,8.59 //
analyzed: yasmin brahmaṇi sarva śakti nilaye mānāni no māninām viṣṭhāyai prabhavanti hanti kaluṣam śrotram sa yātaḥ hariḥ

original: nāntosti yasya na ca yasya samudbhavo 'sti vṛddhirna yasya pariṇāmavivarjitasya /
analyzed: na antaḥ asti yasya na ca yasya samudbhavaḥ asti vṛddhiḥ na yasya pariṇāma vivarjitasya

original: nāpakṣayaṃ ca samupaityavikāri vastu yastaṃ natosmi puruṣotmamīśamīḍyam // ViP_6,8.60 //
analyzed: na apakṣayam ca samupaiti avikāri vastu yaḥ tam nataḥ asmi puruṣotmam īśam īḍyam

original: tasyaiva yonu gumabhugbahudhaika eva suddhopyaśuddha iva bhāti hi mūrtibhedaiḥ /
analyzed: tasya eva guma bhuj bahudhā ekaḥ eva suddhaḥ api aśuddhaḥ iva bhāti hi mūrti bhedaiḥ

original: jñānānvitaḥsakalasattvavibhūtikartā tasmai namostu puruṣāya sadāvyayāya // ViP_6,8.61 //
analyzed: jñāna anvitaḥ sakala sattva vibhūti kartā tasmai namaḥ astu puruṣāya sadā avyayāya
jñāna pravṛtti niyama aikya mayāya puṃsaḥ bhoga pradāna paṭave triguṇa ātmakāya

original: avyākṛtāya bhavabāvanakāraṇāya vande svarūpabhavanāya sadājarāya // ViP_6,8.62 //
analyzed: avyākṛtāya bhava bāvana kāraṇāya vande sva rūpa bhavanāya sadā ajarāya
vyoma anila agni jala bhū racanā mayāya śabda ādi bhogya viṣaya upanaya kṣamāya

original: puṃsaḥsamastakaraṇair upakārakāya vyaktāya sūkṣmabṛhadātmavate natosmi // ViP_6,8.63 //
analyzed: puṃsaḥ samasta karaṇaiḥ upakārakāya vyaktāya sūkṣma bṛhat ātmavate nataḥ asmi

original: iti vividhamajasya yasya rūpaṃ prakṛtiparātmamayaṃ sanātanasya /
analyzed: iti vividham ajasya yasya rūpam prakṛti para ātma mayam sanātanasya
pradiśatu bhagavān aśeṣa puṃsām hariḥ apa janma jarā ādikām siddhim
iti śrī viṣṇu mahāpurāṇe ṣaṣṭha aṃśe aṣṭamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
samāptaḥ ayam ṣaṣṭha aṃśaḥ
iti śrī viṣṇu mahā purāṇam samāptam
